analyzed: kintu agni ādau sati dhūma ādeḥ bhāvāt asati ca abhāvāt tad āyatta svabhāvaḥ dhūma ādiḥ iti vidite tad avinābhāva siddhi ati
tad kāryasya tam antareṇa ātmalābha abhāvāt
tat atra agnau darśanam itaratra adarśanam tad utpattau hetu
tatas
tādātmye tam vinā bhavataḥ tādātmya anupapatte
nanu evaṃvidha anvaya virahiṇaḥ rūpa rasa ādayaḥ numīyeran
na ca khalu tasya rūpam ātmā
na ca kāraṇam iti katham
śrūyatām yathā siddhi ati
rasāt eva hi sva hetau agnau iva dhūmāt anumīyamāne sama sāmagrīka indhana vikāra vat rūpa avagatiḥ iti
yathā āhu
eka sāmagrī adhīnasya rūpa ādeḥ rasataḥ
hetu dharma anumānena dhūma indhana vikāra vat
iti
nanu yukta indhana vikāre tasya dhūmasya ca eka agni kāraṇā tvāt
na tu rūpa rasau eka kāraṇakau

original: kāraṇarasā hi kārye rasamārambhantekāraṇarūpāṇi ca kārye rūpam /
analyzed: kāraṇa rasāḥ hi kārye rasam ārambhante kāraṇa rūpāṇi ca kārye rūpam
tat kutas samāna kāraṇa tā
na eka kāraṇatayā eka sāmagrī adhīna tvam
kintu rasāt rasa hetuḥ anumīyamāna pravṛtti rūpa janana śkati rūpa upādānakāraṇa sahakṛtaḥ numīyate

original: tathāvidhasyaiva kāraṇatvāt pravṛttiśaktinā ca kāraṇena rūpaṃ janyata iti rūpasiddhi' /
analyzed: tathāvidhasya eva kāraṇa tvāt pravṛtti śaktinā ca kāraṇena rūpam janyate iti

original: tadidamanupapannam yat tāvat kāryaṃ kāraṇena vinā na bhavatīti tatastajjñānamuktam /
analyzed: tat idam anupapannam yat tāvat kāryam kāraṇena vinā na bhavati iti tatas tat jñānam uktam
tat ayuktam

original: kathaṃ hi kāraṇena vinā kāryameva na bhavati ityetadevāvaseyam /
analyzed: katham hi kāraṇena vinā kāryam eva na bhavati iti etat eva avaseyam

original: tadvinā bhavato nityaṃ sattvasattvaṃ vā syāt /
analyzed: tat vinā bhavataḥ nityam sattva sattvam vā syāt
tatas ca kārya tā eva hīyeta
uktam hi taiḥ
nityam sattvam asattvam hetoḥ anya anapekṣaṇāt
apekṣātaḥ hi bhāvānām kādācitka tva sambhava
iti
apekṣāt kādācitkatvam anapekṣam tu sat asat vā syāt
gagana śaśaviṣāṇa vat iti ced

original: yadyevamanyo 'yaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvāt svabhāvaniyama' yadanapekṣaṃ tannityaṃ sadasadvā bhavatīti /
analyzed: yadi evam anyaḥ yam kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt svabhāva niyama yat anapekṣam tat nityam sat asat vā bhavati iti
yat ca rasāt rūpa avagatiḥ eka sāmagrī adhīna tvāt iti uktam
tat api uktam
yadi api pravṛtti śakti rūpa upādānakāraṇa sahakṛtaḥ rasa hetuḥ avagata sva kāryāt
rūpam tu kutas avagamyate
pravṛtti sāmarthyāt kāraṇāt iti ced

original: nanu nādo rūpasya kāryaṃ nātmeti kathaṃ tadagame hetu' /
analyzed: nanu nādaḥ rūpasya kāryam na ātmā iti katham tad agame
pravṛtti śakte kāraṇasya kārya avyabhicāra diti ced na
tarhi kārya tad ātmanoḥ eva avinābhāva kāraṇe bhāvāt bhavet
bhavatu iti ced na
agneḥ api dhūma anumāna prasaṅgāt
astu iti ced
atantram tarhi kārya tvam anumāne syāt matam
na pravṛtti sāmarthyāt kāraṇāt rūpa anumānam

original: api tarhi rūpavadrūpakāraṇasahakāriṇā rasakāraṇena raso janyate /
analyzed: api tarhi rūpavat rūpa kāraṇa sahakāriṇā rasa kāraṇena rasaḥ janyate
sahakāri kāraṇam api sa viśeṣaṇam kāraṇam eva iti rasāt itaretara anugṛhītam
kāraṇa cakram anumāsyate iti
tat na
kārya kāraṇayoḥ ayaugapadyāt rūpa kāraṇasya
pāriśeṣyāt dūṣyāt
rūpam eva sahakāri iti vācyam
tatra ca vṛthā tad kāraṇa anumāna pariśrama
rūpam sahakāri iti api
na a nirṇīta rūpa rasa avinābhāvaḥ nubhavitum utsahate

original: prāgeva tu tannirṇaye vṛthā rūpataddhetvo' sahakāritvakalpanā /
analyzed: prāk eva tu tad nirṇaye vṛthā rūpa tad hetvoḥ sahakāri tva kalpanā
sambandhaḥ vyāptiḥ iṣṭā atra liṅga dharmasya liṅginā
api ca anubhava viruddham eva idam
na khalu rasam upalabhya tad hetu anumāna mukhena rūpa avagatiḥ laukikānām

original: api tarhi rūparasayo' sāhityaniyamāt sahasaiva rasād rūpamanumīyate /
analyzed: api tarhi rūpa rasayoḥ sāhitya niyamāt sahasā eva rasāt rūpam anumīyate

original: api ca kāryakāraṇabhūtayoreva bahulamanumānavyavahāro dṛśyate ityanādṛtyaṃ kāryatvamavyabhacāre /
analyzed: api ca kārya kāraṇa bhūtayoḥ eva bahulam anumāna vyavahāraḥ dṛśyate iti an ādṛtyam kārya tvam avyabhacāre
tādātmyam api meya abhāva prasaṅgāt heyam eva

original: kiṃ hi vṛkṣātmani śiṃśapātve vidite meyamavaśiṣyate /
analyzed: kim hi vṛkṣa ātmani śiṃśapā tve vidite meyam avaśiṣyate
nirbhāgam vastu
bhāga avagrahāṇām deśa ādi bhede pi a bādhitānām samyak tvāt

vṛkṣa vyavahāraḥ numīyate iti ced katham anātma vyavahāra śiṃśapā tvāt anumīyate
tādātmye vṛkṣa vat ananumāna prasaṅgāt
vyavahāra yogya tāyām api evam eva iti yat kiñcid etat

original: evameva vaiśiṣikādisamayasiddhā api kāryakāraṇabhāvādaya' sambandhaprakārā' prayuktā veditavyā' /
analyzed: evam eva vaiśiṣika ādi samaya siddhāḥ api sambandha prakārā prayuktā veditavyā
te pi hi aniyata ananumāna utpatti kāraṇam
astu tarhi niyamaḥ vā anumāna aṅgam na
pramāṇa abhāvāt anavagate
na tāvat āpāta jam pratyakṣam asya avadhāraṇa kṣamam

original: īkṣate khalvayaṃ visphāritākṣa' sahasā mahānase dhūmamagninā sahitam /
analyzed: īkṣate khalu ayam visphārita akṣa sahasā mahānase dhūmam agninā sahitam
na tu jānāti niyataḥ yam anena iti
duradhigamaḥ hi sarva bhāvānām svabhāva niyama
na tam unnetum utsahante jhaṭiti mahāntaḥ pi
na hi nirvikalpaka agocare vikalpa pramāṇam
tad pura sara tvāt tasya
syāt etat
deśa ādi bhedeṣu avyabhicārāt svabhāva niyamaḥ vadhāryate iti
kena avadhāryate sarva darśanānām anvaya mātre vyāpārāt
atha pūrva pūrva jñāna janita bhāvanā sacivam antimam anena ayam niyataḥ iti bhavati ālocanā jñānam
tatas vikalpā pravartiṣyante iti
na etat evam
indriya vyāpāra sāpekṣam hi pratyakṣam
na ca sahabhāva darśanāt anyatra
na ca bahis viṣaya vedane tad nirapekṣam anta karaṇam pravartate

original: api ca nirūpitarūpā api bhāvā deśādibhedeṣvanyathābhavanto 'nūbhūyanta iti na svabhāvaniyamaṃ pratyāśrayitumucitaṃ prāmāṇikānām /
analyzed: api ca nirūpita rūpāḥ api bhāvāḥ deśa ādi bhedeṣu anyathā bhavantaḥ nūbhūyante iti na svabhāva niyamam pratyāśrayitum ucitam prāmāṇikānām
tat āhuḥ
deśa kāla ādi rūpāṇām bhedāt bhinnāsu śaktiṣu
bhāvānām anumānena prasiddhiḥ ati durlabhā

original: vyāpyasya gamakatvaṃ ca vyāpakaṃ gamyamiṣyate // Msv_5,4.4 //

original: yo yasya deśakālābhyāṃ samonyūno 'pi vā bhavet /

vā
tena vyāpye gṛhīta irthe vyāpakaḥ tasya gṛhyate

original: na hyanyathā bhavatyeṣā vyāpyavyāpakatā tayo' // Msv_5,4.6 //
analyzed: na hi anyathā bhavati eṣā vyāpya vyāpaka tā
iti tasmāt vaktavyaḥ numāna aṅga bhūta sambandha
atas āha sambandhā eti
vyāptiḥ hi sāhitya niyamam apadiśati

sambandha śabdaḥ uparitana samabhivyāhārāt atra anumāna lakṣaṇa granthe
viśeṣa paraḥ bhavati
upari ca asya avadhāraṇe pramāṇam vakṣyate

original: yadi jñātasambandhasyānumānaṃ sa tarhi sambandho sambanadhe dvyāśraya ityubhayānu māne liṅgaṃ syādata āha-vyāpyeti //4//
analyzed: yadi jñāta sambandhasya anumānam sa tarhi sambandhaḥ dvi āśrayaḥ iti ubhaya anu māne liṅgam syāt atas āha vyāpya iti
atra kāraṇam āha yaḥ yasya iti dvayena
sa sama nyūna deśa kālaḥ hi vyāpyaḥ bhavati
tāvat yatra ubhayoḥ api dharmayoḥ vyāpya vyāpaka tvam
yathā parastāt udāhariṣyate
uttaraḥ tu yathā dhūma ādi
sa hi prāyeṇa agni deśa kāla vartī bhavati
sakala tadīya deśa kāla avyāpte
vyāpakaḥ tu
atra api pūrva uktaḥ eva pūrva
uttaraḥ tu yathā agniḥ eva dhūmasya

original: sa hi tasya deśakālau tāvad vyāpnotyeva /
analyzed: sa hi tasya deśa kālau tāvat vyāpnoti eva
asati api dhūme bhavan deśa kālābhyām adhikaḥ pi abhidhīyate

original: tena kāraṇena vyāpya eva gṛhīte vyāpakasya grahaṇaṃ bhavati yadasau taṃ vināpi na bhavatyeva /
analyzed: tena kāraṇena vyāpye eva gṛhīte vyāpakasya grahaṇam bhavati yat asau tam vinā api na bhavati eva

original: yena taṃ vināpi bhavastaṃ na gamayet /

original: vyāpyatvād gamikā gāvo vyāpikā na viṣāṇitā // Msv_5,4.8 //

uktam atra laukika lakṣaṇa anuvādena aparīkṣā pratipādana artham idam bhāṣyam

original: loke ca vyāpyaikadeśadarśina eva vyāpakajñānamanumānamiti siddham /

original: nahyanyatheti cāpakṛṣya pūrveṇa yojayitvā teneti tadupajīvanena vyākhyeyamiti //6//
analyzed: na hi anyathā iti ca apakṛṣya pūrveṇa yojayitvā tena iti tad upajīvanena vyākhyeyam iti

anitya tvāt iva kṛtaka tvasya

original: ato vyāpakaṃ gamyaṃ vyāpyaṃ gamakamityavyāpakamata āha-vyāpakatveti /

ayayam abhiprāya

mitau anumāne

original: tatrāpi vyāpyataiva syādaṅgaṃ na vyāpitā mite' // Msv_5,4.9 //

original: deśe yāvati kāle vā vyāpatā prāṅanirūpitā // Msv_5,4.10 //

original: evamasaṅkare gamyakagamakavivekād yatrāpi vyāptisaṅkaro bhavati tatrāpi vyāpyatvameva gamakatve kāraṇamiti niṣkṛṣyata ityāha- teneti //9//

original: kasya punariyaṃ saṃyogina' samavāyina' sambandhisambandhino vā /

rasāt rūpa anumānam na syāt

api ca vyāptiḥ iti anvayaḥ abhidhīyate

katham

original: no khalvasya sahasāgnadhūmāvagniśaraṇe vilokayamānasyāgninā vyāpto dhūma iti matirāvirasti /

original: na tāvat pūrvaṃ vyāpteravadhāraṇe samartham apratisandhānāt /

na ca tad anapekṣam uttaram ātmānam labhate

idam api na caturaśram

original: pratyakṣe ca vyāptipramāṇe kathamataphalebhya' puṃviśeṣeṣu vaidikakarmānumānam /

na ca ānumānikī

upamānam api pramāṇa antara prasiddha vastu sādṛśya mātra viṣayam na satām pramiṇoti
arthāpattiḥ api anyathā anupapadyamāna artha viṣayā darśana prabhavā

original: na ca sahitāvadhāritayorasatyāṃ vyāptau kiñcidanupapannaṃ nāma//

evam agninā dhūmaḥ iti aparokṣa niścayaḥ jāyate

original: tanna tāvad dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ nāpi śrutamiti nāśaṅkāmadhirohati /

indriya viṣayāḥ jātimantaḥ ca

evam aprayojakasya asādhaka tvam uktam upasaṃharati tasmāt iti

original: ayamartha'--- ya eva niṣiddhatvādirartho yasyādharmatvade' sādhanaśaktiyuktatvenāvagata' /

original: asmin satyamunā bhavitavyamitīdṛśyā śaktyāvadhāryata iti yāvat /

niyamya śaktiḥ eva hi sādhana śaktiḥ iti ākhyāyate
niyata avagataḥ hi niyāmakam gamayitum
na anyaḥ iti sa

original: niyamya eva gamako na prasaṅgānvito hiṃsātvādi' /

original: niṣiddhatvenānvetumabhipravṛttenādharmatvena prasaṅgāddhi hiṃsātvamapyanvitamiti prasaṅgānvitaṃ hiṃsātvaṃ nādharmatvasya gamakaṃ bhavatīti
analyzed: niṣiddha tvena anvetum abhipravṛttena adharma tvena prasaṅgāt hi hiṃsā tvam api anvitam iti prasaṅga anvitam hiṃsā tvam na adharma tvasya gamakam bhavati iti

artha ākṣepe kāraṇam āha apara arthā eti

original: kiyati punaranumānasya vyāpāra iti bhavati saṃśaya' /

bhavati hi viśiṣṭa artha pratītau api viśeṣaṇa mātra paryavasāyi pramāṇam

numeya tvam

original: asatyapi sāmānye kenacidekenopādhinānantānāmapi bhāvānāṃ sambandho gṛhyata eva /

original: evameva dharmimātrānumāne svatantrobhayānumāne vā siddhasādhyatā darśayitavyetyāha--- tatheti //28//
analyzed: evam eva dharmi mātra anumāne svatantra ubhaya anumāne vā siddha sādhya tā darśayitavyā iti āha tathā iti
dharma dharmi ubhayeṣu eva anumeyeṣu yathāsaṅkhyam dūṣaṇa antarāṇi āha eka deśasya iti
anitya tva ādayaḥ dharmāḥ kṛtaka tva ādayaḥ nahi
dhvaninā anugamaḥ na eṣām na ubhayasya ubhaya ini vā
sambandhaḥ u pi anupādānāt nāmnā ṣaṣṭhī api vā mitau
na ca api anugamaḥ tena liṅgasya iha nidarśyate
etat eva vivṛṇoti anitya tva ādayā iti

original: na cānityatvākhyasya dharmasya svatantrapakṣīkṛtasya kṛtakatvaṃ dharma iti kathamapakṣadharmo liṅgaṃ bhaviṣyati /

original: evaṃ dhvanimātre 'pi svatantre kṛtakatvaṃ tatra tatra dhvaniriti niyama' sambhavati /

nahi bhavati darśanam

original: bhavati tu yo yo dhūmavān sa so 'gnimāniti deśa eva nidarśanaṃ,
analyzed: bhavati tu yaḥ yaḥ dhūmavān sa saḥ gnimān iti deśaḥ eva nidarśanam

iha iti mitim pratyavamṛśati

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati-- na sādhanavākye sambandha' sādhyatayopādīyate nāpi dṛṣṭāntatayā dirdiśyate na cāyathāpratibhāsaṃ parīkṣakāṇāṃ vaktumucitamiti
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati na sādhana vākye sambandha sādhya tayā upādīyate nā api dṛṣṭānta tayā dirdiśyate na ca ayathā pratibhāsam parīkṣakāṇām vaktum ucitam iti

original: api cāyaṃ sambandha' sādhyamāna' sanmātratayā vā sādhyate,
analyzed: api ca ayam sambandha sādhyamāna sat mātra tayā vā sādhyate

yena anumānasya viṣayaḥ bhavet

original: kananvasati sambandhe viśiṣṭa eva sādhayituṃ na śakyate /

original: na(nu) satyamasati sambandhe viśiṣṭo na bhavati,
analyzed: nanu satyam asati sambandhe viśiṣṭaḥ na bhavati

original: viśiṣṭasādhyatvānyathānupapattyaiva tvarthagṛhītā matubarthasya sambandhasya sādhyatā na puna' svatantrasyeti /
analyzed: viśiṣṭa sādhya tva anyathā anupapattyā eva tu artha gṛhītā matup arthasya sambandhasya sādhyatā na puna svatantrasya iti
atra eva dṛṣṭāntam āha yathā iti
daṇḍi ādi śabdāḥ hi daṇḍa ādi viśiṣṭam evā abhidadhānā sambandham api arthāt upādadate
na tu abhidadhati
tadvat iha api parvataḥ gnimān iti sādhyamāna īrtha gṛhītaḥ gni sambandha
na punar saḥ eva sādhyate

original: yathā daṇḍyādiśabdato viśiṣṭārthapratītau satyāṃ sambandho nāntarīyako bhavati,
analyzed: yathā daṇḍi ādi śabdataḥ viśiṣṭa artha pratītau satyām sambandhaḥ nāntarīyakaḥ bhavati
evam atra api viśiṣṭe sādhyamāne bhavati iti artha
idam tu cintanīyam
katham daṇḍi ādi śabdāḥ viśiṣṭa vacanāḥ iti
matvarthīya pratyaya antāḥ hite
sa ca asya asmin asti iti sambandhe smaryate
sambandhaḥ eva atra pratyaya artha
sa ca pradhāna

original: 'prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārthaṃ saha brūta' prādhānyena' iti smṛte' /
analyzed: prakṛti pratyayau pratyaya artham saha brūta prādhānyena iti smṛte
idam hi bhedena eva ubhaya rabhidhāne prādhānya pratipādana artham vacanam

original: ata' sambandhavacanā eva daṇḍyādiśabdā iti yuktam /
analyzed: atas sambandha vacanāḥ eva daṇḍi ādi śabdāḥ iti yuktam

original: api ca 'nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇā viśeṣye buddhirutpadyata' iti viśiṣṭābhidhitsāyāmavaśyambhāvi
analyzed: api ca na agṛhīta viśeṣaṇā viśeṣye buddhiḥ utpadyate iti viśiṣṭa abhidhitsāyām avaśyambhāvi

original: prathamataraṃ viśeṣaṇābhidhānamāpatati tata eva viśiṣṭāvagāhasiddherna tadyāvacchabdasyābhidhānaśaktirupakalpayituṃ śakyate /

atas eva ākṛti viśiṣṭa vyakti abhidhānam ākṛti adhikaraṇe nirākariṣyate

katham ca tābhyām taddhita vṛttau sambandhaḥ abhidhīyate
yadi taddhita abhidheyaḥ na syāt
abhidheya niṣkarṣe hi tayoḥ smaraṇam
yasya guṇasya hi bhāvāt dravye śabda niveśe
tad abhidhāne tva talau iti
tat yadi daṇḍa puruṣa sambandhaḥ daṇḍi śabdasya abhidheya

original: tathā sati tanniṣkarṣe daṇḍitvaṃ daṇḍiteti tvataloranuśāsanamupapadyate /

original: yathā citraguriti citrābhirgobhirviśiṣṭo devadattādireva vṛttau pradhānatayāvagamyate /

original: vigrahe tu citrā gāvo yasyeti gavāmeva

vede pi rathantara sāmā somaḥ iti
tat yadi api smṛti kāreṇa

original: syeti vigrahe sambandha' pradhānatayā ṣaṣṭhyā nirdiṣṭa',
analyzed: sya iti vigrahe sambandha pradhānatayā ṣaṣṭhyā nirdiṣṭa
tathā api gomat ādi taddhita vṛttau tadvān eva pradhānam bhavati
tathā pratīte

original: gomacchabdo hi puruṣapradhāno bhāsate na sambandhapradhāna' /
analyzed: gomat śabdaḥ hi puruṣa pradhānaḥ bhāsate na sambandha pradhāna
pāṇineḥ api sambandha abhidhāna dvāreṇa viśiṣṭa vācyatā eva pratipādayitum abhimatā
vṛttau vigṛhyamāṇāyām avarjanīyaḥ eva ṣaṣṭhī prayogaḥ

original: tāvatā ca tadartha' pradhānatayā vācyatvena nirdiṣṭa iti bhrāntirupajāyate /
analyzed: tāvatā ca tad artha pradhāna tayā vācya tvena nirdiṣṭaḥ iti bhrāntiḥ upajāyate

original: ato na tāvat smṛtyanusāreṇa sambandhasya vācyatā /
analyzed: atas na tāvat smṛti anusāreṇa sambandhasya vācya tā
yat tu prathamataram viśeṣaṇam abhidheyam iti
satyam
na tu iha sambandhaḥ viśeṣaṇam
daṇḍaḥ hi daṇḍinaḥ viśeṣaṇam na
sambandha
sa ca prakṛtyā prathamam abhihitaḥ eva
atas eva na aneka abhidhāna śakti kalpanā doṣa

original: nirbhāgaśabdeṣu hi gavādiṣu viśiṣṭapratītāvapi viśeṣaṇamātramabhidhīyata iti yuktam /
analyzed: nirbhāga śabdeṣu hi gavā ādiṣu viśiṣṭa pratītau api viśeṣaṇa mātram abhidhīyate iti yuktam
tatra hi ekasya eva ubhaya abhidhāna śakti kalpanā doṣaḥ bhavati
daṇḍi ādi śabdāḥ tu
teṣu bhinnābhyām prakṛti pratyayābhyām bhinnau viśeṣaṇa
viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya tvam āpannau
gamyau aṅga aṅgi bhāvaḥ tu kaiścid iṣṭaḥ
sarvathā dharmiṇaḥ dharmaḥ dharmeṇa tu avagamyate
viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya tve na viśeṣaḥ vadhāryate
viśeṣyau abhidhīyate iti kim anupapannam
prakṛti abhihita prathamatara avagata daṇḍa viśiṣṭa puruṣaḥ daṇḍi śabdena abhidhīyate

original: nanvasati sambandhe daṇḍoviśeṣṭumeva naraṃ na śaknoti /
analyzed: nanu asati sambandhe daṇḍaḥ viśeṣṭum eva naram na śaknoti
satyam
na tu etāvatā sambandhaḥ vācyaḥ bhavati

original: na hi pṛthivyāmanavasthitā gāvo na tadvantaṃ viśiṣantīti pṛthivyapyabhidhīyata iti yuktamabhidhātum /
analyzed: na hi pṛthivyām anavasthitāḥ gāvaḥ na tadvantam viśiṣanti iti pṛthivī api abhidhīyate iti yuktam abhidhātum
yatas eva tu asati sambandhe viśiṣṭa avagatiḥ anapapannā
atas eva sambandhaḥ u pi arthāt antar bhāvyate
na tu abhidhīyate
yat tu sambandha abhidhāne tva taloḥ anuśāsanam asati sambandha vācya tve nu papannam iti
tat ayuktam
na hi abhidheya niṣkarṣe gomat ādiṣu bhāva pratyaya anuśāsanam

original: api tarhi abhidheyaniṣkarṣe hi 'yasya guṇasya hi bhāvādi'ti tvabhidheyāniṣkarṣārthameva smaraṇam /
analyzed: api tarhi abhidheya niṣkarṣe hi yasya guṇasya hi bhāvāt iti tu abhidheya a niṣkarṣa artham eva smaraṇam
itarathā tu anena eva gatārtha tvāt kṛt taddhita samāseṣu atyavacanīyam āpadyeta

original: ata' prāk pratīte ekanimittasambandhiviśiṣṭe 'parasmin sambandhinyabhihiter'thagṛhīta' sambandho nābhidheyapakṣe nikṣipyate /
analyzed: prāk pratīte eka nimitta sambandhi viśiṣṭe parasmin sambandhini abhihita īrtha gṛhīta sambandhaḥ na abhidheya pakṣe nikṣipyate
sarva yaugikānām api ca eṣā eva diś darśayitavyā
āha ca
sarvatra yaugikaiḥ śabdaiḥ dravyam eva abhidhīyate
na hi sambandha vācya tvam sambhavati ati gauravāt
iti
atas numeya antara asambhavāt viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhūtau dharma dharmiṇau eva anumāna samadhigamyau iti
upasaṃharati viśeṣaṇa iti gamyau ityantena
sa ca ayam aṅga aṅgi bhāva kaiścid
evam hi manyante

original: sarvathā hi dharmamātre dharmaṇi vā svatantre pramīyamāṇe siddhasādhyatādidoṣo bhavati kana viśiṣṭapramāyām /
analyzed: sarvathā hi dharma mātre dharmaṇi vā svatantre pramīyamāṇe siddha sādhya tā ādi doṣaḥ bhavati viśiṣṭa pramāyām

original: viśiṣṭatā tu kadācit kasyacid yathābhiprāyaṃ bhavatu nāma,
analyzed: viśiṣṭa tā tu kadācid kasyacid yathā abhiprāyam bhavatu nāma
na kiñcid duṣyati

original: sarvathā tāvat dharmiṇa eva parvatāderagnyādidharmastaddharmeṇaiva dhūmādināvagantavya' /
analyzed: sarvathā tāvat dharmiṇaḥ eva parvata ādeḥ agni ādi dharmaḥ tad dharmeṇa eva dhūma ādinā avagantavya
sa tu dharmaḥ viśeṣaṇa bhūtaḥ viśeṣya bhūtaḥ
atra uttaram vadanti anye yadi dharmī viśeṣaṇam
hetu dharmeṇa sambandhaḥ tasya aprādhānyataḥ sphuṭa
pradhāna tvāt hi dharmeṇa sambandhaḥ vākyataḥ bhavet

original: tatrāsambhavata' paścāt kalpyo 'sau dharmiṇā saha // Msv_5,4.37 //
analyzed: paścāt kalpyaḥ sau dharmiṇā saha
vā avagantavyaḥ iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ
ubhayathā api svatantra anumāna abhāvāt iti āha aṅga iti avadhāryate ntena
atra dūṣaṇam āha atra iti

original: ayamabhiprāya'--- laukikāni hi pramāṇāni lakṣaṇakārairapi yathālokamevānugantavyāni /
analyzed: ayam abhiprāya laukikāni hi pramāṇāni lakṣaṇa kāraiḥ api yathālokam eva anugantavyāni
na tu viparītam
na hi agni parvata viśiṣṭaḥ iti lokaḥ budhyate
api tu parvataḥ gnimān iti

original: tathā svayamanumānena pratipannimarthaṃ tenaiva paraṃ pratipādayanto laukikā dharmaṇā viśiṣṭameva hetuṃ prayuñjānā dṛśyante,
analyzed: tathā svayam anumānena pratipannim artham tena eva param pratipādayantaḥ laukikāḥ dharmaṇā viśiṣṭam eva hetum prayuñjānāḥ dṛśyante
yathā agni anumāni eva dhūmavat tvāt agnimān iti
tat ca idam agnau deśena viśiṣṭe numīyamāne na upapadyate

original: viśeṣaṇatayā hi parvataviśiṣṭo 'gniriti dharmiṇyupātte dhūmavattvāditi hetudharmeṇa tasya sambandho na sphuṭaṃ prakāśate /
analyzed: viśeṣaṇa tayā hi parvata viśiṣṭaḥ gniḥ iti dharmiṇi upātte dhūmavat tvāt iti hetu dharmeṇa tasya sambandhaḥ na sphuṭam prakāśate
dharma dharmi tayā avagatasya hetu tvam
na ca guṇa bhāva upāttaḥ dharmī hetu dharma sambandham arhati
guṇānām paraspara a sambanadhāt
atas smāt parārtha hetu prayoga viśeṣāt eva laukikānām īdṛśī pratipattiḥ unnīyate

original: yat svayamapi dharmaviśiṣṭameva dharmiṇaṃ budhyate na viparītamiti // 36 //
analyzed: yat svayam api dharma viśiṣṭam eva dharmiṇam budhyate na viparītam iti

original: yadi tarhi dharmiṇo hetudharmeṇa sambandho na sphuṭa' kena tarhi prasajyata ityata āha--pradhānatvaditi /
analyzed: yadi tarhi dharmiṇaḥ hetu dharmeṇa sambandhaḥ na sphuṭa kena tarhi prasajyate iti atas āha pradhāna tvat iti

original: dhvaniviśiṣṭamanityatvaṃ kṛtakatvādityucyamāne 'nityatvākhyena dharmeṇaiva sādhyatayā pradhānabhūtena kṛtakatvādihetu' sambadhyeta na dhvaninā  #
analyzed: dhvani viśiṣṭam anitya tvam kṛtaka tvāt iti ucyamāne nitya tva ākhyena dharmeṇa eva sādhyatayā pradhāna bhūtena kṛtaka tva ādi hetu sambadhyeta na dhvaninā
guṇa bhūtena
sarvasya hi eka vākya gatasya pradhāna anvayaḥ eva
pradhāna sambandhe ca hetoḥ apakṣa dharma tvam
nahi kṛtaka tvam
dhvaneḥ iti athavā vācyam anavayasya tu darśane

original: bhedopāttasya dharmasya guṇabhāvo na duṣyati // Msv_5,4.38 //
analyzed: bheda upāttasya dharmasya guṇa bhāvaḥ na duṣyati
nitya tvasya
kim tarhi dhvane
atas dharmī eva dharma viśiṣṭa svayam pramātṛbhiḥ avagamyate
tathā eva parasmai pratipādyate iti yuktam iti
yadi tu ucyate

original: satyaṃ pradhānatayā dharmeṇa heto' sambandho vākyādavagamyate,
analyzed: satyam pradhāna tayā dharmeṇa sambandhaḥ vākyāt avagamyate

original: liṅgabalīyastvena tu vākyaṃ bādhitvā dharmiṇaiva sambandha' kalpayiṣyate /
analyzed: liṅga balīyaḥ tvena tu vākyam bādhitvā dharmiṇā eva sambandha kalpayiṣyate

original: hetudharmasya hi dharmiṇaiva sambandhayogyatā na dharmeṇa,
analyzed: hetu dharmasya hi dharmiṇā eva sambandha yogya tā na dharmeṇa

original: ato dharmasambandhābhāvād dharmiṇaiva sambandho bhaviṣyatītyata āha--- tatreti /
analyzed: atas dharma sambandha abhāvāt dharmiṇā eva sambandhaḥ bhaviṣyati iti atas āha tatra iti
ayam abhiprāya satyam evam dharmaṇā sambandha sidhyati
kim tu ayam eva kleśaḥ yat vākya sva rasa bhaṅgaḥ nāma
atas eva āha kalpyaḥ sau iti
anyathā pratipannasya anyathā kalpanā eva doṣaḥ iti
dhvane kṛtaka tvāt iti vā punar dharmi upādānena hetuḥ viśeṣaṇīya

original: na caivaṃ prayoktāra' prayuñjānā dṛśyanta ityabhiprāyeṇāha---dhvaneriti /
analyzed: na ca evam prayoktāra prayuñjānāḥ dṛśyante iti abhiprāyeṇa āha dhvaneḥ iti

original: yastu vadati dharmiṇyapi viśeṣṭe sādhye 'nvayopadarśanavelāyāṃ yatra yatra kṛtakatvamityukte
analyzed: yaḥ tu vadati dharmiṇi api viśeṣṭe sādhye nvaya upadarśana velāyām yatra yatra kṛtaka tvam iti ukte

original: dhvanireva pradhānatayā sambadhyeta nānityatvaṃ guṇabhūtatvādititaṃ pratyāha---anvayasyeti /
analyzed: dhvaniḥ eva pradhāna tayā sambadhyeta na anitya tvam guṇa bhūta tvāt iti tam pratyāha anvayasya iti
anvaya upadarśana kāle hi bhedena eva dharmam upādadate

original: yatra yatra kṛtakatvaṃ tatra tatrānityatvamiti na tatra pradhānasambandhāśaṅkā /
analyzed: yatra yatra kṛtaka tvam tatra tatra anitya tvam iti na tatra pradhāna sambandha āśaṅkā

original: ata' pratijñāvasthāyāṃ dharmaviśiṣṭe dharmiṇi sādhyamāne yoguṇabhāva āsīt nāsau dṛṣṭāntavākye duṣyati /
analyzed: pratijñā avasthāyām dharma viśiṣṭe dharmiṇi sādhyamāne yaḥ guṇa bhāvaḥ āsīt na asau dṛṣṭānta vākye duṣyati
hetuḥ tu aviśiṣṭaḥ eva tārkikaiḥ prayujyate iti uktam
tatra aviśeṣite eva prayukte bhavati pradhāna bhūta dharma sambandha āśaṅkā iti

original: yastu vadati ṣaṣṭhyantena dhvaninānityatvaṃ viśeṣyate dhvaneranityatvamiti /
analyzed: yaḥ tu vadati ṣaṣṭhī antena dhvaninā anitya tvam viśeṣyate dhvaneḥ anitya tvam iti

original: evaṃ ca kṛtakatvādityasyāvipariṇatavibhaktikena dhvaninaiva sambandha' sphuṭo bhavati /
analyzed: evam ca kṛtaka tvāt iti asya avipariṇata vibhaktikena dhvaninā eva sambandha sphuṭaḥ bhavati
dharma sambandhaḥ eva yathāvat vibhakti vipariṇāmena syāt
sa ca anyāyyaḥ iti sa vaktavya
nirākṛtaḥ yam pakṣaḥ vārtikakṛtā eva
sambandhaḥ u pi anupādānāt nāmnā ṣaṣṭhī api vā mitau
iti

original: ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśe hi sambandha eva sādhyo bhavet /
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhī nirdeśe hi sambandhaḥ eva sādhyaḥ bhavet
tasya ca sādhya tā nirākṛtā eva
viśiṣṭa sādhya pakṣe eva sthitvā dharmi viśiṣṭa tā dharmasya idānīm
agneḥ deśa viśiṣṭa tve na ca etat pakṣa lakṣaṇam
viśiṣṭa tā asya deśena bhavet evaṃprakārikā

original: yo 'gni' so 'sti kvaciddeśe yo dṛṣṭo yatra tatra vā /
analyzed: saḥ sti kvacid deśe yaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ yatra tatra vā

original: agni' pūrvānubhūto vā deśamātreṇa saṅgata' // Msv_5,4.40 //
analyzed: pūrva anubhūtaḥ vā deśa mātreṇa

original: yo 'gni' so 'nena yukto vā yo dṛṣṭo 'nena so 'thavā /
analyzed: yaḥ saḥ nena yuktaḥ vā yaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ nena saḥ

original: yo 'yaṃ sa deśamātreṇa yukta' pūrveṇa vāpyayam // Msv_5,4.41 //
analyzed: yaḥ yam sa deśa mātreṇa pūrveṇa vā api ayam
etad adeśa viśiṣṭaḥ vā yaḥ yam agniḥ iti iha tu

original: pūrvayo' siddhasādhyatvaṃ pareṣu syād viruddhatā // Msv_5,4.42 //
analyzed: siddha sādhya tvam pareṣu syāt viruddha tā
vyāptiḥ etena deśena sarva agnīnām na yujyate

original: nāpi pūrvasya nāpyeṣa vahni' sarvairviśeṣyate // Msv_5,4.43 //
analyzed: nā api pūrvasya nā api eṣa sarvaiḥ viśeṣyate
nirākriyate
kim atra sambandha sādhya tvam punar upakṣipyate
tat alam anena bāla bhāṣitena iti
api ca agneḥ deśa viśiṣṭa tve sādhyamāne vakṣyamāṇa samasta pakṣa prakārāṇām asambhavaḥ pi iti āha agneḥ iti
dūṣaṇa antara samuñcaye cakāra
etat iti vakṣyamāṇa lakṣaṇa pratinirdeśaḥ iti
tān eva pakṣa prakārān vaktum saṃkṣipya pratijānīte
idānīm vibhajya tān eva darśayati yaḥ gniḥ iti iti ityantena
nigada vyākhyātaḥ
vivekaḥ tu pakṣāṇām praṇihitaiḥ avagamyate iti
iha ca ādyayoḥ dvayoḥ pakṣayoḥ siddha sādhya tā doṣa
siddhaḥ hi kvacid agni

original: dṛṣṭapūrvo 'pi pūrvadeśādhikaraṇa' siddha eva kiṃ tat pra(sā)dhānena /
analyzed: pūrva deśa adhikaraṇa siddhaḥ eva kim tat

original: pareṣu tu pañcasu pakṣeṣu pramāṇāntaravirodha ityāha--- iha tviti /
analyzed: pareṣu tu pañcasu pakṣeṣu pramāṇa antara virodhaḥ iti āha iha tu iti
siddha sādhya tā su prakāśā eva
virodham prapañcayati vyāptiḥ ita

original: yattāvat yo 'gni' so 'nena yukta ityuktaṃ tadayuktam /
analyzed: yat tāvat yaḥ agni saḥ nena yuktaḥ iti uktam tat ayuktam

original: nahyanena deśena sarvāgnayo vyāpyante deśasyāvaibhavāt sarvāgnīnāṃ cātrāsannidhānāt,
analyzed: na hi anena deśena sarva agnayaḥ vyāpyante deśasya a vaibhavāt sarva agnīnām ca atra a sannidhānāt
tad bhāvaḥ hi atra abhāvena virudhyate iti

original: deśai' pūrveṇa vāpyasya na deśena viśeṣyatā /
analyzed: pūrveṇa vā api asya na deśena viśeṣya tā
etad adeśa viśiṣṭaḥ yam iti etat kathyate katham
yadā deśa anapekṣaḥ gniḥ na ayam iti avadhāryate

original: agne' pūrvataraṃ cātra deśa evāvadhāryate // Msv_5,4.45 //
analyzed: agne pūrvataram ca atra deśaḥ eva avadhāryate
tad jñāna kāla buddhaḥ ca na syāt viśeṣaṇam
deśasya parvata ādeḥ tu pāvakāt ṛte

original: yo dṛṣṭo 'nena so 'thaveti yaduktaṃ dūṣayati---nāpi pūrvasyeti /
analyzed: yaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ nena saḥ yat uktam dūṣayati na api pūrvasya iti
dṛṣṭasya api agneḥ anena deśena vyāptiḥ na vidyate iti artha
yaḥ deśa mātreṇa iti atra dūṣaṇam āhana api iti deśaiḥ antena

original: na hyeṣa pura'sthito vahni' sarvairdeśairviśeṣyate sarvatra tasyābhāvāditi /
analyzed: na hi eṣa pura sthitaḥ vahni sarvaiḥ deśaiḥ viśeṣyate sarvatra tasya abhāvāt iti
pūrveṇa vā api ayam iti atra virodham āha pūrveṇa iti
pūrveṇa deśena asya agneḥ viśeṣya tā na asti eva
pūrva deśasya atra abhāvāt
asya ca tatra

original: pūrvānubhūtasya tvagnerdeśamātreṇa sambandha' pura'sthitavahne' sarvadeśasambandhanirākaraṇenaiva tulyanyāyatayā nirākṛta iti na pṛthagupanyasya  #
analyzed: pūrva anubhūtasya tu agneḥ deśa mātreṇa sambandha pura sthita vahne sarva deśa sambandha nirākaraṇena eva tulya nyāya tayā nirākṛtaḥ iti na pṛthak upanyasya
dūṣitaḥ iti

original: evaṃ saptasu pakṣeṣu nirākṛteṣvaṣṭama' pakṣo 'vaśiṣyate etaddeśaviśiṣṭo vā yo 'yamagniriti tannirākaroti--- etaditi /
analyzed: evam saptasu pakṣeṣu nirākṛteṣu aṣṭamaḥ pakṣaḥ etad deśa viśiṣṭaḥ vā yaḥ yam agniḥ iti tat nirākaroti etat iti

original: ayaṃ pura'sthito 'gniranena deśena viśiṣṭa' sādhyata iti sa vaktavya' /
analyzed: ayam pura sthitaḥ gniḥ anena deśena viśiṣṭa sādhyate iti sa vaktavya

original: svadeśakālavartyeva smaraṇena viṣayīkṛta' kathamasāvanena deśena viśeṣṭuṃ śakya' /
analyzed: sva deśa kāla varti eva smaraṇena viṣayīkṛta katham asau anena deśena viśeṣṭum śakya
tat evaṃvādinā nā api pūrvasya iti api nā ālocitam

original: anavacchinnasmṛtāvapi ca dharmo dharmiṇo viśeṣaṇamiti nedaṃ yuktisādhyam /
analyzed: anavacchinna smṛtau api ca dharmaḥ dharmiṇaḥ viśeṣaṇam iti nā idam yukti sādhyam
dharmāṇām dharmi viśeṣaṇa tayā eva sarvadā avagateḥ iti alam anena iti

original: deśa eva tu pūrvāvagato viśeṣyatāmarhatītyabhiprāyeṇāha--- agneriti //44-45//
analyzed: deśaḥ eva tu pūrva avagataḥ viśeṣya tām arhati iti abhiprāyeṇa āha agneḥ iti

original: yadi cāgnirviśeṣyo bhavet tatastasyaivāyamādyo jñānakālo bhavet,

analyzed: avivāde tu śiṣyaḥ na vyāmohanīyaḥ iti viśadataram eva pratijñā
niyamaḥ tad viruddhāt ca kalpyate na avirodhinaḥ
asannikṛṣṭa vācā ca dvayam atra jihāsitam
vacanena sādhyate iti yuktam
na hi na
yat enam tattvam bubhutsamānam upasannam a viśada vacanena parikleśayāma
na ca eva jalpe n upayogaḥ iti

original: uktamidamasati hi pratijñāvacane 'nāśrayā hetvādayo na pravarteranniti /
analyzed: uktam idam asati hi pratijñā vacane na āśrayāḥ hetu ādayaḥ na pravarteran iti
guṇa bhūtāḥ hi te pradhāna bhūta sādhi apekṣāyām sambadhyante
tat ca sādhya nirdeśe upapadyate

original: nirdiṣṭe hi sādhye kuta ityapekṣāyāṃ hetu' sambadhyate /
analyzed: nirdiṣṭe hi sādhye kutas iti apekṣāyām hetu sambadhyate
tata katham ayam avyāptaḥ sya sādhakaḥ iti apekṣite vyāpti vacanam
itarathā tu aikārthya abhāvāt ekavākya tā eva na savarteta
tathā hi yat
kṛtakam tat anityam iti ukte kṛtaka tvam anitya tayā sambaddham iti anūditam

original: punaśca śabda' kṛtaka iti śabdasya kṛtakatayā sambandho 'nūdita' /
analyzed: punar ca śabda kṛtakaḥ iti śabdasya kṛtaka tayā sambandhaḥ nu udita
paraspara sambandhe tu na pramāṇam
asambaddham idam vākya dvayam iti āśaṅkyet

original: kṛtakaṃ tāvadanityaṃ śabdo 'pi kṛtaka iti svarūpanuvādamātramubhayoriti śaṅkā jāyeta,
analyzed: kṛtakam tāvat anityam śabdaḥ api kṛtakaḥ iti svarūpa anuvāda mātram ubhayoḥ iti śaṅkā jāyeta
artha antaram vā āpadyeta
yathā ca anitya tva dharmā kṛtakaḥ tathā śabda ātmakaḥ u pi iti

original: tadatra sarve kṛtakā' śabdātmāna iti sādhusampāditamāpadyeta /
analyzed: tat atra sarve śabda ātmānaḥ iti sādhu sampāditam āpadyeta

original: ata' pradhānavākyāvayavapratijñā yadapahanuyate tannāstikānāmeva sarvāpalāpavādināṃ śobhate netareṣām /

yat āhuḥ
sāram tu vyavahārāṇām pratijñā samudāhṛtā

original: iti sūkto vādivacanaprakāro dharmiṇamuddiśya sādhyadharmo vidhīyata iti //53-54//
analyzed: iti sūktaḥ vādi vacana prakāraḥ dharmiṇam uddiśya sādhya dharmaḥ vidhīyate iti

original: nanvevaṃ sādhyaviśiṣṭe dharmiṇi vidhīyamāne kevalasādhyānvayāvagamād dharmāntaravyudāso bhavet /

original: tataścānitya' śabda ityukte nitya evetyavadhāraṇādambaraguṇatvādayo 'pi taddharmā na bhaveyu' /

original: evaṃ ca hetorapi pratikṣepāt sādhyasiddhirapi durlabhaiva /

asati avadhāraṇe syāt iti
atha katham ekaḥ nityaḥ nityaḥ ca iti arthāt pratipakṣa pratikṣepa

original: satyam, ata eva tannivṛttyarthamavadhāraṇe kriyamāṇe itaranivṛttirapi bhavedata āha--- niyama iti /
analyzed: satyam atas eva tad nivṛtti artham avadhāraṇe kriyamāṇe itara nivṛttiḥ api bhavet atas āha niyamaḥ iti

na dharma antarāt
atas gnimān iti sādhyamāne gni abhāva mātram eva nirākṛtam bhavati
na punar dharma antaram

original: yathā śukla' paṭa ityukte tadvirodhinastadabhāvasyaiva nivṛttirbhavati,
analyzed: yathā śukla paṭaḥ iti ukte tad virodhinaḥ tad abhāvasya eva nivṛttiḥ bhavati
na avirodhinām sūkṣma tva ādi dharmāṇām iti
atra ca asannikṛṣṭa īrthaḥ iti ucyate tasya
yadi anavagata pūrvam eva artham anumānam gocarayati iti tat na
sambandha jñāna kāle eva hi yāvat dhūma ādi bhāvitayā agni ādi sambandhaḥ vagataḥ eva
anyathā niyamaḥ eva avadhāritau na syāt
na ca atra deśa kāla sambandhaḥ dhikaḥ iti vaktavyam
dhūmasya hi deśa ādi sambandhaḥ bhāsate na agne
dhūma upalakṣita aśeṣa deśa sambandhasya sambandha samadhigamaḥ eva avasāyāt
atas eva kaiścid smaraṇa abhimāna nirāsa artham asannikṛṣca padam vyākhyātam
smaraṇam hi sannikṛṣṭa avamarśa ullikhitam eva prāyaśas bhavati
saḥ iti hi tat pravartate
na ca evam anumānam
atas na idam smaraṇam
nanu asati api tad ullekhe smaraṇam utpadyate eva
yathā pramoṣe
mā evam
grahaṇa kāraṇa abhāvāt hi tatra anubhava ākāra pravṛttam api jñānam smatiḥ iti āsthitam
na hi asannihita rajata ādi avabhāsa kāraṇa tvam indriyayāṇām prāpyakāriṇām sambhavati

original: smṛtihetustu prācīnāmubhavaprabhāvitā bhāvanā samastīti smṛtireva pramuṣitatadavamarśā setyāśritam /
analyzed: smṛti hetuḥ tu prācīnā amubhava prabhāvitā bhāvanā samasti iti smṛtiḥ eva pramuṣita tad avamarśā sā iti āśritam

original: idaṃ tu pratyutpannaliṅgādikāraṇabalādutpadyamānaṃ laiṅgikajñānamanubhavākārapravṛtaṃ na tadbhāvādutārayituṃ śakyam /
analyzed: idam tu pratyutpanna liṅga ādi kāraṇa balāt utpadyamānam laiṅgika jñānam anubhava ākāra pravṛtam na tad bhāvāt uta ārayitum śakyam
anubhūtiḥ ca na pramāṇam

phala abhāvena aprāmāṇya prasaṅgāt
adhika pariccheda phalam pramāṇam bhavati
pariccheda mātrasya tu phala tve smṛtau api prasaṅga
sā api hi sva gocara pariccheda ātmikā eva jāyate
syāt matam anapekṣam hi na pramāṇam
apekṣate ca smaraṇam grahaṇam
atas na pramāṇam iti
tat na
laiṅgike prasaṅgāt
tat api hi eka deśa darśana ādi sāpekṣam eva

iha api tad apekṣaṇāt
laiṅgikam api hi prācīna agni jñāna sāpekṣam eva
na hi anavagata agneḥ avidita sambandhasya agniḥ atrā iti matiḥ āvirasti
na ca grahaṇam pramāṇam eva iti rāja ājñā
bhrāntau api prasaṅgāt
viparīta avagrahaḥ pi grahaṇam eva
na ca pramāṇam
na ca asau na asti iti yathārtha ayathārtha jñāna vibhāgam vyācakṣāṇaiḥ asmābhiḥ uktam eva
api ca arthe n upalabdhaḥ iti sūtrayatā sūtrakāreṇa
tādrūpyeṇa gṛhīta tvam ca

original: pramitasya pramāṇe hi nāpekṣā jāyate puna' // Msv_5,4.56 //
analyzed: pramitasya pramāṇe hi na apekṣā jāyate punar
tādrūpyeṇa paricchinne pramāṇam niṣphalam param
sarvam anupalabdha artha viṣayam eva pramāṇam iti sūtritam
etat api tad vyākhyāna avasare varṇitam eva
atas vyākhyeyam asannikṛṣṭa artha grahaṇam atas āha asannikṛṣṭa iti

original: asyārtha'--- dvedhā hi sannikṛṣṭaṃ bhavati tadrūpapramitaṃ viparītanirūpitaṃ vā /
analyzed: asya artha dvedhā hi sannikṛṣṭam bhavati tad rūpa pramitam viparīta nirūpitam vā
tad ubhaya jihāsayeyam asannikṛṣṭa vāc iti
kim punar tad nirākaraṇam atas āha pramitasya iti
vyavahāra artham hi apramita paricchedāya pramāṇam apekṣyate na vyasanena

original: sa ca sakṛtpramāṇavyāpārādeva siddha iti na pramāṇāntarāpekṣeti //55,56//
analyzed: sa ca sakṛt pramāṇa vyāpārāt eva siddhaḥ iti na pramāṇa antara apekṣā iti

original: kiṃ puna' pramitasya pramāṇāntarāpekṣā na jāyeta /
analyzed: kim punar pramitasya pramāṇa antara apekṣā na jāyeta
atas āha tādrūpyeṇa iti

original: varṇitamidaṃ ---dvedhā hi pramitaṃ bhavati tādrūpyeṇa vaiparītyeneti /
analyzed: varṇitam idam dvedhā hi pramitam bhavati tādrūpyeṇa vaiparītyena iti

original: tatra tāvat tādrūpyaparicchede na paraṃ pramāṇaṃ phalavat /
analyzed: tatra tāvat tādrūpya paricchede na param pramāṇam phalavat
pūrva pira chedāt eva tad artha siddhe
vaiparītya paricchede tu pramāṇa antaram anavakāśam eva iti tad ubhaya nirākaraṇa artham asannikṛṣṭa grahaṇam arthavat
nanu evam apramāṇam eva anumānam
sannikṛṣṭa viṣaya tvāt iti uktam eva na
adhikāra viṣaya tvāt
yadi api pūrva avagataḥ dharma smṛti viṣaya
dharmī ca giriḥ anubhava siddha
tathā api viśiṣṭam anumānena viṣayīkrayataḥ iti varṇitam asakṛt
nanu agni viśiṣṭaḥ sambandha samayaḥ eva
evam hi anena vyāpti grahaṇa kāle vagatam dhūmavat mātram agnimat iti
tat asya dhūmavat mātre eva apekṣā
vidite tu tasmin agnimat tā pramita pūrvā eva anubhūyate
satyam
kintu dhūmavān agnimat tayā sama pratyanumānena pratyabhijñāyate
pratyabhijñānam ca idam pramāṇam eva pratyakṣa pratyabhijñāna vat

original: pūrvaṃ hi dhūmavattvopalakṣitena rūpeṇāgnimattayā deśo nirjñāta' /
analyzed: pūrvam hi dhūmavat tva upalakṣitena rūpeṇa agnimat tayā deśaḥ nirjñāta
sama pratyayam asau agnimān iti viśeṣataḥ numānena pratyabhijñāyate iti kim anupapannam
avaśyam ca evam abhyupagantavyam
anyathā katham agnimān iti viditvā vyavahārāya ghaṭate

vaiparītya paricchinne na avakāśa parasya tu

original: mūle tasya hyanutpanne pūrveṇa viṣayo hṛta' /
analyzed: mūle tasya hi anutpanne pūrveṇa viṣayaḥ hṛta
pratyakṣa ādeḥ ca ṣaṭakasya na eva arthāḥ hi avadhārita

original: agrāhyatā tu śabdāde' pratyakṣeṇa viridhyate // Msv_5,4.59 //

tat kasya heto
na yadi pūrva anubhavāt adya

prāk api dhūmavat āśraya tva na avagamāt

kim asya agni arthinaḥ parvata pratyakṣeṇa

yad kṛtaḥ vyavahāra viśeṣaḥ iti agṛhīta viṣaya tvāt anumānam pramāṇam iti vaktavyam
tat idam asannikṛṣṭa grahaṇena uktam
ye tu smṛti āśaṅkā nirākaraṇam prayojanam āhu
teṣām bādhita viṣayam api anumānam āpadyeta
na hi tad nirākaraṇam avayava antareṇa lakṣaṇa granthe kṛtam upalabhyate

vaiparītya paricchinne param anavakāśam iti uktam
tatra kāraṇam āha mūle iti
vyāpti smaraṇa ādi hi anumānasya mūlam

original: tadyāvaduttaraṃ tattadvyāpāravyagratayā vilambate tāvacchīghrabhāvinā pūrveṇa viṣayāpahārād
analyzed: tat yāvat uttaram tat tat vyāpāra vyagra tayā vilambate tāvat śīghra bhāvinā pūrveṇa viṣaya apahārāt

original: viprakṛṣṭasādhanasyotpattireva nirudhyata ityanantarameva vakṣyata iti kathaṃ punaranumānaṃ bādhyate /

original: tadapi hi pramāṇaṃ kathaṃ pramāṇāntareṇa bādhituṃ śakyate /

original: tat kasya heto' ata āha---pratyakṣāderiti syādantena /

original: tad yatra kasyacidarthasya kenacidātmanāvadhāraṇaṃ bhavati tatra tenotpannasyotpatsyamānasya vā jñānasya bādho 'bhidhīyeta /

original: tatra hi pūrvopamardanenaivottaramātmānaṃ labhata iti tat tasya bādhakam /

original: uttaraṃ ca deśādibhede 'pyabādhitaṃ svabhāvataśca pramāṇaṃ pūrvamābhāsīkaroti /

original: tadevamātmanā jñānena pūrvamābhāsīkṛtamiti tatrābhāsa eva bādhyata iti nātiprasaṅga' /

original: aprāptabādhe tu yāvat kliṣṭasādhanamanumānaṃ svagocare sāmānyaśāstraṃ vā kvacid viśeṣaviṣaye
analyzed: aprāpta bādhe tu yāvat kliṣṭa sādhanam anumānam sva gocare sāmānya śāstram vā kvacid viśeṣa viṣaye

original: yattu jaghanyena mukhyabādho na yukta iti /

tat na
na hi pratyakṣa ādīnām viniyoga pramāṇānām iva pāradaiḥ balya niyama

ābhāsa bādhāt

tat idam avadhārita padena uktam iti

original: nanu ca balavatāpi nāvaśyaṃ durbalaṃ bādhyate /

asati hi sambhave bādha sambhavati

original: ato viṣayavyavasthāyā vikalpena samuccayena vobhayamupapādayiṣyate vinātyantikabodhāśrayaṇena (?)

atas āha vikalpa ādeḥ iti
na atra uktāḥ vikalpa ādayaḥ sambhavanti
na tāvat paraspara viruddham rūpa dvayam ekatra samuccīyate
na hi śrāvaṇaḥ śrāvaṇaḥ ca
nityaḥ nityaḥ ca iti sambhavati
na ca vikalpa
vidhi niṣedha viṣaya tvāt tasya siddhe vastuni asambhavāt
na ca viṣaya vyavasthā
varṇa ātmanām eva nitya anitya tva sādhanāt
atas sambhavāt eva bādham abhidadhmahe iti
evam upapāditaḥ bādhaḥ udāharaṇaiḥ darśayitavya
tatra pratyakṣa bādham eva tāvat darśayati agrāhya tā iti
imam tu pratyakṣa bādham na budhyāmahe
sva gocara viparīta artham hi pramāṇam
teṣām aśrāvaṇa tva ādi viruddham anumānata
nahi śrāvaṇa tā nāma pratyakṣeṇa avagamyate
sā anvaya vyatirekābhyām gamyate badhira ādiṣu
tridhā syāt pratijñā ādi vibhāgata
pratyakṣeṇa bādhyate iti yuktam

śabdaḥ hi pratyakṣa na grāhya tā

original: ata eva hyaśrāvaṇatāpakṣo 'pi na pratyakṣeṇa virudhyata iti vakṣyate /

atra ucyate
satyam

iyam hi śaśa viṣāṇasya a grāhya tā yat na bhavati

original: tadanena prakāreṇa śabdābhāvapakṣasyaiva pratyakṣavirodha upadiṣṭa iti na kiñcidanupapannamiti //58,59//

original: teṣāmeva śabdādīnāmaśrāvaṇatvādyanumānaviruddhaṃ yo hyaśrāṇamanityaṃ vā śabdaṃ pakṣamicchati tasyāsau śīghrabhāvinā viparyayānumānena bādhyata  #

iti
idam tu pratyakṣa avarodham anye manyante

original: śabdo hi pratyakṣa' na tacchrāvaṇatā grāhyagrāhakasambandho hi śabdasya śrāvaṇasya ca tvatalbhyāmucyate /

api ca atīndriyam śrotram

original: na hyaindriyānaindriyādhāra' sambandha' pratyakṣo bhavati vāyuvanaspatyoriva /

atas na ayam pratyakṣa virodhaḥ iti

atas āha sā iti
abadhira ādiṣu śabda upalabdheḥ badhira ādiṣu ca anupalabdheḥ anvaya vyatirekau dṛśyete

original: tathāhi śrotropaghātamātreṇa cakṣurādimato badhirasya śabdabuddhirna dṛśyate /

analyzed: śrotre ca dṛḍhe cakṣuḥ ādiṣu asambhave śabda grahaṇam dṛṣṭam
atas ābhyām anvaya vyatirekābhyām idam śrāvaṇa tvam gamyate iti
nanu evam katham anumāna virodha
na hi anvaya vyatirekau anumānam
mānasa śrāvaṇa tva vikalpa

original: ato mānasapratyakṣa evāyamiti kaścit bhrāmyati sa vaktavya' /

yat yadīya anvaya vyatirekau anuvidhatte tad tad kāraṇakam iti sarva kāryeṣu samadhigatam
anuvidhatte ca śabda jñānam śravaṇam iti tad tad kāraṇakam iti
idam eva ca śabdasya śrāvaṇa tvam

nanu anyatra api anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyina katham tad kāraṇakatvam avagantavyam

original: paśyāmo hi vayaṃ kumbhakāravyāpārānantaraṃ kumbhasambhavamudīkṣamāṇā' kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ cakṣuṣaiva /

original: idaṃ hi kumbhasya tatkāryatvaṃ yā tadanantarasambhūti' /

asati ca na bhavati
tat tad kāraṇakam iti pratyakṣataḥ vidita vyāpteḥ anumām upapannam eva

original: evaṃ ca prayoga'--- śravaṇapramāṇaprakāśya' śabda' tasmin

original: tāvacchīghrajanamanā śrāvaṇatvānumānena vyāptisaṃvidaṃ pratibandhatā tasyotpattireva nirudhyate /

original: yat kṛtakatvādihetukaṃ tadapyasiddhivyabhicārādidoṣānna śīgharmupajāyata iti siddhāvayavai' śīghrajanmabhirnityatvānumānairbādhyate /

original: yathā deśakālādibhinnā gośabdabuddhaya' samānaviṣayā' gaurityatpadyamānatvāt sampratyutpannagośabdabuddhivad hyastanoccārito vā gośabdo 'dyāpyasti

original: pratijñāvirodhādayo hi śabdavirodhatayā prasiddhā iti te tathābhidhīyante /

anumita pratyakṣa bādhaḥ tu ceṣṭā viśeṣa adarśanena tad avagata tikka tā ādi rasa nivāraṇam pratijñāyate
mukha vairūpyeṇa hi tasya tikta anubhavaḥ numīyate atas tad viparīta pakṣasya anumita pratyakṣa bādha

original: śrutapratyakṣabādhastu yatra kenacidarthe kasmiścidapahanute sākṣibhirdṛṣṭo 'yamartha iti sākṣipratyakṣeṇa bādho 'bhidhīyate /
analyzed: śruta pratyakṣa bādhaḥ tu yatra kenacid arthe kasmiṃścid apahanute sākṣibhiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ yam arthaḥ iti sākṣi pratyakṣeṇa bādhaḥ abhidhīyate
na ca eṣa śabdabādha
na hi atra taiḥ arthaḥ bhidhīyate
kintu darśanam
atas tad darśana anusārī eva nirṇaya

original: darśanaṃ tu tai' svaśabdena pratyāyyata iti śabdāvagatapratyakṣavirodha evāyam /
analyzed: darśanam tu taiḥ sva śabdena pratyāyyate iti śabda avagata pratyakṣa virodhaḥ eva ayam
upamānam tu pramāṇa antara prasiddha vastu sādṛśya mātra viṣayam iti anyatas siddhasya sādṛśyam gocarayati

original: yathā dātrādipratyabhijñāyāṃ yādṛśī svātmaniceṣṭā dṛṣṭā tāṃ paratrāpi dṛṣṭavopaminoti mamevāsyāpi dātrādipratyabhijñā pratyakṣamutpannā,
analyzed: yathā dātṛ ādi pratyabhijñāyām yādṛśī sva ātmani ceṣṭā dṛṣṭā tām paratra api dṛṣṭavā upaminoti mama eva asya api dātṛ ādi pratyabhijñā pratyakṣam utpannā
katham anyathā pūrvedyus ardha kṛta karma samāpane paredyu pravartate

original: iha ca ceṣṭayā tadanurūpaṃ paragocaramanumāya svajñānasādṛśyaṃ tatropamīyate /
analyzed: iha ca ceṣṭayā tad anurūpam para gocaram anumāya sva jñāna sādṛśyam tatra upamīyate
yadi api ca atra anumāna avagata prataykṣa bādhaḥ eva śakyaḥ darśayitum
tathā api sva jñāna sādṛśya paricchede śakyam darśayitum iti tad avagata pratyakṣa bādhaḥ bhidhīte
pratyakṣa sattā eva upamānena pramīyate
arthāpatti avagata pratyakṣa bādhaḥ tu evam

original: yadā hi bahuṣu gacchatsu toyārthiṣu taṭākamekastadāharaṇāya prasthito vilambate tadā tadvilambanānyathānupapattyā tadīyaṃ toyapratyakṣamarthāpattyā  #
analyzed: yadā hi bahuṣu gacchatsu toya arthiṣu taṭākam ekaḥ tad āharaṇāya prasthitaḥ vilambate tadā tad vilambana anyathā anupapattyā tadīyam toya pratyakṣam arthāpattyā
pramīyate
tatra tad viparītaḥ nistoya taṭāka pakṣaḥ ṛthāpatti siddhena pratyakṣeṇa bādhyate

original: abhāvena tu bhāvarūpaṃ pratyakṣaṃ nāvagamyata iti tadanavagataprataykṣavirodho nehodāhriyate /
analyzed: abhāvena tu bhāva rūpam pratyakṣam na avagamyate iti tad anavagata prataykṣa virodhaḥ na iha udāhriyate
ṣoḍhā vibhaktam anumāna bādham ata param anusandhāsyāma dhūma avagata vahani pratiṣedhe tāvat
pratyakṣa pūrva anumā bādha
dhūma anumitāt eva vahaneḥ uṣṇa tve numite tad viparīta pakṣaḥ numita anumānena bādhyate

original: yatra tu 'devasya tveti nirvapati' iti pratītaviniyogānmantraśeṣe 'numite tadviparīta' pakṣo gṛhyate,
analyzed: yatra tu devasya tvā iti nirvapati iti pratīta viniyogāt mantra śeṣe pakṣaḥ gṛhyate
tatra āgama anumāna bādha

original: nitye tu karmaṇi pravṛtte vrīhīṇāmapacāre tatsadṛśeṣu nīvāreṣūpamiteṣu 'vrīhibhiryajete'ti codanā nīvāraviṣayatvenānumīyate /
analyzed: nitye tu karmaṇi pravṛtte vrīhīṇām apacāre tad sadṛśeṣu nīvāreṣu upamiteṣu vrīhibhiḥ yajeta iti codanā nīvāra viṣaya tvena anumīyate
vrīhi avayavāḥ hi tad vipaya tayā jñāta sambandhāḥ tām anumāpayanti

original: na hi tasyā' svarūpeṇa vrīhayo viṣayabhūtā',
analyzed: na hi tasyāḥ svarūpeṇa vrīhayaḥ viṣaya bhūtā
tad avayavāḥ tu cūrṇībhūtāḥ vrīhi śāstra artha

original: te ca nīvāreṣvapi santīti vrīhyavayavasāmānyopamitanīvāragāminī vrīhicodanānumīyate /
analyzed: te ca nīvāreṣu api santi iti vrīhi avayava sāmānya upamita nīvāra gāminī vrīhi codanā anumīyate
tat iha a tad gocara tva pakṣasya upamāna pūrvaka anumāna bādha
arthāpatti pūrvaka anumāna bādhaḥ tu śrāvaṇa tva pakṣe bhihitaḥ eva

original: yatra dūrād vṛkṣābhāvaṃ viditvā tacchāyābhāvo 'numīyate tatrābhāvapūrvakānumānena chāyāsadbhāvapakṣo bādhyate /
analyzed: yatra dūrāt vṛkṣa abhāvam viditvā tad chāyā bhāvaḥ numīyate tatra abhāva pūrvaka anumānena chāyā sadbhāva pakṣaḥ bādhyate
pratyakṣa śabda bādhaḥ tu tridhā darśitaḥ eva
anyaḥ u pi śruti smṛtibhyām darśayitavya
aṣṭakā ādīnām adharma tva pakṣaḥ tu kartṛ sāmānya anumati śabda viruddha smṛti adhikaraṇe darśita
śakyam hi aṣṭaka ādaya
śabda mūla aśāstra sthārya āvarta nivāsi kartṛka tvāt agnihotra ādi vat iti anumātum

original: āgamikaśabdabādhastu yatra śākhāntaragataśrutiviṣayavivāde smṛtinibnadhanakārāṇāṃ vacanena śrutisadbhāvo niścīyate,
analyzed: āgamika śabda bādhaḥ tu yatra śākhā antara gata śruti viṣaya vivāde smṛti nibnadhana kārāṇām vacanena śruti sadbhāvaḥ niścīyate
tatra hi āpta āgama avagata nitya āgama virodhaḥ viparīta pakṣasya sambhavati

original: upamitaśabdavirodhastu manvādismṛtibhyor'yāpattyā vaidikaṃ kimapi mūlamastīti kalpite smārtavākyasadṛśa eva mūla upamiter'thavādamūlatvapakṣa  #
analyzed: upamita śabda virodhaḥ tu vaidikam kim api mūlam asti iti kalpite smārta vākya sadṛśe eva mūle upamita īrthavāda mūla tva pakṣa
upamita śabdena bādhyate

original: viśvajidaphalatvapakṣastu śrutārthapattisiddhavadhāraṇe tasya vyāpāra' tatrābhāvāvadhāritavidhikātsnarye jyotiṣṭāmeprākṛtetikartavyatāprāptikṣo  #
analyzed: viśvajit aphalatva pakṣaḥ tu tasya
bādhyate
yathā vakṣyati kṛtsna vidhānāt apūrva soma eti
vrīhi abhāve tu nīvārāṇām agrāhya tā pakṣa pratyakṣa ja upamāna viruddha

original: anumānapūrva kopamānabādhastu yadā hyādityasya deśāntaraprāptyā gatimanumāyatanmadhye
analyzed: anumāna pūrva ka upamāna bādhaḥ tu yadā hi ādityasya deśa antara prāptyāḥ gatim anumāya tad madhye

original: vānte vā sūryagati' tādṛśī vatsarānteṣviti tatra gitavaisādṛśyapakṣo 'numānapūrvakopamānena bādhyate /
analyzed: vā ante vā sūrya gati tādṛśī vatsara anteṣu iti tatra gita vaisādṛśya pakṣaḥ numāna pūrvaka upamānena bādhyate

original: pūtīkā na somasadṛśā iti tu pakṣa' śabdapūrvakopamānaviruddha' /
analyzed: pūtīkāḥ na soma sadṛśāḥ iti tu pakṣa śabda pūrvaka upamāna viruddha
sāma pūtīkayoḥ hi sādṛśyam na pratyakṣam na
śaśa śṛṅga ādi sambhāva virodhaḥ
evam ca dharma sambandha bādhaḥ tāvat udāhṛta
dharma dharmi ubhayeṣām ca svarūpa sva viśeṣayoḥ
ca anumayā īm

original: śabdenaiva tu somāṃśujātatvaṃ pūtīkānāṃ pratipādayatā kāryakāraṇayoraucityena sārūpyaṃpratipāditamiti
analyzed: śabdena eva tu soma aṃśu jāta tvam pūtīkānām pratipādayatā kārya kāraṇayoḥ aucityena sārūpyam pratipāditam iti

original: śabdāvagatakāryakāramaprabhavatvāt pūtīkānāṃ somasādṛśyopamānasya tadviparyaya' śabdapūrvakopamānaviruddho bhavati /
analyzed: śabda avagata kārya kārama prabhava tvāt pūtīkānām soma sādṛśya upamānasya tad viparyaya śabda pūrvaka upamāna viruddhaḥ bhavati

original: jyotiṣṭomikā hi dharmā' satrāhīneṣu na bhavantīti pakṣa upamānopamānena bādhyate /
analyzed: jyotiṣṭomikāḥ hi dharmāḥ satra ahīneṣu na bhavanti iti pakṣaḥ upamāna upamānena bādhyate

original: jyotiṣṭāmopamānena hi te dvādaśāhaṃ gacchanti dvādaśāhopamānena ca satrāhīnāviti /
analyzed: jyotiṣṭāma upamānena hi te dvādaśa aham gacchanti dvādaśa aha upamānena ca satrāhīnau iti

original: yadā tvātmendriyasādṛśyaviśiṣṭāni parendriyāṇyupamīyante tatra tanniṣedhor'thāpattyupamānena bādhyate /
analyzed: yadā tu ātma indriya sādṛśya viśiṣṭāni para indriyāṇi upamīyante tatra tad niṣedhaḥ ṛthāpatti upamānena bādhyate

original: vedakāranāstitā śaśaśṛṅgādyabhāvasadṛśī na bhavatīti pakṣo 'bhāvapūrvākopamānena bādhyate /
analyzed: veda kāra nāstitā śaśa śṛṅga ādi abhāva sadṛśī na bhavati iti pakṣaḥ bhāva pūrvāka upamānena bādhyate
dvayoḥ api abhāvena abhāve vagate sādṛśyam upamīyate
arthāpatti virodhaḥ tu ṣaḍavidhaḥ varṇitaḥ eva
abhāva virodham tu anantaram eva vakṣyāma
abhāva virodham idānīm udāharati śaśa śṛṅgāt iti
ayam ca pratyakṣa abhāva virodha

original: yadā tvamuṃ rāśiṃ sūryo gaco na veti cintyamāne gaṇitakuśalena gaṇitānumānābhāvānna gata ityavagate bhrānto gata iti vadati /
analyzed: yadā tu amum rāśim sūryaḥ na vā iti cintyamāne gaṇita kuśalena gaṇita anumāna abhāvāt na gataḥ iti avagate bhrāntaḥ gataḥ iti vadati
tatra anumāna abhāva virodha
caitya vandana ādi dharma tva pakṣaḥ tu
pūrvavantaḥ darvī homāḥ iti tu upamāna abhāvena virudhyate

original: tathā śabde śrotradeśamanāgacchati śrotre ca śabdeśaṃ dhvanāyāgamanamātreṇaiva śabdaśvaṇopapatteryor'thāpatyā
analyzed: tathā śabde śrotra deśam anā āgacchati śrotre ca śabda īśam dhvanāya āgamana mātreṇa eva

original: śabda' śabdāntaramāramate tata' krameṇāntya' śrotreṇa gṛhyate ityanyathānupapattyā
analyzed: śabda śabda antaram āramate tata krameṇa antya śrotreṇa gṛhyate iti anyathā anupapattyā
pratijānāti tad pratijñā arthāpatti abhāvena bādhyate

original: abhāvābhāvastyevaṃ darśayitavya'--- yadā hi kartrabhāvena vedānāṃ doṣābhāvo 'vagato bhavati tadā doṣavatpakṣasyābhāvābhāvena bādha iti //69//
analyzed: yadā hi kartṛ abhāvena vedānām doṣa abhāvaḥ vagataḥ bhavati tadā doṣavat pakṣasya abhāva abhāvena bādhaḥ iti
evam tāvat dharma sambandha bādha ṣoḍhā prapañcita

original: dharmadharmyubhayasvarūpasvaviśeṣabādhamata' paraṃ vakṣyāma iti saṃkṣipya sukhagrahaṇārthaṃ śrotṛbuddhisamādhānārthaṃ
analyzed: dharma dharmi ubhaya svarūpa sva viśeṣa bādham ata param vakṣyāmaḥ iti saṃkṣipya sukha grahaṇa artham śrotṛ buddhi samādhāna artham
śruti artha ākṣiptayoḥ vākye vācya sarva pramāṇaka
tṛṇa ādi vat kriyā hetoḥ agnimat hima sādhane

original: adharmo vihito du'khaṃ koratyalpamitīha tu // Msv_5,4.72 //
analyzed: adharmaḥ vihitaḥ dukham korati alpam iti iha tu
vihita tvāt adharmasya svarūpasya eva bādhanam
tathā dukha nimitta tvam viśeṣaḥ tasya bādhyate
ca vṛtta vartiṣyamāṇayoḥ saṅkīrtanam karoti evam iti sārdhena
śruti artha ākṣiptayoḥ iti
svarūpam tāvat sarvatra śruti arthaḥ eva
tad viśeṣaḥ

original: dharmadharmiṇorhi svarūpaṃ yena viśeṣeṇa vyāptaṃ tamākṣipati /
analyzed: dharma dharmiṇoḥ hi svarūpam yena viśeṣeṇa vyāptam tam ākṣipati
tat ca anantaram eva vakṣyate iti
śruti arthaḥ ca ākṣiptaḥ ca iti vigrahaḥ iti

original: tatra dharmasvarūpabādho varṇita eveti tamakṛtvaiva tadviviśeṣaṇabādhamudāharati---tṛṇādīti /
analyzed: tatra dharma svarūpa bādhaḥ varṇitaḥ eva iti tam a kṛtvā eva tad vi viśeṣaṇa bādham udāharati tṛṇa ādi iti

original: yo hi tṛṇādivikāradarśanādagnimaddhimaṃ sādhayati tasyābhāvena tāvaddharmasvarūpabādho bhavatyeva /
analyzed: yaḥ hi tṛṇa ādi vikāra darśanāt agnimat himam sādhayati tasya abhāvena tāvat dharma svarūpa bādhaḥ bhavati eva
tad viśeṣaṇam api uṣṇtavam artha ākṣiptam pratyakṣa avagatena śaityena bādhyate

original: na ca vācyamanuṣṇo 'pi vahni' prabhāsu dṛṣṭa iti kathamarthākṣipto viśeṣa iti /
analyzed: na ca vācyam anuṣṇaḥ vahniḥ prabhāsu dṛṣṭaḥ iti katham artha ākṣiptaḥ viśeṣaḥ iti
prabhāsu api evam vaha niḥ uṣṇaḥ eva
abhibhūta tvāt tu sparśaḥ na gṛhyate
na punar uṣṇa tām jātu jahāti
svābhāvikī hi sā tasya
na ca hime pi abhibhūta tvāt agrahaṇam iti vācyam
tad viparīta śaitya upalambhāt
hetu upanyāsaḥ tu pakṣa doṣa abhidhāna avasare tad abīja mātra pradarśana artham saḥ yam abhāvena dharma viśeṣa bādha
iti

original: dharmiṇastu dvaprakāro 'pi bādho 'nukta eveti ubhayathā tadbādhodāharaṇamāha---adharmaiti sārdhena /
analyzed: dharmiṇaḥ tu bādhaḥ nuktaḥ evā iti ubhayathā tad bādhā udāharaṇam āha adharma eti sārdhena
hiṃsā kila adharmaḥ iti sāmānyatas vagatam

original: tad yadā vihito 'dharmo daikṣapaśuhiṃsadārayid du'khaṃ karotītyanūdyatadalpamiti sādhyate,
analyzed: tat yadā vihitaḥ dharmaḥ daikṣa paśu hiṃsa dārayit dukham karoti iti anūdyata dalpam iti sādhyate

original: tadāpi vihitatvenādharmataiva bādhyate tadviśeṣo 'pi du'khanimittatvaṃ yadarthākṣiptaṃ tadapi tenaiva bādhyate /
analyzed: tadā api vihita tvena adharma tā eva bādhyate dukha nimitta tvam yat artha ākṣiptam tat api tena eva bādhyate

original: na hi vihitaṃ nāma kimapi du'khasya nidānaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: na hi vihitam nāma kim api dukhasya nidānam bhavati
puruṣa artha eka sādhana tvāt vidhe
saḥ ya
ayathārthāḥ dhiyaḥ sarvāḥ iti ukte dvaya bādhanam
svarūpa sva aviśeṣābhyām tad dhī mithyātva sādhanāt

darśanāt eka deśasya iti anena etat vyudasyate

śaityāt na dāhakaḥ vahniḥ cākṣuṣa tvāt anitya tā
śabdasya iti evamādau tu dvayoḥ siddhaḥ viparyaya
mā āgamena

original: na cātra śrutyupātta eva svaviśeṣa iti codanīyam /
analyzed: na ca atra śruti upāttaḥ eva sva viśeṣaḥ iti codanīyam
artha ākṣiptasya alpa tayā
vidhāna artham anuvādāt iti
ubhayasya ubhaya virodham udāharati ayathārtha iti

original: yadā hi sarvajñānāni mithyeti sādhyate tadā dharmadharmigrāhiṇorapi jñānayormithyātvāt tadviśeṣaṇagrāhiṇośca mithyātvād bhavatyubhayasyaivobhayabādha  #
analyzed: yadā hi sarva jñānāni mithyā iti sādhyate tadā dharma dharmi grāhiṇoḥ api jñānayoḥ mithyātvāt tad viśeṣaṇa grāhiṇoḥ ca mithyātvāt bhavati ubhayasya eva ubhaya bādha
iti

original: ayaṃ ca dharmoktyobhayabādha iti śabdabādha eva niveśanīya iti samadhigataṃ tāvadubhayo' svarūpabādha iti //74//
analyzed: ayam ca dharma uktyā ubhaya bādhaḥ iti śabda bādhaḥ eva niveśanīyaḥ iti samadhigatam tāvat svarūpa bādhaḥ iti
kau punar tad viseṣau apartha ākṣiptau bādhyete
atas āha kṣaṇikā iti

original: bādhyete iti vipariṇamya sambandho darśayitavya iti /
analyzed: bādhyete iti vipariṇamya sambandhaḥ darśayitavyaḥ iti
tatra ca eka deśa darśanāt iti ucyate
tatra ca darśana grahaṇam atiricyate
eka deśāt iti eva vaktavyam

original: taddhi liṅgaṃ na punardarśanamato vyākhyeyamekadeśadarśanādityata āha---- darśanāditi /
analyzed: tat hi liṅgam na punar darśanam atas vyākhyeyam eka deśa darśanāt iti atas āha darśanāt iti
ayam artha
na eka deśa sattā mātreṇa liṅgam
kintu sva grahaṇam
ca ubhayam upādātum
ṇic bhāva abhāvayoḥ api nirdeśa sādhāraṇyāt
sva pratipattau tāvat eka deśe dṛṣṭe buddhiḥ anumānam iti artha

original: parārthaprayoge tu ṇijantadarśanapadamekadeśaṃ darśayitvā yā buddhirjāyate sānumānamityuktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: para artha prayoge tu ṇic anta darśana padam eka deśam darśayitvā yā buddhiḥ jāyate sā anumānam iti uktam bhavati
tat idam tatra uñcarita darśana padam artha dvaye vyākhyeyam

original: anena ca yatraikadeśe vādiprativādinorekasyobhayorvā saṃśayo 'dhīrviparyayo vā bhavati so 'siddhābhidhāno hetvābhāso vyudasyate /
analyzed: anena ca yatra eka deśe vādi prativādinoḥ ekasya ubhayoḥ vā saṃśayaḥ dhīḥ viparyayaḥ vā bhavati saḥ siddha abhidhānaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ vyudasyate

original: na hyasau tādṛśa' parasmai daraśayituṃ śakyate /
analyzed: na hi asau tādṛśa parasmai śakyate
kṛtaka tva guṇa tva ādau para ukte yājñikam prati
sva ukte ca eva prakāre syāt asiddhaḥ nyatarasya tu
bāṣpa ādi bhāva sandigdhaḥ dvayoḥ anyatarasya vā
dhūmaḥ tridhā api asiddha syāt evam tāvat svarūpataḥ
ete eva syuḥ āśraya asiddha kalpane
jñāte pi hi sva rūpeṇa na a tad dharme sti hetu tā
svayam vā dṛṣṭaḥ bhavati
adhīra jñānam iti artha
tatra dvaya viparyasta udāharaṇam āha śaityāt iti
vahni śabdayoḥ dvayoḥ api śaitya cākṣuṣa tve vādi prativādinoḥ viparyayāt asiddhaḥ iti
anyatara asiddha udāharaṇam āha kṛtaka tva iti

original: yadā vaiśiṣiko yājñikaṃ prati śabdo 'nitya' kṛtakatvāt guṇatvādveti hetuṃ prayuṅkte,
analyzed: yadā vaiśiṣikaḥ yājñikam prati śabdaḥ nitya kṛtaka tvāt guṇa tvāt vā iti hetum prayuṅkte
tadā asau sva rūpeṇa tasya asiddhaḥ bhavati

original: yadā tu svayamevaṃprakāraṃ hetuṃ paraṃ prati vadati tadā tasyāsiddhi' /
analyzed: yadā tu svayam evaṃprakāram hetum param prati vadati tadā
yathā nitya śabda dravya tvāt ākāśa vat iti

original: na hi vaiśiṣikā' śabdaṃ dravyamabhyupagacchanti guṇatvābhyupagamāt /
analyzed: na hi vaiśiṣikā śabdam dravyam abhyupagacchanti guṇa tva abhyupagamāt
evaṃprakāraḥ iti parāsiddha prakāraḥ iti artha
sandigdha asiddham udāharati bāṣpa ādi iti syāt antena

original: yadā hi dhūmo bāṣpādibhāvena sandihyate dvābhyāmekena vā kiṃsvidayaṃ rajasāmudgamo bāṣpo vā dhūmo veti tadā dvayorapyantatarasya vā sandigdhāsiddho  #
analyzed: yadā hi dhūmaḥ bāṣpa ādi bhāvena sandihyate dvābhyām ekena vā kim svid ayam rajasām udgamaḥ bāṣpaḥ vā dhūmaḥ vā iti tadā dvayoḥ api antatarasya vā sandigdha asiddhaḥ
bhavati
evam tāvat sandeha viparyaya ābhāyam asiddha tā udāhṛtā
ajñānena tu aprasiddha artha pada prayoge darśayitavyā
tridhā iti
vādi prativādi ubhayaiḥ trayaḥ prakārāḥ iti

original: evaṃ tāvat svarūpato heturasiddho bhavatītyuktamityāha--- evamiti //78//
analyzed: evam tāvat svarūpataḥ hetuḥ asiddhaḥ bhavati iti uktam iti āha evam iti
āśraya asiddha tā api etaiḥ eva jñāna ādibhiḥ vādi prativādi ubhaya apekṣaiḥ tridhā bhidyate iti āha ete eva iti

original: nanu svarūpāsiddhyāheturduṣyet āśrayāsiddhyā tu kastasya doṣa' ata āha---jñāte 'pīti /
analyzed: nanu svarūpa asiddhyā ahetuḥ duṣyet āśraya asiddhyā tu kaḥ tasya doṣaḥ atas āha jñāte pi iti
ayam abhiprāyana svarūpeṇa hetuḥ gamaka api tu
sarvatra dṛṣṭa kārya tvāt ātmā sarva gataḥ tu iti
bauddham pratyāśraya asiddhaḥ laukika ādeḥ tu saṃśaya
vāc mātra asiddhi mātreṇa vyavahāra a prakalpanāt
dvābhyām satvataḥ jñātaḥ tat vacaḥ dūṣaṇam matam

original: itarat sādhanaṃ tu syāt vādinā yadi sādhyate // Msv_5,4.82 //
analyzed: itarat sādhanam tu syāt vādinā yadi sādhyate
pakṣa dharma tayā
na ca aprasiddha āśrayaḥ tad dharma tayā jñātum śakyate
śaitya cākṣuṣa tvayoḥ api pakṣa dharma tva asiddhayā eva ahetutvam

original: siddhaṃ hi svarūpeṇa jale śaityaṃ rūparūpirūpapaikārthasamavāyiṣu ca cākṣuṣatvam /
analyzed: siddham hi sva rūpeṇa jale śaityam ca cākṣuṣa tvam

original: śabdā(dau) hi pakṣadharmatayā tu tayorasiddhatvamiti taddharmarūpāsiddhavacanam /
analyzed: śabda ādau hi pakṣa dharma tayā tu tayoḥ asiddha tvam iti tad dharma rūpa asiddha vacanam
atas āśraya asiddhau api pakṣa dharma tva asiddheḥ ahetu tvam yuktam evā iti
tām idānīm āśraya asiddhim udāharati sarvatra iti asiddhāntena

original: yadā hi boddhaṃ prati sarvatra kāryopalambhādātmana' sarvagatatvaṃ mīmāṃsakā' sādhayanti,
analyzed: yadā hi boddham prati sarvatra kārya upalambhāt ātmanaḥ sarvagata tvam sādhayanti
tadā anyatara asiddha āśrayaḥ hetuḥ bhavati
bauddhasya ātmananaḥ siddheḥ iti

original: yastu pramāṇagatimajānāno laukika' kaścidātmani saṃśete tasminneva hetāvucyamāne sadnigdhāśrayo heturityāha--- laukikāderiti /
analyzed: yaḥ tu pramāṇa gatim a jānānaḥ kaścid ātmani saṃśete tasmin eva hetau ucyamāne sat nigdha āśrayaḥ hetuḥ iti āha laukika ādeḥ iti
ātmani saṃśayaḥ

original: ādiśabdena satīrthikānāmapi yeṣāmātmani saṃśaya' ta upādriyante /
analyzed: ādi śabdena sa tīrthikānām api yeṣām ātmani saṃśaya te upādriyante
evam saṃśaya viparyayābhyām āśraya asiddhiḥ uktā
ajñānena api āśraya asidghi prasiddha pada prayoge darśayitavyā

original: yasya hi pakṣavacana' śabdo na prasiddhastaṃ pratyevañjātīyake hetāvucyamāne 'jñānenāśrayāsiddhiriti //80//
analyzed: yasya hi pakṣa vacana śabdaḥ na prasiddhaḥ tam prati evañjātīyake hetau ucyamāne jñānena āśraya asiddhiḥ iti
nanu yadi anyatara asiddhyā hetuḥ duṣyati

original: evaṃ tarhyamūrtatvādātmā niṣkriya ityevamāderapi hetutvaṃ na syāt digambarāṇāmātmano 'mūrtatvāsiddhe' /
analyzed: evam tarhi amūrta tvāt ātmā niṣkriyaḥ iti evamādeḥ api hetu tvam na syāt digambarāṇām ātmanaḥ mūrta tva asiddhe
mūrtam hi te śarīra pariṇāmam ātmāne manyante

original: akartṛkatvānnityo veda iti ca bauddhānāṃ tadasiddherahetu' /
analyzed: akartṛka tvāt nityaḥ vedaḥ iti ca bauddhānām tad asiddheḥ ahetu
śabdaḥ nitya kṛtaka tvāt iti mīmāṃsakānām asiddhe
tat eva hetuḥ nāma na kaścid vyavatiṣṭhate
atas āha vāc mātrā iti
ayam arthanā siddhaḥ mama iti vāc mātrāt hetuḥ asiddhaḥ bhavati
tathā sati na kaścid anumāna vyavahāra prakalpeta
dvābhyām tu vādi prativādibhyām asattvena
nirākaraṇa siddhau vā dūṣaṇam prativādinaḥ
sandeha viparīta tva hetū ca atra nirākṛtau
jñāta sambandha vacanāt saṃśaya hetavaḥ
siddhaḥ bhavati

original: tasyaiva tathāviṣayasyāsiddhatāvacanaṃ vādino dūṣaṇaṃ bhavati nāsiddha iti
analyzed: tasya eva tathā viṣayasya asiddha tā vacanam vādinaḥ dūṣaṇam bhavati na asiddhaḥ iti
vāc pravṛtti mātrāt iti
nanu kim idam dvayoḥ asiddhaḥ siddhaḥ iti
na hi vivadamānayoḥ ekatra arthe sampratipattiḥ bhavati
na hi janma sahasreṇa api bauddhaḥ vedānām akartṛka tvam anyate
mīmāṃsakaḥ vā api kaṇṭha gata prāṇaḥ u pi kṛtaka tām śabdasya
tat evam ādau ubhaya sampratipatteḥ abhāvāt na hetu bhāvau avatiṣṭhate
atas āha etarat iti
ayam abhiprāya na dvayoḥ asaṃpratipattiḥ iti etāvatā eva sādhana dūṣaṇayoḥ

original: yadi vādinā prayuṅkte sādhane prativādinā cāsiddhatva udbhāvite vādinā tatsādhanaṃ sādhyate,
analyzed: yadi vādinā prayuṅkte sādhane prativādinā ca asiddha tve udbhāvite vādinā tat sādhanam sādhyate
tatas bhavati sādhanam

original: yadi tuparamārthopapattyābhidhānena prativādinā nirākriyate tatastasya dūṣaṇaṃ sidhyati /
analyzed: yadi tu parama artha upapattyā abhidhānena prativādinā nirākriyate tatas tasya dūṣaṇam sidhyati
siddhiḥ evā atrā upayujyate na ubhaya abhyupagama
dvābhyām sattvataḥ jñātaḥ iti api pramāṇa siddhi abhiprāyeṇa uktam
na abhyupagama mātra apekṣayā
yat hi pramāṇena sādhyate
bādhyate vā tatra prāyeṇa ubhaya sampratipattiḥ dṛṣṭā iti
asattvataḥ jñāta apekṣayā itaracchabda

original: yadvādinā sattvena jñātaṃ bhavati prativādinā ca vaiparityena,
analyzed: yadvādinā sattvena jñātam bhavati prativādinā ca vaiparityena
tat vādinā sādhyamānam sādhanam bhavati
etat ca jalpa nyāye sthitvā uktam
vāde tu dvayoḥ api sampratipattiḥ bhavati eva iti
na ca evam anyatara asiddhiḥ adūṣaṇam
yāvat tu vādī na sādhanam sādhayati
tāvat anyatara asiddhyā nigṛhyate

original: sādhite tu tasmin dūṣaṇaṃ parihṛtaṃ bhavatīti //82 1/2//
analyzed: sādhite tu tasmin dūṣaṇam parihṛtam bhavati iti
darśitam tāvat asat nikṛṣṭa eka deśa śabdayoḥ vyāvartya
jñāta sambandha padasya idānī vyāvartyam darśayati sandeha iti vacana antena
sandeha viparīta hetvoḥ hi na sambandhaḥ jñātaḥ bhavati

original: na hi sādhāraṇa' saṃśayahetu' prameyatvaṃ nityatvena jñātasambandhamiti śakyate vaktum,
analyzed: na hi prameya tvam nitya tvena jñāta sambandham iti śakyate vaktum
ghaṭa ādiṣu anitya tayā api jñāta sambandha tvāt nā api kṛtaka tvam nitya tayā
teṣu eva anitya tayā sambandha sa vitte
atas tad jātīya tu bhayam na jñāta saṃbandham iti jñāta sambandha padena vyudasyati
atra ca a saṃnikṛṣṭa padāt
prabhṛti prātilobhyena vārtika kṛtā lakṣaṇa granthe viśeṣaṇa upadāna phalam uktam

original: sat sādhye tadabhāve ca dvābhyāṃ vyāvṛtta eva ca // Msv_5,4.84 //
analyzed: sat sādhye tad abhāve ca dvābhyām vyāvṛttaḥ eva ca
dvau viruddha artha sambaddhau yau ekatra eka deśini
prameya anitya tā mūrti dharmā sādhāraṇāḥ
tat kasya hetoḥ
pratīti krama anusāreṇa
pramātā hi prathamam pakṣa pratyeti
tatas hetum apekṣate
tatas dṛṣṭānta vacanam sat pakṣa nirākaraṇa artham prayuktam asat nikṛṣṭa padam eva tāvat upavarṇitam
tatas hetu padam eka deśa darśanāt iti

original: tato jñātasambandhasyeti dṛṣṭāntadoṣā api sādhyahetuvikalatvādayo 'nena nirākriyante /
analyzed: tatas jñāta sambandhasya iti dṛṣṭānta doṣāḥ api sādhya hetu vikala tva ādayaḥ nena nirākriyante

original: tadvaikalye 'pi svayaṃ sambandho jñātuṃ parasmai pratipādayituṃ śakyata iti /
analyzed: tad vaikalye svayam sambandhaḥ jñātum parasmai pratipādayitum śakyate iti
kiyanta punar saṃśaya hetavaḥ
ā atas āha trayaḥ iti
tān eva trīn prakārān darśayati san iti
sādhya tad abhāvayoḥ san sādhāraṇaḥ bhidhīyate
yathā prameya tvam nitya anitya tvayoḥ
dvābhyām sādhya tad abhāvābhyām gandhavat tvam
vyāvṛtam hi tat sakala sajātīya vijātīya dravya antara guṇa karmabhyaḥ
dvau viruddha artha sambandhau iti
yau viruddha avyabhicāri iti paraiḥ abhihitau
tau ca anantaram eva udāhāryau iti na iha vyākhyāyete iti
tatra sādhāraṇam tāvat udāharaṇaiḥ prapañcayati prameya iti

original: ete ca dharmā' sādhyatadabhāvayo' sādhāraṇā ityartha' //85//
analyzed: ete ca dharmāḥ sādhya tad abhāvayo sādhāraṇāḥ iti artha

original: keṣu puna' sādhyeṣu teṣāṃ sādhāraṇyamata āha---nityeti nityeṣvantena /
analyzed: keṣu punar sādhyeṣu teṣām sādhāraṇyam atas āha nitya iti nityeṣu antena
katham punar vaiṣamye yathāsaṅkhyam atas āha dvis anitya tā iti
anitya tā svasthāne dvi paṭhitavyā
atas yathāsaṅkhyopapatti
tat ayam artha yoḥ dṛṣṭam iti sādhāraṇa tvāt anna ekāntāya prabhavati
atas na āntarikam iti ucyate
atas eva ca saṃśaya hetu
saṃśayaḥ hi sāmānya pratyakṣāt viśeṣa apratyakṣāt viśeṣa smṛteḥ ca bhavati
yathā sthāṇu puruṣayoḥ āroha pariṇāha sāmānya darśanāt
nityā bhūḥ gandhavat tvena syāt asādhāraṇaḥ tu ayam
niścaya eka aṅga vaikalyāt eṣa saṃśaya kāraṇam
dharma an avadhāraṇāt ca viśeṣa smṛti apekṣa

original: kiṃsvidayaṃ sthāṇurāhosvit puruṣa ityanavadhāraṇajñānātmaka' saṃśayo jāyate /
analyzed: kim svid ayam sthāṇuḥ āhosvit puruṣaḥ iti anavadhāraṇa jñāna ātmaka saṃśayaḥ jāyate
evam prameya tvam api

original: nityānityayo' sāmānyaṃ viditavatastadviśeṣamasmaraṇāpekṣastayorevānirdhāraṇātmaka' pratyaya' saṃśayāparanāmā jāyata iti prameyatvaṃ saṃśayahetu'
analyzed: nitya anityayoḥ sāmānyam viditavataḥ tad viśeṣam asmaraṇa apekṣaḥ tayoḥ eva anirdhāraṇa ātmaka pratyaya saṃśaya apara nāmā jāyate iti prameya tvam saṃśaya hetu
ayam ca kṛtsna ubhaya vyāpī saṃśaya hetu

original: tathā yatnottha' śabda' anityatvādityayamapi sādhāraṇa eva /
analyzed: tathā yatna uttha śabda anitya tvāt iti ayam api sādhāraṇaḥ eva

original: ayatnottheṣu keṣucidvidyudādiṣu gatatvādyatnottheṣu ca sarveṣu ghaṭādiṣu vṛtte' /
analyzed: ayatna uttheṣu keṣucid vidyut ādiṣu gata tvāt yatna uttheṣu ca sarveṣu ghaṭa ādiṣu vṛtte
sakala vipakṣa vyāpatī sapakṣa eka deśa gataḥ iti veditavyam
tathā yatna uttha śabda anitya tvāt iti
yatna uttheṣu sarveṣu eva anitya tā dṛṣṭā
tad abhāve pi kvacid megha ādau dṛṣṭā
na vyoma ādau iti
sakala sapakṣa vyāpī vipakṣa eka deśa vartī ca ayam sādhāraṇaḥ iti avasātavyam
ubhaya eka deśa gataḥ tu yathā śabda amūrta tvāt iti

original: amūrtatā hi na sarvanityavyāpinī vyomādiṣu bhāvādaṇuṣu cābhāvādanityamapi na svaṃ vyāpnoti ghaṭakuḍyādiṣvabhāvāt karmādiṣu bhāvāt /
analyzed: amūrta tā hi na sarva nitya vyāpinī vyoma ādiṣu bhāvāt aṇuṣu ca abhāvāt anityam api na svam vyāpnoti ghaṭa kuḍya ādiṣu abhāvāt karma ādiṣu bhāvāt

original: sarvatra cātra dvayavṛttitvameva heto' saṃśaye kāraṇavṛttyaṃśastu sannapi na kāraṇamityatantram /
analyzed: sarvatra ca atra dvaya vṛtti tvam eva saṃśaye kāraṇa vṛtti aṃśaḥ tu san api na kāraṇam iti atantram

original: ata eva sādhāraṇasya caturdhāvibhāgaṃ vadanti ye teṣāmasāvanupayogyeva sādhanadūṣaṇayorityupekṣayoravṛttyaṃśa' kvacidupayujyate /
analyzed: atas eva sādhāraṇasya caturdhā vibhāgam vadanti ye teṣām asau anupayogī eva sādhana dūṣaṇayoḥ iti upekṣayoḥ avṛtti aṃśa kvacid upayujyate

original: aṇvāpi hi mātrayā vipakṣe vartamāno hetustyājya eva /
analyzed: aṇvā api hi mātrayā vipakṣe vartamānaḥ hetuḥ tyājyaḥ eva
dūṣaṇa vādinaḥ u pi vipakṣa vṛtti mātram vacanīyam iti kim tad avāntara viśeṣa āśrayaṇena

original: vārtikakāreṇāpi sarvasādhāraṇeṣu dvayavṛttitvameva saṃśayakāraṇamiti darśayitumudāharaṇaprapañco darśita',
analyzed: vārtikakāreṇa api sarva sādhāraṇeṣu dvaya vṛtti tvam eva saṃśaya kāraṇam iti darśayitum udāharaṇa prapañcaḥ darśita
na punar cāturvidhyam abhametya
yathā āha
na tu ekasya upayogaḥ sti dūṣaṇa udbhāvanam prati
tyajyate sādhane ca evam sādhāraṇyāt viśeṣataḥ iti
prapañcataḥ sādhāraṇa
asādhāraṇam idānīm saṃśaya hetum udāharati nityā bhūḥ iti
gandhaḥ hi sva asādhāraṇaḥ guṇa

original: na tāṃ vihāya nityamanityaṃ vā bhāvāntaramāśrayayatītyasādhāraṇa iti gīyata /
analyzed: na tām vihāya nityam anityam vā bhāva antaram āśrayayati iti asādhāraṇaḥ iti gīyata
sādhāraṇaḥ yathā dṛṣṭaḥ buddhi dvaya nimittaka
viruddha eka anavāpteḥ ca saṃśaye kāraṇam mata
yatra asādhāraṇaḥ na asti tad avabhāva mukhena tu
dvaya asattva virodhāt ca saṃśaya kāraṇam
āha astu asādhāraṇam gandhavat tvam
katham tu saṃśaya hetu

original: yuktaṃ hi pakṣadvayāvalambī sādhāraṇo dvayoranavasthādhiyamādadhāno yatsaṃśayaheturiti,
analyzed: yuktam hi pakṣa dvaya avalambī sādhāraṇaḥ dvayoḥ anavasthā dhiyam ādadhānaḥ yat saṃśaya hetuḥ iti

original: asādhāraṇastu dvābhyāṃ vyāvṛtto naikatrāpi dhiyamupajanayitumalāmiti kathamasya saṃśayahetubhāva',
analyzed: asādhāraṇaḥ tu dvābhyām vyāvṛttaḥ na ekatra api dhiyam upajanayitum alām iti katham asya saṃśaya hetu bhāva
atas āha niścaya iti

original: hetorhi niścayajanane 'nvayavyatirekāvaṅgamanyatarāpāye 'pi na niścayāya hetu' paryāpto bhavati /
analyzed: hetoḥ hi niścaya janane nvaya vyatirekau aṅgam anyatara apāye na niścayāya hetu paryāptaḥ bhavati

original: tad yathā sādharaṇo 'nvayasanātho 'pi vinākṛto vyatirekeṇa na niścayāya prabhavati,
analyzed: tat yathā vinākṛtaḥ vyatirekeṇa na niścayāya prabhavati

original: evamevāsādharaṇo 'pi niścayasyaikenānvayanāmnāṅgena vilastamakurvan saṃśayahetutāṃ pratipadyata iti //86 1/2//
analyzed: evam eva asādharaṇaḥ niścayasya ekena anvaya nāmnā aṅgena vilastam akurvan saṃśaya hetu tām pratipadyate iti

original: nanūktaṃ sādhāraṇo dvayagāmī dvaye buddhiṃ janayan saṃśaye heturiti /
analyzed: nanu uktam sādhāraṇaḥ dvaya gāmī dvaye buddhim janayan saṃśaye hetuḥ iti

original: asādhāraṇastu na kiñcid jñāpayatīti nāsāvekāṅgavikalatāmātreṇa saṃśayaheturiti yuktamata āha---sādhāraṇaiti dvayena /
analyzed: asādhāraṇaḥ tu na kiñcid jñāpayati iti na asau ekāṅga vikala tā mātreṇa saṃśaya hetuḥ iti yuktam atas āha sādhāraṇā eti dvayena
ayam abhiprāya sādhāraṇaḥ na ubhayatra buddhi jananāt saṃśaya hetu
kintu viruddha ubhaya pratipādana mukhena

original: viruddhe dyubhayasmin pratipādite tayorekatra samavāyasambhavād vyāghātādeva saṃśayo bhavati /
analyzed: viruddhe div ubhayasmin pratipādite tayoḥ ekatra samavāya sambhavāt vyāghātāt eva saṃśayaḥ bhavati
tat ca asādhāraṇe pi aviśiṣṭam

original: asādhāraṇo 'pi dyubhayasmād vyāvṛttestadabhāvaṃ gamayan dvayābhāvāsambhavādeva saṃśayaṃ janayati /
analyzed: asādhāraṇaḥ pi vyāvṛtteḥ tad abhāvam gamayan dvaya abhāva asambhavāt eva saṃśayam janayati

original: na hi sambhavati nityamanityaṃ ca vastu na bhavatīti,
analyzed: na hi sambhavati nityam anityam ca vastu na bhavati iti
dharma dvandvaiḥ eva hi sarvam
atas ubhaya abhāvaḥ virudhyate
na ca ubhaya bhāva
virodhāt eva
na ca anyatara parigrahaḥ viśeṣāt
tam imam saṅkaṭam āsādya prāmāṇika saṃśete

original: ayaṃ cātrāvayavārtha'---yathā prameyatvādi' sādhāraṇo dṛṣṭa' san buddhidvayanimittaka' /
analyzed: ayam ca atra avayava artha yathā prameya tva ādi sādhāraṇaḥ san buddhi dvaya nimittaka
buddhi dvayam saṃśaye nimittam asthāti iti bahuvrīhi
nimitta śabdena ca buddhi dvayasya nimitta mātra tām kathayati

original: sādhyatadabhāvaviṣayaṃ hi buddhidvayaṃ nimittīkṛtya viruddhaikānavāptereva sādhāraṇena saṃśayo janyate /
analyzed: sādhya tad abhāva viṣayam hi buddhi dvayam nimittīkṛtya viruddha eka anavāpteḥ eva sādhāraṇena saṃśayaḥ janyate
na hi
paraspara viruddhābhyām śabdaḥ vyāpyate
dharmi bheda nibandhanaḥ hi viruddha dharma abhyāsaḥ
yathā nityam vyoma anityam kārya dravyam iti
atas smāt pratīti vyāghātāt eva sādhāraṇena saṃśayaḥ manyate
sa ca ayam asādhāraṇasya api samāna

original: so 'pi hi yatra nitye 'nitye vā nāsti tadabhāvaṃ pratipādya tanmukhena dvayasattvavirodhamāpādayan saṃśayakāraṇaṃ bhavatīti /
analyzed: saḥ u pi hi yatra nitye nitye vā na asti tad abhāvam pratipādya tad mukhena dvaya sattva virodham āpādayan saṃśaya kāraṇam bhavati iti
idam ca asādhāraṇasya saṃśaya hetu tvam na amum anyante

original: avyavasthayā hyubhayasmin manasi viparivartamāne saṃśayo bhavati /
analyzed: avyavasthayā hi ubhayasmin manasi viparivartamāne saṃśayaḥ bhavati
na ca asādhāraṇena kiñcid buddhau ādhīyate
tasya kenacid anvaya abhāvāt

original: api ca parimiteṣveva bhāveṣu saṃśayo dṛṣṭa' /
analyzed: api ca parimiteṣu eva bhāveṣu saṃśayaḥ

original: nivṛttimukhena tu saṃśayajanane sarvato nivṛttenāsādhāraṇena sarvatomukha' saṃśayo janyeta /
analyzed: nivṛtti mukhena tu saṃśaya janane sarvatas nivṛttena asādhāraṇena sarvatomukha saṃśayaḥ janyeta
na ca sarva viṣaya saṃśayaḥ dṛṣṭa cara
tasya buddhau anārohāt
na ca kvacid nivṛtti mātreṇa sarvatra abhāva śakyate vagantum
yad mukhena saṃśayaḥ bhavet
na hi anuvṛttau adṛṣṭāyām vyāvṛtti sidhyati

original: agnāvanuvartamāno hi dhūmo dṛṣṭavyatireko 'gniniyatasvabhāvatvenāvagator'thādadṛśyamānebhyo 'vagnibhyo vyatiricyata ityavagamyate /
analyzed: agnau anuvartamānaḥ hi dhūmaḥ dṛṣṭa vyatirekaḥ gni niyata svabhāva tvena avagataḥ ūrthāt adṛśyamānebhyaḥ vyatiricyate iti avagamyate

original: yastu na kenacidanvitastasya kathamanupalabdhiyogyāt sarvato vyatireka' pratīyeta /
analyzed: yaḥ tu na kenacid anvitaḥ tasya katham anupalabdhi yogyāt sarvatas

original: yadi tvasādhāraṇadharmāṇobhāvā nityānityabhāvabhājo dṛṣṭā iti kṣitimapi taddharimikāmupalabhya nityā vā syādanityā veti saṃśayo bhavatītyucyate
analyzed: yadi tu asādhāraṇa dharmāṇaḥ bhāvāḥ nitya anitya bhāva bhājaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ iti kṣitim api tad harimikām upalabhya nityā vā syāt anityā vā iti saṃśayaḥ bhavati iti ucyate
evam tarhi asādhāraṇa dharma tvāt eva bahu sādhāraṇāt saṃśayaḥ na asādhāraṇāt

original: anyo hyasādhāraṇadharma' anyā ca bahusādhāraṇī tadvattā /

original: tad yadyasau saṃśayakāraṇaṃ jātā kiṃ jātamasādhāraṇasya /

original: hantaivaṃ sādhāraṇa eva saṃśayaheturabhyupagato bhavatīti siddham /

na asādhāraṇasya saṃśaya hetu tvam
anyat matam anadhyavasāya hetuḥ eva ayam iti
asti kila anadhyavasāyaḥ nāma jñānasya prakāra
saḥ u senā janyate
bhavati hi tādṛś adharma dṛśa kimbhūta tasya asya dharmaḥ yam iti anadhyavasita avabhāsa vratyaya
na ca eva prāmāṇam
aniścaya ātmaka tvāt
na ca saṃśaya pakṣa dvaya asaṃsparśāt
saḥ yam evaṃvidha anadhyavasāyaḥ sādhāraṇena janyate iti
na tu etat ghaṭate

original: na hyanavyavasāyo nāma kaścid jñānasya prakāra',
analyzed: na hi anavyavasāyaḥ nāma kaścid jñānasya prakāra
yamayam janayet
adhyavasāya abhāvaḥ na adhyavasāya
sa ca prāgabhāva rūpa tvāt na janya
atha anya mātra vacanaḥ naṃ a brāhmaṇa ādi vat iṣyate tatas saṃśaya
sandigdha hetu tā ca eṣām viṣaya apekṣayā ucyate
nirṇayasya api hetu tvam dṛṣṭam sādhya antare yata
vyavaccheda anvayau labdhvā niṣkriya ādau amūrti vat
eva tad śabda vācyaḥ bhavet
na ca tad hetuḥ asādhāraṇaḥ iti phaṇitam eva
atha adharma ādi vat vipa parīta vacanaḥ nañ
evam sati viparyavācyaḥ na adhyavasāya śabdaḥ bhavet
na ca viparīta avagrahaḥ sādhāraṇena janyate iti
yadi tu na me smin vastuni adhyavasāyaḥ sti iti adhyavasāya abhāva avadhāraṇam eva an adhyavasāya

atas jijñāsā mātra hetuḥ asādhāraṇaḥ iti samarthanīyam

original: bhavati hi taddarśina' kīdṛgdharmo 'yamito dharmād bhāvo bhavediti
analyzed: bhavati hi tad darśina kīdṛś dharmaḥ yamitaḥ dharmāt bhāvaḥ bhavet iti

original: yadyapi cāsau śuddhadharmidarśanādapi kadācid bhavatyeva tathāpi dharmadvāreṇāpi tāvad bhavatyeveti na taddhetutvamanupapannam /
analyzed: yadi api ca asau śuddha dharmi darśanāt api kadācid bhavati eva tathā api dharma dvāreṇa api tāvat bhavati eva iti na tad hetu tvam anupapannam
āha ca
tena ajñānam asiddhebhyaḥ
sāmānyāt saṃśayaḥ yuktaḥ tathā sa pratisādhanāt iti

jñāta sambandha padasya hi vyāvartanīyam atra darśayitum abhipretam

iti

original: idaṃ ca vārttikakṛtaiva pradeśāntare svayamupanyasya yathoktadūṣaṇairdūṣi tameveti //88//
analyzed: idam ca vārttikakṛtā eva pradeśa antare svayam upanyasya yathā ukta dūṣaṇaiḥ dūṣi tam eva iti

original: amūrtatā hi nityatve sādhye nityānityavyomakarmasādhāraṇī saṃśayaheturāsīdat,

original: gandhaviśeṣadarśino hi viditavyāpte' kṣityekadeśasiddhatve bhavatyānumāniko nirṇaya iti //90 1/2//

original: yatra hi na sākṣātkārijñānaviṣayo vāyu' arūpatvādityeka' sādhayati /

dvayoḥ api sādhanayoḥ prasiddha avayava tva aviśeṣāt
arūpam hi arūpi samavetam apratyakṣam iti kāṇādāḥ manyante

atas na pratyakṣaḥ

viruddhayoḥ ekatra upānapāta asambhavāt

original: yathā sarvajño 'stīti buddhavacanaṃ samyak taduktatvād kṣaṇabhaṅgādivākyavadityekenokte

original: viruddhārthasambandhau saṃśayahetū iti dvivacanāntenaiva nāmnā saṃśayahetubhāvo darśita' /
