pratyekam saṃhatau vā api gamakau avirodhinau
tasmāt bhinau viriddha arthau hetū ca atra nidarśitau
ṣoḍhā viruddha tām āhuḥ caturdhā vā ekadhā api vā
api tarhi paraspara viruddha artha upaplāvaka tvam eva

original: viruddhau hi dvābhyāṃ dvāvarthāvekatropaplāvitāviti tatra saṃśerate /
analyzed: viruddhau hi dvābhyām dvau arthau ekatra upaplāvitau iti tatra saṃśerate
na tu hetu anekatvāt
saṃśaya hetvoḥ api pratyekam avagatayoḥ ubhaya samāveśāt eva kvacid nirṇayaḥ
yathā
kevalā hi ūrdhvatā sthāṇu puruṣa sādhāraṇī na anyatara nirṇayāya prabhavati
kāka nilayana sahakṛtā tu sthāṇuḥ ayam iti niścāyayati

original: tadatraikasyaiva saṃśayahetutvaṃ dvābhyāmeva tu nirṇaya ityaprayojakaṃ saṃśayahetutve dvitvaṃ,
analyzed: tat atra ekasya eva saṃśaya hetu tvam dvābhyām eva tu nirṇayaḥ iti aprayojakam saṃśaya hetu tve dvi tvam
viruddha aneka sādhya tvam eva saṃśaya hetu

original: yathā khalveka eva sādhārama' sapakṣavipakṣayorvartamāna' saṃśayaheturbhavati /
analyzed: yathā khalu ekaḥ eva sādhārama sapakṣa vipakṣayoḥ vartamāna saṃśaya hetuḥ bhavati

original: evaṃ viruddhārthasyāpi hetudvayasyāṃśābhyāmubhayavṛttireva saṃśaye kāraṇamiti na taddvitvena hetutvanirākaraṇaṃ yuktamityāha---kvaciditi /
analyzed: evam viruddha arthasya api hetu dvayasya aṃśābhyām ubhaya vṛttiḥ eva saṃśaye kāraṇam iti na tad dvi tvena hetu tva nirākaraṇam yuktam iti āha kvacid iti
nanu yuktam
tāvat ūrdhva tayā sthāṇu puruṣa sandehaḥ bhavati iti
kākavattā mātreṇa na saṃśayaḥ dṛṣṭa pūrva
satyam

original: yastu kākavattāmātreṇa sthāṇuṃ siṣādhayiṣati tasyāsau kevalā saṃśayahetu',
analyzed: yaḥ tu kāka vat tā mātreṇa sthāṇum siṣādhayiṣati tasya asau kevalā saṃśaya hetu
ūrdhva tā sanāthā tu nirṇāyikā iti etāvat eva vivakṣitam iti adoṣaḥ iti

original: api ca avirodhino' pratyekaṃ saṃhatayorapi kvacidarthe sādhye hetubhāvo dṛśyate /
analyzed: api ca avirodhinoḥ pratyekam saṃhatayoḥ api kvacid arthe sādhye hetu bhāvaḥ dṛśyate
yathā ekasmin eva śābdasya jñānasya anumā tve nvaya vyatireka ja tva pratyakṣa anya pramāṇa tvayoḥ

original: śakyate hi tābhyāmaikaikaśyena samastābhyāṃ cānumānatvaṃ sādhayitum /
analyzed: śakyate hi tābhyām aikaikaśyena samastābhyām ca anumāna tvam sādhayitum

original: dvitve ca hetvābhāsatvakāraṇe naikasmin sādhye 'nekahetava' prayujyeran /
analyzed: dvi tve ca hetvābhāsa tva kāraṇe na ekasmin sādhye na eka hetavaḥ prayujyeran

original: prayoktārastvekameva sādhyaṃ kiñcānyaditaśceti nānāsādhanai' sādhayanto dṛśyante /
analyzed: prayoktāraḥ tu ekam eva sādhyam kiñca anyat itas ca iti nānā sādhanaiḥ sādhayantaḥ dṛśyante
tasmāt virodha nibandhanaḥ saṃśaya
na tu nānātva nibandhanaḥ iti abhiprāyeṇa āha pratyekam iti
pūrvam tu pratyekam saṃśaya hetvoḥ eva militayoḥ nirṇaya hetu tvam uktam

original: ga atra tu pratyekaṃ gamakāvapi saṃhatau ca gamakāviti pratipāditamiti //95//
analyzed: atra tu pratyekam gamakau api saṃhatau ca gamakau iti pratipāditam iti
tasmāt viruddha arthau eva bhinnau saṃśaya hetu tvena darśanīyau
yathā asmābhiḥ uktam na tu bhinna tā mātreṇa iti āha tasmāt iti
vyākhyātaḥ tri prakāraḥ
śruti artha uktasya bādhāyām pratijñā arthasya hetunā
nitya tve kṛtaka tvasya dharma bādhāt viruddha tā
bādhaḥ dharma viśeṣasya yadā tu evam viśiṣyate
arthavat śabda rūpam syāt prāk sambandha avadhāraṇāt
pisaṃśaya hetu viparīta prakārān pratijānāti ṣoḍhā viruddha tām āhuḥ iti
dharma dharmi sva rūpa sva viśeṣa ubhaya sva rūpa sva viśeṣaiḥ ṣaṣ prakārām viruddha tām eke bruvate iti artha

original: anye tūbhayavirothayo' pratyekapakṣānatirekāt cāturvidhyaṃ pratipannā ityāha--- caturdhā
analyzed: anye tu ubhaya virothayoḥ pratyeka pakṣa anatirekāt cāturvidhyam pratipannāḥ iti āha caturdhā
vā iti

original: vayaṃ tu iṣṭavighātamātreṇaikameva prakāraṃ saṅgirāmaha ityāha--- ekadhāpi veti /
analyzed: vayam tu iṣṭa vighāta mātreṇa ekam eva prakāram saṅgirāmahe iti āha ekadhā api vā iti
pūrva ukta pakṣa pakṣa dvaya nivṛttau api vā śabda

original: api vā śeṣabhājāṃ syāditi pakṣabādha eva viruddhatve kāraṇaṃ kimavāntarabhedopanyāseneti /
analyzed: api vā śeṣa bhājām syāt iti pakṣa bādhaḥ eva viruddha tve kāraṇam kim avāntarabheda upanyāsena iti

original: triṣvapi ca prakāreṣu śrutyarthopāttasya pratijñātārthasya bādhāyāṃ viruddhatāmāhurityāha--- śrutyārthoktasyeti /
analyzed: triṣu api ca prakāreṣu śruti artha upāttasya pratijñāta arthasya bādhāyām viruddha tām āhuḥ iti āha śruti artha uktasya iti
dharma dharmi ubhaya svarūpam śruti uktam
tad viśeṣāḥ tu prāyeṇa artha uktā
te ca sva rūpa sva viśeṣā pratijñā artha śabdena upādīyante
sarve hi te vaktuḥ abhipretā
na tu dharma ādi viśeṣā sākṣāt pratijñāyām antargatā

original: tadasmin pratijñārthe hetunā bādhyamāne hetorviruddhatā bhavatīti /
analyzed: tat asmin pratijñā arthe hetunā bādhyamāne hetoḥ viruddha tā bhavati iti
tat punar idam vipratiṣiddham iva manayāmahe

original: kathaṃ hi pratijñārthe hetunā bādhyamāne heturviruddho bhavati /
analyzed: katham hi pratijñā arthe hetunā bādhyamāne hetuḥ viruddhaḥ bhavati

original: sa hi pratijñārthaṃ pratijñārthena bādhyate yadviruddho bhavet prasiddhatvādasya /
analyzed: sa hi pratijñā artham pratijñā arthena bādhyate yat viruddhaḥ bhavet prasiddha tvāt asya
prasiddham hi ghaṭasya kṛtaka tvam
na tat aprasiddhayā nitya tayā bādhitum śakyam
atas bādhakaḥ iti eva ayam

original: vārtikakṛtā tu paraprasiddhimātreṇa viruddha ityuktāmiti veditavyamiti /
analyzed: vārtika kṛtā tu para prasiddhi mātreṇa viruddhaḥ iti uktām iti veditavyam iti
tatra dharma svarūpa bādhena tāvat viruddha tām udāharati nitya tve iti
dharma viśeṣa bādhaḥ tu evam prayukte bhavati iti āha bādhā eti
tam eva prayogam darśayati arthavat iti pāda trayeṇa
svarūpa abhidhāna vādinaḥ hi āhu gauḥ ayam iti śabda ākāra viśiṣṭaḥ ūrthaḥ vagamyate

original: na ca viśeṣaṇamanabhidhāya viśiṣṭo 'bhidhātuṃ śakyata iti svarūpameva tāvadādau śabdo
analyzed: na ca viśeṣaṇam an abhidhāya viśiṣṭaḥ abhidhātum śakyate iti svarūpam eva tāvat ādau śabdaḥ
vibhaktimat tvāt paścādvat sva rūpeṇa iti ca āśrite
asvarūpa artha yogaḥ tu paścāt śabdasya dṛśyate
tena prāk api sambandhāt asvarūpa artha tā bhavet
ihapratyaya hetu tvāt dravya ādeḥ vyatiricyate
samavāyaḥ yathā iha ayam ghaṭaḥ ityādi saṅgati
abhidhatte tatas viśiṣṭam
api ca artha śabdaḥ vyabhicarati
ajñāta sambandhasya tad anavagate

original: svarūpaṃ tu na kadācid vyabhicarati sambandhāvadhāraṇātprāgapi tadavagamāt,
analyzed: svarūpam tu na kadācid vyabhicarati sambandha avadhāraṇāt prāk api tad avagamāt
avyabhicārī ca śabda arthaḥ iti yuktam
atas svarūpam tāvat avaśya abhidheyam śabdānām
tad abhidhā uttara kālam tu viśiṣṭa abhidhānam api bhavatu nāma iti

original: evaṃ prasādhyānte prayogamāhu'--- śabdasvarūpaṃ sambandhāvadhāraṇāt prāgarthavad vibhaktisambandhāt,
analyzed: evam prasādhya ante prayogam āhuḥ śabda svarūpam sambandha avadhāraṇāt prāk artha vat vibhakti sambandhāt
agṛhīta sambandhaḥ pi hi sva ādi vibhakti yuktān śabdān avagacchati

original: yadā ca vibhaktiyoga' tadārthavattvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā sambandhagrahaṇāt paścāditi /
analyzed: yadā ca vibhakti yoga tadā arthavat tvam dṛṣṭam yathā sambandha grahaṇāt paścāt iti

original: kathaṃ punarevaṃ prayujyamāne dharmaviśeṣabādho bhavatyata āha--- svarūpeṇeti cāśrita iti /
analyzed: katham punar evam prayujyamāne dharma viśeṣa bādhaḥ bhavati atas āha sva rūpeṇa iti ca āśritaḥ iti
yadā hi sva rūpeṇa arthanā arthavat tvam prathamam āśritya arthavat tā mātra viśiṣṭam sādhyate
tadā arthāt idam avagamyate svarūpa arthavat tvam asya siṣādhayiṣitam iti

original: evaṃ ca bhavatyarthākṣiptasya dharmaviśeṣasya bādha iti /
analyzed: evam ca bhavati artha ākṣiptasya dharma viśeṣasya bādhaḥ iti

original: kathaṃ puna' svarūpeṇeti cāśrite dharmaviśeṣo bādhyate /
analyzed: katham punar sva rūpeṇa iti ca āśrite dharma viśeṣaḥ bādhyate
atas āha asvarūpa iti
vibhaktimat tvam hi svarūpa atirekeṇa artha antareṇa arthavattvam avinābhāva balena śabdasya avagamayati
sambandha grahaṇāt paścāt artha antarasya darśāt
atas vyāpti balena tat eva vibhaktimat tayā sādhyate

original: ator'thavattāyā viśeṣaṃ svasvarūpārthavattvaṃ heturayaṃ viruṇaddhīti bhavati dharmaviśeṣabādha iti //99 1/2//
analyzed: atorthavattāyāḥ viśeṣam sva svarūpa arthavattvam hetuḥ ayam viruṇaddhi iti bhavati dharma viśeṣa bādhaḥ iti
dharmi svarūpa bādhā udāharaṇam āha aiha pratyaya iti

original: yadā hisamavāyadharmiṇaṃ kṛtvā tasya dravyādivyatireka' sādhyate,
analyzed: yadā hi samavāya dharmiṇam kṛtvā tasya dravya ādi vyatireka sādhyate

original: ihapratyahetutvaṃ ca heturucyate ihāyaṃ ghaṭa iti,
analyzed: iha prati a hetu tvam ca hetuḥ ucyate iha ayam ghaṭaḥ iti
saṃyogaḥ dṛṣṭānta
tadā dharmi svarūpa bādhaḥ
atra api asamavāya tvam saṃyogasya iva sidhyati
tena dharmi svarūpasya vaiparītyāt viruddha tā
yat ca sattāvat eka tvam samavāyasya kalpitam
tatra saṃyoga vat bhedāt sāyat viśeṣa viruddha tā

original: nityamātmāstitā kaiścid yadā sautrāntikaṃ prati // Msv_5,4.103 //
analyzed: nityam ātma astitā kaiścid yadā sautrāntikam prati
sādhyate vayava abhāvāt vyoma vat dvaya bādhanam
tadā ubhaya viśeṣasya bādhaḥ yam sādhyate yadā
pārārthyam cakṣuḥ ādīnām saṅghātāt śayana ādi vat
śayane saṅgha pārārthyam bhautika vyāpta hetuke
katham punar atra udāharaṇe dharmi svarūpa bādha
atas āha atra api iti
atra api udāharaṇe dharmi svarūpasya samavāya ātmanaḥ vaiparītya āpādanāt hetoḥ viruddha tā bhavati

original: ihapratyayahetutvaṃ hyasamavāyātmana eva dṛṣṭamiti tādrūpyaṃ virundhyāditi dharmisvarūpabādha iti //101 1/2//
analyzed: ihapratyaya hetu tvam hi asamavāya ātmanaḥ eva dṛṣṭam iti tādrūpyam virundhyāt iti dharmi svarūpa bādhaḥ iti
asmin eva ca dharmi viśeṣa bādhaḥ darśayitavyaḥ iti āha yat ca iti

original: samavāyo hi sattāsāmānyavadekarūpa iti kāṇādā manyante /
analyzed: samavāyaḥ hi sattā sāmānya vat eka rūpaḥ iti kāṇādāḥ manyante

original: so 'pyasya viśeṣa' saṃyogavadbhedāpatterbādhyata iti bhavati dharmiviśeṣaviruddho heturiti //102 1/2//
analyzed: saḥ u pi asya saṃyoga vat bheda āpatteḥ bādhyate iti bhavati dharmi viśeṣa viruddhaḥ hetuḥ iti
ubhaya svarūpa bādhāyām udāharaṇam āha nityam ātma astitā iti

original: yadā kaścit sautrāntikaṃ pratyevaṃ sādhayati--- ātmā nitya' niravayatvāt vyomavaditi,
analyzed: yadā kaścid sautrāntikam prati evam sādhayati ātmā nitya niravaya tvāt vyoma vat iti
tadā dharma dharmi dvayasya bādhanam bhavati

original: sautrāntikasya hyavayavābhāvo vyomnyabhāvenaiva sambaddho 'bhimata ityātmano 'pi tadvadabhāvaṃ gamayeta,
analyzed: sautrāntikasya hi avayava abhāvaḥ vyomni abhāvena eva sambaddhaḥ bhimataḥ iti ātmanaḥ u pi tadvat abhāvam gamayeta
āvaraṇa abhāva mātram hi nabha
na punar tattva antaram iti bauddhāḥ manyante

original: ato 'navayavatvādātmana' svarūpasya taddharmasya ca nityatvasya bādhādubhayabādha iti //103 1/2//
analyzed: atas nava yava tvāt ātmanaḥ sva rūpasya tad dharmasya ca nitya tvasya bādhāt ubhaya bādhaḥ iti
ubhaya viśeṣa bādhaḥ tu evam sādhyamāne bhavati iti āha tadā iti

original: yadā hi parārthāścakṣurādaya' saṅghātatvāt śayanādivaditi sādhyate,
analyzed: yadā hi para arthāḥ cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ saṅghāta tvāt śayana ādi vat iti sādhyate
tadā ubhaya viśeṣa bādhaḥ iti artha
katham punar atra ubhaya viśeṣa bādha
atas āha śayane iti
śayanīye
ātmānam prati pārārthyam asiddham iti bādhanam
asaṃhata parārtha tve
dṛṣṭe saṃhata tā api ca
anāhaṅkārika tvam ca cakṣuḥ āde prasajyate

original: hikhaṭvādau mahābhūtasaṃhataśarīrapārārthyena saṅghātatvāditi heturvyāpto dṛṣṭa iti saṃhatapārārthyameva sādhayet /
analyzed: hi khaṭvā ādau mahābhūta saṃhata śarīra pārārthyena saṅghāta tvāt iti hetuḥ vyāptaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti saṃhata pārārthyam eva sādhayet
ātmānam ca prati pārārthyam sādhayitum abhimatam
tat na sidhyet

original: so 'yaṃ tāvat pārārthyasya dharmasya yo viśeṣo 'bhimata ātmapārārthyaṃ sa tāvad bādhyate /
analyzed: saḥ yam tāvat pārārthyasya dharmasya yaḥ viśeṣaḥ bhimataḥ ātma pārārthyam sa tāvat bādhyate

original: cakṣurāderapi dharmiṇo yo viśeṣa āhaṅkārikatvaṃ nāma so 'pyanenaiva hetunā bādhyate /
analyzed: cakṣuḥ ādeḥ api dharmiṇaḥ yaḥ viśeṣaḥ āhaṅkārika tvam nāma saḥ u pi anena eva hetunā bādhyate
saṃhata ātmaka tvam hi śayana ādau anāhaṅkārika tvena vyāptam dṛṣṭam
bhautikāḥ hi te
atas tad nidarśanena cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ bhautikāḥ bhaveyu
āhaṅkārikāṇi indriyāṇi iti kāpilā saṅgirante
teṣām ca ayam prayoga

original: tadayamartha'--- saṃhatapārārthyabhautikatvābhyāṃ vyāpto heturyasmin śayane tatrātmapārārthyamasiddhamiti dharmaviśeṣabādhanaṃ tāvad bhavati
analyzed: tat ayam artha saṃhata pārārthya bhautika tvābhyām vyāptaḥ hetuḥ yasmin śayane tatra ātma pārārthyam asiddham iti dharma viśeṣa bādhanam tāvat bhavati

original: dharmiviśeṣabādho 'pi bhautikavayāptyā sūtrito 'nantarameva vivariṣyata iti na kevalamātmapārārthyaṃ na sidhyati,
analyzed: dharmi viśeṣa bādhaḥ pi bhautika vayāptyā sūtritaḥ nantaram eva vivariṣyate iti na kevalam ātma pārārthyam na sidhyati

original: asaṃhatarūpātmapārārthye ceṣṭe vyāptibalenātmano 'pi saṃhatatā prāpnotītyāha--- asaṃhateti /
analyzed: asaṃhata rūpa ātma pārārthye ca iṣṭe vyāpti balena ātmanaḥ u pi saṃhata tā prāpnoti iti āha asaṃhata iti
na anena hetunā asaṃhata rūpa ātma artha tā sidhyati
pratyuta saṃhata tā eva atnaḥ bhavet iti
dharmi viśeṣa bādham vivṛṇoti anāhaṅkārika tvam iti
vyākhyāta caram ca idam
evam tāvat jñāta sambandha pada vyāvartanīyaḥ viruddha
idānīm tad vyāvartyā eva dṛṣṭānta ābhāsā darśayitavyā
taiḥ hi na anumāna aṅga sambandhaḥ jñāpayitum śakyate
atas te pi jñāta sambandha padena eva vyāvartyante
idam ca asmābhi prāk eva uktam
anyatra api āha
jñāta sambandha vācā ca trayaḥ
hetu dṛṣṭāntayoḥ deṣā bhāṣyakāreṇa vāritā
gamakasya eka deśasya vyāptiḥ gamyā iti bhāṣitum
sādhya sādharmya vaidharmya dṛṣṭānta pratipādyate
tatra hetu artham uddiśya sādhya upādānam iṣyate
uddeśyaḥ vyāpyate dharmaḥ vyāpakaḥ ca itaraḥ mata
yad vṛtta yoga prāthamyam ityādi uddeśya lakṣaṇam
tad vṛttam evakāraḥ ca syāt upādeya lakṣaṇam
iti
atas tad nirākaraṇa artham dṛṣṭānta vacanam eva tāvat avatārayati gamakasya iti
vyāpti pradarśanāya dvividhaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ tāvat sādhana vākye

original: sādhya' pakṣa' tatsādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ yo dṛṣṭānta' sa pratipādyata ityartha' //107 1/2//
analyzed: sādhya pakṣa tad sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām yaḥ dṛṣṭānta sa pratipādyate iti artha
tatra sādharya dṛṣṭānta prakāram āha tatra iti
asya arthaḥ udāharaṇa sādharmyāt liṅgasya prasādhaka tva vacanam yat āhu
udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetu iti
sādhyasya prajñāpana vacanam iti yāvat
tasya ca arthaḥ liṅgam eva
tat ca uddiśya sādhya upādānam sādharmya dṛṣṭānte iṣyate

original: yo yo dhūmavān sa so 'gnimāniti yāvaditi /
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ dhūmavān sa saḥ gnimān iti yāvat iti
kim evam upādīyamāne sidhyati atas āha uddeśyaḥ iti
ukatam vyāpti pradarśanāya dṛṣṭānta vacanam iti

original: evaṃ copādīyamāna uddeśyo dhūmādirvyāptatayā kathito bhavati,
analyzed: evam ca upādīyamānaḥ uddeśyaḥ dhūma ādiḥ vyāpta tayā kathitaḥ bhavati
itaraḥ ca upādeyaḥ gni ādiḥ vyāpaka tvam bhavati iti uktam
kīdṛśam tu tayoḥ svarūpam atas āha yat vṛttā iti
yad vṛtta tad vṛttābhyām yat tat pariniṣpannānām yaḥ yaḥ iti ādi śabdānām upādānam
tat ayam arthaḥ bhavati

original: yadyad yadvṛttena saṃyuktaṃ prathamaṃ prayujyate pradhānaṃ ca taduddeśyaṃ,
analyzed: yat yat yad vṛttena saṃyuktam prathamam prayujyate pradhānam ca tat uddeśyam

original: tattadvṛttuyaktaṃ ca paścāt prayujyamānaṃ sa so 'gnimāneveti caivakāreṇa yuktaṃ tadupādeyam /
analyzed: tat tat vṛttu yaktam ca paścāt prayujyamānam sa saḥ gnimān evā iti ca evakāreṇa yuktam tat upādeyam
sarveṣu eva ca graha vrīhi ādi saṃmārga avaghāta ādiṣu uddeśya upādeyeṣu ayam eva vivekaḥ iti veditavyam iti

original: vadatyarthaṃ svaśaktyā ca śabdo vaktranapekṣayā // Msv_5,4.110 //
analyzed: vadati artham sva śaktyā ca śabdaḥ vaktṛ anapekṣayā
sādhya hetu tvam arthānām vyāpti śakti anurodhata
tatra ajñānāt yadā vaktā sahabhāva vivakṣayā

original: viparyayeṇa vā hetau na pyāptatvaṃ vivakṣati /
analyzed: viparyayeṇa vā hetau na vivakṣati

original: vivakṣannapi vā śabdaṃ tadyogaṃ na vaded yadi // Msv_5,4.112 //
analyzed: vivakṣan api vā śabdam tad yogam na vadet yadi

original: ghaṭe kṛtakanāśitve nāśi vyāptaṃ kṛtena vā /
analyzed: ghaṭe kṛtaka nāśi tve vyāptam kṛtena vā

original: na tadeṣṭasya hetutvaṃ syādaniṣṭasya caiva tat // Msv_5,4.113 //
analyzed: na tadā iṣṭasya hetu tvam syāt aniṣṭasya ca eva tat
kim punar evam prayoga niyame prayojanam
vivakṣā paratantrāḥ hi śabdāḥ

original: te yathā tathā vā prayuktā yathābhiprāyaṃ vartiṣyanta eva /
analyzed: te yathā tathā vā prayuktāḥ yathā abhiprāyam vartiṣyante eva
atas āha vadati iti
na vaktṛ abhiprāya paratantrā śabdāḥ

original: svābhāvikyaiva tu śaktyā kecideva kvacidevārthe vartante,
analyzed: svābhāvikyā eva tu śaktyā kecid eva kvacid eva arthe vartante

original: ato na vivakṣānusāreṇeṣṭasiddhirbhavatīti vācya eva dṛṣṭāntavacanavinyāsaprakāra iti //110//
analyzed: atas na vivakṣā anusāreṇa iṣṭa siddhiḥ bhavati iti vācyaḥ eva dṛṣṭānta vacana vinyāsa prakāraḥ iti

original: yadi tarhi svatantrā' śabdā' atathāsthite 'pyarthe śabdānusāriṇīṣṭasiddhirbhavedata āha---sādhyahetutvamiti /
analyzed: yadi tarhi svatantrā śabdāḥ atathāsthite pi arthe śabda anusāriṇī iṣṭa siddhiḥ bhavet atas āha sādhya hetu tvam iti
ayam abhiprāya na artha śakti śabda śaktim anurudhya pravartate
na ca śabda śaktiḥ artha śaktim
atas na yatā vaktṛ abhipreta artha anusāriṇī śabda śakti
evam na śabda anusāriṇī artha vyavasthā iti

original: arthādīnāṃ kṛtakatvānityatvādīnāṃ vyāptiśaktyanurodhādeva sādhyahetubhāvo bhavati na śabdānurodhāditi //110 1/2//
analyzed: artha ādīnām kṛtaka tva anitya tva ādīnām vyāpti śakti anurodhāt eva sādhya hetu bhāvaḥ bhavati na śabda anurodhāt iti

original: vaktranapekṣayā svaśaktyaiva śabder'thamācakṣāṇe yattāvadāpadyate tad darśayati---tatrājñānāditi sārdhadvayena /
analyzed: vaktṛ anapekṣayā sva śaktyā eva śabdeḥ ṛtham ācakṣāṇe yat tāvat āpadyate tat darśayati tatra ajñānāt iti sārdha dvayena

original: yadā hi dṛṣṭānta vaktumanabhijño vaktā sādhyahetvo' sahabhāvamātraṃ vivakṣati /
analyzed: yadā hi dṛṣṭānta vaktum anabhijñaḥ vaktā sādhya hetvoḥ sahabhāva mātram vivakṣati
yathā śabdaḥ nitya kṛtaka tvāt iti prayoge
yathā ghaṭe kṛtaka tva nāśi tve staḥ iti
viparīta avagraheṇa vā na hetoḥ vyāpya tām vivakṣati

original: satyāmapi vivakṣāyāṃ kutaścid bhramanimittāt na vyāptiyogyaṃ śabdaṃ vadati /
analyzed: satyām api vivakṣāyām kutaścid bhrama nimittāt na vyāpti yogyam śabdam vadati
sahabāva mātram eva tu pūrvavat vadet

original: viparītaṃ vā bhrānta' yatā nāsitā kṛtakatvena vyāpteti,
analyzed: viparītam vā bhrānta yatā na asitā kṛtaka tvena vyāptā iti

original: tadā tāvanna kevalamiṣṭaṃ na sidhyati aniṣṭameva tu vyāptiviparyayādāpadyate /
analyzed: tadā tāvat na kevalam iṣṭam na sidhyati aniṣṭam eva tu vyāpti viparyayāt āpadyate
iṣṭasya
tasmāt vyāpya tva rūpeṇa vācyaḥ hetu tva saṃmata

original: yadā samyak prayukte 'pi vākyer'tho na tathā bhavet // Msv_5,4.114 //
analyzed: yadā samyak prayukte vākya īrthaḥ na tathā bhavet
sādhya hetu ubhaya vyāpti śūnya tvāt
nityaḥ dhvaniḥ amūrta tvāt karma vat paramāṇu vat
ghaṭa vat vyoma vat ca api tat asat vādinam prati
dharmya siddhau api hi evam dṛṣṭānta ābhāsa tā bhavet
ca vyomni dvaya yukte kīrtite
karma ādi ālocanāt vyāptiḥ hetoḥ na asti iti varjanam
kṛtaka tvasya hetu tvam na syāt

original: aniṣṭasyaiva tu nāśitvasya bhavedityevañjātīyakāniṣṭaprayoganivāraṇāya yukto dṛṣṭāntaprayoganiyama iti /
analyzed: aniṣṭasya eva tu nāśi tvasya bhavet iti evañjātīyaka aniṣṭa prayoga nivāraṇāya yuktaḥ dṛṣṭānta prayoga niyamaḥ iti
etat eva upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
hetutva saṃmata kṛtaka tva ādi vyāpya tva rūpeṇa vācyaḥ iti artha

original: arthānāṃ śabdatantratve yad bhavati tad darśayati---yadetipādarahitadvayena /
analyzed: arthānām śabda tantra tve yat bhavati tat darśayati yadā iti pāda rahita dvayena

original: asyārtha'--- yadā hi vyāptiśaktyanusāreṇaivārthānāṃ sādhyahetutvaṃ tadā yadyapi vaktrā na sahabāvamātraṃ darśitaṃ,
analyzed: asya artha yadā hi vyāpti śakti anusāreṇa eva arthānām sādhya hetu tvam tadā yadi api vaktrā na sahabāva mātram darśitam
kintu samyak eva dṛṣṭānta vacanam

original: arthāstu na tadanurūpavyāpyavyāpakabhāvanāvasthitā iti dṛṣṭāntābhāsatā bhavediti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti /
analyzed: arthāḥ tu na tad anurūpa vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvanā avasthitāḥ iti dṛṣṭānta ābhāsa tā bhavet iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandhaḥ iti

original: yathā nityo dhvaniramūrtatvāditi prayoge karmavat paramāṇuvad ghaṭavad vyomavaditi dṛṣṭānteṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ paramārthata' sādhyahetūbhayavyāptiśūnyatayā
analyzed: yathā nityaḥ dhvaniḥ amūrta tvāt iti prayoge karmavat paramāṇu vat ghaṭa vat vyoma vat iti dṛṣṭānteṣu yathāsaṅkhyam sādhya hetu ubhaya vyāpti śūnyatayā

original: karma khalvanityamiti tat sādhyabhūtayā nityatayā śūnyaṃ,
analyzed: karma khalu anityam iti tat sādhya bhūtayā nitya tayā śūnyam
hetuḥ tu amūrtavāt iti tatra vidyate eva
paramāṇavaḥ tu bhūrtāḥ iti teṣu hetu śūnyatā

original: sādhyaṃ tu nityatvaṃ teṣu vidyata eva /
analyzed: sādhyam tu nitya tvam teṣu vidyate eva

original: ghaṭe tu na sādhyaṃ nityatvaṃ nāpyamūrtatvaṃ heturityubhayaśūnyatā /
analyzed: ghaṭe tu na sādhyam nitya tvam na api amūrta tvam hetuḥ iti ubhaya śūnyatā

original: vyomni tu dṛṣṭānte vyāptiśūnyatāmuttaratra svayameva vivariṣyati /
analyzed: vyomni tu dṛṣṭānte vyāpti śūnyatām uttaratra svayam eva vivariṣyati

original: atraiva ca vyomavaditi dṛṣṭānte tadasadvādinaṃ sautrāntikaṃ prati prayujyamāne dharmyasiddhyā
analyzed: atra eva ca vyoma vat iti dṛṣṭānte tad asat vādinam sautrāntikam prati prayujyamāne dharmya siddhyā
dṛṣṭānta ābhāsa tā bhavati iti āha tat asat vādinam iti
vyāpti śūnyatām vivṛṇoti tad sadbāve pi iti
yadi api ca

original: vyāptyā sādharmya ukte ca na vaidharmyamapekṣyate /
analyzed: vyāptyā sādharmye ukte ca na vaidharmyam apekṣyate

original: sahabhāvitvadṛṣṭyā tu yadā vyāptiṃ na lakṣayet // Msv_5,4.118 //
analyzed: sahabhāvi tva dṛṣṭyā tu yadā vyāptim na lakṣayet

original: para' sādharmyadṛṣṭāntāt taṃ vā nāpekṣate yadā /
analyzed: sādharmya dṛṣṭāntāt tam vā na apekṣate yadā

original: vaktā vā sahabāvitvaṃ śuddhaṃ tena vaded yadā // Msv_5,4.119 //
analyzed: vaktā vā sahabāvi tvam śuddham tena vadet yadā
vapa rīta anvayam vā api tad samādhitsayā tadā
vyomnaḥ sadbhāvaḥ bhavet
tat ca hetu sādhya dvaya yuktam nitya tvāt amūrta tvāt ca

original: tathāpi karmādiṣvamūrteṣu anityeṣvālocyamāneṣu hetorvyāptirnāstīti īdṛśasyāpi dṛṣṭāntasya varjanameva /
analyzed: tathā api karma ādiṣu amūrteṣu anityeṣu ālocyamāneṣu hetoḥ vyāptiḥ nā asti iti īdṛśasya api dṛṣṭāntasya varjanam eva

original: ayamapi na sādhyasiddhye samartho yata iti //117//
analyzed: ayam api na sādhya siddhye samarthaḥ yatas iti
vyākhyāta sa ābhāsa sādharmya dṛṣṭānta
vaidharmya dṛṣṭānta mata param vyākhyāsyati
tatra etat eva tāvat prathamam vaktavyam

original: kiṃ sarvadaiva sādharmyavad vaidharmyavacanaṃ kāryaṃ na veti /
analyzed: kim sarvadā eva sādharmya vat vaidharmya vacanam kāryam na vā iti

original: tatra tāvad vyatirekapradhānavādina' sarvadā vācyamiti ye vadanti tān pratyāha---vyāptyā sādharmya ukta iti /
analyzed: tatra tāvat vyatireka pradhāna vādinaḥ sarvadā vācyam iti ye vadanti tān pratyāha vyāptyā sādharmyaḥ uktaḥ iti

original: evaṃ hi manyate--- vyāptiprajñāpanāya hi dṛṣṭāntavacanam,
analyzed: evam hi manyate vyāpti prajñāpanāya hi dṛṣṭānta vacanam

original: sā cet sādharmyavacanena jñāpitā kiṃ vaidharmyavacanena /
analyzed: sā ced sādharmya vacanena jñāpitā kim vaidharmya vacanena
sādharmyam ca avaśyam eva vacanīyam anvaya prajñāpanāya
tad pradhāna tvāt anumānasya
vyatirekasya api tad mukhena eva siddhe
itarathā duradhigama tvāt
atas yadi vyāptyā sahitam sādharmyam uktam
alam vaidharmya vacanena iti

original: kadā tarhi vaidharmyaṃ vācyamata āha--- sahabhāvitvadṛṣṭyeti pādatrayeṇa /
analyzed: kadā tarhi vaidharmyam vācyam atas āha sahabhāvi tva dṛṣṭyā iti pāda trayeṇa

original: yadā hi vaktrā samyageva dṛṣṭānta ukte para' śrotā jānāti--- yathā hetusādhyayo' sāhityamātranenoktaṃ na vyāptiriti,
analyzed: yadā hi vaktrā samyak eva dṛṣṭānte ukte paraḥ śrotā jānāti yathā na vyāptiḥ iti

original: tadā sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvaṃ jñāpayituṃ 'vaidharmyeṇeṣṭasādhana'miti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti /
analyzed: tadā sādhya abhāve hetu abhāvam jñāpayitum vaidharmyeṇa iṣṭa sādhanam iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandhaḥ iti

original: yadā khalvabhyastavaidharmyastamevāpekṣate na sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaṃ tadā ca vaidharmyeṇeṣṭasādhanamityāha--- taṃ vā nāpekṣate yadeti /
analyzed: yadā khalu abhyasta vaidharmyaḥ tam eva apekṣate na sādharmya dṛṣṭāntam tadā ca vaidharmyeṇa iṣṭa sādhanam iti āha tam vā na apekṣate yadā iti

original: yadā vā vaktā suśikṣitavaidharmya' sādharmyaṃ vaktumajānānastena sādharmyadṛṣṭāntena sahabhāvamātrameva śuddhaṃ vyāptihīnaṃ kathayati,
analyzed: yadā vā vaktā suśikṣita vaidharmya sādharmyam vaktum a jānānaḥ tena sādharmya dṛṣṭāntena sahabhāva mātram eva śuddham vyāpti hīnam kathayati

original: tadāpi paryanuyuktena tenaiva vaidharmyeṇeṣṭasādhanaṃ kāryamityāha--- vaktā veti //119//
analyzed: tadā api paryanuyuktena tena eva vaidharmyeṇa iṣṭa sādhanam kāryam iti āha vaktā vā iti
yadā vā bhrāntaḥ viparītam anvayam darśayati
tadā api tad samādhāna iccha gayā pūrva viparīta jñāna upamardanena vaidharmyeṇa iṣṭa sādhanam iti āha viparīta anvayam iti
pūrva jñāna upamardena vaidharmyeṇa iṣṭa sādhanam
sāhitya mātram pūrva uktam hetoḥ tatra upayujyate
vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ hi bhāvayoḥ yādṛś iṣyate
tayoḥ abhāvayoḥ tasmāt pratīyate
dhūma bhāve gni bhāvena vyāpte na agniḥ tatas cyuta
a dhūmaḥ eva vidyeta iti evam vyāpya tvam aśnute
tathā anagnau adhūmena vyāpte dhumaḥ tatas cyuta
anyatra anavakāśa tvāt vyāpyate dhruvam agninā

original: nanvanvayavaipītye sa eva yathāvat pratipādyatāṃ kiṃ vaidharmyavacanena /
analyzed: nanu anvaya vaipītye saḥ eva yathāvat pratipādyatām kim vaidharmya vacanena
satyam evam api iṣṭam sidhyati eva

original: kintu bhrāntairidamasmābhiruktaṃ sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvo vivakṣita iti vaidharmyeṇāpi tāvadiṣṭasādhanaṃ bhavetyeveti /
analyzed: kintu bhrāntaiḥ idam asmābhiḥ uktam sādhya abhāve hetvabhāvaḥ vivakṣitaḥ iti vaidharmyeṇa api tāvat iṣṭasādhanam bhava iti eva iti

original: yattu tatpūrvaṃ sāhityamātramuktaṃ tadvaidharmya evopayujyate tasyaiveṣṭaṃ sādhayato 'nugrahe vartate ityāha--- sāhityamātramiti //120 1/2//
analyzed: yat tu tat pūrvam sāhitya mātram uktam tat vaidharmye eva upayujyate tasya eva iṣṭam sādhayataḥ nugrahe vartate iti āha sāhitya mātram iti
evam tāvat vaidharmya vacanasya avasaraḥ darśita
tadvat vacana prakāram idānīm darśayati vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ hi iti
vaiparītye kāraṇam āha dhūma bhāvaḥ iti

original: yadā hi dhūmabhāvo 'gnibhāvena vyāpto bhavati tadānagniragnyabhāvastato dhūmāt pracyuta' sannadhūme dhamābhāva eva bhavatītyevaṃ tāvad vyāpto  #
analyzed: yadā hi dhūma bhāvaḥ gni bhāvena vyāptaḥ bhavati tadā anagniḥ agni abhāvaḥ tatas dhūmāt pracyuta sanna dhūme dhama abhāvaḥ eva bhavati iti evam tāvat vyāptaḥ
bhavati

original: yo hi yasmin sati bhavati asati ca na bhavati sa tanniyatastadvyāpta ityucyate /
analyzed: yaḥ hi yasmin sati bhavati asati ca na bhavati sa tad niyataḥ tad vyāptaḥ iti ucyate

original: yathā dhūmo 'gnāveva bhavannagninā vyāpta iti siddho 'bhāvayorvyāptiviparyaya iti //122 1/2//
analyzed: yathā dhūmaḥ gnau eva bhavan agninā vyāptaḥ iti siddhaḥ bhāvayoḥ vyāpti viparyayaḥ iti

original: yata eva cābhāvayorīdṛśo vyāpavyāpakabhāva' ata eva bhāvayorabhimatavyāptisiddhirityāha---tathānagnāviti /
analyzed: yatas eva ca abhāvayoḥ īdṛśaḥ atas eva bhāvayoḥ abhimata vyāpti siddhiḥ iti āha tathā anagnau iti

original: anagnāvagnyabhāve dhūmābhāvena vyāpte dhūmastatra virodhivyāpteralabdhāvakāśo 'gnāveva bhavatītyevaṃ tadvyāpyatā tasya sidhyati /
analyzed: anagnau agni abhāve dhūma abhāvena vyāpte dhūmaḥ tatra virodhi vyāpteḥ alabdha avakāśaḥ gnau eva bhavati iti evam tad vyāpya tā tasya sidhyati
tathā iti
yathā bhāva vyāpti apekṣayā abhāva vyāpti evam abhāva vyāpti apekṣayā bhāva vyāptiḥ iti artha
na ca evam itaretara āśraya tā
bīja aṅkura vat anādi tayā upapatteḥ iti

original: vyāpakau tu yadocyete bhāvābhāvau tadā tata' // Msv_5,4.124 //
analyzed: vyāpakau tu yadā ucyete bhāva abhāvau tadā tata
na eva vyāpyāt vipakṣasya pracyuti kathitā bhavet

original: tasmād dhūmena sādhyatvamagne' prārthayate yadā // Msv_5,4.125 //
analyzed: tasmāt dhūmena sādhya tvam agne prārthayate yadā
tadā anagniḥ adhūmena vyāptaḥ vācyaḥ na ca anyathā
anagnya dhūma sāhitye vyāpteḥ vā api viparyaye
syāt anyat vā api prasādhyate

original: yatrāpyarthasya śūnytavaṃ dvābhyāmekena vā bhavet // Msv_5,4.127 //
analyzed: yatra api arthasya śūnya tavam dvābhyām ekena vā bhavet
kim punar abhāvayoḥ vyāpti viparyaya āśrayaṇe prayojanam atas āha vyāpakau tu iti

original: yadā hi ya eva bhāvo vyāpakastadabhāva eva vyāpakatayā vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta ucyate tadā tato vyāpyād dhūmādernaiva vipakṣasyānagnyāde' pracyuti'  #
analyzed: yadā hi yaḥ eva bhāvaḥ vyāpakaḥ tad abhāvaḥ eva vyāpaka tayā vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ ucyate tadā tatas vyāpyāt dhūma ādeḥ nā eva vipakṣasya anagni āde
kathitā bhavet
tata kathana artham ca vaidharmya vacanam
prayojanam bhavet

original: na hi yatra dhūmastatrāgniritivat yatra dhūmābhāvastatrāgnyabhāva iti kathyamāne vyāpyād dhūmādanagnervipakṣasya nivṛttirdarśitā bhavatīti
analyzed: na hi yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ iti vat yatra dhūma abhāvaḥ tatra agni abhāvaḥ iti kathyamāne vyāpyāt dhūmāt anagneḥ vipakṣasya nivṛttiḥ darśitā bhavati iti

original: ato dhūmenāgniṃ siṣādhayiṣatā vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntenāgnidhūmābhāvayorvyāptiviparyayo vācya ityāha--- tasmāditi vācyo 'ntena /
analyzed: atas dhūmena agnim siṣādhayiṣatā vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntena agni dhūma abhāvayoḥ vyāpti viparyayaḥ vācyaḥ iti āha tasmāt iti

original: yatrāgnirnāsti tatra dhūmo nāstītyevaṃ yadavṛttatadavṛttābhyāmuddeśyopādeyabhāvo darśayitavya ityartha' /
analyzed: yatra agniḥ na asti tatra dhūmaḥ na asti iti evam yad avṛtta tad avṛttābhyām uddeśya upādeya bhāvaḥ darśayitavyaḥ iti artha

original: sa cānagniradhūmen vyāpta ucyamāno nānyathā vācya',
analyzed: sa ca anagniḥ a dhūmet vyāptaḥ ucyamānaḥ na anyathā vācya
kintu sādharmya uktena eva uddeśya upādeya prakāreṇa iti āha na ca anyathā iti
prakāraḥ ca anantaram eva uktaḥ iti
anyathā vacane doṣam āha anagniya dhūma sāhityā iti

original: yathaiva sādharmyadṛṣṭānte svaśaktyā śabdor'thaṃ vadati nārthaśaktimanurudhyata iti sāhityamātravacane vyāptiviparyaye vā neṣṭaṃ sidhyatītyuktam,
analyzed: yathā eva sādharmya dṛṣṭānte sva śaktyā śabdaḥ artham vadati na artha śaktim anurudhyate iti sāhitya mātra vacane vyāpti viparyaye vā na iṣṭam sidhyati iti uktam
evam iha api bhavati iti
evam tadvatā ava

original: dihāpyartho na śabdavaśavartīti yatrārtho dṛṣṭāntarūpo dvābhyāṃ hetusādhyābhāvābhyāmekena

original: vā tayo' śūnyo bhavati tatrāpi na prastutopakāro bhavati anyadvāniṣṭaṃ prasajyata
analyzed: vā śūnyaḥ bhavati tatra api na prastuta upakāraḥ bhavati anyat vā aniṣṭam prasajyata

samyak prayukte
atra udāharaṇam āha
yat anityam tu tat mūrtam aṇu vat buddhi vat kha vat

original: sādhyena vyāptisiddhyai hi vyātireko 'tra kathyate // Msv_5,4.128 //
analyzed: sādhyena vyāpti siddhyai hi tra kathyate

original: tena dṛṣṭe 'pi sāhitye na sarvo gamya iṣyate // Msv_5,4.129 //

saha dṛṣṭiḥ na sambandhaḥ vyāptiḥ nā eva ca tāvatā
mūrta anitya tva yukte tasmāt aṅgīkṛte ghaṭe
yat iti

original: nityo dhvaniramūrtatvādityatraiva prayoge yadaivaṃ vaidharmyamucyate yannityaṃ na bhavati tadamūrtamapi na bhavati yathā paramāṇuriti tadā  #
analyzed: nityaḥ dhvaniḥ amūrta tvāt iti atra eva prayoge yadā evam vaidharmyam ucyate yat nityam na bhavati tat amūrtam api na bhavati yathā paramāṇuḥ iti tadā
sādhya abhāva śūnyaḥ dṛṣṭānta
paramāṇoḥ nitya tayā tad abhāvasya tatra darśayitum aśakya tvāt
buddhi vat iti tu dṛṣṭānte hetu abhāva śūnyatā
buddheḥ amūrta tayā tad abhāvasya vaktum aśakya tvāt
kha vat iti tu ubhaya abhāva śūnyatā
nitya amūrte tasmin ubhaya abhāvaḥ duradhigamaḥ yatas iti
evam sādharmya dṛṣṭānta vat vyāpti vaikalye pi abhāsa tā darśayitavyā
tad sidadhi artham hi vipakṣāt hetoḥ vyatireka kathyate
yasya tu vipakṣa eka deśāt api vyātirekaḥ nā asti

original: nāsau sādhyena vyāpto bhavatītyasatyāṃ vyāptāvanarthakaṃ tādṛśasya vaidharmyasya vacanamityabhiprāyeṇāha--- sādhyeneti //128 1/2//
analyzed: na asau sādhyena vyāptaḥ bhavati iti asatyām vyāptau anarthakam tādṛśasya vaidharmyasya vacanam iti abhiprāyeṇa āha sādhyena iti

original: yataścaivañjātīyako na sādhyena vyāpyate tena kvacidabhāvayo' sāhitye dṛṣṭe 'pi na sarvatra gamyagamakabhāvo bhavatītyāha---teneti /

original: yadyapi yannityaṃ na bhavati tadamūrtamapi na bhavati,
analyzed: yadi api yat nityam na bhavati tat amūrtam api na bhavati
yathā ghaṭa kuḍyam vā iti
kvacid abhāvayoḥ sāhityam śakyate darśayitum
tathā api na sarva
śabda ādi

kim iti na iṣyate atas āha saha dṛṣṭiḥ iti

atra bauddhāḥ vadanti kim idam

sādhanam yadi api iṣṭaḥ vyatirekaḥ numām prati

original: tāvatā na hyanaṅgatvaṃ yukti' śābde 'bhidhāsyate // Msv_5,4.132 //

original: 'vyāptyā sādharmya ukte ca na vaidharmyapekṣyate' ityucyate,
analyzed: vyāptyā sādharmye ukte ca na vaidharmī apekṣyate iti ucyate

original: na hi śatāṃśenāpi hetorvipakṣād vyatireke śaṅkyamāne gamakatvamastītyaśeṣavipakṣo 'numāturvyatirekaṃ grahītumapekṣita' /
analyzed: na hi śata aṃśena api hetoḥ vipakṣāt vyatireke śaṅkyamāne gamaka tvam asti iti aśeṣa vipakṣaḥ numātuḥ vyatirekam grahītum apekṣita
na ca asau duradhigama
eka deśa sthasya api sarva adarśana saukaryāt
darśanam hi sarva vipakṣāṇām duṣkaram
tad abhāvaḥ tu saukarya prāptaḥ eva
na ca ayogya anupalambhāt na idam adarśanam hetoḥ vyatirekāya prabhavati iti vācyam
na hi no vipakṣa adarśanāt avinābhāva niyama

original: vipakṣadarśane tu heto' paripanthinyavinābhāvo grahītumaśakyo bhavati /
analyzed: vipakṣa darśane tu heto paripanthini avinābhāvaḥ grahītum aśakyaḥ bhavati

original: taccaikadeśasthasyāpi tāvannāstyeveti paripanthini vṛttimātre darśanaṃ vyāpriyate /
analyzed: tat ca eka deśa sthasya api tāvat na asti eva iti paripanthini vṛtti mātre darśanam vyāpriyate

original: ato yadaivāgnikāryo dhūma ityavagataṃ tadaiva tadāyattātmalābho nāsati tasmin bhavatīti jñāyate /
analyzed: atas yadā eva agni kāryaḥ dhūmaḥ iti avagatam tadā eva tad āyatta ātmalābhaḥ na asati tasmin bhavati iti jñāyate
na ca anvaya jñānam eva vyatireka buddhau nibandhanam
asādhāraṇeṣu tad asambhavāt
na hi mahānasa paridṛṣṭayoḥ agni dhūma sva lakṣaṇayoḥ tatra eva niruddhayoḥ anyatra darśanam asti
yena anvayaḥ nubhūyeta

original: tat kuto 'nvaya' kutastarāṃ ca tannibandhano vyatireka' /
analyzed: tat kutas kutastarām ca tad nibandhanaḥ vyatireka

original: na ca viśeṣeṣu sāmānyaṃ nāma kiñcidanugataṃ svarūpamasti,
analyzed: na ca viśeṣeṣu sāmānyam nāma kiñcid anugatam svarūpam asti
yat niyamya niyāmaka tayā avasīyeta
vikalpa ākāra tvāt tasya

original: ato viśeṣā eva kecit kayācid vyāvṛttyopalakṣitā' kañcid viśeṣaṃ vipakṣavyāvṛttimukhena gamayantīti tatpradarśanārthaṃ vaidharmyavacanameva
analyzed: atas viśeṣāḥ eva kecid kayācid vyāvṛttyā upalakṣitā kañcid viśeṣam vipakṣa vyāvṛtti mukhena gamayanti iti tad pradarśana artham vaidharmya vacanam eva
tān pratyāha aśeṣa iti yuktiḥ antena
ayam abhiprāya yadi api vyatirekaḥ numāna aṅgam

tad deśa āgamanāt api ca tasya upapatte
na ca kārya tva avadhāraṇāt asati kāraṇe bhāva

original: yaddhi yasmin sati bhavati asati ca na bhavati tattatkāryam /

a taḥ satya bhāvaḥ va
bodha prasaṅgaḥ bhedānām na ca avyāpteḥ bhaviṣyati

original: asti sāmānyavastveṣu vyāpitā tatra gamyatām // Msv_5,4.133 //
analyzed: asti sāmānya vastveṣu vyāpi tā tatra gamyatām
gantavya
tata kārya tā tad adhīnā iti

na etāvatā anumām prati yuktiḥ anaṅgam
yuktiḥ yoga sambandhaḥ nvayaḥ iti anarthāntaram

na asau ekāntena pratyākhyātum śakyate

original: yathokta eva siddhānta' samyak sādharmyaprayoge na vaidharmyamapekṣaṇīyamiti /
analyzed: yathā ukte eva siddhānta samyak sādharmya prayoge na vaidharmyam apekṣaṇīyam iti

original: ata' sa tāvad vidhimukhena prathamaṃ darśayitavya',

original: anaṅgatvamiti tu paṭhatāmiyaṃ vyākhyā---idaṃ hi liṅgasyānumāyāmaṅgatvam yadanvayavyatirekau,

atas yathā vyatirekaḥ ṅga tvam
kaḥ evam anvaya apara nāmā yuktiḥ api iti

original: nanu liṅge 'pi śabdātmake pratītyuttarakālabhāvyanvayo 'naṅgamevāta āha--- śābde 'bhidhāsyata iti /

original: śābde hyanumānād bhinne pratītyuttarakālabhāvinī yuktiranaṅgamiti vakṣyate /

yathā vakṣyati
na aṅgam artha dhiyām eṣā bhavet anvaya kalpanā
iti
anumāne tu sarvatra eva anvaya pratīti aṅgam iti

original: ye tu tāvatā nānaṅgatvamanvayasyetyadhyāhṛtyātraivārthe śābde yuktirvakṣyate iti vyācakṣate,
analyzed: ye tu tāvatā na anaṅgatvam anvayasya iti adhyāhṛtya atra eva arthe śābde yuktiḥ vakṣyate iti vyācakṣate
teṣām aśruta anvaya adhyāhāraḥ eva tāvat upālambha

original: yattu bhedānāmevānumāne gamyagamakatvaṃ teṣāṃ cānvayo na sambhavatītyuktam,

kecid sādharmya dṛṣṭānte vyāptyā api kathite punar

original: na cāsati tasminnānumānāṅgaṃ sambhavatīti teṣāmanvayābhāvo na doṣāyeti /

kasya tarhi darśitam idam

yadi api ca vyāpti samaya saṃvidita rūpa āropeṇa eva adhunā anumānam upajāyate

original: pratibandhabalena tu kiñcideva svalakṣaṇaṃ kenāpi vikalpākāreṇa sāmānyātmanā samadhigataṃ yadaparaṃ vikalpākārollikhitameva svalakṣaṇaṃ pratilambhayati  #
analyzed: pratibandha balena tu kiñcid eva sva lakṣaṇam kena api vikalpa ākāreṇa sāmānya ātmanā samadhigatam yat aparam vikalpa ākāra ullikhitam eva sva lakṣaṇam pratilambhayati
tat pramāṇam iti ākhyāyate

a viṃsa vādaḥ iti
bhavati ca anumāna īrthakriyā samartha vastu lābhaḥ pramāṇam anumānam
yathā uktam
bhrāntiḥ a viṃsa vādata pramā iti
atas bhedānām eva gamya gamaka tvam

original: te ca na bhājanamanvayasyeti yuktamevoktamata āha--- astīti /

asya artha

original: bhavedevaṃ yadi na bhedātiriktaṃ kiñcit sāmānyaṃ vastu bhavet /

asti tu tat iti ākṛti granthe sakala para ukta doṣa parihāreṇa upapādayiṣyate

na ca a tasmin tat agraha
pāramārthika tvāt tasya

original: evaṃ ca yadanumānuprāmāṇyasiddhyarthaṃ parai' kimapi kāśaṃ kuśamavalambyate,

original: anyanmataṃ vyāptyāpi sādharmyadṛṣṭānta ukte vaidharmyamapi vācyamiti,

tat tu manda phalam yasmāt pakṣe pi evam nirūpitam

dvaividhyam na upapannam tu yathā eva hi agni dhūmayaḥ

original: tadā heto sādhyenaivāgnināvadhārite sarvato 'gnoranyamātrād vyāvṛtti' prāpnoti,

original: ata' sādhyābhāva eva vyāvṛttiṃ niyantuṃ sarvadaiva vaidharmyavacanamarthavat /
analyzed: sādhya abhāve eva vyāvṛttim niyantum sarvadā eva vaidharmya vacanam arthavat

original: sati hi tasminnagnyabhāve dhūmo na bhavatītyāveditaṃ, bhavatīti //135//
analyzed: sati hi tasmin agni abhāve dhūmaḥ na bhavati iti āveditam bhavati iti
etat api dūṣayati tat tu manda phalam iti

katham manda phalam atas āha yasmāt iti
kim nirūpitam atas āha vyāpāka bhāva mātram hi iti
agnimān parvataḥ iti pakṣa vacane nirūpitam idam

original: ata' sādharmyadṛṣṭānte 'pi vyāpyā dhūmādervyāpakābhāvanivṛtti mātremeva darśayitavyam,

na anya mātra nivṛttiḥ iti

tat iha

vākyasya avayavāḥ prāyas mīmāṃsaka mate satām
etat ca bhāṣyakāreṇa svayam eva upadarśitam
iti

original: atra bhāṣyam--- 'tattu dvividhaṃ pratyakṣato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ ca /
analyzed: atra bhāṣyam tat tu dvividham pratyakṣatas dṛṣṭa sambandham sāmānyatas dṛṣṭa sambandham ca
tatra pratyakṣataḥ dṛṣṭa sambandham yathā dhūma ākṛti darśanāt agni ākṛti vijñānam

original: sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ ca yathā--- devadattasya gatipūrvikāṃ deśāntaraprāptimupalabhyāditye 'pi gatismaraṇam' iti /

anena prameya dvaividhyāt anumāna dvaividhyam uktam iti

original: atra kecinnītijñaṃmanyā avadhṛtasvalaśraṇameva kvacidanumānena sāmānyato gṛhyata iti manyante /
analyzed: atra kecid nīti jñaṃmanyāḥ kvacid anumānena sāmānyatas gṛhyate iti manyante

adṛṣṭa sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam api anumānam asti kriyā ādiṣu iti

yadi api anavadhṛta sva lakṣaṇena vastunā viśeṣata sambandhaḥ
sāmānyatas tu dṛśyate

original: sarvaṃ hi kādācitkaṃ phalaṃ kutaścidāgantukādutpattimato jāyamānaṃ dṛṣṭam,

original: ato devadattasya bhūtapūrvottaradeśavibhāgasaṃyogau kadācidupalabhyāgantuka' ko 'pi heturanumīyate /

tat idam
sāmānyatas dṛṣṭa sambandham anumānam ācakṣate pratyakṣa anupalakṣita pūrva sva lakṣaṇa viṣaya tvāt

original: agnyādiṣu tu pratyakṣata' svalakṣa āvadhāraṇāt prāk pratyakṣato dṛṣṭasambandhamanumānamāhu' /

original: na ca dravyameva saṃyogavibhāgayo' kāraṇamiti vaktavyam /

na ca idam pramāṇam

original: taddeśasthitenaiva hi dhūmena tasminneva deśe sa eva gomayendhanajanyāgniranumīyate /

original: yadi viśeṣadṛṣṭodāharaṇamidaṃ kathaṃ tarhi bhāṣye ākṛtigrahaṇam /

original: sa evāyamadya yāvadanuvartamāno gomayendhanavikārasya dhūmasyākāro dṛśyate /

atas āha agni dhūma antara tve ca iti
yathā hi agni dhūma ākṛtyoḥ tuṇa dāru gomaya inthana ādi janmā su vyaktaḥ viśeṣa sarva pramātṛ sya saṃvedyaḥ bhavati

original: ata' prāptyākṛtimātrād gatyākṛtimātrānumānamāditya ekāntata' sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambanthamiti yuktamevādityodāharaṇamiti //145//

atas āha pratyakṣa viṣaya tvam iti
bhavet anavasthā
vadi anumānena sāmānya grahaṇam iṣyate

original: tasya tu savikalpakasiddhau pratyakṣaviṣayatvamupapādyānta upasaṃhṛtaṃ 'pratyakṣatvamata' siddhaṃ sāmānyasye'ti /
analyzed: tasya tu savikalpaka siddhau pratyakṣa viṣaya tvam upapādya ante upasaṃhṛtam pratyakṣa tvam atas siddham sāmānyasya iti

original: nanu yastveva na sāmānyaṃ kiñcidasti nāma /
analyzed: nanu yaḥ tu eva na sāmānyam kiñcid asti nāma
tasya bhinna abhinnasya anirūpaṇāt atas āha
vastu tvam ca iti
vastu tvam api ākṛti granthe vistareṇa
pratyakṣa viṣaya tā pratipādanena ca pratyakṣe pi prasādhita prāyam eva
atra ca asti sāmānya vastuṣu iti anvaya upapādanāya sāmānyasya vastu tvam upanyaśrastam eva
ayam tu hetu kathana artha punar upanyāsaḥ iti
yaḥ tu haitukaḥ na hetum antareṇa pramāṇa antara siddhau ādriyate
tam prati hetunā eva ubhayam upapādayiṣyāmaḥ iti āha atra iti
dhumāt agni anumānasya vastu ālambana tā bhavet
abhāva anya pramāṇa tvāt svārthe
sāmānyasya ca vastu tvam pratyakṣa gnāhya tā api ca
abhāva anya prameya tvāt asādhāraṇa vastu vat
tatra vastu tva prasādhana artham tāvat hetum āha dhūmāt agni anumānasya iti
bauddhāḥ hi avastu sāmānya ālambanam anumānam ācakṣate
sāmānyasya vikalpa ākāra mātra abhyupagamāt
atas eva bhrāntiḥ eva anumānam
sambandha balena sva lakṣaṇa rūpam upasthāpayati iti pramāṇiti āhu
tān eva prati idam ucyate yathā svārthe
yā hi sva viṣaye śrotra ādibhiḥ indriyaiḥ buddhiḥ janyate
sā vastu ālambanā

original: yena ca yadindriyaṃ sannikṛṣyate sa tasya svārtha' prāpyakāritvādindriyāṇām /
analyzed: yena ca yat indriyam sannikṛṣyate sa tasya sva artha prāpya kāri tvāt indriyāṇām
tat iha mṛgatṛṣṇā ādi jñāna nirākaraṇa artham svārtha viśeṣaṇam

original: aviśeṣeṇopādāne tu nābāvānyapramāṇatvasya vastvālambanatayā vyāpti' kathitā bhavet /
analyzed: aviśeṣeṇa upādāne tu na abāva anya pramāṇa tvasya vastu ālambana tayā kathitā bhavet
bhrāntīnām ubhaya vikala tvāt
na hi tā pramāṇam
na ca vastu ālambanā
anya samprayukta indriyasya hi tāḥ anya viṣayāḥ jāyante
ūdṛśam eva jñānam avastu ālambanam
na punar atyanta asat artham

original: evaṃ vastvālambantve 'numānasya sādhite arthāt sāmānyaṃ vastvityuktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: evam vastu ālamban tve numānasya sādhite arthāt sāmānyam vastu iti uktam bhavati
idam ca avastu ālamba tvam anumānasya artha padam prayuñjānena bhāṣyakāreṇa nirākṛtam
anartha viṣayam anumānam iti bauddhāḥ manyante

original: yadvaditi(?) svapratibhāse 'narther'thādhyavasāyena pravartamānā bhrāntirapyarthasambandhena pravṛttestadavyabhicārāt pramāṇamanumānamiti,
analyzed: yadvat iti sva pratibhāse na artha irtha adhyavasāyena pravartamānā bhrāntiḥ api artha sambandhena pravṛtteḥ tad avyabhicārāt pramāṇam anumānam iti

original: teṣāmidamuttaram artha' sāmānyamanumānasya viṣayo bāhya eva /
analyzed: teṣām idam uttaram artha sāmānyam anumānasya viṣayaḥ bāhyaḥ eva
na vikalpa ākāra mātram iti ākṛti granthe vistareṇa pratipādayiṣyate iti

original: evamarthād vastutvaṃ prasādhyāhratya prasādhayati---sāmānyasya ca vastutvamiti /
analyzed: evam arthāt vastu tvam prasādhya āhratya prasādhayati sāmānyasya ca vastu tvam iti

original: sāmānyaṃ vastu abhāvānyaprameyatvādasādhāraṇavastuvaditi vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti /
analyzed: sāmānyam vastu abhāva anya prameya tvāt asādhāraṇa vastu vat iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandhaḥ iti
pratyakṣa viṣaya tām idānīm prayogeṇa darśayati pratyakṣa iti pāda trayeṇa
yad abhāva anya prameyam tat pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyate eva
yathā saugatānām eva asādhāraṇam vastu iti
sāmānyam na anumānena vinā yasya pratīyate
na ca liṅga vinirmuktam anumānam pravartate
asāmānyasya liṅga tvam na ca kenacid iṣyate

original: na cānavagataṃ liṅgaṃ kiñcidasti prakāśakam // Msv_5,4.150 //
analyzed: na ca anavagatam liṅgam kiñcid asti prakāśakam
tasya vā api anumānena syāt anyena
tad utpattiḥ ca liṅgāt syāt sāmānya jñāna saṃhatāt
tasya ca api anumāna tvāt bhavet liṅgena ca udbhava
anumāna antarāt eva jñānena evam ca kalpane
liṅga liṅgi anumānānām ānantyāt eka liṅgini
kati yuga sahasreṣu bahuṣu api na vidyate
atha sāmānya bhūte pi liṅge ni asmāt g i taḥ bhavet
pramāṇāt apramāṇāt vā tathā liṅgi gatiḥ bhavet

original: bauddhānāmeva tu sāmānyamanumānaikaviṣayaṃ manvānānāmanavasthā prasajyata ityāha--- sāmānyamiti pañcabhi' /
analyzed: bauddhānām eva tu sāmānyam anumāna eka viṣayam manvānānām anavasthā prasajyate iti āha sāmānyam iti
nigada vyākhyātaḥ
yadi tu ucyate liṅga bhūta sāmānya grahaṇa artham anumāna apekṣāyām anavasthā bhavati
na tad agrahaṇa artham anumānam apekṣyate
dhūma ādi sva lakṣaṇa darśana prabhava vikalpa vedya tvāt tasya
na ca asau apramāṇam
artha kriyā samartha vastu pratilabhāt
na ca pramāṇam anartha viṣaya tvāt
atas nirvacanīya vikalpa siddha tvāt liṅgasya na anavasthā bhavati iti āśaṅkya āha atha iti

original: ayamabhiprāya'--- na tāvat pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ ca jñānaṃ sambhavati /
analyzed: ayam abhiprāya na tāvat pramāṇam apramāṇam ca jñānam sambhavati
viruddha svabhāvayoḥ ekatra pratiṣedhe nyatara āpatteḥ aparihārya tvāt
apramāṇasya ca prameya vyavasthāpana aśakteḥ avaśyam pramāṇam eva tat jñānam abhyupagantavyam
pratyakṣa anumāna anabhyupagamāt ca
pramāṇa antaram eva āpadyeta
evam api anumānasya nitya uccheda prasajyate
pramāṇa antaram eva syāt sāmānyasya avabodhakam
a pramāṇa avabuddhāt vā liṅgāt liṅgini yā mati
sā api mithyā bhavet nityam bāṣpa jāta agni buddhi vat
nanu apramāṇa bhūtā api sambandha smṛtiḥ iṣyate
yathā liṅgi gatau hetuḥ tathā liṅga gatiḥ bhavet
tatra yat pūrva vijñānam tasya prāmāṇyam iṣyate
tad usthāna mātreṇa smṛte syāt caritārtha tā
pramāṇa antaram ca sat yathā tat liṅgam vedane pramāṇam iṣyate
evam liṅginī api prāpnoti
evam ca vakṣyamāṇa prasaṅgaḥ bhavet
pramāṇāt apramāṇāt vā iti vadan anirdhārita ubhaya rūpa tām vikalpasya darśayati
astu tarhi
kaḥ doṣa
atas āha evam api iti
ayam abhiprāyaḥ anavastām api prasañjayatām asmākam anumāna uccheda āpādanam abhimatam
pramāṇa antara abhyupagame ca anumāna ucchedaḥ bhavati eva

original: tadeva hi pramāṇaṃ tadā sarvasya liṅgaliṅgisāmānyasyāvabodhakaṃ bhavediti //155//
analyzed: tat eva hi pramāṇam tadā sarvasya liṅga liṅgi sāmānyasya avabodhakam bhavet iti
yadi tu eka rūpa abhyupagame pramāṇa tvam eva liṅga jñānasya iṣyate
pramāṇa avagatāt liṅgāt liṅgi jñānam api mithyā bhavet
bāṣpāt iva dhūma saṃviditāt agni jñānam
evam ca na anumānam iti
saḥ eva anumānasya nitya ucchedaḥ iti abhiprāyeṇa āha apramāṇa avabuddhāt iti
atra codayati nanu iti

original: yathā hyapramāṇameva sambandhasmaraṇaṃ pramāṇakāraṇamiṣyate tathā liṅgajñānamapi bhaviṣyatītyartha' //157//
analyzed: yathā hi apramāṇam eva sambandha smaraṇam pramāṇa kāraṇam iṣyate tathā liṅga jñānam api bhaviṣyati iti artha
pariharati tatra iti
smatiḥ hi pūrva jñānāt bhavanti iti upasthāpana dvāreṇa anumāyām upayujyate

original: tacca pramāṇameveti tadanusārī nirṇayo yukta iti //158//
analyzed: tat ca pramāṇam eva iti tad anusārī nirṇayaḥ yuktaḥ iti
na tu liṅga gatau kiñcid pramāṇam upapadyate

original: tadabhāvāt smṛtiścātra na kathañcit pravartate // Msv_5,4.159 //
analyzed: tad abhāvāt smṛtiḥ ca atra na kathañcid pravartate
sma artham etat abhedena vijñānam iti yaḥ vadet
tasya vandhyā sute pi asti nūnam smaraṇa śakta tā
na ca asādhāraṇaḥ ūrtha ātmā sāmānya jñāna kāraṇam
yasmāt na asya avinābhāvaḥ tena dṛṣṭa kathañcana

original: na caiṣa prakāro liṅgagatau sambhavatītyāha---na tviti /
analyzed: na ca eṣa prakāraḥ liṅga gatau sambhavati iti āha na tu iti

original: na hyatra prāgapi liṅgāvagame pramāṇaṃ kiñcidupapadyate,
analyzed: na hi atra prāk api liṅga avagame pramāṇam kiñcid upapadyate
yat pramāṇa jñānena upasthāpyate iti
na ca liṅga jñānam api smṛtiḥ evā iti vācyam
pūrva pramāṇa abhāvāt eva iti āha tad abhāvāt iti
nanu liṅga jñānam api smṛtiḥ eva
nirvikalpa pramāṇa antarataḥ nirṇayaḥ yuktaḥ eva
atas āha smārtam iti
yathā samprati sambandha jñānam gṛhīta prāpaka tayā samaraṇam

original: evametadapi liṅgajñānaṃ nirvakalpakagṛhītaprāpakatayā tadabhedena smārtamiti yo vadati tasya vandhyāsutre 'pi smaraṇaśaktiranivāritā /
analyzed: evam etat api liṅga jñānam nirvakalpaka gṛhīta prāpaka tayā tad abhedena smārtam iti yaḥ vadati tasya vandhyāsutre pi smaraṇa śaktiḥ anivāritā
gṛhīta viṣayā hi smṛtiḥ iti

original: na ca liṅgasāmānyajñānaṃ nirvakalpakagṛhītasvalakṣaṇālambanamiti kathaṃ smṛti' /
analyzed: na ca liṅga sāmānya jñānam nirvakalpaka gṛhīta sva lakṣaṇa ālambanam iti katham smṛti
yat atra prakāśate tat na gṛhītam

original: yacca gṛhītaṃ sanna prakāśata iti na smṛtitvam /
analyzed: yat ca gṛhītam sat na prakāśate iti na smṛti tvam

original: agṛhītagocarāyāṃ tu smṛtau vandhyāsute 'pi smaraṇaprasaṅga iti //160//
analyzed: agṛhīta gocarāyām tu smṛtau vandhyā sute smaraṇa prasaṅgaḥ iti
nanu anumānena liṅga sāmānya jñāne navasthā bhavati
yadi sāmānya ātmakam eva liṅgam tat agrahaṇa artham iṣyate
tasya anumāna vedya tvāt
asādhāraṇaḥ eva artha ātmā sāmānya jñāne liṅgam bhaviṣyati
sa ca pratyakṣaḥ eva iti na anavasthā
atas āha na ca iti
kim na kāraṇam atas āha yasmāt iti
dṛṣṭa avinābhāvam liṅgam bhavati

original: na cāsya tena sāmānyenāvinābhāva' kathañciddeśata' kālato vā dṛṣṭa' /
analyzed: na ca asya tena sāmānyena avinābhāva kathañcid deśataḥ kālataḥ vā dṛṣṭa

original: asādhāraṇasya bhāvāntareṣvanusyūtyasambhavādekatra dṛṣṭasya ca tatraiva niruddhatvāditi //161//
analyzed: asādhāraṇasya bhāva antareṣu anusyūti asambhavāt ekatra dṛṣṭasya ca tatra eva niruddha tvāt iti
syāt vā sambandha dṛṣṭyā asau sāmānyam kṛtaka tva vat

original: nahyasādhāraṇaṃ vastu pūrvatreha ca vidyate // Msv_5,4.162 //
analyzed: na hi asādhāraṇam vastu pūrvatra iha ca vidyate
na ca api avyapadeśyasya vikalpa rahitasya ca
vinā pūrva anusandhānāt liṅga tvam upapadyate
kalpyante ca viśeṣāḥ ye te pi aliṅgam ananvayāt
etasmāt eva syāt tad jñānasya api aliṅga tā
sāmānya rūpa tāyām vā tathā eva anavadhāraṇam
sambandha darśana abhyupagame kṛtaka tva ādi vat sāmānya rūpatā āpattiḥ iti āha syāt vā iti
atra kāraṇam āha nahi iti
itas ca asādhāraṇaḥ ūrtha ātmā na liṅgam iti āha na ca iti
dhūmāt arhi dhūmaḥ yam ityādi vikalpa āspadīkṛtaḥ gnaya ādeḥ liṅgam iti dṛṣṭam
asādhāram astu kenacid rūpeṇa api avyapadeśya katham liṅgam bhavet iti

original: liṅgatvaṃ nopapadyata iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti /
analyzed: liṅga tvam na upapadyate iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandhaḥ iti

original: nanu tiraścāmasatyeva śabdollekhe 'sādhāraṇarūpadarśināmevānumānaṃ dṛṣṭamato nāvyapadeśyatvādaliṅgatvamata āha---vikalpeti pādatrayeṇa /
analyzed: nanu tiraścām asati eva śabda ullekhe sādhāraṇa rūpa darśinām eva anumānam dṛṣṭam atas na avyapadeśya tvāt aliṅga tvam atas āha vikalpa iti pāda trayeṇa

original: ayamabhiprāya'---- mā nāma tiraścāṃ śabdollekho bhavet,
analyzed: ayam abhiprāya mā nāma tiraścām śabda ullekhaḥ bhavet
artha vikalpaḥ tu teṣām api pūrva apara anusandhāna ātmakaḥ sti eva
atas yuktam eva teṣām anumāne vyapadeśyasya api katham liṅgam

original: na hi so 'yamityānārūḍho buddhau dhūmo 'gnerliṅgaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: na hi saḥ yam iti an ārūḍhaḥ buddhau dhūmaḥ gneḥ liṅgam bhavati
na ca evam asādhāraṇe sambhavati
pūrva apara anusandhāna agocara tvāt tasya iti

original: asmanmate 'pi ye 'sādhāraṇātmāno dhūmādayo viśeṣā vikalpyante te 'pyanvayābāvādaliṅgaṃ,
analyzed: asmad mate pi ye sādhāraṇa ātmānaḥ dhūma ādayaḥ viśeṣāḥ vikalpyante te pi anvaya abāvāt aliṅgam
kim aṅga punar nirvikalpaka eka gocaraḥ sādhāraṇaḥ ūrtha ātmā iti āha kalpyante eti
anvaya abhāvāt eva asādhāraṇa jñānam api liṅgi sāmānya jñāne na liṅgam iti āha etasmāt eva iti
yadi tu anvaya siddhi artham asādhāraṇasya sāmānya rūpa tā iṣyate
tatas liṅga sāmānya grahaṇe iva anavasthā prasaṅgāt tasya api anavadhāraṇam iti āha

original: kvacidvā dṛṣṭasambandhe sarva' pratyāyako bhavet // Msv_5,4.165 //
analyzed: kvacid vā dṛṣṭa sambandhe pratyāyakaḥ bhavet
sambandha anubhavaḥ vaśyam eṣitavyaḥ ca liṅgina

original: anumānapravṛttestu prāṅmānaṃ tatra nāsti te // Msv_5,4.166 //
analyzed: anumāna pravṛtteḥ tu prāk mānam tatra na asti te
na ca api vāsanā mātrāt liṅga jñānasya sambhava

original: liṅgijñānaṃ ca tadvat syāt trirūpālliṅgato na tat // Msv_5,4.167 //
analyzed: liṅgi jñānam ca tadvat syāt trirūpāt liṅgataḥ na tat
sāmānya iti

original: yadi tu kasmiṃścidevāsādhāraṇe sāmānyena jñātasambandhe 'nyadarśināpi sāmānyamanumīyate /
analyzed: yadi tu kasmiṃścid eva asādhāraṇe sāmānyena jñāta sambandhe nyadarśinā api sāmānyam anumīyate

original: evaṃ tarhi sarva eva sarvasya pratyāyako bhavet /
analyzed: evam tarhi sarvaḥ eva sarvasya pratyāyakaḥ bhavet
aviśeṣāt iti āha kvacid eti
evam tāvat na liṅga avadhāraṇe pramāṇam asti iti uktam
idānīm anvayam agrahaṇa kāle liṅgi jñāne na kiñcid pramāṇam asti iti āha
sambandha anubhavā eti
na agṛhīte liṅgini tad sambaddham liṅgam śakyate vagantum

original: na cānumānapravṛtte' prāk tasmin sāmānyātmani bhavata' kiñcit pramāṇamastyasmākamiva pratyakṣam,
analyzed: na ca anumāna pravṛtte prāk tasmin sāmānya ātmani bhavata kiñcid pramāṇam asti asmākam iva pratyakṣam
atas lliṅgini api avagamyamāne navasthā prasaṅgaḥ
nanu anādi kālīna vāsanā mātra nibandhanaḥ eva ayam liṅga liṅgi saṃvyavahāra
kim iha ati nirbandhena

original: kācideva hi vāsanodbhūtā kiñcilliṅgākāraṃ vikpamāvirbhāvayantī kiñcidevānumāsaṃvyavahāraṃ pravartayati /
analyzed: kācid eva hi vāsanā udbhūtā kiñcid liṅga ākāram āvirbhāvayantī kiñcid eva anumā saṃvyavahāram pravartayati
yathā āhuḥ eva ayam anumāna anumeya vyavahāraḥ buddhi ārūḍhena dharma dharmi nyāyena
na bahis sat asat tvam apekṣate iti
atas āha na ca api iti
na vāsanā mātra nirmitam liṅga jñānam
vāsanā hi pūrva anubhava āhita

original: nāsau lihgasāmānyasya śaśaviṣāṇādivadatyantāsata' sambhavatīti kathaṃ vāsanāmātrālliṅgajñānasya sambhava iti /
analyzed: na asau lihga sāmānyasya śaśaviṣāṇa ādi vat atyanta asata sambhavati iti katham vāsanā mātrāt liṅga jñānasya sambhavaḥ iti
tad nibandhane liṅga jñāne iṣyamāṇe tadvat eva liṅgi jñāna upapattar enarthakam anumānam iti anumāna prāmāṇya āśrayaṇam iti āha liṅgi jñānam
ca iti
yatra abāvasya liṅga tvam na ca asau ānumānika

original: pramāṇāntaragamyatvāt tatra doṣo na jāyate // Msv_5,4.168 //
analyzed: pramāṇa antara gamya tvāt tatra doṣaḥ na jāyate
pratyakṣa avagatāt liṅgāt yasya liṅgi gatiḥ bhavet

original: tasya nāto 'dhikaṃ kiñcit prārthanīyaṃ prasajyate // Msv_5,4.169 //
analyzed: tasya na atas dhikam kiñcid prārthanīyam prasajyate
yatra api anumitāt liṅgāt liṅgini grahaṇam bhavet

original: tatrāpi maulikaṃ liṅgaṃ pratyakṣādeva gamyate // Msv_5,4.170 //
analyzed: tatra api maulikam liṅgam pratyakṣāt eva gamyate
liṅga tvam ka kṛtaka tva ādau kriyāyāḥ kārakasya vā

original: pratyakṣatvaṃ ca tasyeṣṭamiti dūraṃ na gamyate // Msv_5,4.171 //
analyzed: pratyakṣa tvam ca tasya iṣṭam iti dūram na gamyate
nanu iyam anavasthā megha abhāvena vṛṣṭhi abhāva anumāne bhavataḥ samānā eva
abhāvasya anupalabdhi liṅga tvāt
sātīya liṅga antara apekṣāyām anavasthā āpadyate
atas āha yatra iti

original: yatra hi vṛṣṭyabhāve meghābhāvo liṅgaṃ nāsāvanumeya',
analyzed: yatra hi vṛṣṭi abhāve megha abhāvaḥ liṅgam na asau anumeya
abhāva ākhya pramāṇa antara gamya tvāt
atas nā atra tulya jātīya apekṣā nibandhanaḥ navasthā doṣaḥ jāyate iti
pratyakṣa sāmānay vādinām tu na na kācid anavasthā iti āha pratyakṣa avagatāt iti
atas pratyakṣāt iti artha
anumita anumāne tarhi anavasthā
atas āha yatra api iti

original: pratyakṣā hi deśāntaraprāptirmaulikaṃ mūle bhavaṃ liṅgaṃ,
analyzed: pratyakṣā hi deśa antara prāptiḥ maulikam mūle bhavam liṅgam
tena gatim anumāya āditye gati sādhane numīyamāne na avasthā iti abhiprāya
nanu anitya śabda kṛtaka tvāt

original: kṛtakatvaṃ catatra darśanādityevaṃ karmānantarabhāvitayā kṛtakatve sādhyamāne karmaṇo 'pi hetvantarādanumāne 'navasthā bhavedata āha--- liṅgatvamiti
analyzed: kṛtaka tvam ca tatra darśanāt iti evam karma anantara bhāvi tayā kṛtaka tve sādhyamāne karmaṇaḥ u pi hetu antarāt anumāne navasthā bhavet atas āha liṅga tvam iti
kṛtaka tva anumāne hi karma eke tatra darśanāt
iti kāraka vyāpāra antara bhāvi tvam liṅgam uktam

original: tatra ca kārakāviśiṣṭā kriyā tadviśiṣṭaṃ vā kārakamantarabhāvitāṃ viśiṣalliṅgamāpatati /
analyzed: tatra ca kārakā viśiṣṭā kriyā tad viśiṣṭam vā kārakam antara bhāvi tām viśiṣat liṅgam āpatati
ubhayam
evam śabda aupamāna ādau sāmānya śraya tā yata
tad dausthityena dausthityam sarvatra ata prasajyate
tasmāt pratyakṣa pūrva tvam pramāṇa antare iṣyate

original: pratyakṣatvaṃ ca sāmānye nānyatā hi gatirbhavet // Msv_5,4.173 //
analyzed: pratyakṣa tvam ca sāmānye na anyatā hi gatiḥ bhavet
pratyakṣa ālambana tvam ca viśeṣasya katham bhavet

original: yadā vastvamtarāpekṣa' sāmānyāṃśa' sa kīrtyate // Msv_5,4.174 //
analyzed: sa kīrtyate
rūpa ādayaḥ hi sāmānyam sarve nīla ādi apekṣayā
sva viśeṣān apekṣya atha nīla ādīnām samāna tā
ca tat pratyakṣam
kriyāyāḥ tāvat pratyakṣa tvam anantaram eva sādhitam
kārakam api tadvat pratyakṣam eva
śaktiḥ tu parokṣā
sā ca na tāvat iha liṅgam
na ca anumeyā
atas kriyā kārakayoḥ ubhayoḥ api pratyakṣa tvāt na dūra gamanam
anumeya karma vādinām api hi phala avadhi avasthānāt na anavasthā
nitarām asmākam iti

original: evaṃ tāvadanumāsyāsati sāmānyasya vastutve pratyakṣatve ca dausthityamuktam idānīṃ sarvameva pramāṇajātaṃ sāmānyasya
analyzed: evam tāvat anumāsya asati sāmānyasya vastu tve pratyakṣa tve ca dausthityam uktam idānīm sarvam eva pramāṇa jātam sāmānyasya
dausthitye dusthitam āpadyeta teṣām api sāmānya śraya tvāt
na ca tat apramāṇam vakṣyamāṇa nayāyāt iti abhiprāyeṇa āha evam iti

original: ato 'vaśyaṃ pramāṇāntarāṇāṃ pratyakṣapūrvakatvameṣṭavyaṃ sāmānyasya ca pratyatvam,
analyzed: atas vaśyam pramāṇa antarāṇām pratyakṣa pūrvaka tvam eṣṭavyam sāmānyasya ca
itarathā tu anavasthā prāpnoti iti upasaṃharati tasmāt iti

original: evaṃ tāvat sāmānyasya pratyakṣatvaṃ vastutā copapāditā idānīṃ viśeṣā eva pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyanta iti ye vadanti tān pratyāha---pratyakṣeti /
analyzed: evam tāvat sāmānyasya pratyakṣa tvam vastu tā ca upapāditāḥ idānīm viśeṣāḥ eva pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyante iti ye vadanti tān pratyāha pratyakṣa iti
viśeṣaḥ hi yadi tāvat avayavī dravyam abhimata

original: cāvayavavastvantarāpekṣa' sāmānyāṃśo 'smābhi' kīrtyata iti kathaṃ pratyakṣa iti //174//
analyzed: sāmānya aṃśaḥ sma abhi kīrtyate iti katham pratyakṣaḥ iti
yadi tu avayavi rūpa ādayaḥ eva viśeṣāḥ iṣyante
tat api ayuktam
te hi sva viśeṣa nīla ādi apekṣayā sāmānayam eva iti āha rūpa ādayaḥ hi iti

original: te cāpi tāvat sāmānyaṃ yāvat syu' paramāṇava' /
analyzed: te ca api tāvat sāmānyam yāvat syuḥ paramāṇavaḥ

original: dvyaṇukasyāpi yadarūpaṃ taddhi sādhāraṇaṃ dvayo' // Msv_5,4.176 //
analyzed: dvyaṇukasya api yat arūpam tat hi sādhāraṇam
na ca antyena viśeṣeṇa vyavahāraḥ sti kasyacid

original: na ca pratyakṣatātsaya saṅghāte kevalasya vā // Msv_5,4.177 //
analyzed: na ca saṅghāte kevalasya vā
bhedena agṛhyamāṇasya na abhedaḥ grāhya tām vrajet
na ca bhinneṣu abhinna tva buddheḥ grāhya tva sambhava

original: yadi tu nīlādaya eva viśeṣā iti matam /
analyzed: yadi tu nīla ādayaḥ eva viśeṣāḥ iti matam
tat na
teṣām api avāntara nīla ādi apekṣayā sāmānya rūpa tvāt iti āha sva viśeṣān iti
yadi tu eka bhramara ādi dravaya nīlimā eva viśeṣaḥ iṣyate tat na
tasya api pakṣa ādi sva avayava āśrita nīla viśeṣa apekṣayā sāmānya rūpa tvāt
pakṣanīlimā api tad avayava nīla apekṣayā sāmānyam eva

original: evaṃ ca aparamāṇubhya' prasaṅgo darśayitanya ityāha---te cāpīti /
analyzed: evam ca prasaṅgaḥ iti āhate ca api iti
nirbhāgāḥ hi paramāṇavaḥ iti tat arūpam asādhāraṇam eva iti

original: tebhyastu prāk dvyaṇukarūpamapi dvayo' sādhāraṇamityāha--- dvyaṇukasyāpīti //176//
analyzed: tebhyaḥ tu prāk dvyaṇuka rūpam api sādhāraṇam iti āha dvyaṇukasya api iti
nanu astu paramāṇu rūpam eva viśeṣa

original: sa eva na' pratyakṣo bhaviṣyatyata āha---na cāntyeneti /
analyzed: saḥ eva na pratyakṣaḥ bhaviṣyati atas āha na ca antyena iti
vyavahāra artham hi pramāṇam anustriyate
na vyasani tayā

original: na cāntyena viśeṣeṇa vyavahāra' kasyacidastīti kiṃ tatpratyakṣatayeti /
analyzed: na ca antyena viśeṣeṇa kasyacid asti iti kim tad pratyakṣa tayā iti
nanu upekṣā phalam api pramāṇam bhavati eva
atas āha na ca iti

original: na na' kaparamāṇūnāṃ rūpaṃ sthūle vartamānānāṃ tantūnāmiva paṭe pratyakṣaṃ vibhaktānāṃ veti na kathañcid viśeṣaviṣayatā pratyakṣasyeti //177//
analyzed: na na ka paramāṇūnām rūpam sthūle vartamānānām tantūnām iva paṭe pratyakṣam vibhaktānām vā iti na kathañcid viśeṣa viṣaya tā pratyakṣasya iti

original: nanu paramāṇava eva bhinnā' sañcitā gṛhyante na kāryadravyamekam /
analyzed: nanu paramāṇavaḥ eva bhinnā sañcitāḥ gṛhyante na kārya dravyam ekam
atas katham tat sa avayaveṣu sāmānyam iti ucyate

original: sañcitā eva cānanyavṛttitayā viśeṣāsādhāraṇādipadavācyā iti te pratyakṣā bhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: sañcitāḥ eva ca ananya vṛtti tayā viśeṣa asādhāraṇa ādi pada vācyāḥ iti te pratyakṣāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: mā nāmaikaikata' paramāṇurakṣagocaro bhavedata āha--- bhedeneti /
analyzed: mā nāma ekaikata paramāṇuḥ akṣa gocaraḥ bhavet atas āha bhedena iti

original: eko hi sarvadā sarveṣāṃ ca bāva' prakāśate na paramāṇubhedā' /
analyzed: ekaḥ hi sarvadā sarveṣām ca prakāśate na

original: na ca bhedenāgṛhyamāṇo 'bhedo gṛhyata iti sāmpratam /
analyzed: na ca bhedena agṛhyamāṇaḥ bhedaḥ gṛhyate iti sāmpratam
saṃvid virodhāt iti
nanu ayam eva

original: samudāyo na vāpyasti bhavatāṃ na ca sarvadā /
analyzed: samudāyaḥ na vā api asti bhavatām na ca sarvadā
sarveṣām asatā arthena pratyaya utpatti sambhava
na ca eka jāti yogena vinā asti samudāya tā
samudāye pi ca aṇu tvam na eteṣām apagacchati
sāmānyam iti adṛśye tena sāmānye eva na
vyāsaṅginī bhavati eṣā dhīḥ vinā api eka kalpanāt
vagrahaḥ yaḥ yama bhinna prakāśa
kim bheda grahaṇena atas āha na ca bhinnā iti
na a bhinna ākāra buddhi bodhyaḥ
bhada abheda viveka anupapatteḥ iti
nanu asati api ekasmin samudāya ālambanaḥ
ayam abhinna avasa bhāsaḥ bhaviṣyati iti atas āha samudāyaḥ iti

original: ye hi sāmānyameva sarvajagatsaṃviditamapalapanti kutasteṣāṃ samudāyo nāmārthāntaraṃ,
analyzed: ye hi sāmānyam eva sarva jagat saṃviditam apalapanti kutas teṣām samudāyaḥ nāma artha antaram
yad ālambanaḥ bhinna pratibhāsaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: api ca sarvadā sarve caikaṃ dravyamavabudhyatnate kathaṃ tadanyathā bhaviṣyatītyāha--- na ca sarvadeti //179//
analyzed: api ca sarvadā sarve ca ekam dravyam katham tat anyathā bhaviṣyati iti āha na ca sarvadā iti
kiñca ayam samudāyaḥ na eka jātyā vinā upapadyeta

original: na hi nānājātīyeṣu vṛkṣaghaṭaloṣṭeṣu kasyacit samudāyabuddhirasti /
analyzed: na hi nānā jātīyeṣu vṛkṣa ghaṭa loṣṭeṣu kasyacid samudāya buddhiḥ asti
samudāye pi iṣyamāṇe ṇu tva sāmānayam abhyupagantavyam āpadyeta bhavatām iti āha na ca iti
hetau ca

original: nanu nānekāvayavavṛttyanusandhānena vinā tatsāmānyarūpaṃ dravyamabhyupagantuṃ śakyam /
analyzed: nanu na aneka avayava vṛtti anusandhānena vinā tat sāmānya rūpam dravyam abhyupagantum śakyam
na ca aindriyakam jñānam etau iva
ti samartham avikalpaka tvāt tasya
atas āha sāmānyam iti iti
yadi api eka anugama kḷpteḥ tat nānā avayava vyāsaṅgi dravyam sāmānyam iti evam vikalpya na gṛhyate

original: tathāpi tadekarūpaṃ tāvannirvikalpakenāpi gṛhyata eveti nāpahnotuṃ śakyata iti vyāsajyavṛttyavayavisāmānyanyāyena
analyzed: tathā api tat eka rūpam tāvat nirvikalpakena api gṛhyate eva iti nā apahnotum śakyate iti vyāsajya vṛtti avayavi sāmānya nyāyena
prati vyakti vartinaḥ go tva ādi sāmānyasya aikandriyaka tvam darśayitavyam

original: tadapi sāmānyamityena rūpeṇāgrāhyaṃ vastuta' sāmānyameva gṛhyate /
analyzed: tat api sāmānyam ityena rūpeṇa agrāhyam vastuta sāmānyam eva gṛhyate
śabda ādi smaraṇa uttara kālam tu aneka anugama avamarśāt sāmānyam iti vikalpya gṛhyate
idam ca savikalpaka siddhau uktam eva

original: ato naivaṃ vācyam--- astvavayavisāmānysaya svalakṣaṇāparanāmna indriyairgrahaṇam,
analyzed: atas nā evam vācyam sva lakṣaṇa apara nāmnaḥ indriyaiḥ grahaṇam
na tu prati vyakti niveśinaḥ iti
vyāsajya vartamānasya sāmānyasya yathā indriyaiḥ
grahaṇam tadvat eva syāt prati vyakti niveśina
mīmāṃsakaiḥ ca na avaśyam iṣyante paramāṇava
yat abalena upalabdhasya mithyātvam kalpayet bhavān
samūha rūpam pratyakṣam adṛśyai paramāṇubhi

original: yo 'pahanute śaśasyāpi so 'bhāvaṃ śṛṅgato vadet // Msv_5,4.184 //
analyzed: yaḥ upahanute śaśasya api saḥ bhāvam śṛṅgataḥ vadet
ubhayatra api pratyaya aviśeṣāt iti āha vyāsajya iti
tat anena etat āpāditam kim idam mudhā eva sāmānyasya pratyakṣa tā na iṣyate
viśeṣam api hi pratyakṣam icchadbhiḥ balāt sāmānyam eva pratyakṣam āśrayaṇīyam

original: sarvasya hi sunipuṇaṃ nirūpyamāṇasya rūpāde' sāmānyarūpatvād,
analyzed: sarvasya hi su nipuṇam nirūpyamāṇasya rūpa āde sāmānya rūpa tvāt
dravyasya ca nānā avayava sādhāramasya tādrūpyāt

original: svattraṃ paramāṇusañcayamātrasya cānupalambhād dravyāpalāpe ca pratyakṣavirodhāt /
analyzed: svattram paramāṇu sañcaya mātrasya ca anupalambhāt dravya apalāpe ca pratyakṣa virodhāt

original: ato 'vayavisāmānyaṃ tatsamavetāni ca gotvādisāmānyāni sarvāṇyeva pratyakṣāṇi na viśeṣā eveti tātparyam /
analyzed: atas vayavi sāmānyam tad samavetāni ca go tva ādi sāmānyāni sarvāṇi eva pratyakṣāṇi na viśeṣāḥ eva iti tātparyam
evampara tvāt eva ca pradeśa antara siddha sāmānya avayavi sāmānya pratyakṣa tā pratipādanena na punarukta tā codanīyā iti
nanu bhavadbhiḥ mīmāṃsakaiḥ tāvat avasyam abhyupagantavyā paramāṇava
atas teṣām eva ubhaya siddhānām param eka ākāra buddhi janana śakti mātram eva upakalpitam
kim dharmi kalpanayā
laghīyasī hi tad kalpanā atas dharma kalpanā
atas āha mīmāṃsakaiḥ ca iti
ayam abhiprāyaḥ
yat hi pramāṇena upanīyate
tat asmābhiḥ iṣyate

original: na ca sthūlaṃ hitvā paramāṇava evākṣajāyāṃ buddhau bhāsante,
analyzed: na ca sthūlam hitvā paramāṇavaḥ eva akṣa jāyām buddhau bhāsante
yat tān upetya sthūlam avajānīmahe
tad ānuguṇyena tu yadi aṇavaḥ
dyante bhavantu
na tad valena mūla bhūtam sthūlam apalapitum utsahāmahe iti

original: pratyakṣaṃ tu sthūlamadṛśyai' paramāṇubhi' nihanuvānasya śaśo 'pi tadviṣāṇadhiyā nihnotavya' prāpta ityāha---samūharūpamiti //184//
analyzed: pratyakṣam tu sthūlam adṛśyai paramāṇubhi nihanuvānasya śaśaḥ api tad viṣāṇa dhiyā prāptaḥ iti āha samūha rūpam iti
samūha parama artha tve sthite tad siddhi hetukā
yadi nāma avagamyeta paramāṇu astitā

original: tasmād yad gṛhyate vastu yena rūpeṇa sarvadā /
analyzed: tasmāt yat gṛhyate vastu yena rūpeṇa sarvadā
tat tathā iva abhyupetavyam sāmānyam athavā itarat
sattā ādi sāmānyam apekṣya sarvam go tva ādi asādhāraṇa tām upaiti

original: tasmādasādhāraṇam akṣagamyaṃ vadan na sāmānyamapahanuvīta // Msv_5,4.187 //
analyzed: tasmāt asādhāraṇam akṣa gamyam vadan na sāmānyam apahanuvīta

original: sāmānyarūpeṇa na gṛhyate cet kiṃ vāstyasādhāraṇabuddhiratra /
analyzed: sāmānya rūpeṇa na gṛhyate ced kim vā asti asādhāraṇa buddhiḥ atra
kim idānīm śaśaviṣāṇa kalpa paramāṇava
na iti āha samūha iti

original: na hyatra kalpanālāghavena pratyakṣasiddho dharmī paratyāgamarhati /
analyzed: na hi atra kalpanā lāghavena pratyakṣa siddhaḥ dharmī para tyāgam arhati

original: siddhe ca tasmistadanuguṇā' paramāṇava iti kena neṣyate /
analyzed: siddhe ca tasmin tad anuguṇā paramāṇavaḥ iti kena nā iṣyate

original: siddhyupāyastu teṣāmanyo nāstīti paramāṇavo nāvaśyamiṣyanta ityuktaṃ bhavati //185//
analyzed: siddhi upāyaḥ tu teṣām anyaḥ nā asti iti paramāṇavaḥ na avaśyam iṣyante iti uktam bhavati
atas yat eva vastu sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ aparokṣam gṛhyate
tat tathā eva aparokṣam apahnotum śakyate
go tva ādi sāmānyānām api sattā ādi para sāmānya apekṣayā asādhāraṇa tvāt

original: ato yadyasādhāraṇaṃ pratyakṣamityāgraho bhavatāmevamapi na gotvādisāmānyamapratyakṣamiti
analyzed: atas yadi asādhāraṇam pratyakṣam iti āgrahaḥ bhavatām evam api na go tva ādi sāmānyam apratyakṣam iti
pratyakṣa sāmarthya siddha tvāt na śakyam apahnotum iti āha sattāt iti

original: yadi tūcyate pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyamāṇamapi sāmānyaṃ na sāmānyollekhena gṛhyata iti(na)
analyzed: yadi tu ucyate pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyamāṇam api sāmānyam na sāmānya ullekhena gṛhyate iti na
pratyakṣam iti
tat etat āśaṅkate sāmānya iti
pariharati kim vā iti
evam hi asādhāraṇam api na pratyakṣam bhavet
tatra api nirvikalpakā

original: yadvastu loka' pratipadyate 'smin dvidhāpi tacchakyata eva vaktum // Msv_5,4.188 //
analyzed: pratipadyate smin dvidhā api tat śakyate eva vaktum
iti anumāna vārttikam
atha śabda pariccheda
pratyakṣa ādiṣu vaktavyam śabda mātrasya lakṣaṇasya
tat ati tvaritena iha kim śāstrāt abhidhīyate
avasthāyām para vyāvṛtti akalpanāt asādhāraṇa ullekhaḥ na asti eva iti
yadi tu tādrūpyeṇa avikalpitam api sva rūpeṇa vikalpakaḥ vabudhyata
iti tat pratyakṣam

original: evaṃ tarhi dvyākārameva saṃmugdhaṃ vastu loka' pratipadyata iti parīkṣakairubhayathāpi tat śakyata eva vaktumiti siddhaṃ dvyākāremeva vastu  #
analyzed: evam tarhi dvi ākāram eva saṃmugdham vastu loka pratipadyate iti parīkṣakaiḥ ubhayathā api tat śakyate eva vaktum iti siddham vastu
pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyate iti

original: siddhaṃ ca sāmānyata' sambandhadarśanamityabhiprāyeṇāha--- yadvastu loka' pratipadyate 'smin dvidhāpi tat śakyata eva vaktumiti /
analyzed: siddham ca sāmānyatas sambandha darśanam iti abhiprāyeṇa āha yat vastu pratipadyate smin dvidhā api tat śakyate eva vaktum iti
asmin iti pratyakṣa jñāne iti artha
iti upādhyāya sucaritamiśra kṛtau kāśikā ṭīkāyām anumāna pariccheda samāpta
atha śabda pariccheda

original: atra pratyakṣānumānayoraparīkṣytava ukte śāstrasyāpyaparīkṣyatāpratipādanārthaṃ bhāṣyam---“śāstraṃ śabdavijñānādasannikṛṣṭer'the vijñānam“iti
analyzed: atra pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ ukte śāstrasya api aparīkṣya tā pratipādana artham bhāṣyam śāstram śabda vijñānāt asannikṛṣṭa ṛthe vijñānam iti

original: nanu vṛttikāramate na parīkṣivyaṃ nimittamiti pratijñāyapratyakṣādīni hi prasiddhāni
analyzed: nanu vṛtti kāra mate na parīkṣivyam nimittam iti pratijñāya pratyakṣa ādīni hi prasiddhāni

original: pramāṇāni tadantargataṃ ca śāstramityukte' pratyakṣavyabhicāreṇa parīkṣāmāśaṅkya
analyzed: pramāṇāni tad antargatam ca śāstram iti ukte pratyakṣa vyabhicāreṇa parīkṣām āśaṅkya

original: tadavyabhicāra ukte 'nantarameva śāstrasyāparīkṣā pratipādyata iti yuktam,
analyzed: tad avyabhicāre ukte nantaram eva śāstrasya aparīkṣā pratipādyate iti yuktam
tat hi prakṛtam
kim anumānena vyavadhīyate
satyam evam
ayam tu tantra antara anusāreṇa kramaḥ āśrita

original: tathā hi nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamiti lokāyatikā manyante /
analyzed: tathā hi na apratyakṣam pramāṇam iti lokāyatikāḥ manyante
te hi vaiśiṣika ādi āśrita pratyakṣa anantara anumāna prāmāṇya pratipādanena
evam hi vaiśiṣikāḥ paṭhanti dvividham pramāṇam ālocita adhyavasānam anālocita anugamanam ca iti
tathā anye pi pratyakṣam anumānam varṇitam

original: tato mahāviṣayatayā prakṛtvena puruṣārthopayikatvena ca śāstram /
analyzed: tatas mahā viṣaya tayā prakṛ tvena ca śāstram

original: tadanantaraṃ ca yatra kvacana vācye bahūnāṃ prasiddhamityupamānamuktam /
analyzed: tad anantaram ca yatra kvacana vācye bahūnām prasiddham iti upamānam uktam
nyāya vistare hi prasiddha sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam upamānam iti uktam
tata pārāśarya matena arthāpattiḥ uktā
tad uttara kālam eva tad mata anusāriṇā kṛtakoṭinā uktavāt

original: abhāvapramāṇasya tu bhāvapramāṇābhāva evātmeti taduttara' prastāva' /
analyzed: abhāva pramāṇasya tu bhāva pramāṇa abhāvaḥ eva ātmā iti tad uttara prastāva

original: ki punastantrāntareṣvevamimāni pramāṇāni prasiddhānīti prasiddhiprābalyaṃ kathitaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: ki punar tantra antareṣu evam imāni pramāṇāni prasiddhāni iti prasiddhi prābalyam kathitam bhavati

original: vyutthitāśca tena tena sākṣiṇā pratipāditā bhavanti /
analyzed: vyutthitāḥ ca tena tena sākṣiṇā pratipāditāḥ bhavanti
atra ca śabda vijñānāt iti ucyate
tat katham vigṛhyate

original: kiṃ śabdād vijñānaṃ śabdasya vā vijñānamiti /
analyzed: kim śabdāt vijñānam śabdasya vā vijñānam iti
pūrvatra
bhayena hi pañcamī samasyate
uttaratra tu sa vikalpaka pratyakṣe śāstra tva prasaṅga
śabda vijñānāt eva hi gauḥ iti evamādayaḥ sannikṛṣṭa artha vikalpāḥ bhavanti
atra ucyate
ṣaṣṭhī samāsaḥ eva ayam
na ca sa vikalpake prasaṅga
na hi tat śabda pramāṇāt utpadyate
api tu śabda sahāyāt indriyāt

original: yathaiva hi gandhasahakṛtamidandriyaṃ tailād vilīnaṃ ghṛtaṃ vivinakti /
analyzed: yathā eva hi gandha sahakṛtam idandriyam tailāt vilīnam ghṛtam vivinakti
evam śabda sahakṛtam jāti ādīn
tathā ca akṣa sambandha phala parokṣa avabhāsi tā
sa vikalpake sti iti aktam pratyakṣa ante
atas yat eva śabda śakti vimarśa uttham vijñānam asannikṛṣṭa artha gocaram tat śābdam
atas eva na padārtha mātra jñānam śābdam
na hi tad asannikṛṣṭa artha gocara
sāmānya lakṣaṇam tyaktvā viśeṣasya eva lakṣaṇam

original: na śakyaṃ kevalaṃ vaktumito 'pyasya na vācyatā // Msv_5,5.2 //
analyzed: na śakyam kevalam vaktum itas pi asya na vācya tā
yat ca uktam śabda vijñānāt arthe jñānam iti īdṛśam

original: aviśiṣṭaṃ viśiṣṭasya na tat śāstrasya lakṣaṇam // Msv_5,5.3 //
analyzed: a viśiṣṭam viśiṣṭasya na tat śāstrasya lakṣaṇam
pravṛttiḥ vā nivṛttiḥ vā nityena kṛtakena vā
puṃsām yena upadiśyeta tat śāstram abhidhīyate
caram

original: idaṃ tu vaktavyaṃ kimidaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇavasare viśeṣalakṣamaṃ praṇīyate /
analyzed: idam tu vaktavyam kim idam sāmānya lakṣaṇa vasare viśeṣa lakṣamam praṇīyate
śabda viśeṣaḥ hi śāstram
tat yadi vaktavyam
evam api sāmānya lakṣaṇam uktvā vakṣyate lakṣyeta

original: yat punaratitvaritenaiva sāmānyalakṣaṇavasare viśeṣo lakṣyate tadasāmpratam /
analyzed: yat punar ati tvaritena eva sāmānya lakṣaṇa vasare viśeṣaḥ lakṣyate tat asāmpratam

original: na hīha pratyakṣādīnāṃ cākṣuṣatvādayo viśeṣā lakṣyante /
analyzed: na hi iha pratyakṣa ādīnām cākṣuṣa tva ādayaḥ viśeṣāḥ lakṣyante

original: tata' pratyakṣādiṣu sāmānyato vaktumārabdheṣu madhye śabdamātrasyaiva lakṣaṇaṃ vaktuṃ yuktam,
analyzed: tata pratyakṣa ādiṣu sāmānyatas vaktum ārabdheṣu madhye śabda mātrasya eva lakṣaṇam vaktum yuktam
na śāstrasya iti
tat etat āha pratyakṣa ādiṣu iti
dūṣaṇa antaram āha sāmānya iti

original: nirjñātasāmānyalakṣaṇo hi tadviśeṣaṃ bodhayituṃ śakyo netara' /
analyzed: nirjñāta sāmānya lakṣaṇaḥ hi tad viśeṣam bodhayitum śakyaḥ
na hi a lakṣite dravye
tad viśeṣā pṛthivī ādayaḥ lakṣayitum iti
evam tāvat śāstram iti lakṣya nirdeśaḥ nupapannaḥ iti uktam

original: śabdavijñānādityādi lakṣaṇamapi lakṣyaviśeṣe na saṅgacchata ityāha---yaccoktamiti //3//
analyzed: śabda vijñānāt ityādi lakṣaṇam api lakṣya viśeṣe na saṅgacchate iti āha yat ca uktam iti
kīdṛś tarhi śāstra lakṣamam atas āha pravṛttiḥ iti
svarūpa kathanam yat tu kasyacid tatra dṛśyate
tad aṅga tvena tasya api śāstra tvam avagamyate
bhāvanāyām samastāyām vākyāt eva upajāyate

original: pravṛttirvā nivṛttirvā tacchāstraṃ na padādyata' // Msv_5,5.6 //
analyzed: pravṛttiḥ vā nivṛttiḥ vā tat śāstram na

original: ityupadeśakaṃ hi nityaṃ vedavākyamanityaṃ tharmaśāstrādikaṃ śāstramucyate na śabdamākṣamiti //4//
analyzed: iti upadeśakam hi nityam veda vākyam anityam tharma śāstra ādikam śāstram ucyate na śabda mākṣam iti
nanu svarūpa mātra abhidhāyinām api kṣepiṣṭha ādi vākyānām śāstra tvam iṣyate
kim ucyate pravṛtti nivṛtti aṅgam śāstram iti
atas āha svarūpa iti
tad aṅga tvena iti
vidhāyaka vākya eka deśa tvena iti artha

original: asti hi tatrāpi“vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabheta bhūtikāma“iti vidhyuddeśa' /
analyzed: asti hi tatra api vāyavyam śvetam ālabheta bhūti kāmaḥ eti vidhi uddeśa
tena eka vākya bhūtaḥ uvāyuḥ vai kṣepiṣṭhā iti evamādi
atas yuktam tasya api śāstra tvam iti

original: nanvarthavādā na tāvat sākṣāt kriyāṃ pratipādayanti /
analyzed: nanu arthavādāḥ na tāvat sākṣāt kriyām pratipādayanti
na api tadaśam

original: trayo 'pi hi tadaṃśā' sādhyaṃ sādhanamitikartavyatā ceti /
analyzed: trayaḥ pi hi tad aṃśā sādhyam sādhanam itikartavya tā ca iti
na ca eṣām anyatamam amībhiḥ abhīdhīyate
atas kriyā arthānām eka vākya tām eva na manyāmahe
atas āha bhāvanāyām iti śāstram ityantena
ayam abhiprāya yadi api na kriyām gamayati
na ca kriyā sambaddham kiñcid sādhana ādi
tathā api vidhinā śabda bhāvanā apara nāmadheyena saha eṣām eka vākya tā
vidhiḥ hi puruṣam pravartayitum viṣaya praśasti ajñānam apekṣate

original: taccārthavādā' śaknuvanti kartumiti tat kurvatāmeṣāmasti pravṛttinivṛttyorupayoga' /
analyzed: tat ca arthavādā śaknuvanti kartum iti tat kurvatām eṣām asti pravṛtti nivṛttyoḥ upayoga

original: ata' samastāyāṃ tryaṃśapūrṇāyāmeva bhāvanāyāṃ mahāvākyādevasārthavādakāt puruṣa' pravartate nivartate vā na vidhyuddeśamātrāditi sārthavādakameva  #
analyzed: samastāyām tri aṃśa pūrṇāyām eva bhāvanāyām mahāvākyāt eva sārthavādakāt pravartate nivartate vā na vidhi uddeśa mātrāt iti sārthavādakam eva
vākyam śāstram iti
etat ca arthavāda adhikaraṇe prapañcayiṣyāma
darśitam ca vidhi vivaraṇe iti alam anena ati parispandeta iti
yatas eva sārthavādakāt pravṛtti nivṛtti jñānam

original: ata eva vidhinācina' pratyayamātrasyapadamātrasya vā yajetetyevamādikasya vidhiśrutāvapi kana śāstratvam /
analyzed: atas eva vidhi śrutau api śāstra tvam
yatra hi tri aṃśa bhāvanā vacanam api avāntara vākyam anapekṣita artha vādakam na pravṛttau samartham

original: kathamiva tatra padapratyayayo' śaktirbhaviṣyatīti duradhigamamityāha--- na padādyata iti //6//
analyzed: katham iva tatra pada pratyayayoḥ śaktiḥ bhaviṣyati iti duradhigamam iti āha na pada ādi atas iti
aparīkṣā miṣeṇa api lakṣaṇāni vadan ayam
na svatantra upayogi tva nirapekṣāṇi jalpati
tatra yat loka vākya stham kathayet śabda lakṣaṇ
vedam vyākhyātu kāmasya tat na atīva upayujyate
pratyakṣa ādi upayogam tu
śāstra artha jñāna velāyām matvā tad lakṣaṇam kṛtam
evam lakṣya lakṣamā anupapattyā dūṣitam bhāṣyam upapādayati aparīkṣā iti
veda vyākhyā hi prakṛtā

original: ato yadeva tadupayogi tadeva vācyamityatikramyāpi sāmānyaprakramaṃ viśeṣamevaṃ lakṣitavān /
analyzed: atas yat eva tad upayogi tat eva vācyam iti atikramya api sāmānya prakramam viśeṣam evam lakṣitavān
na hi iha lakṣaṇa karaṇam eva svarūpeṇa vivakṣitam
aparīkṣā chalena hi lakṣaṇāni praṇīyante
tatra api yat eva prakṛta upayogi śāstṛ lakṣaṇam tat eva
svatantraḥ veda a puruṣa tantra tvāt iti
yadi svatantra upayogitva nirapekṣāṇi na jalpati
tata kim atas āha tatra iti

original: yadā hyayaṃ jalpāka iva nānupayuktaṃ bhāṣata iti sthitam,
analyzed: yadā hi ayam jalpākaḥ iva na anupayuktam bhāṣate iti sthitam

original: tatra yadi lokavākyasthitaṃ śabdalakṣaṇaṃ kathayet tadasya vedaṃ vyācikhyāsārenupayuktaṃ syāditi //8//
analyzed: tatra yadi loka vākya sthitam śabda lakṣaṇam kathayet tat asya vedam syāt iti
nanu yadi anupayuktam na lakṣaṇīyam

original: kimiti tarhi pratyakṣādi lakṣyate na hi teṣāṃ vedopayogo dṛśyate ata āha---pratyakṣādīti /
analyzed: kim iti tarhi pratyakṣa ādi lakṣyate na hi teṣām veda upayogaḥ dṛśyate atas āha pratyakṣa ādi iti
ayam abhiprāya veda sva rūpa avadhāraṇe eva tāvat mahān upakāra pratyakṣasya

original: na hi tadantareṇa pura'--- parthamameva svādhyāyagrahaṇakāle varṇamātrādyavadhārayituṃ śakyate,
analyzed: na hi tad antareṇa svādhyāya grahaṇa kāle varṇa mātra ādi avadhārayitum śakyate
tadā ca anavadhṛtam śāstra artha jñāna velāyām asmṛta tvāt na upayujyeta eva

original: ata' purastāt parastācca varṇamātrādita' kṛte pratyakṣādyupayogaṃ matvā tallakṣaṇaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: purastāt parastāt ca kṛte pratyakṣa ādi upayogam matvā tad lakṣaṇam kṛtam
anumānam api pratīka viniyukta mantra śeṣa anumāne upayujyate
yathā devasya tvā iti nirvapati iti
upamānam api saurya ādi karmaṇām prakṛti viśeṣa upamāne
arthāpattiḥ api aśruta vākya eka deśa kalpanāyām
pada vākye yattā avadhāraṇe dravya devatā ādi abhāve ca
karmaṇām avyakta codanā tva avadhāraṇe upayujyate iti dvayoḥ ādi śabdayoḥ arthaḥ iti
yat tu gām ānaya ityādi vākya stham śābda lakṣaṇam
tasya na iha upayogaḥ sti tasmāt śāstra gatam kṛtam
viśeṣaḥ ca na sāmānyam antareṇa asti kaścana

original: tasmāt tampayudāhratya sāmānyaṃ lakṣayet sukham // Msv_5,5.11 //

sāmānya rūpam api etat adhikārāt viśiṣyate
