original: na caivañjātīyaka' kaścidupayogo gāmānayetyādivākyasthasya śābdalakṣamasyāstīti tadupekṣyaiva śāstragatameva lakṣaṇaṃ praṇītamityāha---yatviti
analyzed: na ca evañjātīyaka kaścid upayogaḥ gām ānaya ityādi vākya sthasya śābda lakṣam asya asti iti tat upekṣya eva śāstra gatam eva lakṣaṇam praṇītam iti āha yatu iti

original: yatpunaralakṣite sāmānye na viśeṣo lakṣayituṃ śakyata ityuktaṃ tatpariharati---viśeṣaśceti /

vyabhicārāt

original: viśeṣastu sāmānyāvyabhicārīti tasmin lakṣite tadantargataṃ sāmānyaṃ sukhameva lakṣitaṃ bhavet /

original: yadā hi vidhāyakavijñānādasannikṛṣṭer'the vijñānaṃ śāstramityuktaṃ tadārtād vidhāyakaviśeṣarahitācchabdamātrajñānācchābdamiti śakyamavagantumiti  #
analyzed: yadā hi vidhāyaka vijñānāt asannikṛṣṭa arthe vijñānam śāstram iti uktam tadā ārtāt vidhāyaka viśeṣa rahitāt śabda mātra jñānāt śābdam iti śakyam avagantum iti
na pṛthak ucyate iti
nanu na idam viśeṣa lakṣaṇam viśeṣa upādāna abhāvāt iti uktam

na avaśyam upāttam eva viśeṣaṇam bhavati
kintu adhikāra labhyam api
yathā āgneya ādiṣu vakṣyate tat vai
diha api codanā lakṣaṇa adhikārāt śabda vijñānāt iti ukte vidhāyaka viśeṣaṇam pratyeṣyate iti
nanu yadi prakṛta upayogi codanā iti
paryāyāḥ ete iti

original: ayaṃ cādhikārato viśeṣalābho jaimineraṣyanumataścodanāśabdamaviśeṣitaṃ dvitīye sūtre prayuñjānasyetyāha---yathā ceti /
analyzed: ayam ca adhikārataḥ viśeṣa lābhaḥ jaimineḥ aṣi anumataḥ codanā śabdam aviśeṣitam dvitīye sūtre prayuñjānasya iti āha yathā ca iti

original: evaṃ hi manyate--- yadyapi codanāśabda' pravartakavākyamātravacana',
analyzed: evam hi manyate yadi api codanā śabda pravartaka vākya mātra vacana
tathā api prathama sūtre tha śabdena
śabda jñāna artha vijñāna śabdau śāstre tathā sthitau
śāstrasya api aparīkṣya tvam anayā eva dhiyā uditam
dhyayana ānantaryasya upātta tvāt tad adhikārāt eva codanā śabdaḥ vaidikyām eva codanāyām avatiṣṭhate
evam iha api śāstra lakṣame codanā prāmāṇya adhikārāt śabda vijñāna artha jñāna śabdau viśiṣṭa śabda artha parau
vidhāyake śabda śabdaḥ vidheye ca artha śabdaḥ iti

original: yadyapi vṛttikāramatopanyāsāvasare'pratyakṣādīni hi prasiddhāni pramāṇāni tadantargataṃ
analyzed: yadi api vṛtti kāra mata upanyāsa avasare pratyakṣa ādīni hi prasiddhāni pramāṇāni tat antargatam

original: śāstram' iti bhāṣyakāreṇoktaṃ tatrāpi viśeṣaśāstrāparīkṣāpratijñānaṃ prakṛtopayogitvābhiprāyeṇaiveti
analyzed: śāstram iti bhāṣyakāreṇa uktam tatra api viśeṣa śāstra aparīkṣā pratijñānam prakṛta upayogi tva abhiprāyeṇa eva iti
darśayati pratyakṣa ādi iti
idam tu cintanīyam
yadi vidhāyaka śabda janitam vijñānam śāstram

original: kimidānīmaṅgāni mīmāṃsā karmānuśāsanāni ca na sāstrāṇi,
analyzed: kim idānīm aṅgāni mīmāṃsā karma anuśāsanāni ca na sa astrāṇi
laukikāni ca gām ānaya ityādi vākyāni śāstrāṇi

na hi laukikāḥ gām ānaya ityādiṣu śāstra śabdam upacaranti
sva vacana virodhaḥ śva
yatas gām ānaya ityādi vākya stham śābda lakṣamam iti hi vadanti

original: mīmāṃsādiṣu vedavat tato 'pi vā sātiśayaṃ śāstraśabdopacāramupalabhāmahe /
analyzed: mīmāṃsā ādiṣu veda vat vā sa atiśayam śāstra śabda upacāram upalabhāmahe

original: api cāyaṃ śāstraśabdo rūḍho vā syād yaugiko vā,
analyzed: api ca ayam śāstra śabdaḥ rūḍhaḥ vā syāt yaugikaḥ vā
sarvathā
sarvathā ca vaidāṅga ādiṣu vartitum arhati
asti hi teṣu yathāyatham artha anusāsanam
rūḍhiḥ ca varṇitam
atra abhidhīyate
yoga rūḍhiḥ iyam paṅkaja ādi vat
atas na tāvat nāma ānaya ityādiṣu atiprasajyate
sati api yoge laukikānām teṣu aprayogāt
puruṣa artha upadeśān eva laukikā śātrsam iti manyante
tathā ca aṅgāni iti teṣām śāstra tvam
nanu vidhāyakam śāstram iti śāstra lakṣamam
na ca tāni kañcid vidadhati
mā evam
sarveṣām eva anuṣṭhāna upadeśa para tvāt
vyākaraṇe hi yat sādhubhiḥ bhāṣeta tat ebhiḥ iti upadiśayate
mīmāṃsāyām api pratyadhikaraṇam nyāya vyutpādanena anuṣṭhāna upadeśaḥ eva sarvatra
atas yat śāstram tad pravṛtti nuvṛtti upadeśakam eva iti niyama

original: na punastadupadeśakaṃ śāstrameveti laukikī prasiddhiriha bhāṣyakāreṇānūditā,
analyzed: na punar tad upadeśakam śāstram evā iti laukikī prasiddhiḥ iha bhāṣyakāreṇa anūditā

original: vivakṣādi ca dhūmādau nāstītyetena bhinnatā // Msv_5,5.16 //
analyzed: vivakṣā ādi ca dhūma ādau nā asti iti etena bhinna tā

original: gocaraṃ puruṣaśreyovidhāyakaṃ loke śāstramiti prasiddhaṃ tacchāstram /

pratyakṣa vat ca atra api śabda tad jñāna ādiṣu pramāṇa vikalpāḥ darśayitavyā
na avaśyam jñānam eva pramāṇiti abhiniveṣṭavyam

original: pūrvapramāṇe cottaraṃ vākyārthajñānaṃ phalaṃ tatprāmāṇye ca hānādibuddhiriti viveka iti //14//

tān nirākartṛ kāmaḥ teṣām matam upanyasati tatra iti
idam ca pratijñā mātram eva teṣām uktam
tadīya abheda hetu upanyāsaḥ tu para ukta bheda hetu nirāsa avasare kariṣyate iti
kim punar abheda upanyāsa nirāsayoḥ
nanu ayam sāṅkhya ādibhiḥ eva bheda vādibhiḥ abhedaḥ nirākṛtaḥ eva
atas āha bhedaḥ iti
na taiḥ asamyak bheda kāraṇam uktam iti artha
tān eva tad uktān bheda hetūn nirākartṛm upanyasyati pūrva saṃskāra iti ukta antena

original: evaṃ hi tairuktam--- śābde hi pūravasaṃskārayukto 'ntyo varṇo,

analyzed: atas sti atra api gamya gamakayoḥ sādṛśyam iti pratibimbeṣu vartamānaḥ hetuḥ anaikāntikaḥ bhavati iti
nanu na edam anumānam

original: ādarśatejasā hi pratihatena nāyanena tejasā prakāśitaṃ pratyakṣameva mukhamavagamyata iti śabdādhikaraṇe vakṣyate /
analyzed: ādarśa tejasā hi pratihatena nāyanena tejasā prakāśitam pratyakṣam eva mukham avagamyate iti śabda adhikaraṇe vakṣyate
atas āha na ca iti

original: ayamabhiprāya'--- yadā hyayaṃ paratyakṣeṣvaṅgulyādiṣvādarśavartinā pratibimbena tādṛktve viditavyāptirbhavati,
analyzed: ayam abhiprāya yadā hi ayam para tyakṣeṣu aṅguli ādiṣu ādarśa vartinā pratibimbena tādṛktve vidita vyāptiḥ bhavati
tadā mukham api ādarśa gatam bimba anurūpam anuminoti
itarathā tu aṅguli sannikarṣaḥ u pi anya rūpam anyādṛś tayā bodhayati iti
sambhāvayet
atas na tādṛktvam niścinuyāt iti
astu vā idam pratyakṣam
kim iti sūkṣma īkṣikayā
viśadataram eva anumānam upadarśayāma
yatra gamya gamakayoḥ sādṛśyam avagamyata
iti āha pratyakṣa tā iti
gatānām iti anumāna viṣaya siddi artham apratyakṣa tām darśayati iti

original: yadapīdamuktam--- śābde hi sakṛduktameva vākyaṃ sahasā nānārthān pratibhāsayati viruddhānaviruddhāṃśca,
analyzed: yat api idam uktam śābde hi sakṛt uktam eva vākyam sahasā nānā arthān pratibhāsayati viruddhān aviruddhān ca
codanā lakṣaṇa ūrthaḥ dharma
śvetaḥ dhāvati iti ca yathā
na evam anumāne
dhūmaḥ hi yena eva vidita vyāptiḥ tatra ekatra eva dhiyam ādadhāti
atas śabda anumānayoḥ bheda

original: prayogaśca bhavati--- śabdo 'numānād bhinna' ekadā nānārthapratibhāsādakṣavaditi /
analyzed: prayogaḥ ca bhavati śabdaḥ numānāt bhinnaḥ ekadā nānā artha pratibhāsāt akṣa vat iti
a nīta hetuḥ vā
liṅgam ekam eva
liṅgasya api hi tādrūpyam dṛśṭam
virodhāt na anumānam ced syāt anāgama tā api te
yatra ca eka artha tā vākye tatra syāt anumāna tā
sakṛt uccarite ca asmin vivakṣā ekā eva dṛśyate
yaḥ tu anirdhārita arthānām aneka pratibhā udbhava
sa liṅge pi asphuṭe dṛṣṭaḥ tasmāt na etena bhidyate
prakāśayati
yathā dhūma ādi
na ca tathā śabda
atas bhidyate iti
tat upanyasya dūṣayati eka vākyāt iti
anena api prakāreṇa na bhinna tā iti arthaḥ iti
kim iti na bhinna tā
atas āha liṅgasya api iti
anaikāntikaḥ hetiḥ iti

original: heturhi dhūmo 'gnitvamuṣṇatvaṃ dāhakatvamindhanavikāratvaṃ ca ekadaiva pratipādayati /
analyzed: hetuḥ hi dhūmaḥ gni tvam uṣṇa tvam dāhaka tvam indhana vikāra tvam ca ekadā eva pratipādayati
tathā viruddha nitya śabda kṛtaka tvāt iti
vivakṣā anusāreṇa tāvat nitya tām pratipādayati
vyāpti balena ca anitya tvam atas na aikāntikaḥ hetuḥ iti
nanu na viruddhaḥ na ekam artha pratipādayati
vyāpti balena hi liṅgam pratipādakam bhavati
atas kṛtaka tvam anitya tvena vyāptam iti tat eva gamayati
viruddha artha vyāptiḥ tu ekasya virodhāt eva na sambhavati iti
tat tāvat āśaṅkate virodhāt iti
uttaram āha syāt iti
vivakṣita artha pratipādane hi śabdasya śaktiḥ avagatā
atas saḥ u pi ekadā ekam artham pratipādayati
artha antare tu asau api virodhāt anāgamakaḥ eva iti

original: bhūyasāṃ caikārthānāṃ vākyānāṃ nānena hetunā bheda' sidhyatītyāha---yatraceti /
analyzed: bhūyasām ca eka arthānām vākyānām na anena hetunā bhedaḥ sidhyati iti āha yatra ca iti

original: na kevalaṃ viruddhamanekaṃ śabdo na pratipādayati,
analyzed: na kevalam viruddham anekam śabdaḥ na pratipādayati
kintu aviruddham api
uktam idam vivakṣite śabda pramāṇam iti
sakṛt uccaritān ca buddhaḥ bhavati
atas na kvacid aneka artha pratipādanam iti asiddhaḥ hetuḥ iti āha sakṛt iti
nanu asti tāvat aneka artha pratibhānam
pramāṇam tu ekatra bhavatu nāma
etāvatā ca siddham anumānāt vaidharmyam atas āha yaḥ tu iti
yathā hi
prasiddha tvāt hi tatra api na dṛṣṭāntaḥ abhidhīyate
an abhyaste tu apekṣnate śabde sambandhinaḥ smṛtim

original: atra prayukta ityevaṃ budhyante hi cirāt kvacit // Msv_5,5.34 //
analyzed: atra prayuktaḥ iti evam budhyante hi cirāt kvacid
parā uktāḥ hetavaḥ ca atra nā abhedasya nivāritā
śabda anumānayoḥ aikyam dhūmāt agni anumāna vat
anvaya vyirekābyām eka pratyakṣa darśanāt
sambandha pūrvaka tvāt ca pratipattiḥ itas yata
nyāyya vacana vyakti paricayāt pūrvam śabdāt aneka arthā pariplavante
tathā liṅge pi dhūma ādau asphuṭa vidite na eka artha pratibhā nandaṣṭam eva

original: bhavati hi dūrād dhūmo 'yamāhosvid dhūlisantāna iti saṃśayānasyāgnivātāvartayoranavasthito vitarka iti //32//
analyzed: bhavati hi dūrāt dhūmaḥ yam āhosvit dhūli santāne iti saṃśayānasya agni vāta āvartayoḥ anavasthitaḥ vitarkaḥ iti

original: tathā śabde dṛṣṭāntānabhidhānamapi dhūmādau vyabhicārānna bhedaheturityāha---dṛṣṭānteti /
analyzed: tathā śabde dṛṣṭānta anabhidhānam api dhūma ādau vyabhicārāt na bheda hetuḥ iti āha dṛṣṭānta iti
katham vyabhicāra
atas āha prasiddha tvāt iti
nanu aprasiddhe tāvat asti dṛṣṭānta apekṣā
śabde tu tat api na asti iti atas āha anabhyastā eti
apekṣām eva darśayati atra iti
yatra hi aprasiddha padārtha gocara saṃśayaḥ bhavati

original: tatra yāvadayaṃ śabdo 'muṣminnarthe vṛddhairācarita iti cireṇa praṇidhāya na budhyate,
analyzed: tatra yāvat ayam śabdaḥ muṣmin arthe vṛddhaiḥ ācaritaḥ iti cireṇa praṇidhāya na budhyate
na tāvat tam artham niścinuyāt iti

original: tadevaṃ tāvad bhedavādibhirna bhedahetava' samyaguktā iti darśitam //34//
analyzed: tat evam tāvat bheda vādibhiḥ na bheda hetavaḥ samyak uktāḥ iti darśitam

original: bauddhoktābhedahetunirāso 'pi tairna kṛta ityāha--- paroktā iti /
analyzed: bauddha ukta abheda hetu nirāsaḥ api taiḥ na kṛtaḥ iti āha para uktāḥ iti
tān eva abheda hetūn upanyasyati śabda anumānayoḥ iti
sārda dvayena
asya artha yathā dhūmāt agni anumānam anvaya vyatireka jam
ekasya ca dhūmasya pratyakṣa darśanāt
pratyakṣa anya pramāṇa tvāt tad adṛṣṭa artha bodhanāt
sāmānya viṣaya tvāt traikālya viṣaya āśrayāt
kaiścid mīmāṃsakaiḥ uktaḥ viṣaya antarāt
pūrvābhyām hi apiḥ a chinne śāstram arthe pravartate
sambandha pūrvakam ca bhavati
evam śabdāt api jñānam jāyamānam evam jāyate
pratyakṣāt ca tad anyat pramāṇam
pratyakṣa adṛṣṭam ca artham bodhayati
sāmānya viṣayam ca śābdam
traikālya āśrayam ca
atas na bhidyate
idam ca sādhana vākyasya artha kathanam
sādhana prayogāḥ tu evam darśayitavyā śābdam jñānam anumānam anvaya vyatireka ja tvāt agni anumāna vat iti
eka pratyakṣa darśana utpatte
tadvat eva sambandha pūrvakatvam vāca hetu
tau eva sādhya dṛṣṭāntau

original: na ca katavācyamanvayavyatirekajatvāt sambandhapūrvakatvaṃ na bhidyate,
analyzed: na ca sambandha pūrvakatvam na bhidyate
anvaya vyatireka ātmaka tvāt anumāna sambandhasya iti

original: pūrvaṃ hi sambandhaviśeṣajatvaṃ heturukta' idānīṃ tvavivakṣitaviśeṣaṃ sambandhasāmānyapūrvakatvamiti /
analyzed: pūrvam hi sambandha viśeṣa ja tvam hetuḥ uktaḥ idānīm tu avivakṣita viśeṣam sambandha sāmānya pūrvakatvam iti
evam uttareṣu api triṣu pūrvavat sādhya dṛṣṭānta yojanā kāryā
caturthe tu agni anumānam pradarśana mātram
bhaviṣyat avṛtta vṛtti aṣṭya
numāne api darśayitavye iti
mīmāṃsaka eka deśinām bheda hetum idānīm dūṣayitum upanyasyati kaiścid iti
viṣaya antaram eva darśayati pūrvābhyām iti

original: ayamabhiprāya'--- yadayadaparicchinne pavartate tat tato bhidyate,
analyzed: ayam abhiprāya yat ayat aparicchinne tat tatas bhidyate
anumānam iva pratyakṣāt
śāstram ca pūrva dvaya aparicchinna ṛthe pravartate
tatas tābhyām bhidyate
kim punar pratyakṣāt bheda pratipādanena prayojanam
na hi tad abheda kaiścid āśrita
yat nirākriyate
ucyate
asti eva keṣāñcid
śrotra vyāpāra āśrayāt jāyamānam idam śābdam śrotra pratyakṣam eva
tad anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānāt
atas eva badhirasya na bhavati iti
tat anena pratyakṣataḥ bheda pratipādanena nirākriyate

original: evaṃ hi manyate--- vidyamānopalambhanaṃ pratyakṣamiti darśitam /
analyzed: evam hi manyate vidyamāna upalambhanam pratyakṣam iti darśitam

original: idaṃ tu śābdaṃ trikālārthaviṣayamata' kathaṃ pratyakṣe 'ntarbhaviṣyati /
analyzed: idam tu śābdam tri kāla artha viṣayam ata katham pratyakṣe ntarbhaviṣyati
badhiraḥ tu śabda aśravaṇāt artham na jānāti
na artha aśravaṇāt

original: prayogaśca bhavati--- śābdaṃ pratyakṣād bhinnaṃ tadaparicchinnaviṣayatvād anumānavaditi //38//
analyzed: prayogaḥ ca bhavati śābdam pratyakṣāt bhinnam tad aparicchinna viṣaya tvāt anumāna vat iti
tatra api nā āgama tvam syāt puruṣokteḥ tathā astu ced

original: pratyaya' kinnimittor'the vaktṛbuddhe' kuto vasau // Msv_5,5.39 //
analyzed: pratyaya vaktṛ buddhe kutas vasau
tat imam pratyakṣataḥ bhedam abhyupetya anumānāt bheda kāraṇam nirākaroti tatra api iti
evam hi manyate yadi anumāna aparicchinna viṣa tayā bhedaḥ bhidhīyate
tarhi puṃvākyānām anāgama tvam

original: vedavākyānyeva tu mānāntarāviṣayārthāni bhidyante ityavyāpako heturiti /
analyzed: veda vākyāni eva tu māna antara aviṣaya arthāni bhidyante iti avyāpakaḥ hetuḥ iti
kim punar idam aniṣṭam āpāditam
nanu iṣyate eva puṃvacasām anāgama tvam
āgamaḥ hi śāstram
aprāpte śāstram arthavat iti
vakṣyati
imāni punar pramāṇa antara prāpta viṣaya pratipādakāni iti anuvāda vākyāni eva

original: ata eva śāstrameva vedavākyaṃ bhinnatayā pakṣīkṛtaṃ 'śāstramarthe pravartata'iti /
analyzed: atas eva śāstram eva veda vākyam bhinna tayā pakṣīkṛtam śāstram arthe pravartate eti
tad bheda stha evā upayogāt iti
tat etat āha yathā iti
atra dūṣaṇam āha pratyayaḥ iti
evam ayam paṃvacana a prāmāṇya āvādī
kim asti na vā
na tāvat na asti
sarva loka vyavahāra uccheda prasaṅgāt
sataḥ tu na a nimitta utpatti sambhavati iti nimittam vācyam

original: na ca śabdādanyannimittamasyopapadyata iti jātamasandagdhamabādhitaṃ ca jñānāntareṇa pramāṇameva puṃvacanajanitaṃ jñānamiti nāsyānāgamatvābyupagamo  #
analyzed: na ca śabdāt anyat nimittam asya upapadyate iti jātam asandagdham abādhitam ca jñāna antareṇa pramāṇam eva puṃvacana janitam jñānam iti na asya anāgama tva abyupagamaḥ
yuktaḥ iti
itaraḥ tu anumāna antarbhāva abhiprāyeṇa āha vaktṛ buddheḥ iti
ayam abhiprāya visaṃvāda bhūyiṣṭāni hi puṃvacanāni
tat na etāni śruta mātrāṇi eva artham niścāyayanti
na ca aniścita ūrthaḥ jñātaḥ bhavati
niścayasya eva jñāna tvāt

original: ata' praṅ(?) niścayotpatterjñānābhāva evanti kiṃ nimittaprayatnena /
analyzed: atas prak niścaya utpatteḥ jñāna abhāve kim nimitta prayatnena
yadā tu
vaktā evam avadhārita vyāptiḥ bhavati na ca ayam anavagatam bravīti iti

original: tadā tadvākyādeva jñānakāryāt kāraṇabhūtaṃ jñāyamanumāya jñānasyārthāvyabhicāreṇārtho niścīyate /
analyzed: tadā tad vākyāt eva jñāna kāryāt kāraṇa bhūtam jñāyam anumāya jñānasya artha avyabhicāreṇa arthaḥ niścīyate
tasyām ca avasthāyām jñāna liṅga avagata tvāt arthasya vākyam anuvādakam eva
atas na āgamaḥ iti
siddhānta vādī tu āha kutas nu asau iti
ayam abhiprāyaḥ avagatā hi buddhiḥ artham niścāyayati

original: na cāsyā' kiñcidavagame kāraṇastīti vakṣyāma iti //39//
analyzed: na ca asyāḥ kiñcid avagame kāraṇa asti iti vakṣyāmaḥ iti

original: na śabdārthasya sā liṅgaṃ na śabdo 'syā' kathañcana /
analyzed: na śabda arthasya sā liṅgam na syā kathañcana

original: viśeṣo gamyate tābhyāṃ na caitasyānumeyatā // Msv_5,5.40 //
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ gamyate tābhyām na ca etasya anumeya tā
tena vaktuḥ abhiprāye pratyakṣa ādi anirupite
puruṣoktiḥ api śrotuḥ āgama tvam prapadyate
svayam eva anavagatā na arthasya liṅgam iti āha na iti
nanu uktam kāryāt śabdāt anumāsyate
atas āha na śabdaḥ iti
yatā na ubhayam ubhayatra liṅgam
tathā darśayati viśeṣaḥ iti
anumānam hi vyāpti balena bhavati

original: iha ca vākyasāmānyaṃ jñānasāmānyena vyāptamavagatamiti tatastat sidhyed,
analyzed: iha ca vākya sāmānyam jñāna sāmānyena vyāptam avagatam iti tatas tat sidhyet
jñāna mātrāt ca artha mātram
na ca iha tathā
jñāna artha viśeṣayoḥ anumitsita tvāt
tayoḥ ca sambnadha grahaṇa abhāvena ananumeya tvāt

original: nanu yatrāpto vākyaṃ prayuṅkte tadeva jñātvā prayuṅkta iti vijñānaviśeṣeṇaiva sambandho 'vagata' /
analyzed: nanu yatra āptaḥ vākyam prayuṅkte tat eva jñātvā prayuṅkte iti vijñāna viśeṣeṇa eva sambandhaḥ
atas saḥ eva anumāsyate
yadi evam avagataḥ tarhi prāk eva vākyāt artha

original: na hyanyathā yatra prayuṅkta iti śakyate pratinirdeṣṭum /
analyzed: na hi anyathā yatra prayuṅkte iti śakyate pratinirdeṣṭum

original: na cārthoparāgamantareṇa jñānasya viśeṣa' sambhavati yo 'numīyate /
analyzed: na ca artha uparāgam antareṇa jñānasya sambhavati yaḥ numīyate
na ca akarmakam jñāna mātram anumīyate
na ca tatas ṛtha viśeṣaḥ tidhyati
na ca aniścitam jñānam
saṃśaya ātmanaḥ vijñāna vidhāyāḥ darśita tvāt
na ca evam puṃvākyebhyaḥ sandeha

original: yā tu kvacid vyabhicārādaprāmāṇyāśaṅkā sā āptatvādinā nirākriyata ityuktam /
analyzed: yā tu kvacid vyabhicārāt aprāmāṇya āśaṅkā sā āpta tva ādinā nirākriyate iti uktam
yadi tu eva jñāna viśeṣa avagatiḥ ucyate

original: ya evamavadhārito bhavati--- nāyamananvitārthāni padāni prayuṅkte,
analyzed: yaḥ evam avadhāritaḥ bhavati na ayam ananvita arthāni padāni prayuṅkte
na ca anavagata anvayāni
tat nūnam amīṣām anena anvayaḥ jñātaḥ iti

original: kimidānīṃ viditapadapadārthasaṅgati' śrotā puṃvākyādarthaṃ na budhyata eva /
analyzed: kim idānīm vidita pada padārtha saṅgati śrotā puṃvākyāt artham na budhyate eva
yadi evam anuttarāḥ guravaḥ

original: jātā tu buddhirasandigdhāviparyastā ca na vaidavākyajanitāyā dhiyo viśiṣyeta /
analyzed: jātā tu buddhiḥ asandigdhā aviparyastā ca na vaida vākya janitāyāḥ dhiyaḥ viśiṣyeta

original: śaṅkāmātraṃ tu kathañcid vede 'pi vākyatvādinā bhavatīti na tāvatā tadaprāmāṇyam /
analyzed: śaṅkā mātram tu kathañcid vede pi vākya tva ādinā bhavati iti na tāvatā tad aprāmāṇyam
tābhyām iti
buddhi śabdābhyām iti artha
atas vaktṛ abhiprāya avagatau pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa asambhavāt tad anavagame
na ca api ananumeya tvam āgama arthasya śakyate

original: liṅgaṃ hi śabda evāsya dhūmo 'gneriva kalpate // Msv_5,5.42 //
analyzed: liṅgam hi śabdaḥ eva asya dhūmaḥ gneḥ iva kalpate
na ca api ananumeya tvāt pramāṇa antara gamya tā
rūpasya a śrāvaṇa tvena na hi apratyakṣa tā iṣyate
evam sthite sva yūthyāḥ na kecid na ati prayatnata
anumāna viśeṣaḥ yam īdṛś dharmasya bodhaka
bhaviṣyati artha rūpam tu liṅgam dharme nirākṛtam
ca artha anumāna anupapatte śrotuḥ aprāpta pūrvam artham prāpayantī puruṣoktiḥ veda vat āgamaḥ eva iti āha tena iti
yat api ca idam ucyate
vedaḥ tāvat bhinna viṣaya tayā pramāṇa antaram eva iti
tat api manoratha mātram eva iti āha
na śakyate vaktum iti abhiprāya
kim iti na śakyate
atas āha liṅgam iti
yadā pūrva uktaiḥ hetubhiḥ aviśeṣeṇa sarvam eva śābdam anumānāt abhinnam iti ukam
tadā katham tad gocarasya ananumeya tvam bhaviṣyati iti

original: nanvarthātmanā tāvadalliṅgenānanumitapūrvamarthaṃ vedo bodhayatīti pramāṇāntaraṃ bhaviṣyatītyata āha---na ceti /
analyzed: nanu artha ātmanā tāvat alliṅgena ananumita pūrvam artham vedaḥ bodhayati iti pramāṇa antaram bhaviṣyati iti atas āha na ca iti
dhūmat tva kṛtaka tva ādīnām hi sati api avāntarabhede yathā eva trailakṣaṇya aparityāgena anumāna tvam evam iha api syāt
yadi tu tat eva na asti iti ucyate
tat tarhi vacanīyam
kim avāntarabheda upanyāsena iti
anye tu prakṣīṇa śaktayaḥ bhedam eva āśritya eka deśina
tat darśayati evam sthitā eti

original: ayaṃ hi teṣāmabhiprāya'--- codanāprāmāṇyaṃ hi pratijñātaṃ,
analyzed: ayam hi teṣām abhiprāya codanā prāmāṇyam hi pratijñātam
tat ca anumāna tve sidhyati eva
yathā eva hi śabda madhyāt veda pramāṇam
evam anumānebhyaḥ veda anumānam iti kim ati prayatnataḥ beda pratipādanena iti
nanu bhaviṣya tvāt dharmaḥ na anumīyate iti uktam bhāṣyakāreṇa
atas numāna tva abhyupagame bhavet
āha bhaviṣyati iti
artha rūpa liṅga abhiprāyeṇa tat nirākṛtam iti artha
saṃjñā anumāna tā icchā tu na duṣyet āgame
lakṣaṇena tu abhinna tvam yadi śabda anumānayoḥ
veda jñāna apramāṇa tvam
āpta vāda avisaṃvāda sāmānyāt hi
lakṣaṇena anumāna tvāt prāmāṇyam siddhim ṛcchati
vede tu āpta nara abhāvāt sambandha anubhavāt ṛte
lakṣaṇam na anumānasya iti aprāmāṇyacam prasajyate
nanu eka deśa satya tve tasya syāt anumāna tā
veda tvāt agnihotra ādau vāyu kṣepiṣṭha vākya vat
etat api dūṣayati saṃjñā iti
yadi paścāt māna sāmānyāt anumāna tvam tat astu
na ca tad abhyupagame doṣaḥ iti artha

original: lakṣaṇaikatvena tvabheda iṣṭe 'numānalakṣaṇābhāvāt pramāṇāntarānabyupagamāccāprāmāṇyameva vedavacasāmāpadyata ityāha--- lakṣaṇeneti //46//
analyzed: lakṣaṇa eka tvena tu abhede iṣṭe numāna lakṣaṇa abhāvāt pramāṇa antara anabyupagamāt ca aprāmāṇyam eva veda vacasām āpadyate iti āha lakṣaṇena iti
nanu uktam lakṣaṇa ekatvam āpta vāda avisaṃvāda sāmānyāt iti atra āha āpta vāda iti

original: puṃvākyānāmanena prakāreṇānumānatvāt prāmāṇyaṃ siddhyati na vedavacasāmiti bhāva' //47//
analyzed: puṃvākyānām anena prakāreṇa anumāna tvāt prāmāṇyam siddhi ati na veda vacasām iti
kim iti na siddhi ati
atas āha vede tu iti
āpta nara abhāvāt tāvat na āpta vāda tvena avisaṃvāda danumānam
na ca atīndriya yaiḥ arthaiḥ vedānām sambandha anubhava sidhyati iti apramāṇam eva
na āpta sandṛbdhāḥ vedāḥ iti veda adhikaraṇe vakṣyati iti

original: nanu pramāṇāntarakasaṅgatārthāni vedaikadeśabhūtāni kṣepiṣṭhādivākyāni dṛṣṭvā itarāṇyapyagnihotrādivākyāni vedatvāt satyārthānyanumāsyante
analyzed: nanu veda eka deśa bhūtāni kṣepiṣṭha ādi vākyāni dṛṣṭvā itarāṇi api agnihotra ādi vākyāni veda tvāt satya arthāni anumāsyante
atas sti lakṣaṇena anumāna tvam iti āha nanu iti
na āditya yūpe na aikāntyāt tadvat vā gauṇa tā bhavet

original: samā loke ca vede ca siddhā vedapramāṇatā // Msv_5,5.51 //
analyzed: samā loke ca vede ca siddhā veda pramāṇa tā

original: nāptasya sambhavo vede loke nāsmāt pramāṇatā // Msv_5,5.52 //
analyzed: na āptasya sambhavaḥ vede loke na asmāt pramāṇa tā

original: purastād varṇitaṃ hyetat tasmāt śabdena yā mati' /
analyzed: purastāt varṇitam hi etat tasmāt śabdena yā mati

original: tasyā' svata' pramāṇatvaṃ na cet syāddoṣadarśanam // Msv_5,5.53 //

etat api dūṣayati na āditya iti

original: ādityaśabdo hi sārupyād gauṇo yūpe vartata iti tatsiddhisūtre vakṣyate,
analyzed: āditya śabdaḥ hi sārupyāt gauṇaḥ yūpe vartate iti tatsiddhisūtre vakṣyate

original: api ca prāk svamahimnā vedaprāmāṇyabalenāprāmāṇyānumānāni pratyuktāni /
analyzed: api ca prāk sva mahimnā veda prāmāṇya balena aprāmāṇya anumānāni pratyuktāni

original: ato lakṣaṇabhedenaiva śabdasya pramāṇāntaratve iṣyamāṇe vedā' pramāṇaṃ bhavanti /

original: loke 'pi nāptatvaṃ prāmāṇye kāraṇamityāha--- loka iti //52//

original: prāmāṇyaṃ tu sarvasaṃvidāṃ sahajameveti svata'prāmāṇyevāde varṇitamiti /

viṣayaḥ dṛśyate

original: na tāvadanumānaṃ hi yāvat tadviṣayaṃ na tat // Msv_5,5.56 //

evañjātīyakasya śabdasya ca anumānena prāmāṇyam eva samam
na lakṣaṇam iti āha anumānena iti

original: tathāpi parai' padānyudāhṛtya vicāra' kṛta iti tadbhedameva pratipādayāma' /

atra iti

liṅgam asya asti iti liṅgī
tasya viśiṣṭasya prasādhakam liṅgam asti iti

original: nanvanumāne vyāptibalena dharmasāmānyamanumīyata ityata āha--- na tāvaditi /

tra viṣayam
siddha tvāt iti uktam iti

original: kiñcit śābde sāmānyādatiriktamavagamyate sa vākyasyaiva viṣaya' /

a śrute pi pada antare padāt ekasmāt viśiṣṭa bodhaḥ dṛṣṭa

original: yatra hi saṅkhyādayo 'vagamyante tatra kathamata āha--- yatrāpīti /

original: rājā bhartā manuṣyasya tena rājña' sa ucyate // Msv_5,5.69 //
analyzed: rājā bhartā manuṣyasya tena rājña saḥ ucyate
va gata viśeṣam
ubhaya anugatam go śabda sāmānyam hetum kariṣyāma

original: na pratijñārthaikadeśatā bhaviṣyatyata āha --- na pratyāyaneti ayamabhiprāya' na drutādiviśeṣāṇāṃ deśādinibandhanor'thena sambandho vidyate
analyzed: na pratijñā artha eka deśatā bhaviṣyati atas āha na pratyāyana iti ayam abhiprāya na druta ādi viśeṣāṇām deśa ādi nibandhana ūrthena sambandhaḥ vidyate
pratyāyana śakti viśiṣṭa tā ca api teṣām na sambhavati iti
kim iti na sambhavati atas āha viśeṣāṇām iti

original: yathā pakṣīkṛtasya mahato dhūmasyaikadeśe 'dhastādagnirastīti tadviśiṣṭo dhūma' sādhyo bhavati /
analyzed: yathā pakṣīkṛtasya mahataḥ dhūmasya eka deśe dhastāt agniḥ asti iti tad viśiṣṭaḥ dhūma sādhyaḥ bhavati
na evam druta ādi viśeṣāṇām pratyāyana śakti yoga
teṣām vyabhicāreṇa a pratyāyakta vāt iti

original: yattu teṣāṃ sāmānyaṃ gośabda' sapratyāyanaśaktiviśiṣṭa' tatra ca pakṣe sa eva pakṣo hetuścetyuktamevetyāha sāmānyasyeti //67//
analyzed: yat tu teṣām sāmānyam go śabda tatra ca pakṣe saḥ eva pakṣaḥ hetuḥ ca iti uktam eva iti āha sāmānyasya iti
śabdaḥ na anumeyaḥ iti upasaṃharan āha tasmāt iti

original: evaṃ tāvat śabdo na pakṣa ityuktam /
analyzed: evam tāvat śabdaḥ na pakṣaḥ iti uktam
yadi tu artam pakṣīkṛtya śabdaḥ hetuḥ iti ucyate
tat api ayuktam
apakṣa dharma tvāt iti āha katham ca iti
katham ca nirūpyate iti
kim iti na nirūpyate te āha na kriyā iti

original: kasyāñcit kriyāyāṃ kartṛtayā sambaddhaṃ kiñcit kasyacit sambandhī bhavati,
analyzed: kasyāñcid kriyāyām kartṛ tayā sambaddham kiñcid kasyacid sambandhī bhavati
kriyā kāraka sambandha pūrvaka tvāt śeṣa sambandhānām sva svāmi ādīnām iti
tatra sva svāmi sambandhaḥ tāvat kriyā kāraka sambandha pūrvakaḥ iti āha rājā iti
pratamam hi bharaṇa kriyāyām kartṛ karma bhāvam āpannau rāja puruṣau
sva svāmi sambandham anubhavataḥ iti

original: vṛkṣastiṣṭhati śākhāsu tā vā tatreti tasya tā' /
analyzed: vṛkṣaḥ tiṣṭhati śākhāsu tāḥ vā tatra iti tasya tā

original: deśe 'gnimati dhūmasya kartṛtvaṃ bhavanaṃ prati // Msv_5,5.70 //
analyzed: deśe gnimati dhūmasya kartṛ tvam bhavanam prati
kārya kāraṇa bhāva ādau kriyā sarvatra vidyate
na ca anavagata ākāra sambandhaḥ sti iti gamyate
na ca asti asati sambandhe ṣaṣṭhī tatpuruṣaḥ vā
tasmāt na pakṣa dharmaḥ yam iti śakyā nirūpaṇā
nivṛtte nyatra sambandhe ye tad viṣaya ātmanā
vadeyuḥ pakṣa dharma tvam śabdasya anupalabdhi vat
evam avayava avayavi sambandhaḥ pi kriyā garbhaḥ iti āha vṛkṣa eti
vṛkṣaḥ vayavī hi avayaveṣu tiṣṭhati iti prati iti
kadācid tu avayavāḥ eva śākhā ādayaḥ tasmin iti prati iti
tat evam sthiti kriyā kartṛ bhāva nibandhanaḥ vayava avayavi samambandhaḥ iti

original: evaṃ saṃyogo 'pi kriyāgarbha evetyāha--- deśa iti /
analyzed: evam saṃyogaḥ pi kriyā garbhaḥ evā iti āha deśaḥ iti

original: agnimaddeśe bhavane kartā bhavan dhūmo 'gnimato deśasya saṃyogī bhavatīti//
analyzed: agnimat deśe bhavane kartā bhavan dhūmaḥ gnimataḥ deśasya saṃyogī bhavati iti
evam kārya kāraṇa bhāva ādayaḥ pi kriyā kāraka sambandha pūrvakāḥ iti āha kārya iti

original: kiṇvaṃ hi surāyā bījaṃ surātmake pariṇāme kartṛbhavatsurāyā' kāraṇamityucyate /
analyzed: kiṇvam hi surāyāḥ bījam surā ātmake pariṇāme kartṛ bhavat surāyāḥ kāraṇam iti ucyate
tathā samūha samūhi sambandhaḥ pi

original: senākāryaṃ pratipakṣajayamaṃśena kurvan hastī senāyā' sambandhitayocyata iti /
analyzed: senā kāryam pratipakṣa jayam aṃśena kurvan hastī senāyāḥ sambandhi tayā ucyate iti
śabda arthayoḥ tu na kaścid eva bākāra sambandhasya avagamyate

original: na cānirūpitākāra' sambandho 'stīti śakyate vaktumityāha--- na ceti /
analyzed: na ca anirūpita ākāra sambandhaḥ sti iti śakyate vaktum iti āha na ca iti

original: na ca sambandhamantareṇa pakṣasya dharma iti vigrahagatā ṣaṣṭhī pakṣadharma iti ca tatpuruṣasamāso vā ghaṭata ityāha---na cāstīti /
analyzed: na ca sambandham antareṇa pakṣasya dharmaḥ iti vigraha gatā ṣaṣṭhī pakṣa dharmaḥ iti ca tatpuruṣa samāsaḥ vā ghaṭate iti āha na ca asti iti
vṛtti vigrahau api na upapannau iti
upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
anye tu śabdaḥ ūrtha viṣayaḥ iti evam tad dharma tām āhu
yathā anupalabdhiḥ abhāve prameya vakṣyate
tat etat upanyasyati nivṛttā eti
taiḥ api etat nirūpyam tu śabdaḥ tad viṣaya katham

original: na taddeśādisadbhāvo nābhimukhyādi tasya vā // Msv_5,5.74 //
analyzed: na tad deśa ādi sadbhāvaḥ na abhimukhya ādi tasya vā
tasmāt utpādayati eṣa yatas ṛtha viṣayām matim

original: tena tadviṣaya' śabda iti dharmatvakalpanā // Msv_5,5.75 //
analyzed: tena tad viṣayaḥ śabdaḥ iti dharma tva kalpanā
tatra vācaka tāyām ca siddhāyām pakṣa dharma tā
na pratīti aṅga tām gacchet na ca evam anumāna tā
gamaka tvāt ca dharma tvam dharma tvāt gamakaḥ yadi
syāt anyonya āśraya tvam hi tasmāt nā eṣā api kalpanā
na ca agṛhīta sambandhā svarūpa vyatirekata
śabdam jānanti yena atra pakṣa dharma matiḥ bhavet
etat api na upapannam iti āha taiḥ api iti

original: na kenāpi prakāreṇa viṣayaviṣayibhāvo ghaṭata ityartha' /
analyzed: na kena api prakāreṇa viṣaya viṣayi bhāvaḥ ghaṭate iti artha

original: yathā na ghaṭate tadetadāha--- na taditi //74//
analyzed: yathā na ghaṭate tat etat āha na tat iti
sarva prakāra asambhavāt pāriśeṣyeṇa tad viṣaya buddhi janaka tayā tad viṣaya tā vaktavyā
evam ca tad viṣaya buddhi janaka tvasya vācya vācaka bhāvam antareṇa anupapatteḥ tad abhyupamaga
tad siddhau ca na pratīti aṅgam pakṣa dharma tā
na ca a pakṣa dharma jani tā
pratītiḥ anumānam iti āha tasmāt iti dvayena
yadi tu pakṣa dharma tā eva tad viṣaya buddhi ja jane hetuḥ iṣyate

original: tatastavyatirekeṇa pakṣadharmatāyā evapānupapatteritaretarāśrayatvamato neyamapi kalpanā ghaṭata ityāha---gamakatvāditi //77//
analyzed: tatas tad vyatirekeṇa pakṣa dharma tāyāḥ itaretara āśraya tvam atas na iyam api kalpanā ghaṭate iti āha gamaka tvāt iti
itas ca na pakṣa dharma tā iti āha na ca iti

original: anavagatavācyavācakasambandhā' svarūpātirekeṇa na śabdaṃ kasyacid dharmatayā jānanti /
analyzed: anavagata vācya vācaka sambandhā svarūpa atirekeṇa na śabdam kasyacid dharma tayā jānanti
yena pakṣa dharma buddhi śabde bhavet iti
na ca svarūpa mātreṇa dhūma ādeḥ pakṣa dharma tā
na ca api pūrva sambandham apekṣya eṣā prasajyate
dhūmavān ayam iti evam apūrvasya api jāyate
pakṣa dharma matiḥ tena bhidyeta uttara lakṣaṇāt
na tu atra pūrva sambandhāt adhikā pakṣa dharma tā
na ca artha pratyayāt pūrvam iti anaṅgam iyam bhavet

original: na ca dharmī gṛhīto 'tra yena taddharmatā bhavet /
analyzed: na ca dharmī yena tad dharma tā bhavet
parvata ādiḥ yathā prāk dharma tva avadhāraṇāt

original: yaścātra kathyate dharmī prameyo 'sya sa eva na' /
analyzed: yaḥ ca atra kathyate dharmī saḥ eva na
na ca an avadhṛte tasmin tad dharma tva avadhāraṇāt

original: svarūpamātravijñānaṃ tu na dhūmādau pakṣadharmatāyāṃ hetu',
analyzed: svarūpa mātra vijñānam tu na dhūma ādau pakṣa dharma tāyām hetu
api tu dharmi sambandha
na ca asau asti iti abhiprāyeṇa āha na ca iti

original: nanvatrāpyarthena dharmiṇā pratamaṃ vyutpattikāle sambandho 'vagata eva,
analyzed: nanu atrā api arthena dharmiṇā pratamam vyutpatti kāle sambandhaḥ vagataḥ eva
āha na ca api iti
pūrva sambandha nirapekṣaḥ eva ayam avyutpanna sambandhasya api pakṣa dharma sambandhaḥ
na ca atra tathā iti āha dhūmavān iti matiḥ antena
yatas eva tad nirapekṣaḥ yam pakṣa dharma sambandha
atas eva tad uttarasmāt sapakṣa sattva lakṣaṇāt bhidyate
anyathā tad abhedaḥ eva syāt iti āha tena iti

original: trīṇi hetorlakṣaṇāni pakṣadharmatā sapakṣe sattā vipakṣād vyāvṛtti' /
analyzed: trīṇi hetoḥ lakṣaṇāni pakṣa dharma tā sapakṣe sattā vipakṣāt
tatra ca pakṣa dharmatāyāḥ uttaram sapakṣa sambandham uttara lakṣamam apadiśati iti
śabde tu evam na asti iti āha na tu atra iti
pūrva sambandha apekṣayā ca iyam avagamyamāna artha pratīti uttara kālam avagamyate
atas na tat aṅgam iti āha na ca iti
itas ca na pakṣa dharma tā iti āha na ca dharmī iti

original: arthādanyastāvad dharmī na pramīyata iti bhāva' //82//
analyzed: arthāt anyaḥ tāvat dharmī na pramīyate iti
yaḥ tu asau arthaḥ dharmi tayā
yad dharma tayā avagata śabda pakṣa

original: prāk sa cet pakṣadharmatvād gṛhīta' kiṃ tata' param /
analyzed: prāk sa ced pakṣa dharma tvāt kim tata param
pakṣa dharma ādibhiḥ jñātaiḥ yena syāt anumāni tā

original: anvayo na ca śabdas prameyena nirūpyate /
analyzed: anvayaḥ na ca śabdaḥ prameyena nirūpyate
vyāpāreṇa hi sarveṣām anvita tvam pratīyate
yatra dhūmaḥ sti tatra apagneḥ astitvena anvaya sphuṭa

original: na tvevaṃ yatra śabdo 'sti tatrārtho 'stīti niścaya' // Msv_5,5.86 //
analyzed: na tu evam yatra śabdaḥ sti tatra arthaḥ sti iti
na tāvat atra deśe tad kāle vā avagamyate
bhavet nitya vibhu tvāt ced sarva artheṣu ca tat samam
tena sarvatra dṛṣṭa tvāt vyatirekasya ca āgate
sarva śabdaiḥ aśeṣa artha pratipatti prasajyate
atha evam deśa kālābhyām asatya tva prakalpane
vācaka pratyayam kaścid brūyāt artha dhiyā anvitam
dharmaḥ bhavati
parastāt api sa tāvān eva
tat yadi pakṣa dharma tvam avagantum asau prathamam eva avagamyate

original: tato gṛhīte tasmin kiṃ parabhāvinā pakṣadharmādijñānena ato nānumānatetyāha---yaścetidvayena //83,84//
analyzed: tatas gṛhīte tasmin kim para bhāvinā pakṣa dharma ādi jñānena atas nā anumāna tā iti āha yaḥ ca iti dvayena
anvayam idānīm dūṣayati anvayaḥ iti
katham na nirūpyate
atas āha vyāpāreṇa iti
etat eva darśayati yatra iti
iha tu evam na asti iti āha na tu iti
katham na iti atas āha na tāvat iti
idam ca pūrvam eva uktam iti

original: nanu vaibhavācchabdasya nityatvāccārthasya śabdārthayo' śakyate 'nvayo darśayitumityāha--- bhavediti /
analyzed: nanu vaibhavāt śabdasya nitya tvāt ca arthasya śabda arthayoḥ śakyate nvayaḥ darśayitum iti āha bhavet iti
pariharati sarva arthaḥ iti
kim atas yadi evam atas āhatena iti
prakāra antareṇa sambandham āśaṅkate atha evām iti
na evam api asti dṛṣṭaḥ hi vinā api artha dhiyā kvacid
vācaka pratyayaḥ smābhiḥ avyutpanna narān prati
dvitīya ādi prayoge ca bhavet anvaya kalpanā

original: śatakṛtva' prayukte 'pi na ca dṛṣṭārthadhī' kvacit // Msv_5,5.91 //
analyzed: śata kṛtva na ca dṛṣṭa artha dhī kvacid
nanu ye jñāta sambandhāḥ teṣām dṛṣṭaḥ nvaya sphuṭa
yadi evam anvayāt pūrvam sambandha
na aṅgam artha dhiyām eṣā bhavet anvaya kalpanā
anvaya adhīna janma tvam anumānasya ca sthitam
jñāte pratīti sāmarthye jāyate
paścāt anvayaḥ iti eṣa kāraṇam katham ucyate
etat api dūṣayati na evam iti
kāraṇam āha dṛṣṭaḥ hi iti asmai
bhis antena
kva dṛṣṭa atas āha avyutpanna iti
nanu dvitīya ādi prayoge śabda artha pratyayayoḥ anvayaḥ grahīṣyate iti āśaṅkate dvitīya ādi iti
etat api dūṣayati śata kṛtvas iti
śata kṛtva prayoge sambandham budhyate
a vidita sambandhaḥ ca na artham pratyeti iti
nanu jñāta sambandhasya tāvat na śabda jñānam artha jñānam vyabhicarati
tasya eva ca anumāna tvam iṣyate iti āha nanu iti
pariharati yadi evam iti
yadi jñāta sambandhasya anvaya

original: anya eva tarhi sambandha' śabdārthayorabhyupagamyata iti //92//
analyzed: anyaḥ eva tarhi sambandha śabda arthayoḥ abhyupagamyate iti
tata kim atas āha na aṅgam iti
yadi na aṅgam
kim jātam atas āha anvaya iti
asati anvaye jñānam na anumānam iti

original: anvayastu pūrvāvagatapratītisāmarthyānusāreṇaiva jāyamāno nārthagrahītau kāraṇamityāha--- jñāta iti //94//
analyzed: anvayaḥ tu pūrva avagata pratīti sāmarthya anusāreṇa eva jāyamānaḥ na artha grahītau kāraṇam iti āha jñātaḥ iti
tsamāt tad nirapekṣā eva pratīyate
na ca dhūma anvayat pūrvam śakta tvam avagamyate
vyatirekaḥ pi a vijñātāt arthāt śabda dhiyaḥ yadi
saḥ u pi paścāt sthita tvena na artha pratyaya sādhanam
sambandham yam tu vakṣyāmaḥ tasya nirṇaya kāraṇam
syāt anvayaḥ tirekaḥ ca na tu artha adhigamasya tau
tasmāt ananumāna tvam śabde pratyakṣa vat bhavet
trairūpya rahita tvena tādṛś viṣaya varjanāt
sati ca asya pramāṇa tve bheda abeda nirūpaṇā

original: yuktā na tu padajñānāt padārtho 'tra pramāyate // Msv_5,5.99 //
analyzed: yuktāḥ na tu pada jñānāt pramāyate
upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
anumāne tu na anvayāt pūrvam gamaka tva siddhiḥ iti āha na ca iti
vyatirekam idānīm dūṣayati vyatirekaḥ iti

original: na hyanavagater'the tajjñānena vinā śabdajñānaṃ bhavatīti vyatireka' śakyate 'vagantum /
analyzed: na hi anavagata irthe tad jñānena vinā śabda jñānam bhavati iti śakyate vagantum
avagataḥ ced artha kim vyatireka āśraṇena iti
kim idānīm anupayoginau anvaya vyatirekau śabde na iti āha sambandham iti
śaktini ṣkarṣe
yoḥ vyāpāraḥ vācya vācaka rūpa śabda arthayoḥ sambandhaḥ iti

original: evaṃ ca trailakṣaṇyaparityāgenānanumānatvaṃ prasādhya prayogeṇa darśayati---tasmāditi /
analyzed: evam ca trailakṣaṇya parityāgena ananumāna tvam prasādhya prayogeṇa darśayati tasmāt iti
śabdaḥ na anumānam trairūpya rahita tvāt
pratyakṣa vat
tādṛś viṣaya varjanāt
tadvat eva tādṛś
viṣaya varjanam ca sāmānya viṣaya tvam hi ityādinā varṇitam eva iti

original: idaṃ ca padasyānumānād bhedapratipādanaṃ prauḍhipradarśanārthamasmābhi' kṛtam /
analyzed: idam ca padasya anumānāt bheda pratipādanam prauḍhi pradarśana artham asmābhi kṛtam
na tu padam pramāṇam iti āha sati iti
padam prayujyamānam hi caturdhā arthe prayujyate

original: pratyakṣe ca parokṣe ca jñāte 'jñāte 'pi vā purā // Msv_5,5.100 //
analyzed: pratyakṣe ca parokṣe ca jñāte jñāte vā purā
tatra yat pūrva vijñāte pratyakṣe ca prayujyate
pramite ca prayukta tvāt anuvādaḥ dhikāt vinā
adṛṣṭa pūrve tu ajñānam vā

original: sambandho na ca tasyārtho yor'tha' sa tvakṣagocara' // Msv_5,5.102 //
analyzed: sambandhaḥ na ca tasya arthaḥ sa tu akṣa gocaraḥ
parokṣe na anubhūte ca na abhidheye matiḥ bhavet
parokṣaḥ ca anubhūtaḥ ca yaḥ tatra smṛtiḥ iṣyate
pramite ca pravṛtta tvāt smṛteḥ nā asti pramāṇa tā
pariccheda phala tvāt hi prāmāṇyam upajāyate

original: yathā na pramāṇaṃ tathā darśayati--- padamiti /
analyzed: yathā na pramāṇam tathā darśayati padam iti
tān eva prakārān āha pratyakṣaḥ iti

original: eṣvartheṣu prayuktasya yathā na prāmāṇyaṃ tathāha--- tatreti //101//
analyzed: eṣu artheṣu prayuktasya yathā na prāmāṇyam tathā āha tatra iti
adṛṣṭa pūrve tu samprati pratyakṣe n utpatti lakṣamam eva aprāmāṇyam iti āha adṛṣṭa pūrvā eti

original: sambandhajñānameva vā tadā jāyata ityāha--- sambandheti /
analyzed: sambandha jñānam eva vā tadā jāyate iti āha sambandha iti

original: na ca sambandha eva padasya prameya iti vācyam,
analyzed: na ca sambandhaḥ eva padasya prameyaḥ iti vācyam
tasya arthāpatti prameya tvāt iti abhiprāyeṇa āha sambandhaḥ iti
tad arthaḥ tu pratyakṣāt avagataḥ iti āha yaḥ ṛthaḥ iti
parokṣe ca jñāna anutpattiḥ eva iti āha parokṣā eti

original: anubhūte tu parokṣe smṛtirityāha--- parokṣa iti //103//
analyzed: anubhūte tu parokṣe smṛtiḥ iti āha parokṣe iti

original: nanu smṛtimeva janayat pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatyata āha--- pramita iti /
analyzed: nanu smṛtim eva janayat pramāṇam bhaviṣyati atas āha pramitaḥ iti
pramita viṣayā hi smṛti
sannikṛṣṭa artha gocaram ca pramāṇam iti sthitiḥ iti

original: kathaṃ puna' pramitaviṣayaṃ na pramāṇamata āha--- paricchedeti /
analyzed: katham punar pramita viṣayam na pramāṇam atas āha pariccheda iti
pariccheda phalam hi pramāṇam
na ca smṛtyā kiñcid paricchidyate
pūrvavijñāna mātra upasthāpaka tvāt iti
tādātvika pariccheda phala tvena pramāṇa tā

original: pratyabhijñānavat kasmāt smṛte 'pi na kalpyate // Msv_5,5.105 //
analyzed: pratyabhijñāna vat kasmāt smṛte na kalpyate

original: smṛtyā tadanusāreṇa tadā sattve 'sya naiva dhī' // Msv_5,5.106 //
analyzed: smṛtyā tad anusāreṇa tadā sattve nā eva
padam abhyadhika abhāvāt smārakāt na viśiṣyate

original: yadādhikyaṃ bhavet kiñcit tatpadasya na gocara' // Msv_5,5.107 //

atra codayati tādātvikā iti

original: tathāpi tadānīṃ sattāṃ bodhayantī pratyabhijñānavat smṛti' pramāṇaṃ kimiti na bhavatīti //105//
analyzed: tathā api tadānīm sattām bodhayantī pratyabhijñāna vat smṛti pramāṇam kimiti na bhavati iti

original: na tu pratyabhijñānavat tadanīṃ vastu' sattāṃ niścāyayati,

original: idaṃ tu pratyutpannakāraṇakaṃ padāt padārthajñānaṃ grahaṇameva,

original: ato na padaṃ smārakebhya' sadṛśādṛṣṭādibhyo viśiṣyata ityapramāṇamiti /

original: ata' kathamucyate nādhikyamavagatamyata ityata āha--- yadādhikyamiti /

original: idaṃ cāsmābhi' sauhṛdamātreṇa śiṣyebhya' kathyate na padaṃ pramāṇamiti /
analyzed: idam ca asmābhi sauhṛda mātreṇa śiṣyebhya kathyate na padam pramāṇam iti

original: na tu tatpramāṇatve vākyārtho nāgamārtho bhavati /
analyzed: na tu tad pramāṇa tve vākya arthaḥ na āgama arthaḥ bhavati

original: tena hi pramāṇenāpi bhavatāvaśyaṃ padārthe bhavitavyam /
analyzed: tena hi pramāṇena api bhavatā avaśyam padārthe bhavitavyam
pramāṇa antara anadhigatam artha gamayat vākyam pramāṇam eva
evam anumāna antargata tve pi padasya na kācid kṣati
vākya arthasya ananumeya tvāt iti āh pramāṇam iti
vākya arthe tu sambandha anubhavāt ṛte
buddhiḥ utpadyate tena bhinnā asau akṣa buddhi vat
vākya adhikaraṇe ca asya siddhiḥ bhaviṣyati

original: sarveṣāṃ ca paroktānāṃ vākyād buddhāvasiddhatā // Msv_5,5.110 //
analyzed: sarveṣām ca paroktānām vākyāt buddhau asiddha tā
āha vākya artha jñānasya eva katham ananumāna tvam
tat api ālocita anugamanam anumānam eva atas āha vākya arthā eti
agṛhīta sambandhāḥ eva padārthāḥ vākya artham gamayanti
atas na vākya artha jñānam anumānam

original: evañca darśayitavyaṃ vākyārthabuddharanumānād bhinnā sambandhanubhavādṛte jāyamānatvād akṣabuddhivaditi //109//
analyzed: evam ca darśayitavyam vākya artha buddhaḥ anumānāt bhinnā sambandha anubhavāt ṛte jāyamāna tvāt akṣa buddhi vat iti
katham punar apratibaddham artha antarasya pratipādakam
evam hi atiprasaṅga
atas siddhaḥ hetuḥ atas āha vākya iti
ye ca paraiḥ padārtha buddheḥ anumānāt abheda hetavaḥ uktā

original: te tāvad bahavo vākyārthabuddhāvasiddhā ityāha--- sarveṣāmiti /
analyzed: te tāvat bahavaḥ vākya artha buddhau asiddhāḥ iti āha sarveṣām iti
vākya artha buddhiḥ hi na tāvat anvaya vyatireka jā
na apa sambandha tvāt
sāmānya viṣaya tvam api asiddham viśiṣṭa viṣaya tvāt
pratyakṣa anya pramāṇa tva tad adṛṣṭa artha bodhane tu upamāna ādīni prasādhya na aikāntikīkārye
tad adṛṣṭa artha bodhanam ca anumāna ābhāsaiḥ api anaikāntikam
evam tri kāla viṣayam api anumāna ābhāsa itatra api asiddham eva
uktam hi śabda śakti nirdhāraṇe tayoḥ vyāpāraḥ na buddhi janmani iti
sambandha pūrvaka tvam tu yadi aviśeṣitam tat pratyakṣeṇa eva anaikāntikam

atha anumāna aṅga sambandha pūrvakatvam
tat asiddham
vyāptiḥ hi tad aṅgam

pratyakṣa anya pramāṇa tva tad adṛṣṭa artha bodhananāni tu upamāna ādibhiḥ api iti

original: yata evaivaṃ vākyārthabuddha' sahārthairadṛṣṭeṣvapi vākyeṣu padārthamātravido jāyate /

original: ato 'syā' sphaṭataramanumānād bhedaṃ paśyanta' saugatāstato 'vatīryāgamasyāmānavyatirekāt vibhyata' padābedavicāraṇāyāmeva kliṣṭā' /
analyzed: atas syā sphaṭataram anumānāt bhedam saugatāḥ tatas vatīrya āgamasya a māna vyatirekāt pada abeda vicāraṇāyām eva kliṣṭā
evam hi

manyate

original: etāvatāpīha śabdānumānayoraikyamiti vākya pravartata sopahāsamāha --- vākyeṣviti //111//

iti upādhyāya sucaritamiśra kṛtau kāśikāṭīkāyām
śabda pariccheda samāpta
atha upamāna pariccheda

original: avayavārthastvekatra dṛśyamānaṃ sādṛśyaṃ pratiyogyantare dṛśyamānapratiyogisādṛśyaviśiṣṭatayāsannikṛṣṭer'the yāṃ buddhimutpādayati 'etatsādṛśyaviśiṣṭo
analyzed: avayava arthaḥ tu ekatra dṛśyamānam sādṛśyam pratiyogi antare dṛśyamāna pratiyogi sādṛśya viśiṣṭa tayā asannikṛṣṭa ṛthe yām buddhim utpādayati etad sādṛśya viśiṣṭaḥ
sa upamānam iti
sa upamānam iti ca yad tadoḥ adhyāhāra

original: na ca vācyaṃ viṣayaviśeṣānupādānāt kathaṃ sādṛśyaviśiṣṭaviṣayā buddhiravagamyata iti,

atas na doṣa

atra udāharama anusāreṇa lakṣama vākye pi

original: asyārtha'--- prasiddhena gavādinā sādharmyāt sādhyasyāprasiddhasya gavayāde' kañcidanabhijñaṃ prati sādhanaṃ prajñāpanaṃ yādṛśo gaustādṛśo  #

original: evaṃ hi naiyāyikānāṃ śābdalakṣaṇam 'āptopadeśa' śabda' iti /

original: nanu smṛtisambhinnamapi deśādibhedena jāyamānaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ dṛṣṭam /

original: na khalu deśādibheda' sanmātratayā prāmāṇye kāraṇam,

ya tvāt apramāṇam

original: tarhi pratyakṣādeva labhyata iti na pramāṇāntarāvakāśa iti //8 1/2//

original: nanuktamasannihite gavitatsādṛśyasyāpratyakṣātvānna tadviśiṣṭo gavaya' pratyakṣeṇāvagantuṃ śakyata iti sāvakāśaṃ pramāṇāntaramityata āha---  #

original: tathā ca sādṛśyaviśiṣṭo gavaya iti kathamapratyakṣo bhaviṣyati /

original: pratijāti kṛtsnaparisamāptameva jātivat sādṛśyamityapratyakṣe 'pi gavi tatsādṛśyaviśiṣṭagavayapratyakṣamupapadyata eveti bhāva' //9//

śruta atideśa vākya tvam na ca atīva upayujyate
ye hi a śruta tad vākyāḥ teṣām api bhavati ayam

atha saṃjñā anusandhānam teṣām na asti iti varṇyate

original: na nām, vastu tattāvat sarvathā tai' pratīyate // Msv_5,6.12 //

viveke sati na apramāṇa tā iti artha
śruta atideśa vākya viśeṣaṇa upādānasya api na phalam upalabhyate iti āha śruta iti

original: gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭagavayadarśanaṃ cedupamānamabhimataṃ tadāśrutatadvākyānāmapi nagare gāṃ dṛṣṭavatāṃ vane gavayaṃ paśyatāmastyeveti mandaṃ viśeṣaṇaphalamiti

na avaśyam mahā vayavinaḥ yaḥ vayavaḥ tat sāmānyam sādṛśyam
avayava sāmānyāni tu sādṛśyam iti uktam
tat ca avayavānām api cakṣuḥ ādīnām
sva avayava sāmānya bhūmnā sambhavati eva iti yuktaḥ ṅganā ādīnām sadṛśa avayava bodhaḥ iti āha
astu tāvat avayaveṣu avāntara avayava sāmānya yogāt sādṛśyam

original: vināpi tu tāni tatra tatra sadṛśabodho dṛṣṭa' /
analyzed: vinā api tu tāni tatra tatra
sa katham upapadyate atas āha evam iti
na idam avayava sāmānya grahaṇam tantram

original: yadeva tu kiñcid guṇādisāmānyaṃ sadṛśadhiyamupajanayati tadeva sādṛśyamato nātraikarūpyameva /
analyzed: yat eva tu kiñcid guṇa ādi sāmānyam sadṛśa dhiyam upajanayati tat eva sādṛśyam atas na atra aikarūpyam eva
vicitra tā tu sādṛśyasya yathādarśanam aṅgīkartavyam
tat yathā jāti sādṛśyam agniḥ vai brāhmaṇaḥ iti
agni sadṛśaḥ
kim anayoḥ sādṛśyam
ekasmāt brahmaṇaḥ mukhāt jātīḥ utpattiḥ iti artha
idam ca tatsiddhisūtre vakṣyate
kuta punar anayoḥ samāna abhijanana tvam avagamyate
śrute

original: evaṃ hyāha--- 'prajāpatirmukhatastrivṛtaṃ chandasāṃ niramimīta agniṃ devatānāṃ brāhmaṇaṃ manuṣyāṇāmi'ti /
analyzed: evam hi āha prajāpatiḥ mukhataḥ trivṛtam chandasām niramimīta agnim devatānām brāhmaṇam manuṣyāṇām iti
loke ca samāna abhijananayoḥ darśayitavyam
guṇa sāmānyam tu citra ādau su prakāśam eva loke
vede ca ādityaḥ yūpaḥ iti
ekaika dvi tri sāmastya bhedāt etasya citra tā

original: na dharmā eva sādṛśyaṃ bhūyastā vā tadāśrayā /
analyzed: na dharmāḥ eva sādṛśyam bhūyaḥ tāḥ vā tad āśrayā
bhūyaḥ tva vat hi jāti ādi sadṛśa tvena dṛśyate
dravya sādṛśyam sama alaṅkāra dhāriṇoḥ loke
vede ca lohita upṇīṣāḥ ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti iti
kriyā sādṛśyam adhyayana ādi sāmānyāt loke
vede ca yajña vihaṅgamayoḥ nipati ādāna sāmānyāt
evam hi āha yathā vai śyenaḥ nipatya ādatte
evam ayam dviṣantam bhrātṛvyam nipatya ādatte iti

original: śaktisādṛśyaṃ tu bhīmo malla iti loke,
analyzed: śakti sādṛśyam tu bhīmaḥ mallaḥ iti loke
vede ca soma pūtīkayoḥ
avagamyate hi pūtīkānām sāma śaktiḥ arthavādāt
tad kārya tvena avagamāt
kāryasya ca kāraṇa anuvidhāyi śaktika tvāt

original: uktaṃ ca---“somasya yoṃ'śa' parāpatat sa pūtīko 'bhavad” iti /
analyzed: uktam ca somasya yaḥ oṃśa parāpatat sa pūtīkaḥ bhavat iti

original: svadharmasādṛśyaṃ kecit triśikhā' kecit pañcaśikhā iti loke triśikhādīnāmanyonyasādṛśyaṃ,
analyzed: svadharma sādṛśyam kecid triśikhā kecid pañcaśikhāḥ iti loke triśikha ādīnām anyonya sādṛśyam

original: vede ca vasiṣṭhātryādīnāṃ narāśaṃso dvitīya' prayāja iti /
analyzed: vede ca vasiṣṭha atri ādīnām narāśaṃsaḥ dvitīyaḥ prayājaḥ iti
dharma niyamaḥ eva hi tatra sādṛśyam
prakṛti vikṛti karmaṇoḥ ca dharma sāmānyam eva sādṛśyam iti uktam eva

original: ete ca jātyādaya ekaikaśo dviśastriśa' samastaśaśca samānā bhavanta' sādṛśyasya vicitratāmāpādayantīti //20//
analyzed: ete ca jāti ādayaḥ ekaikaśas dviśas triśas samastaśas ca samānāḥ sādṛśyasya vicitra tām āpādayanti iti

original: nanu yatra sādṛśyaṃ samavaiti tatsadṛśabuddhyā gṛhyate /
analyzed: nanu yatra sādṛśyam samavaiti tat sadṛśa buddhyā gṛhyate
yadi ca avayava sāmānyāni sādṛśyam

original: tāni tarhyavayaveṣu samavayantīti teṣveva sadṛśadhiyaṃ janayeyu' /
analyzed: tāni tarhi avayaveṣu samavayanti iti teṣu eva sadṛśa dhiyam janayeyu
atha teṣām bhūyasastā
sā ca avayava sāmānyeṣu iti tāni eva sadṛśāni syuḥ

original: kathaṃ jātyantare sadṛśabuddhirata āha---na dharmā iti /
analyzed: katham jāti antare sadṛśa buddhiḥ atas āha na dharmāḥ iti
satyam

original: ata eva hetorna dhmākhyāvayavasāmānyāni tadabhūyastā vā sādṛśyaṃ,
analyzed: atas eva hetoḥ na dhmā ākhya avayava sāmānyāni tad abhūyaḥ tāḥ vā sādṛśyam
teṣu sādṛsya buddhi anutpatte

original: yadeva hi teṣāṃ bhūyastayā yuktaṃ jātyantaraṃ gavayādi vyaktyantaraṃ vāgneyasauryādi,
analyzed: yat eva hi teṣām bhūyaḥ tayā yuktam jāti antaram gavaya ādi vyakti antaram vā āgneya saurya ādi
tat eva sadṛśa buddhyā gṛhyate
atas jāti antara samavāyaḥ eva teṣām sādṛśyam

piṇḍitāni tu jāti antara samavāya upahitāni sādṛśyam
ayam ca bhūyas vayava sāmānya ityasya eva
prapañcaḥ iti
katham etat ced dṛṣṭa tvāt kim iha ucyate
kvacid hi bhūyasām etat kvacid alpīyasām api
na etāvatā viśeṣeṇa vastu tvam tasya hīyate

ananta āśraya yogāt ca na nāśaḥ nyatra vidyate

original: tena sarvaṃ na sāmānyaṃ nityatvena prakalpyate // Msv_5,6.24 //
analyzed: tena sarvam na sāmānyam nitya tvena prakalpyate
atra codayati yamayoḥ iti

original: jātyantarasyeti yāvacchrutagrāhiṇa' paricodanamidam--- yadi jātyantarasya bhūyo 'vayavasāmānyayogata' sādṛśyaṃ kataṃ yamayorvyaktisādṛśyamiti
analyzed: jāti antarasya iti paricodanam idam yadi jāti antarasya bhūyas vayava sāmānya yogata sādṛśyam katam yamayoḥ vyakti sādṛśyam iti
itaraḥ tu pradarśana mātram jāti antasya iti kā iyam atra eva āsthā
tat ayam arbhakaḥ barākaḥ iti apahasati dṛṣṭa tvāt iti

original: yatraivaṃ sādṛśyaṃ dṛśyate jātau vyaktau vā,

syāt etat
eka svabhāvāḥ hi bhāvāḥ jāti ādaya

atha bahu vṛtti svabhāvam tatas jātyoḥ eva
ardhavaiśasam tu avastu tām āpādayati iti

original: tāni vyastāni santyevaṃ pratyakṣe 'pi kvacit kvacit // Msv_5,6.26 //

original: tata' paraṃ tu sāmānyaṃ bhavet sādṛśyavarjitam // Msv_5,6.28 //

original: nanu gṛhābhāvo nāntareṇa bahirbhāvamupapadyate ato nāntarīyaka',

original: na ceha nāntareṇa bahirbhāvaṃ gṛhābhāvo bhavatīti prāgavagatam,

original: ata' sā svarūpasatyapi na pūrvamavagateti na jñānotpattau kāraṇamiti //30//

nanu anupalabdhiḥ abhāva avagame kāraṇam

original: taddeśāgamanāt sā hi dūrastheṣvasti satsvapi // Msv_5,7.37 //

original: gatvā gatvā tu tān deśān yadyartho nopalabhyate /

original: taddeśāgamanāt spaṣṭo vyatireko na sidhyati // Msv_5,7.39 //

original: evamekatra san sarvatra nopalabhyata iti sarvatraiva nāstīti śakyamavagantum /

original: darśanaṃ hi kāryaṃ svakāraṇarthendriyasannikarṣādyapekṣamāṇamekatra sato na sarvatra sambhavati,

atra khalu eka deśe n upalabdhitaḥ vidyamāna tvam avagamyate

atra parihāram āha na etayā iti

original: kimiti na pratīyate ata āha--- taddeśeti /

original: dūrastheṣu tvayogyatvādeva satsvapyanupalabdhi' sambhavatīti nābhāvaniścaya iti //37//
analyzed: dūra stheṣu tu ayogya tvāt eva satsu api anupalabdhi sambhavati iti na abhāva niścayaḥ iti

original: na ca sarve vipakṣā gatvopalabdhuṃ śakyante,

original: agnyādyabhāve ye vyatirekiṇo dhūmādayasteṣāmagnyādyabhāvadeśāgamanād vyatireko na sidhyatīti //39//
