mama tu adṛṣṭa mātreṇa gamaka sahacāriṇa
nanu evam itaratra api sambandhaḥ
caitra abhāvasya bhāvena dṛṣṭa tvāt upapadyate
sāhitye mita deśa tvāt prasiddhe ca agni dhūmayoḥ
vyatirekasya ca adṛṣṭeḥ gama ga tvam prakalpyate
pariharati yasya iti

original: vyatirakepradhānavādino hi bauddhasyāsati vipakṣād vyatirekagrahaṇe na heturgamako bhavati,
analyzed: vyatirakepradhānavādinaḥ hi bauddhasya asati vipakṣāt vyatireka grahaṇe na hetuḥ gamakaḥ bhavati
vastu antara abhāvaḥ hi tasya prameya
agni ādeḥ vastunaḥ
anyasya anagni ādeḥ abhāve iti yāvat
sa hi sarvān agni vyatirekam antareṇa na sambhavati
mama tu sahacāriṇaḥ hetuḥ gamaka
anvaya mātra niyamena

original: sa ca vipakṣādarśanamātreṇa dvitraireva darśanai' sidhyatīti // 40 //
analyzed: sa ca vipakṣa adarśana mātreṇa dvitraiḥ eva darśanaiḥ sidhyati iti
nanu anvayavādinā u pi ajāta ativṛttaka pratyutpanna ananta deśa varti vahni sahacarita dhūma darśanam durlabham eva
atha katipaya agni sāhitya darśanāt eva asahita avagatāḥ api vahnayaḥ numīyante

original: evaṃ tarhīhāpi caitrābhāvasya jagadavartina ekadeśabhāvena sambandha upapadyata eva /
analyzed: evam tarhi iha api caitra abhāvasya jagat avartinaḥ eka deśa bhāvena sambandhaḥ upapadyate eva

original: atrāpi hyekatra caitre bhavati katipayeṣu tadabhāvo dṛṣṭa eva,
analyzed: atrā api hi ekatra caitre bhavati katipayeṣu tad abhāvaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ eva
tāvatā ca sarvatra abhāvaḥ iti āha nanu evam iti
atra parihāram āha sāhityā eti
ayam abhiprāya na hi naḥ vyakti viṣayam anumānam
api tarhi ākṛti viṣayam
ākṛtyoḥ ca prati vyakti kṛtsna samavāyāt sulabham eva sāhitya darśanam
sakṛt darśanena eva hi ākṛtyoḥ sāhityam avagamyate
atas eva dvitra ādi darśanam api vyabhicāra āśaṅkāyām niyama artham abhyarthyate

original: avagate hi sāhitye bhavati śaṅkā--- kimayamaupādhika' saṃsargo dhūmasyāgninā saha āhosvit sahaja eveti,
analyzed: avagate hi sāhitye bhavati śaṅkā kim ayam aupādhika saṃsargaḥ dhūmasya agninā saha āhosvit sahajaḥ eva iti
tatra asakṛt darśane nvaya avyabhicārāt upādhi antara praveśa kāraṇa abhāvāt svābhāvikaḥ sya agninā anvayaḥ iti bhavati
agneḥ tu prathamam avagata sambandhasya api dhūmena darśana antare vyabhicāra darśanāt ārdra indhana ādiḥ upādhiḥ anupraviśati
na ca deśa ādi bhede vyabhicārā śaṅkā
sakṛt darśana avadhārita sāhacaryayoḥ hi dvayoḥ api agneḥ tāvat vyabhicāraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
iha sāhityam eva idam ekasya sahabhāvina
ananta deśa varti tvāt na tāvat upapadyate
nanu deśa antaram śūnyam caitreṇa evam pratīyate
tad deśa vyatirikta tvāt samīpa sthita deśa vat
viruddha avyabhicāri tvam tadvat eva hi gamyate
samīpa deśa bhinna tvāt caitra adhiṣṭhita deśa vat
puruṣasya tu kārtsnyena yat ekatra upalambhanam
dvitra ādi darśanena eva
tat yadi dhūmaḥ u pi agnim vyabhicaret
asya api hi dvi tri caturaiḥ eva darśanaiḥ vyabhicāraḥ dṛśyeta
na ca dṛśyate
atas gni anvita svabhāvaḥ yam iti niścīyate
yasya tu evam api anāśvāsa
tasya sarva pramāṇeṣu eva kvacid vyabhicāra darśanāt anāśvāsa syāt
vipakṣa vyatirekaḥ ca evam arthāt eva siddhaḥ bhavati

original: sa hi prathamamanvicchato vipakṣadeśānāmanantatvād durlabho bhavati /
analyzed: sa hi prathamam anvicchataḥ vipakṣa deśānām ananta tvāt durlabhaḥ bhavati

original: svabhāvaniyame tu jñāte svabhāvasyāvyabhicārāt sulabho vyatireka' /
analyzed: svabhāva niyame tu jñāte svabhāvasya avyabhicārāt sulabhaḥ

original: na hi svābhāvikamuṣṇatvamantareṇa kvacit kadācidagnirbhavatīti kaścidāśaṅkate /
analyzed: na hi svābhāvikam uṣṇa tvam antareṇa kvacid kadācid agniḥ bhavati iti kaścid āśaṅkate
mita deśa tvāt iti
parimita deśa tvāt iti artha
eka deśa bhāva jagat abhāvayoḥ tu nā evam sāhitya jñānam bhavati iti āha iha iti
ekaḥ hi atra
na tu agni dhūma ākṛti vat parimita deśa
atas tra durgraham sāhityam iti
atra codayati nanu iti
anumānena deśa antara abhāvaḥ caitrasya pratīyate
evam hi anumāsyate
parokṣā sarva bhūmayaḥ caitra abhāva sambandhā
tad ākrānta deśa vyatireki tvāt sthita caitra deśa mamīpa vat iti
pariharati viruddhā iti
katham hi viruddha avyabhicāri tvam atas āha tadvat iti
tadvat caitra vat deśa antaram iti
atas ṛthāpattyā eva sarvatra abhāvaḥ
na anyā gatiḥ asti

original: tathātu taṃ gṛhītvāsāhityagrahaṇapura' saraṃ yadyanumānamiṣyate tadarthāpattipūrvakam,
analyzed: tathā tu tam gṛhītvā a sāhitya grahaṇa pura saram yadi anumānam iṣyate tat arthāpatti pūrvakam
etāvatā ca siddham arthāpatte prāmāṇyam iti abhiprāyeṇa āha puruṣa

original: tasyānyathā na siddhi' syādityanyeṣvasya nāstitā // Msv_5,7.46 //
analyzed: tasya anyathā na syāt iti anyeṣu asya na astitā
tena arthāpatti pūrva tvam atra yatra ca kāraṇe
kārya darśanataḥ śakteḥ astitvam sampratīyate
sya iti atra antena

original: yastu vadati--- svātmanastāvadekatra sata' sarvatrābhāvena sambandho dṛṣṭa' ato 'nyasyāpyanuminotīti /
analyzed: yaḥ tu vadati sva ātmanaḥ tāvat ekatra sata sarvatra abhāvena sambandhaḥ dṛṣṭa atas nyasya api anuminoti iti

original: sa vaktavya' svātmana eva sarvatrāsattā kathamavagamyate,
analyzed: sa vaktavya svātmanaḥ eva sarvatra asattā katham avagamyate
yadi abhāvena
kasya iti vaktavyam
na tāvat pratyakṣasya nivṛttyā dūra deśeṣu abhāva śakyate vagantum
dūra tvāt eva teṣām anupalabdhi yogya tvāt na sva ātmanaḥ bhāvaḥ teṣu śakyate vagantum

original: atha tatra sato dūrasthatvameva na syāt,
analyzed: atha tatra sataḥ dūra stha tvam eva na syāt
atas saha eva deśa antare sva śarīram upalabdhi yogyam bhavati
yogya tvāt ca upalabhyet

original: yo hi yatra bhavati tasya sahaivādhāreṇātmopalabdhiyogyo bhavati,
analyzed: yaḥ hi yatra bhavati tasya saha eva ādhāreṇa ātma upalabdhi yogyaḥ bhavati
na ca iha tathā
atas na deśa antara iṣavasti iti
evam ca anumānena deśa antara abhāvaḥ
na pratyakṣa abhāvena

original: tatra ca viruddhāvyabhicāritoktaiva--- deśāntarāṇi vimatipadāni caitravanti caitravaddeśasamīpavyatiriktadeśatvāccaitravaddeśavaditi /
analyzed: tatra ca viruddha avyabhicāri tā uktā eva deśa antarāṇi vimati padāni caitravanti caitravat deśa samīpa vyatirikta deśa tvāt caitravat deśa vat iti

original: yatra ca pratihetunā sandeha' kriyate tatra balavatānyena sarvatrābhāvena samartham /
analyzed: yatra ca pratihetunā sandeha kriyate tatra balavatā anyena sarvatra abhāvena samartham
sā hi evam pravartate
yat etat ekatra kārtsnyena caitrasya upalambhanam tat nā upapadyate
yadi deśa antare caitraḥ bhavet
dvedhā hi vibhavaḥ ca
vibhavaḥ pi dvedhā
sarva vyāpinaḥ sva āśraya vyāpinaḥ ca
pūrve gagana ādaya
uttare jāti ādaya
yat hi sarva saṃyogibhiḥ anāgataiḥ agatam sambadhyate
tat vibhu tayā prasiddham
tayā ca ātma ākāśa ādayaḥ iti vibhavaḥ iti ucyante
na tāvat ākāśavat ca etra
ekatra parisamāptaḥ hi saḥ avagamyate

original: na ca yathāvayavī svāvayaveṣu vartate tathā deśāntare vartitumarhati /
analyzed: na ca yathā avayavī sva avayaveṣu vartate tathā deśa antare vartitum arhati

original: yadi hi tasyānyatra bhāgā' bhaveyu' iha kṛtsno nopalabhyeta /
analyzed: yadi hi tasya anyatra bhāgāḥ bhaveyuḥ iha kṛtsnaḥ na upalabhyeta
bhavan vā antarāle vicchedāt anyaḥ bhavet
na ca jāti vat vartitum arhati
jātiḥ hi amūrtā
sā ekatra nahi idam sāmānyam
saṃyogaḥ sya deśa antareṇa sambandha
sa ca na agatasya sambhavati
gatvā deśa antaraiḥ saṃyujyamānaḥ dṛśyate
atas eva na vibhu
kāryasya nanu liṅga tvam na sambandha anapekṣaṇāt

original: dṛṣṭvā sambandhitāṃ caiṣā śaktirgamyeta nānyathā // Msv_5,7.48 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā sambandhi tām ca eṣā śaktiḥ gamyeta na anyathā
tad darśane tadānīm ca pratyakṣa ādeḥ asambhavāt

original: arthāpatte' pramāṇatvaṃ trailakṣaṇyād vinā bhavet // Msv_5,7.49 //
analyzed: arthāpatte pramāṇa tvam trailakṣaṇyāt vinā bhavet

original: ato 'syana kathañcidekatra sato 'nyatra sattvamupapadyata ityanyatrābhāvamantarbhāvya kṛtsnabodha' samarthyate,
analyzed: atas kathañcid ekatra sataḥ nyatra sattvam upapadyate iti anyatra abhāvam antar bhāvya kṛtsna bodha samarthyate
kā punar atra anupapatti
na atra kṛtsna bodhasya kenacid pratighātaḥ daśyate

original: bhāvānumānenaiva kevalaṃ tu durbale pratighātahetau tadabādhenaivārthāpattirātmānaṃ labhate /
analyzed: bhāva anumānena eva kevalam tu durbale pratighāta hetau tad abādhena eva arthāpattiḥ ātmānam labhate
durbalam ca iha bhāva anumānam prati hetu viruddha tvāt
yatra tu tulya balam ubhayam ekatra upanipatitam bhavati
tatra artha antara kalpanayā upapattiḥ iti na kiñcid anupapannam iti
evam tāvat abhāva pūrvikāyāḥ arthāpatteḥ anumānāt bhedaḥ ukta

original: pratyakṣapūrvikāyā bhedamidānīṃ darśayituṃ tatpratijñānaṃ tāvadāha--- yatra ceti /
analyzed: pratyakṣa pūrvikāyāḥ bhedam idānīm darśayitum tad pratijñānam tāvat āha yatra ca iti

original: yatrāpi dāhādikāryadarśanādagnyāde' kāraṇasya śaktirastīti kalpyate tatrāpyarthāpattireva prathamā /
analyzed: yatra api dāha ādi kārya darśanāt agni āde kāraṇasya śaktiḥ asti iti kalpyate tatra api arthāpattiḥ eva prathamā
yadi tu paścāt anumānam bhavati bhavatu

original: bhāṣyodāhṛtatvāccābhāvapūrvikāyā eva prathamamanumānād bhedo varṇita iti //46,47//
analyzed: bhāṣya udāhṛta tvāt ca abhāva pūrvikāyāḥ eva prathamam anumānāt bhedaḥ varṇitaḥ iti
atra anumāna vādinām liṅgam upanyasyati kāryasya iti

original: evaṃ hi manyante--- dvividhamanumānaṃ dṛṣṭasvalakṣaṇaviṣayamadṛṣṭasvalakṣamaviṣayaṃ ca saṃyogavibhāgādibhya iva kriyādyanumānam /
analyzed: evam hi manyante dvividham anumānam dṛṣṭa sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam adṛṣṭa sva lakṣam aviṣayam ca saṃyoga vibhāga ādibhyaḥ iva kriyā ādi anumānam

original: kāryaṃ hi kāraṇena sāmānyato jñātasambandhamiti tatastatpratītiranumānabhevedamiti /
analyzed: kāryam hi kāraṇena sāmānyatas jñāta sambandham iti tatas tad pratītiḥ anumāna bhā iva idam iti
etat api dūṣayati na sambandha iti

original: yena hyekadā bījādaṅkuro dṛṣṭa' so 'nyadā tathāvidhādeva punaranupalabhamāna' svabhāvānumānena janayitavyo 'nenāṅkura ityanumimāna evātrā śaṅkate  #
analyzed: yena hi ekadā bījāt aṅkuraḥ dṛṣṭa saḥ nyadā tathāvidhāt eva punar anupalabhamāna svabhāva anumānena janayitavyaḥ nena aṅkuraḥ iti anumimānaḥ eva atra śaṅkate  /
katham aṅkuraḥ na jāyate iti

original: tata' kalpayati--- asti kaścid bījasamavāyī śaktibhedo yadvaśāt prāk kāryamāsīdadya ca nāstīti /
analyzed: tata kalpayati asti kaścid bīja samavāyī śakti bhedaḥ yad vaśāt prāk kāryam āsīt adya ca na asti iti
tat ca idam anapekṣita sambandhasya eva purātana idānīntana aṅkura darśana adarśana vicārāt eva jñānam jāyamānam katham anumānam iti

original: api ca sambandhagrahaṇādhīnameva sarvamanumānaṃ na tadagṛhītayo' sambandhino' sambhavati /
analyzed: api ca sambandha grahaṇa adhīnam eva sarvam anumānam na tat agṛhītayoḥ sambandhinoḥ sambhavati
na ca iha tayoḥ atīndriyā
anumānāt abhinna tvāt na uktau jaya parājayau
vaghya ghātaka bhāvena yau sarpa nakula ādiṣu

original: pīno divā na bhuṅkte cetyevamādivaca' śrutau // Msv_5,7.51 //
analyzed: pīnaḥ divā na bhuṅkte śrutau
tām artha gocarām kecid apare śabda gocarām
kalpayanti āgamāt ca enām abhinnām pratijānate
pramāṇa antareṇa śakyate nubhavitum

original: ata eva ca na tadvato 'pi grahaṇaṃ sambhavati,
analyzed: atas eva ca na grahaṇam sambhavati
atas katham agṛhīta sambandhāt
kāryāt śakti tadvataḥ siddhiḥ iti
tat etat āha dṛṣṭavā iti
nanu avagatam tāvat kārya sāmānyam kāraṇa sāmānyena vyāptam iti
atas tat anumāsyate

original: satyam, kintu śaktikakalpanayā vinā kāraṇākhyaiva na nivartate /
analyzed: satyam kintu śaktika kalpanayā vinā kāraṇa ākhyā eva na nivartate

original: aṅkuro hi bījabhāvabhāvī vyabhicaritabhāvāntaraśca bījakāraṇaka ityavagata' satyapi tu bīje 'jāyamānastadapi vyabhicaratīti kāraṇāvagatirevāvasīdati,
analyzed: aṅkuraḥ hi bīja bhāva bhāvī vyabhicarita bhāva antaraḥ ca bīja kāraṇakaḥ iti avagata sati api tu bīje jāyamānaḥ tat api vyabhicarati iti kāraṇa avagatiḥ eva avasīdati
tām śakti kalpanayā uttabhnāti

original: kḷptāyāṃ ca śaktau kāraṇasambandhinyāmarthāpattyā yadi sambandho 'vagamyate tadastu siddhāntavacchaktisiddhāvarthāpatti' pramāṇamiti /
analyzed: kḷptāyām ca śaktau kāraṇa sambandhinyām arthāpattyā yadi sambandhaḥ vagamyate tat astu siddhānta vat śakti siddhau arthāpatti pramāṇam iti
anumāna lakṣaṇāt vinā arthāpattiḥ jāyamānā pramāṇa antaram iti upasaṃharati arthāpatteḥ iti
vṛtti antara udāhṛtam udāharaṇa dūṣayati anumānāt iti

original: jayo hi parājayena viditavyāptiriti tamekatra ghātake nakule dṛṣṭvā pratipakṣasya parājayo 'vagamyate /
analyzed: jayaḥ hi parājayena vidita vyāptiḥ iti tam ekatra ghātake nakule dṛṣṭvā pratipakṣasya parājayaḥ vagamyate
parājaya darśanena pratipakṣasya jayaḥ iti
na idam arthāpattau udāhāryam iti
śruta arthapattiḥ abhidhāsyate iti uktam
tām idānīm udāharati pīnaḥ iti
asyāḥ ca viṣayam prati asti vivāda
tam eka nirdhāraṇa artham upanyasyati tām artha iti kalpayanti antena
sarve ca āgama abahirbhūtām ātiṣṭhante iti āha āgamāt ca iti
prāyaśas ca anayā vede vyavāhāraḥ vyavasthita

original: so 'vaidika' prasajyeta yadyeṣā bhidyate tata' // Msv_5,7.53 //
analyzed: saḥ u vaidika prasajyeta yadi eṣā bhidyate
vacanasya śrutasya eva saḥ u pi artha kaiścid āśrita
tad artha upaplutasya anyaiḥ iṣṭaḥ vākya antarasya tu
na tāvat śrūyamāṇasya vacasā ṛthaḥ yam iṣyate

original: na hyanekārthatā yuktā vākye vācakatā tathā // Msv_5,7.55 //
analyzed: na hi aneka artha tā yuktā vākye vācaka tā tathā
padārtha anvaya rūpeṇa vākya arthaḥ hi pratīyate
na rātri ādi padārthaḥ ca divā vākyena gamyate
na divā ādi padārthānām saṃsargaḥ rātri bhojanam

original: na bhedo yena tadvākyaṃ tasya syāt pratipādakam // Msv_5,7.57 //
analyzed: na bhedaḥ yena tat vākyam tasya syāt pratipādakam
āgama abheda abhyupagame bhiprāyam āha prāyaśas eti
phala apūrva vidhi anta ādi siddhau bhūyān asyāḥ vede upayoga
sarvaḥ syāt iti
āgamika tve pi avāntara vipratipattim upanyasyati vacanasya iti
atra niṣkarṣam darśayati na tāvat iti
kāraṇam āha na hi iti
vākyam tāvat avācakam
prak eva anekeṣām arthānām iti
yadi avācakam katham vākyāt artha pratītiḥ atas āha padārtha iti
etat ca tad abhūta adhikaraṇe vakṣyate iti

original: nanu rātryādivākyārtho yadi divāvākyenānabhihita' padārthānvayarūpeṇaiva svārthavad gamayiṣyate /
analyzed: nanu rātri ādi vākya arthaḥ yadi padārtha anvaya rūpeṇa eva svārtha vat gamayiṣyate
atas āha na rātri ādi iti
na hi divā vākye rātri ādi padārthāḥ santi
kutas tatra teṣām anvayaḥ iti
nanu divā ādi padārtha anvayāt eva rātri ādi vākya artha pratyeṣyate
atas āha na divādi iti
anya artha vyāpṛta tvāt ca na dvitīya artha kalpanā
tasmāt vākya antareṇa ayam buddhi sthena pratīyate
tasya ca āgamika tve yat tat vākyam pratīyate

original: pramāṇaṃ tasya vaktavyaṃ pratyakṣādiṣu yad bhavet // Msv_5,7.59 //
analyzed: pramāṇam tasya vaktavyam pratyakṣa ādiṣu yat bhavet
na hi anuccārite vākye pratyakṣam tāvat iṣyate

original: nānumānaṃ na cedaṃ hi dṛṣṭaṃ tena saha kvacit // Msv_5,7.60 //
analyzed: na anumānam na ca idam hi dṛṣṭam tena saha kvacid
yadi tu anupalabdhe sambandhe liṅga tā iṣyate
tad uccāraṇa mātreṇa sarva vākya mitiḥ bhavet
na ca artha āpatti gamyāni sarvaiḥ sarva vacāṃsi hi
sambaddhāni upalabdhāni yena teṣu anumā bhavet
na hi aneka artha tā iti yat uktam tat vivṛṇāti anya arthā iti
atas vākya antarasya eva ayam arthaḥ na dinā vākyasya iti āha tasmāt iti
evam tāvat na mūla āgamasya ayam artha
yena tu vākya antareṇa buddhi sthena ayam arthaḥ vagamyate

original: tasyaiva pratyakṣādiṣu madhye pramāṇaṃ nirdhāraṇīyamityāha--- tasyeti //59//
analyzed: tasya eva pratyakṣa ādiṣu madhye pramāṇam nirdhāraṇīyam iti āha tasya iti

original: tatra pratyakṣaṃ tāvanna tatsiddhau pramāṇamityāha---na hīti /
analyzed: tatra pratyakṣam tāvat na tad siddhau pramāṇam iti āha na hi iti

original: anumānamapi tena sambaddhasya divāvākyasyādarśanānna sambhavatītyāha--- nānumānamiti //60//
analyzed: anumānam api tena sambaddhasya divā vākyasya adarśanāt na sambhavati iti āha na anumānam iti

original: aviditasambandhe tu divāvākye liṅga iṣyamāṇe 'vyavasthetyāha---yadi tviti //61//
analyzed: a vidita sambandhe tu divāvākye liṅge iṣyamāṇe vyavasthā iti āha yadi tu iti

original: yadi tūcyate sambandhamevadivāvākyasya rātrivākyenagṛhītvā tatastadanumāsyata iti,
analyzed: yadi tu ucyate sambandham eva divā vākyasya rātri vākyena gṛhītvā tatas tat anumāsyate iti
sidhyati evam

original: na tuśrutārthāpattivedyāni sarvāṇi lokavedavākyāni sarvai' pratipādakavākyai' sambaddhānyavagatāni /
analyzed: na tuśruta arthāpatti vedyāni sarvāṇi loka veda vākyāni sarvaiḥ pratipādaka vākyaiḥ sambaddhāni avagatāni
atas katham tebhyaḥ tāni anumīyante iti āha na ca iti
na ca sattā anumānena viśeṣaḥ vā anumīyate
iha vākya viśeṣasya sattā eva tu avagamyate
pūrva siddha svatantreṇa viśeṣita
dharmī dharma viśiṣṭaḥ tra na anumeya pratīyate
atha śrutasya vākyasya mīyate tad viśiṣṭa tā
tata pakṣaḥ bhyupeta syāt aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa
kiñca liṅga antara abhāvāt etasya yadi liṅga tā
pratijñā artha eka deśa tvam pada vat taiḥ prasajyate
tadvat eva nirākāryā vacasoḥ dharma dharmi tā

original: nāgṛhīte hi taddharmo gṛhīte nānumeyatā // Msv_5,7.67 //
analyzed: na a gṛhīte hi tad dharmaḥ gṛhīte na anumeya tā
itas ca na anumānam iti āha na ca iti

original: kenaciddhi sāmānyātmanā jñātasambandhena viśiṣṭaṃ kiñcidanumīyate na vastusattāmātram /
analyzed: kenacid hi sāmānya ātmanā jñāta sambandhena viśiṣṭam kiñcid anumīyate na vastu sattā mātram
na ca viśiṣṭa
ajñāta sambandha tvāt iha tu tat ubhayam viparītam iti

original: yataścātra vākyāsvarūpameva prameyamata' parvatādiriva pūrvasiddha' svatantro 'sambaddha'
analyzed: yatas ca atra parvata ādiḥ iva svatantraḥ

original: kenacidagnyādineva svatantreṇa kenacid viśeṣito dharmī dharmaviśiṣṭo nāstītyāha---
analyzed: kenacid agni ādinā iva svatantreṇa kenacid viśeṣitaḥ dharmī dharma viśiṣṭaḥ na asti iti āha
pūrva siddhaḥ iti

original: atha śrutameva vākyaṃ dharmitayopādāyāśrutavākyaviśiṣṭatā sādhyate tatastadaprasiddheraprasiddhaviśeṣaṇa' pakṣa ityāha--- atheti //65//
analyzed: atha śrutam eva vākyam dharmi tayā upādāya aśruta vākya viśiṣṭa tā sādhyate tatas tad aprasiddheḥ aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa pakṣaḥ iti āha atha iti

original: api ca śrute vākye 'śrutavākyaviśiṣṭe sādhyamāne na tāvat kiñcilliṅgamupalabhyate,
analyzed: api ca śrute vākye śruta vākya viśiṣṭe sādhyamāne na tāvat kiñcid liṅgam upalabhyate
na ca aliṅgaka anumānam bhavati

original: tad yadi tadeva punarliṅgamiṣyate tata' pratijñārthaikadeśitvam,
analyzed: tat yadi tat eva punar liṅgam iṣyate tata pratijñā artha eka deśi tvam
yathā pade pakṣīkṛta irtha viśiṣṭe sādhyamāne bhihitam iti āha kiñca iti

original: dharmadharmibhāvo 'pi divāvākyarātrivākyadayo' śabdārthayoriva nirākārya ityāha--- tadvadeveti /
analyzed: dharma dharmi bhāvaḥ pi śabda arthayoḥ iva nirākāryaḥ iti āha tadvat eva iti

original: yathā tatrārthe dharmiṇyapratipanne na padaṃ taddharma ityuktam,
analyzed: yathā tatra arthe dharmiṇi apratipanne na padam tat dharmaḥ iti uktam
evam iha api na a pratipanne rātri vākye tad ha dharma tayā divā
kriyā kāraka sambandhāt ṛte na asti tu dharmatā
a vācaka tayā ca etat na dharmaḥ viṣaya ātmanā
pratīteḥ vācaka tvam ced prasakta aneka śakti tā

original: anumāviṣayotthaṃ tu dharmatvaṃ niṣphalaṃ bhavet // Msv_5,7.69 //
analyzed: anumā viṣaya uttham tu dharma tvam niṣphalam bhavet
padārthaiḥ api tat vākyam na asambandhāt pratīyate
sāmānyāni anyathā asiddheḥ viśeṣam gamayanti hi
vākyam pratīyate

original: atha tu pakṣadharmatāpratipattyarthaṃ tat prathamamavagatamityucyate tato 'numeyābhāva ityabhiprāya' /
analyzed: atha tu pakṣa dharmatā pratipatti artham tat prathamam avagatam iti ucyate tatas numeya abhāvaḥ iti abhiprāya
abhiprāyam
vivṛṇoti na a gṛhītaḥ iti

original: api ca tatraiva pade varṇitam--- na kriyākārakasambandhādṛte sambandho bhavatīti /
analyzed: api ca tatra eva pade varṇitam na kriyā kāraka sambandhāt ṛte sambandhaḥ bhavati iti
atas yathā padasya na kaścid
kriyā nibandhana ūrtha sambandhaḥ sti iti na tad dharmaḥ iti uktam
evam divā vākyasya api rātri vākya dharmata nirākāryā iti āha kriyā iti

original: na cātra viṣayaviṣayibhāvarūpāpi dvayārvākyayo' śabdārthayoriva sambandho bhavati ucyate hi śabdenārtha',
analyzed: na ca atra viṣaya viṣayi bhāva rūpā api śabda arthayoḥ iva sambandhaḥ bhavati ucyate hi śabdena artha

original: na tu vākyaṃ vākyāntarasya vācakamityāha--- avācaketi /
analyzed: na tu vākyam vākya antarasya vācakam iti āha avācaka iti
pade tu artha pratīti janaka tvena tad viṣayatām aṅgīkṛtya anumeya abhāvaḥ darśita

original: iha tu vākyasyāvācakatvāt tadviṣayatvameva pratyetuṃ na śakyate iti viśeṣa' //68//
analyzed: iha tu vākyasya avācaka tvāt tad viṣaya tvam eva pratyetum na śakyate iti

original: yadi tūcyate pratīyate tāvad divāvākyād rātrivākyam,
analyzed: yadi tu ucyate pratīyate tāvat divāvākyāt rātrivākyam
atas tasya api tad vācaka tvam iti asti viṣaya viṣayi lakṣaṇa sambandhaḥ iti
tatra ekam vākyam aneka artham abhyupagatam bhavet
sva artham hi tat pratipādayati rātri vākyam api
na ca evam nyāyyam iti abhiprāyeṇa āha pratīteḥ iti
athā ucyeta mā abhūt avācaka tayā
tena tu tat vākyam anumīyate
atas tat liṅgam anumāna viṣaya tayā liṅgam eva divāvākyam tad dharma tayā abhidhīyate iti
yat tāvat anumāna viṣaya bhāvāt utthitam tat dharma tvam tat anumānasya pūrva siddha tvāt niṣphalam iti āha anumā iti
evam tāvat divāvākyam aliṅgam iti uktam
tad gata padārthānām api evam eva liṅga tā nirākāryā iti āha padārthaiḥ iti
nanu agṛhīta sambandhāḥ eva padārthāḥ

original: na tu vākyāntareṇaiṣāṃ vinā kiñcinna sidhyati /
analyzed: na tu vākya antareṇa eṣām vinā kiñcid na sidhyati

original: na cāpyanya' prakāro 'sti tena vākyena saṅgatau // Msv_5,7.71 //
analyzed: na ca api anyaḥ prakāraḥ sti tena vākyena saṅgatau
atha etat vāci kalpyeta vākyam anyat tathā eva ca

original: prasaṅgāt tatra dūre 'pi nāsambandhāt pramucyate // Msv_5,7.72 //
analyzed: prasaṅgāt tatra dūre pi na asambandhāt pramucyate
tatas ca prathamāt eva varam jñātum asaṅga tāt

original: anvayavyatirekau ca pratiṣedhyau pade yathā // Msv_5,7.73 //
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekau ca pratiṣedhyau pade yathā
yathā vākya artham gamayanti
evam rātri vākyam api kim na gamayanti
atas āha sāmānya iti

original: kriyāsāmānyaṃ kārakasāmānyaṃ vā pratipannamalabdhetaretaravyatiṣaṅgamanyathā na sidhyatīti taṃ viśeṣaṃ gamayati,
analyzed: kriyā sāmānyam kāraka sāmānyam vā pratipannam alabdha itaretara vyatiṣaṅgam anyathā na sidhyati iti tam viśeṣam gamayati

original: yaścāsau viśeṣa' sa eva tu vākyārtha ityucyate iti //70//
analyzed: yaḥ ca asau viśeṣa saḥ eva tu vākya arthaḥ iti ucyate iti

original: na caiṣa prakāro rātrivākyapratipādane sambhavatītyāha---na tviti /
analyzed: na ca eṣa prakāraḥ rātri vākya pratipādane sambhavati iti āha na tu iti
yadi api divāvākyam na rātri vākyasya vācakam
tathā api kalpayiṣyāma
tatas ca tat pratyeṣyate iti
tat idam āśaṅkete tāvat atha etat vāci iti anyat antena
atra dūṣaṇam āha tathā eva iti

original: atra tāvadevaṃ vākyāntarakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇameva nāstīti tadanādṛtya tāvadanavasthāmāpādayati,
analyzed: atra tāvat evam vākya antara kalpanāyām pramāṇam eva na asti iti tat an ādṛtya tāvat anavasthām āpādayati

original: yadapi kalpitaṃ vākyaṃ tadapi na rātrivākaymavagamayituṃ śaktam /
analyzed: yat api kalpitam vākyam tat api na śaktam

original: na ca tadasambaddhameva tasya gamakamiti yuktam /
analyzed: na ca tat asambaddham eva tasya gamakam iti yuktam
punar api vākya antara kalpanāyām saḥ eva doṣa

original: evaṃ yadeva kiñcid vākyaṃ kalpayitumiṣyate tadeva nāsambaddhaṃ gamakamityanavasthāpata iti //72//
analyzed: evam yat eva kiñcid vākyam kalpayitum iṣyate tat eva na asambaddham gamakam iti anavasthāpataḥ iti
atha tu antimam asambaddham eva gamakam iti kalpyate

original: tad varaṃ prathamasyaiva tathāvidhasya gamaktavaṃ kalpatum,
analyzed: tat varam prathamasya eva tathāvidhasya gamaktavam kalpatum
kim vākya antaraka kalpanayā
na ca tat yuktam iti abhiprāyeṇa āha tatas ca iti
evam tāvat pakṣa dharma tva ādi asambhavena rākṣi vākyasya anumeya tvam nirastam

original: anvayavyatirekayorapi padavat pratiṣedho darśayitavya ityāha--- anvayeti /
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekayoḥ api pada vat pratiṣedhaḥ darśayitavyaḥ iti āha anvaya iti
nahi sati eva rātri vākye divāvākyam
śruta vākyena sādṛśyam na aśrutasya asti kiñcana
tasmāt anupamāna tvam arthasya api anayā diśā
upamāna tva liṅgena vākyam prati nivārite

original: arthe 'pi caivameva syāt tasmāt pūrveṣvasambhava' // Msv_5,7.75 //
analyzed: arthe ca evam eva syāt tasmāt pūrveṣu asaṃbhava
atas śrutasya vākyasya yat artha pratipādanam

original: tadātmalābha eva syād vinā netyetadiṣyate // Msv_5,7.76 //
analyzed: tadā ātmalābhaḥ eva syāt vinā nā iti etat iṣyate

original: etadarthād vinā nāyamityartha' kiṃ na kalpyate /
analyzed: etad arthāt vinā na ayam iti artha kim na kalpyate
vākya arthavat ca kim na ayam āgama artha pratīyate
na asati iti anvaya vyatirekau staḥ
tad deśa tad kāla ādi sambandhasya abhāvāt

original: na ca jñānānvayo 'satyapi rātrivākyajñāne vyutpannasya divāvākyajñānād,
analyzed: na ca jñāna anvayaḥ sati api rātri vākya jñāne vyutpannasya divā vākya jñānāt
vijñāna uttara kāla bhāvinoḥ ca anvaya vyatirekayoḥ tad anupayogāt ityādi pada vat darśayitavyam iti abhiprāya

original: evaṃ tāvat pratyakṣānumānāgamairna rātrivākyaṃ pratīyata ityuktam,
analyzed: evam tāvat pratyakṣa anumāna āgamaiḥ na rātri vākyam pratīyate iti uktam

original: upamānamapi tatra na pramāṇamiti darśayati---śrutavākyeti tvamantena /
analyzed: upamānam api tatra na pramāṇam iti darśayati śruta vākya iti tvam antena

original: divāvākyavacca tadarthenāpi na rātrivākyamupamīyata ityāha--- arthasyeti //74//
analyzed: divā vākya vat ca tad arthena api na rātri vākyam upamīyate iti āha arthasya iti

original: yathā ca rātrivākyasya divāvākyatatadarthābhyāmupamānaṃ nirastamevaṃ rātrivākyārthasyāpi tābhyāṃ nirasanīyamityāha--- upamānatveti syādantena
analyzed: yathā ca rātri vākyasya divā vākya tad arthābhyām upamānam nirastam evam rātri vākya arthasya api tābhyām nirasanīyam iti āha upamāna tva iti syāt antena
upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
atas arthāpattiḥ eva rātri vākya avagame śaraṇam iti āha atas iti
pratyakṣa dṛṣṭam pīna tvam bhojana pratiṣedhena pratihanyate
pīna tvena divā abhojanam
paraspara pratighātāt divā vākyasya sva artha pratipādanam eva anupapadyamānam rātri vākyam anupraveśayati
atas tat rātri vākyam kalpyate iti
tām artha viṣayām iti yat ktam tat idānīm dūṣayitum upanyasyati etad arthāt vinā iti

original: ayamabhiprāya'--- pīntavaṃ hi bhojanapratiṣedho vā paraspareṇa pratihanyate tayoścārthakalpanayaivātmalābha' /
analyzed: ayam abhiprāya hi bhojana pratiṣedhaḥ vā paraspareṇa pratihanyate tayoḥ ca artha kalpanayā evā ātmalābha
pīnasya hi divā niṣiddhe
sa vikalpa vijñānaiḥ śabda pūrvam pratīyate

original: labdhaprayojane vākye paraṃ nāgamikaṃ ca na' // Msv_5,7.78 //
analyzed: labdha prayojane vākye param na āgamikam ca na
bhojane rātri bhojanena eva pīna tvam upapadyate
na rātri vākyena atas ṛtha kalpanā eva yuktā iti

original: api ca, yathā parairabhidhīyamāno 'pi padārthānupapattyā gamyamāno vākyārtha āgamārtho bhavati /
analyzed: api ca yathā paraiḥ abhidhīyamānaḥ pi padārtha anupapattyā gamyamānaḥ vākya arthaḥ āgama arthaḥ bhavati
evam vākya artha anupapatti gamya u pi artha kim nā āgame ntarbhavati iti āha vākya artha iti
prathama paricodanām tāvat pariharati sa vikalpaka iti

original: savikalpako hi śrutārthāpattibodha' savikalpajñānāni ca śabdapura' sarāṇi /
analyzed: sa vikalpakaḥ hi sa vikalpa jñānāni ca śabda pura sarāṇi

original: ata' śabdaparyavasitāyāmarthāpattau śabdādeva sidhyannartho nārthāpatterviṣaya iti /
analyzed: atas śabda paryavasitāyām arthāpattau śabdāt eva sidhyan arthaḥ na arthāpatteḥ viṣayaḥ iti
nanu evam sarva pramāṇa vikalpeṣu samānam idam
indriya liṅgābhyām api śabda pura saram eva agni pratīyate

original: tatastayorapi śabdaparyavasāyitaiva bhavet atastatra smṛtistha eva śabdo 'pratyāyaka',
analyzed: tatas tayoḥ api śabda paryavasāyi tā eva bhavet atas tatra smṛti sthaḥ eva
tat iha api samānam

original: yathā hi karmendriyamarthenaiva sannikṛṣṭamiti tameva prakāśayati liṅgaṃ cārthena sambaddhamiti ta gamayati,
analyzed: yathā hi karmendriyam arthena eva sannikṛṣṭam iti tam eva prakāśayati liṅgam ca arthena sambaddham iti gamayati
na śabdam
evam iha api anupapadyamāna arthena eva upapadyate na śabdena
tathā ca dṛṣṭa artha āpattayaḥ artha viṣayāḥ eva
atra ucyate
satyam artha dvārikā iva vākya antaram evā ākāṅkṣati
yathā padam pada antaram
na hi pacati iti ukte odana pratyakṣeṇa ākāṅkṣā nivartate
kim tarhi odanam iti padena
evam vākyam api anupapadyamāna tayā avagatam vākya antaram eva ākāṅkṣati
na tu tam artham sva rūpeṇa

original: ata eva nirvāpamantre 'tideśād vikṛtiṃ gate prākṛtadevatāyā abhāvāt tatpadanivṛttau tasya sthāne sūryāyeti padamūhyate /
analyzed: atas eva nirvāpa mantre tideśāt vikṛtim gate prākṛta devatāyāḥ abhāvāt tad pada nivṛttau tasya sthāne sūryāya iti padam ūhyate
chedana mantre tviṣā itvā iti atra chinadmi iti padam adhyāhriyate

original: hṛdayasyāgne 'vadyati atha jihvāyā atha vakṣasa ityatrāpadyatipadānuṣaṅga' /
analyzed: hṛdayasya agne vadyati atha jihvāyāḥ atha vakṣasaḥ iti atra āpadi ati pada anuṣaṅga

original: na cārtha evānuṣajyate 'anuṣaṅgo vākyasamāpti' sarveṣu pekṣyate śabdollekhenāpi gṛhyamāṇa',
analyzed: na ca arthaḥ eva anuṣajyate anuṣaṅgaḥ sarveṣu pekṣyate śabda ullekhena api
kinnu artha rūpeṇa eva
tam artham vikalpayani

original: yadi tu tatrāpi śabdo 'pekṣyate tiraścāmarthavikalpo na syāt,
analyzed: yadi tu tatra api śabdaḥ upekṣyate tiraścām artha vikalpaḥ na syāt

original: sa ca nāsti dṛśyeta hi teṣāmapi hitāhitaprāptiparihārārtha' prayatna' /
analyzed: sa ca na asti dṛśyeta hi teṣām api hita ahita prāpti parihāra artha prayatna
tṛṣitāḥ hi gāvaḥ taṭākāni gacchanti
varṣa ātapa abhi
nanu ca asati sambandhe sati vā anavadhārite
gamya jñānam idam vākyam prasajyeta apramāṇakam
bhūtāḥ ca tad pratīkāra kṣamam deśam
atas śabda jñānām api anumāna ādi vikalpa darśanāt na tatra śabda apekṣā asti iti niścīyate
śruta arthāpatti bodhaḥ tu tiraścām nā asti eva
śabda vyutpatti jaḥ hi asau
na ca teṣām asau asti iti pratyakṣe varṇitam
anyeṣām api avyutpannam aśabdānām śruta arthāpatti bodhaḥ na dṛśyate
kim punar tiraścām
atha u nvaya vyatirekābhyām agamyate sti śabda apekṣā śruta artha āpattau
anumāna ādiṣu tu saṃskāra uda bodhena avarjanīya tayā astu nāma śabda smṛti
na tu śabda apekṣā

original: ato 'tra vākyasyānupapannasya vākyāntaramevārthavadupapādakaṃ na tvarthamātraṃ śabdamātraṃ vā /
analyzed: vākyasya anupapannasya vākya antaram eva arthavat upapādakam na tu artha mātram śabda mātram vā

original: ata evāgṛhītasambandhasyārthamaviduṣa' śrute 'pyupapādake vākye nānupapannavākyārthajñāne 'nupapatti' śāmyati,
analyzed: atas eva agṛhīta sambandhasya artham aviduṣa śrute pi upapādake vākye na anupapanna vākya artha jñāne śāmyati
pratipanna arthasya api āśaya kalpanā
atas na śruta vākyasya nyūna tā buddhiḥ niva labdha prayojanaḥ iti
yāvat haya kṛta artha śabdaḥ tāvat bodhaḥ vagamyate
sa tad arthaḥ bhavati
prayojana vacanaḥ hi artha śabda
atas eva vākya arthaḥ āgama arthaḥ bhavati

original: tu kriyākārakasaṃsarge labdhaprayojanaṃ vākyamiti tata' paramarthāntaramavagamyamānaṃ nāgamikaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tu kriyā kāraka saṃsarge labdha prayojanam vākyam iti tata param artha antaram avagamyamānam na āgamikam bhavati

original: na hi prayojanatvāvagatārthānupapattyā yadavagamyate nāsādyata iti yuktaṃ vākyārthasya pūrvāvagatasyāgamārthātvam /
analyzed: na hi prayojana tva avagata artha anupapattyā yat avagamyate na āsādyate iti yuktam vākya arthasya pūrva avagatasya āgama arthātvam

original: śrutāgamārthatve yadi pramādāt tannāśo bhavati tato yajurvedādivihitanāśanimittaṃ prāyaścitam,
analyzed: śruta āgama artha tve yadi pramādāt tad nāśaḥ bhavati tatas yajurveda ādi vihita nāśa nimittam prāyaścitam

śruta arthāpatti vedyaḥ eva hi vedaḥ vijñātaḥ iti ucyate
sa hi ṛk ādīnām na anyatama tvena
jñāyate iti
atra codayati nanu ca iti

san api vā na vidita na
ca avidita sambandhāni adarśa

original: pratyakṣasya pramāṇatvaṃ kathaṃ vā saṅgatervinā // Msv_5,7.80 //

asti indriya artha sambandhaḥ tatra ced na anapekṣaṇāt

original: aprāpyakāriṇī yeṣāṃ cakṣu' śrotre ca te yathā /

ne nya kalpanā yuktā
atipa prasaṅgāt
pratibaddha svabhāvam hi pratibandha balāt eva pratibandhakam upasthāpayati
tu anya kalpanāyām na pratiniyame kāraṇam asti
pramāṇam eva idam rātri vākya jñānam iti
pariharati sambandhasya iti
karaṇa sādhanaḥ ca pramāṇa śabdaḥ iti
akāraṇa tvam eva prāmāṇye sambandhasya darśayati pratyakṣasya iti

original: nanvindriyārtasannikarṣajameva pratyakṣamato nākāraṇaṃ prāmāṇye sambandha iti codayati---astīticedantena /

anapekṣa tvam eva darśayati na hi iti
nirūpitaḥ hi sambandha pramāṇa utpattau kāraṇam anumāne
na ca iha tathā iti
pratyakṣa uttara kālam tu nirūpaṇam na pramāṇa aṅganam iti āha yena api iti
api ca aprāpyakāri indriya vādi pakṣe svarūpa sattvam api sambandhasya na asti eva

original: tenānādṛtyaiva sambaddhamutpannamasandigdhamaviparītaṃ ca deśādibhede 'pi jñānaṃ pramāṇamitayāśrayaṇīyamityāha---tasmāditi /

abhaṅguram iti saṃśaya viparyayau iti

veda upayogam arthāpatteḥ darśayati smṛtyā iti

yat āha

analyzed: tathā liṅga ādibhiḥ śrutiḥ upakalpyate yathā tāvat prakaraṇa āmnāte

analyzed: sāmānyatas kratu upakāra avagatau viśeṣa apekṣāyām mantra śakti nirīkṣayā yat śaknuyāt iti upabandhena śakya artha

iti arthāpatti vārttikam

original: aśrutaphaletikartavyatākeṣu ca karmasu viśvajitsauryādiṣu pūraṇasamarthā śruti' kalpyate 'viśvajitā yajeta svargakāma'iti,

tat na

original: na hi tat rūpāṇāṃ bhāvenaiva sannikarṣa', nābhāvena /

original: yathā svarūpamātradṛṣṭe gṛhādau deśāntaragamane kasyacidabhāvaṃ pratyanuyuktena tadaiva tadabhāvo 'vasīyate /

a vijñānāt

na ca ajñāta sambandham

original: asti ca mīmāṃsakānāṃ prasiddhi'--- ṣaṣṭhaṃ kiledaṃ pramāṇamiti /

original: granthato hi pramāṇābhāva evāvasīyate na pramāṇam,

original: nāstītyapyukte prameyābhāvameva laukikā' pratibudhyante na prameya kiñcit /

original: siddhasya hi jñānasya pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ veti vicāraṇā yuktā /

tat eva hi dvedhā prakāśate

original: yadā ghaṭādisahitaṃ tadupalabhyate tadā ghaṭo 'stīti vyavahāra' pravartate /

original: na ca vācyaṃ satsvapi sūkṣmeṣu bhāveṣu tanmātrabodho dṛṣṭa' /

tat eva hi dvedhā prakāśate
dvedhā hi tanmātra bodha
dṛśye pratiyogini adṛśye vā

original: tatra yā dṛśye pratiyogini tanmātrabuddhi' saiva ghaṭādernāstitvam /

original: ato yeyaṃ sarvavādisiddhā tanmātrabuddhi' saiva nāstīti vyapadiśyate /

yat ca abhāvasya kāraṇam iṣyate kāraṇam āśrīyatām

original: ato yatraiva prāk saṃsṛṣṭabuddharāsīt tatraiva vilakṣaṇakāraṇopanipāte tanmātrabuddhireva jāyate na punarghaṭādyabhāva' /

avasyam ca etat eva abhyupagantavyam
anyathā hi na abhāvaḥ gṛhītum śakyate
pramāṇa abhāvaḥ hi tatra pramāṇam
na ca agṛhītena sa pratipādayitum śakyate
asti hi suṣuptasya api
na ca na asti iti
atas na agṛhītam adarśanam abhāvam niścāyayati
tad agrahītiḥ api ca abhāva rūpa tvāt apareṇa adarśanena iti evam anavasthā āpāta
yadi ca sat mātram eva adarśanam niścāyayati
tatas nivṛtte pi adarśane prāk devadattaḥ
pramāṇa pañcakam yatra vastu rūpe na jāyate
na āsīt iti prita pattiḥ na syāt
bhavati hi kadācid etat

original: yo yatra na dṛṣṭastasmin punadṛśyamāna evāsatyapyadarśane pracīnābhāvajñānaṃ tadasatyadarśane na syāt /
analyzed: yaḥ yatra na dṛṣṭaḥ tasmin puna dṛśyamāne eva asati api adarśane pracīna abhāva jñānam tat asati adarśane na syāt
pracīna adarśana vimarśa jam eva tat jñānam iti vācyam
evam ca gṛhyamāṇam eva tad abhāvam prakāśayati
grahaṇe ca anavasthā prasaṅga
tanmātra saṃvid eva tu adarśanam iti āśrīyamāṇe na kiñcid duṣyati

original: svaprakāśā hi sā phalabhūtā na prakāśāntaramapekṣate /

na ca na asti iti jñānam pramāṇam

original: bhramavaditi na vidma' kimatra lakṣyate iti /

tad nirākaraṇa arthaḥ eva ayam bhāṣyakārasya prayatna

atra āha pramāṇa iti
ayam artha

original: asati hi tasmin pādavihārādivyavahāra' kaṇṭakādyabhāvāvadhāraṇa pura' sara' so 'pyabhāvasyāsati prameyatve na syāt /

original: satsvapi teṣūpalabhyata iti nāstīti dhiyā gṛhyeta /

original: tad yadā satsvapyaviguṇeṣvindriyādiṣu jijñāsito 'pyartha' prayatnenānviṣṭo na dṛśyate tadā tadabhāvādadarśanamiti kalpyate /

tat evam dṛśya tva siddhi arthā yuktā sūkṣa jijñāsā

original: yaccoktam--- yadabhāvasya kāraṇaṃ tattanmātradhima eva kalpanālāghavādastviti /

prāgvat upalambha prasaṅga

original: na hyapracyutaprācyārthakriyārūpasyānupalambhe ghaṭasya kiñcitkāraṇamadhunā paśyāmo yadyasya vināśo nāma kimapi tattvāntaraṃ nāśrīyata iti  #
analyzed: na hi apracyuta prācya arthakriyā rūpasya anupalambhe ghaṭasya kiñcid kāraṇam adhunā paśyāmaḥ yadi asya vināśaḥ nāma kim api tattva antaram na āśrīyate iti
siddham tattva antaram iti
etat ca anupākhyeya tvam abhāvasya nirākartum uktam na tu abāvaḥ vastu
loka virodhāt
yathā ahi acandra śaśī iti loka viruddham
evam abhāvaḥ vastu iti
sattā hi vastu tvam
na ca asau abhāve vastu tva vāda na mukhya tayā
abhāvaḥ hi arthakriyā samarthaḥ eva
jñāna janana darśanāt
vihita akaraṇe ca prāgabhāvasya eva kriyā antara viśeṣaṇa tayā pratyavāya hetu tvāt
evam uttaratra api vastu tā prasādhanam veditavyam iti
i taḥ ca bhāvaḥ
yat vā anuvṛtti vyāvṛtti buddhi grāhyaḥ yatas tu ayam

original: tasmād gavādivad vastu prameyatvācca gamyate // Msv_5,8.9 //
analyzed: tasmāt gavādi vat vastu prameya tvāt ca gamyate
na ca aupacārika tvam vā bhrāntiḥ vā api yadṛcchayā
bhavati atas na sāmānya viśeṣa ātmaka tā mṛṣā
vastu iti āho kāya ādīnam iti
vastu eva sat asat ātmakam iti siddhānta
tatra katham vastu rūpasya eva abhāvasya svabhāva tvam
kim idānīm bhāva abhāvayoḥ abhedaḥ eva
na iti vadāma
bhedaḥ u pi hi anayoḥ dharma dharmi tayā kiyān api asti eva rūpa ādīnām iva
ka punar anayoḥ sambandha
saṃyoga samavāyaḥ vā
na tāvat saṃyoga
dravya dharma tvāt tasya
na ca samavāya
bhāva abhāva prasaṅgāt
abhāva samavāye hi bhāvaḥ na syāt eva
na abhāva samavāyāt asattvam
na hi ghaṭaḥ bhāva samavāyāt asan bhavati
asati samavāya anupapatte
kintu prahārāt eva

original: yattvanāhatamanapasāraṃ ca bhāvāntaramabhāvarūpeṇāvagamyate tat kathamasad bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: yat tu anāhatam anapasāram ca bhāva antaram abhāva rūpeṇa avagamyate tat katham asat bhaviṣyati

original: ata' svahetoreva jāyamāno nityo vā sarvo 'saṅkīrṇasvabhāva eva jāyata iti siddhamasya jātyādivad bhāvadharmatvam /
analyzed: atas sva hetoḥ eva jāyamānaḥ nityaḥ vā saṅkīrṇa svabhāvaḥ eva jāyate iti siddham asya jāti ādi vat bhāva dharma tvam
tatas ca vastu tvam iti
itas ca vastu abhāvaḥ iti āha yat vā iti vastu antena

original: abhāva iti sāmānyātmanā prāgabhāvādibedena ca vyāvṛttyātmanā gṛhyamāṇo 'bhāva' sāmānyaviśeṣātmaka',
analyzed: abhāvaḥ iti sāmānya ātmanā prāgabhāva ādi bedena ca vyāvṛtti ātmanā gṛhyamāṇaḥ bhāva sāmānya viśeṣa ātmaka
tatas ca vastu viṣaya prayoga arthaḥ abhāvaḥ
sāmānya viśeṣa ātmaka tvāt gavādi vat iti
tasmin eva sādhye hetu antaram āha prameya tvāt iti
nanu ayam asiddhaḥ
aupacārikaḥ hi sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvaḥ bhāve
eka śabda vācyam sāmānya rūpam dṛṣṭam gavādi
nānā śabda vācyam ca viśeṣa rūpam śābaleya ādi
sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvaḥ viveka jñasya

original: asati tu viveke ekaśabdanibandhanabhrama evāyam--- abhāva' sāmānyaviśevātmeti /
analyzed: asati tu viveke eka śabda nibandhana bhramaḥ eva ayam
atas āha na ca iti

original: sati hi bādhake bhrāntirupacāro vā kalpyate,
analyzed: sati hi bādhake bhrāntiḥ upacāraḥ vā kalpyate
na ca iha tathā iti bhāvaḥ iti
pratyakṣa ādeḥ anutpatti pramāṇa abhāvaḥ ucyate
pariṇamaḥ vā vijñānam vā anya vastuni
svarūpa para rūpābhyām nityam sat asat ātmake

original: vastuni jñāyate kaiścidrūpaṃ kiñcit kadācana // Msv_5,8.12 //
analyzed: vastuni jñāyate kaiścid rūpam kiñcid kadācana
yasya yatra yadā udabhūtiḥ jidhṛkṣā vā upājāyate
cetyate nubhavaḥ tasya tena ca vyapadiśyate

original: evaṃ tāvat 'vāstītyasyārthasyāsannikṛṣṭasya' iti yadutaktaṃ bhāṣye tad vivṛtam /
analyzed: evam tāvat vā asti iti asya arthasya asat nikṛṣṭasya iti yat utaktam bhāṣye tat vivṛtam
idānīm pramāṇa abāva śabdam vyācaṣṭe pratyakṣa ādeḥ anutpattiḥ iti

original: anutpattireva keti cedata āha--- sātmana iti /
analyzed: anutpattiḥ eva kā iti ced atas āha sātmanaḥ iti
ātmanaḥ hi jñāna ātmaka pariṇāmaḥ

original: tad yadā ātmā bhūtalādau na ghaṭādijñānātmanā piraṇamati sā tasya pratyakṣādyanutpatti' svarūpāvasthānaṃ pramāṇābhāva ityākhyāyate,
analyzed: tat yadā ātmā bhū tala ādau na ghaṭa ādi jñāna ātmanā piraṇamati sā tasya pratyakṣa ādi anutpatti svarūpa avasthānam pramāṇa abhāvaḥ iti ākhyāyate
tad prāmāṇye ca na asti iti jñānam phalam
na asti iti eva vā bhāva jñānam pratyakṣa ādi anutpattiḥ iti ucyate
atas tat eva pramāṇam na ahā
phalam iti
nanu yadi dvi ātmakam vastu

original: tarhi sakṛdeva tathā pratibhātagiti kiṃ pramāṇāntareṇāta āha--- svarūpeti /
analyzed: tarhi sakṛt eva tathā kim pramāṇa antareṇa atas āha svarūpa iti
sva rūpeṇa tat vastu gavādi sat rūpam aśva ādi rūpeṇa ca asat rūpam

original: tadasminneva dvirūpe kiñcideva kadācit pratīyate na tu sarvātmakameva gṛhītavyamiti niyama iti //12//
analyzed: tat asmin eva dvi rūpe kiñcid eva kadācid pratīyate na tu sarva ātmakam eva gṛhītavyam iti niyamaḥ iti

original: kiṃ puna' kāraṇaṃ dvyātmakasyaikameva rūpaṃ gṛhyate nāparaṃ kiñcidata āha---yasya yatreti /
analyzed: kim punar kāraṇam dvi ātmakasya ekam eva rūpam gṛhyate na aparam kiñcid atas āha yasya yatra iti
udbhūtam hi gṛhyate na an uda bhūtam
agneḥ iva rātrau rūpam na sparśa
jidhṛkṣitam vā prāyeṇa

original: ato yadeva sadasatorudbhūtaṃ bhavati tenaiva buddhivyapadeśau bhavata' /
analyzed: atas yat eva sat asatoḥ udbhūtam bhavati tena eva buddhi vyapadeśau bhavata
cetyate nubhavaḥ iti kim idam
na hi anubhavaḥ cetyate
saḥ eva cetanā
viṣayaḥ tu cetyate
satyam
viṣaya prāpti anyathā anupapattyā anubhavaḥ ca iti atas eva
tat anena prakāreṇa viṣaya prakāśam eva darśayati iti adoṣaḥ iti
tasya upakāraka tvena vartate iṃśaḥ tadā itara
ubhayoḥ api saṃvittau ubhaya anugamaḥ asti hi

original: ayameveti yo hyeṣa bhāve bhavati nirṇaya' /
analyzed: ayam eva iti yaḥ hi eṣa bhāve bhavati
na eṣa
na asti iti api ca saṃvittiḥ na vastu anugamāt ṛte
jñānam na jāyate kiñcid upaṣṭambhana varjitam
pratyakṣa ādi avatāraḥ tu bhāva aṃśaḥ gṛhyate yadā
vyāpāraḥ tad anutpattiḥ abhāva aṃśe jighṛkṣite
na tāvat indriyaiḥ eṣā na asti iti utpadyate
bhāva aṃśena eva saṃyogaḥ yogya tvāt indriyasya hi
udbhūta jighṛkṣita eka grahaṇe ca itaraḥ tanu guṇa tayā eva līnaḥ bhūtvā avatiṣṭhate
sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ iva eka grahaṇe nyataraḥ iti āha tasya iti
idam ca anvāruhya vacanena asmābhiḥ uktam
asti eva tu bhāva abhāva pratītau anyatara anugamaḥ iti āha aubhayoḥ iti
ubhāy anugamam eva darśayati ayam eva iti dvayena
ayam eva iti
bhāva antareṇa asaṅkīrṇaḥ iti artha

original: na hyapratisaṃhite bhāvāntarābāve saṅkīrṇasvabhāvo na niścetuṃ śakyate /
analyzed: na hi a pratisaṃhite bhāva antara abāve saṅkīrṇa svabhāvaḥ na niścetum śakyate
na asti iti api pratiṣedhya pratiṣedhāra bhāva upaṣṭhambhana varjitam na kiñcid jñānam jāyate
kiñcid śabdena bhāvasya abhāva anugama śūnyam api jñānam asti eva
na tu evabhāvasya iti darśayati
darśitam tāvat sat asat ātmakam vastu iti
kadācid kiñcid anubhūyate iti ca
ubhayoḥ aṃśayoḥ idānīm pramāṇa vibhāgam darśayati pratyakṣa ādi iti
katham punar idam avagamyate
visphārita akṣasya hi sahasā na iha ghaṭaḥ sti
aghaṭam vā bhū talam iti abhāva viśiṣṭam bhū tala jñānam jāyamānam upalabhyate
daṇḍi pratyakṣa vat
tad abhāvasya apratyakṣa tve na avakalpate

original: na hyapratyakṣa eva viśeṣaṇe viśiṣṭa' pratyakṣo bhavati,
analyzed: na hi apratyakṣaḥ eva viśeṣaṇe pratyakṣaḥ bhavati
daṇḍaḥ iva daṇḍī

original: na ca nāstyeva viśiṣṭā dhīriti vaktavyam,
analyzed: na ca na asti eva viśiṣṭā dhīḥ iti vaktavyam
anāśraya abhāva saṃvitti abhāvāt
api ca ātmā bhāvasya abhāva
sa katham svatantraḥ nubhūyate

original: na hi rūpādayo bhāvadharmā' svatantrā evāvasīyante /
analyzed: na hi rūpa ādayaḥ bhāva dharmāḥ svatantrāḥ eva avasīyante
svatantra abhāva vādaḥ tu svātantryam eva
sat asat ātmake vastuni iti hi darśayati

original: bhāvāṃśo 'bhāvāṃśa iti ca vispaṣṭaṃ tadabhāvaviśiṣṭaṃ grahaṇamityāha /
analyzed: bhāva aṃśaḥ bhāva aṃśaḥ iti ca vispaṣṭam tad abhāva viśiṣṭam grahaṇam iti āha
kiñca asya svātantrye pramāṇam
na hi an kadācid api tathā avasīyate
kim idānīm abhāvaḥ na avasīyate eva
svatantraḥ vā avasīyate
na tāvat pūrva kalpa
tad avagame pramāṇa antara abhāvāt nitya asaṃvitti saṅgāt
na ca saṃyoga pratiṣedhe svatantra abhāva avasāyaḥ u sti
hi abhāva

original: sa cādhāratantra eveti saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇatvalakṣaṇayā pratyāsattyā satīndriyasannikarṣe aindriyajñānagocara eva /
analyzed: sa ca ādhāra tantraḥ eva iti saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa tva lakṣaṇayā pratyāsattyā sati indriya sannikarṣe aindriya jñāna gocaraḥ eva
ekam hi idam viśiṣṭam jñānam
tat asya abhāva pramāṇam indriyam vā
sa tarhi bhāvam api gocarayet
na ca etat iṣṭam

original: ata' satyupalabhyamāne tadaiva yannopalabhyate tannāstīti sata eva prakāśakamasato 'pīti na pramāṇavibhāgaṃ paśyāma' /
analyzed: sati upalabhyamāne tadā eva yat na upalabhyate tat na asti iti sataḥ eva prakāśakam asataḥ pi iti na pramāṇa vibhāgam paśyāma
atas āha na tāvat iti
tāvat chadaḥ liṅga apekṣayā
tat ca upariṣṭhāt nirākariṣyate iti
atra kāraṇam āha bhāva aṃśa iti
yogyatā hi kārya darśana samadhigamyā
sā ca indriyāṇām bhāva ātmaka grahaṇe eva upalabhyate na abhāve pi
vinā api tu tena tad grahaṇāt iti vakṣyāma

original: atra tu yogyatāsahitā prāptirindriyārthayo' sambandha ityabhiprāya' /
analyzed: atra tu yogyatā sahitā prāptiḥ indriya arthayoḥ sambandhaḥ iti abhiprāya
yat tu eka jñāna saṃsargiṇoḥ eka pramāṇa tvam iti
tat na
ekasyāḥ api buddheḥ nānā kāraṇa tva darśanāt
ekam hi idam bhāvanā indriya samāhāra jam pratyabhijñānam iti vakṣyāma
eka jñāna pratibhāsinoḥ api ca gṛhyamāṇa smaryamāṇayoḥ vivekaḥ ukta
viviktāḥ eva te hi arthāḥ iti

original: na hi smṛtyupasthāpitanāmaviśiṣṭo ḍittho na pratyakṣo bhavati /
analyzed: na hi smṛti upasthāpita nāma viśiṣṭaḥ ḍitthaḥ na pratyakṣaḥ bhavati
nāma ca a pratyakṣam smaryamāṇa tvāt

original: tasyāgṛhīte hi viśeṣaṇe viśiṣṭo nāvagamyate nāpratyakṣe /
analyzed: tasya agṛhīte hi viśeṣaṇe viśiṣṭaḥ na avagamyate na apratyakṣe
evam iha api pramāṇa abhāva upanīta abhāva viśiṣṭe sati upalabhyamāne na kiñcid anupapannam

original: daṇḍinyapi śābde tāvad daṇḍapadopanītaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭa eva pratyayārtho na daṇḍo 'pi /
analyzed: daṇḍini api śābde tāvat daṇḍa pada upanīta viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭaḥ eva pratyaya arthaḥ na daṇḍaḥ api
pratyakṣam tu yogyatayā ubhayatra pravartatām nāma
na ca evam ubhayatra akṣāṇām yogyatā
nanu bhāvāt abhinna tvāt samprayogaḥ sti tena ca
na hi atyantam abhedaḥ sti rūpa ādi vat iha api na

original: dharmayorbheda iṣṭo hi dharmyabhede 'pi na' sthite /
analyzed: dharmayoḥ bhedaḥ iṣṭaḥ hi dharmya bhede na sthite
udbhava abhibhava ātma tvāt grahaṇam ca avatiṣṭhate
vakṣyamāṇa tvāt
kim idānīm anumāne pi pratyakṣa anumāna samāhāra jaḥ viśiṣṭa bodha na
anumānasya anvaya adhīna jaṃma tvāt
viśiṣṭena eva ca anvaya anugamāt
dhūmavān agnimān iti hi vyāptiḥ avagatā
uktam ca
na evam na hi atra liṅgasya śakti ananta tva kalpanā iti
atra api ca ayam agnimān iti viśeṣa bodhe sti eva pratyakṣa apekṣā
ayam eva abhāvasya pratīti prakāra
yat pramāṇa antara prāpita āśrayam viśinaṣṭi iti na kiñcid anupapam annam
yat ca saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa tayā indriya sannikarṣaḥ bhāvasya iti uktam
tat ayuktam
asambaddhasya viśeṣaṇa tva anupapatteḥ atiprasakte
itarathā viseṣaṇa artham arthitena eva sannikarṣa upapattau vṛthā eva
saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa artha tva āśrayaṇam iti alam enena iti
abhiprāyam a jānānaḥ codayati nanu iti
prāpti mātram hi artha indriyayoḥ sannikarṣaḥ
asti ca bhāvāt abhinnasya abhāvasya bhāva vat eva indriya prāptiḥ iti
atra ca yogyatāyāḥ uddhāṭanena eva uttaram deyam
tat upekṣya eva tāvat atyanta abhedam eva ayam āha
tat etam eva tāvat nirākaroṣi imī
tyabhiprāyeṇa āha nahi iti

original: yadi bhāvābhāvayorekāntaramabheda eva syāt tato bhāvendriyasannikarṣe tadabhinnasyābhāvasyāpi syāt,
analyzed: yadi bhāva abhāvayoḥ ekāntaram abhedaḥ eva syāt tatas bhāva indriya sannikarṣe tad abhinnasya abhāvasya api syāt
na tu evam asti
abhāvasya api rūpa ādi vat atyanta abheda abhāvāt iti
rūpa ādi tulya tām eva abhāvasya darśayati dharmayoḥ iti
bhāva abhāva ātmanoḥ dharmayoḥ dharmya bhede sthite
bhede kāraṇam āha udbhava iti
bhāva abhāvayoḥ api udbhava acadbhūtā
bhi bhūtayoḥ gahaṇa a grahaṇa vyavasthā dṛśyate
na ca etat eka tve kalpite

original: na hyekameva tattvamudbhūtamabhibhūtaṃ ceti pratīyata iti //20//
analyzed: na hi ekam eva tattvam udbhūtam abhibhūtam ca iti pratīyate iti
idam eva nimittam ca vivekasya pratīyate
bhāva abhāva dhiyoḥ akṣaiḥ kṣā an apekṣaṇam
rūpa ādeḥ api bhedam ca kecid grāhaka bhedata
varṇayanti yathā ekasya puṃsaḥ putra ādi rūpa tām
buddhi mātra kṛtaḥ bhedaḥ rūpa ādau nityam eva hi
na ca deśa ādi abhinnānām samudāya avakalpanā
idam ca anayoḥ viveka kāraṇam iti āha edam eva iti
akṣa an apekṣa tā ca abhāva dhiyaḥ vakṣyate iti

original: ayaṃ ca grāhakabhedanibandhano bhedo rūpādīnāmiti kaiścidiṣyate /
analyzed: ayam ca grāhaka bheda nibandhanaḥ bhedaḥ rūpa ādīnām iti kaiścid iṣyate
saḥ nayoḥ api śakyate vagantum iti āha rūpa ādeḥ iti

original: evaṃ hi kecid vadanti--- yathā hyekameva mukhaṃ maratakapadmarāgādyupādhibhedād bhinnamiva pratibhāti,
analyzed: evam hi kecid vadanti yathā hi ekam eva mukham marataka padmarāga ādi upādhi bhedāt bhinnam iva pratibhāti

original: yathā caika eva puruṣo 'pekṣābhedāt bhinnamiva pratibhāti,
analyzed: yathā ca ekaḥ eva puruṣaḥ upekṣā bhedāt bhinnam iva pratibhāti
evam iha api bhāva abhāvayoḥ aupādhikaḥ bhedaḥ bhaviṣyati iti
nanu evam aupādhike bhede tāttvikam ekatvam prāpnāti
bhavatu asmin mate
tathā api rūpa ādi vyavasthā sidhyati eva iti
idam ca anvārudya vacanena asmābhiḥ uktam
na hi rūpa ādīnām grāhaka bheda nibandhanaḥ bheda
kintu buddhi bheda nibandhanaḥ eva

original: mukhaṃ hi pramāṇāntarādekarūpamavagataṃ tadupādhibhedād bhidyata iti yuktam /
analyzed: mukham hi pramāṇa antarāt eka rūpam avagatam tad upādhi bhedāt bhidyate iti yuktam

original: na tvekatve rūpādīnāṃ bhedaheturbhāvābhāvayorapi samāna evetyabhiprāyeṇāha---buddhimātreti /
analyzed: na tu ekatve rūpa ādīnām bheda hetuḥ bhāva abhāvayoḥ api samānaḥ eva iti abhiprāyeṇa āha buddhi mātra iti
ka punar ayam bhāva abhāva ātmakaḥ dharmī
yad dharmau bhāva abhāvau
na ekam rūpa ādi samudāyāt bhinnam upalabhyate
vṛtti ādi vikalpa akṣama tvāt
atas deśa ādi abhinnānām rūpa ādīnām samudāyaḥ dharmī
na tattva antaram atas āha na ca iti

original: nātra vana iva bādhikā buddhirastīti bhāva' /
analyzed: na atra vane iva bādhikā buddhiḥ asti iti
idam ca savikalpaka siddhau uktam api abhāva āśraya samarthana artham atra uktam iti apunarukta tā iti
sat guṇa dravya rūpeṇa rūpa ādeḥ eka tā iṣyate
sva rūpa apekṣayā ca eṣām paraspara vibhinna tā

original: yadi tadvadapekṣātra na syād bhedo 'tra naiva hi /
analyzed: yadi tadvat apekṣā atra na syāt na eva hi
sat asat rūpa tā buddheḥ bhavet anyataratra na
sat sambandhe sat iti evam sat rūpa tvam pratīyate
na asti atrā idam iti idam tu tad asaṃyoga hetukam
gṛhītvā vastu sadbhāvam smṛtvā ca pratī yoginam
mānasam nāstitā jñānam jāyate kṣā an apekṣayā
evam tāvat abhāvasya bhāvāt bheda abhedau darśitau
tau eva rūpa ādi dṛṣṭāntena draḍhayati sat guṇa dravya iti

original: na hi rūpādaya' sadādirūpeṇa na bhidyanta iti svarūpāpekṣayāpi teṣāṃ bheda' śakyate vārayitum,
analyzed: na hi rūpa ādaya sat ādi rūpeṇa na bhidyante iti svarūpa apekṣayā api teṣām bheda śakyate vārayitum

original: tayā vā bheda iti na sadādyātmanābheda' pratikṣipyate /
analyzed: tayā vā bhedaḥ iti na sat ādi ātmanā abhedaḥ pratikṣipyate

original: evamabhāvo 'pi bhāvadharmatayā tato bhinno 'pi svarūpāpekṣayābhinna iṣyate /
analyzed: evam abhāvaḥ pi bhāva dharma tayā tatas bhinnaḥ pi svarūpa apekṣayā abhinnaḥ iṣyate
dravya rūpeṇa iti
rūpa ādayaḥ dravyāt abhinnā
tat ca abhinnam iti tad rūpeṇa eṣām abhedaḥ iti artha

original: svarūpāpekṣayā rūpādivad bhedānāśrayaṇe bhāvābhāvayoranyataratra na buddhe' sadasadrūpatā bhavedityāha---yaditi //25//
analyzed: svarūpa apekṣayā rūpa ādi vat bheda anāśrayaṇe bhāva abhāvayoḥ anyataratra na buddhe sat asat rūpatā bhavet iti āha yat iti
asti tu asau indriya sambandha asambandha hetukaḥ buddhi bhedaḥ iti āha tad sambandhā eti

original: etena, yadāhu'--- na bhāvād bhedakamabhāvasya rūpamupalabhāmaha iti,
analyzed: etena yat āhuḥ na bhāvāt bhedakam abhāvasya rūpam upalabhāmahe iti
tat nirākṛtam
sat asat rūpa vivekāt iti
yat indriyeṇa saṃyujyate bhū talam tat asti iti pratīyate

original: yanna sambadhyate ghaṭādi tannāstīti pratīyata iti //26//
analyzed: yat na sambadhyate ghaṭa ādi tat na asti iti pratīyate iti
nanu indriya vyāpāra anantaram eva iha ghaṭaḥ na asti iti jñānam utpadyate
tat kutas yam vivekaḥ na indriyeṇa abhāva budghiḥ janyate iti

original: na hyasati tadvyāpāre bhāvabuddhivadabhāvabuddhirapi jāyamānā dṛśyate /
analyzed: na hi asati tad vyāpāre bhāva buddhi vat abhāva buddhiḥ api jāyamānā dṛśyate
yadi api bhāvāt abhāvaḥ bhidyate

original: tathāpi tasya rūpādivatsaṃyuktasamavāyena vā tadviśeṣaṇatayā vendriya
analyzed: tathā api tasya rūpa ādi vat saṃyukta samavāyena vā tad viśeṣaṇa tayā vā indriya
sva rūpa mātram dṛṣṭvā api paścāt kiñcid smaran api
tatra anya nāstitām pṛṣṭaḥ tadā eva pratipadyate
sannikarṣaḥ sti eva
atas tat jñānam aindriyakam bhavet atas āha gṛhīta tva iti
ayam abhiprāya nānā āśrayaḥ bhāva śakyate grahītum iti āśraya grahaṇa artham eva atra indriya apekṣā na abhāva grahaṇāya

original: yathā nāsmṛte pratiyoginyabhāvo gṛhyata iti tatsmaraṇārthaṃ prācīnajñānajanmana' saṃskārasyodabodhāpyapekṣita',
analyzed: yathā na asmṛte pratiyogini abhāvaḥ gṛhyate iti tad smaraṇa artham
evam āśraya grahaṇa artham indriyam
na ca prāpti mātram aindriyaka jñāna janmani kāraṇam

original: api tu yogyatāsahitā prāptiriti pratyakṣe varṇitam /
analyzed: api tu yogyatā sahitā prāptiḥ iti pratyakṣe varṇitam
na ca indriyāṇām abhāva jñāna janana yogya tā
teṣu asatsu api tad bhāvāt iti vakṣyate
mānasam iti
kim sukha ādi jñānavat manasā janyate iti
yadi evam tathā api pratyakṣa tā eva
na bahis manasaḥ svātantryam asti
satyam
sarva pramāṇa sādhāraṇaḥ tu manasaḥ

original: kevalātmamana' sannikarṣādeva bāhyendriyānapekṣaṃ pramāṇābhāvenābhāvajñānaṃ janyata ityuktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: kevala ātma mana sannikarṣāt eva bāhya indriya anapekṣam pramāṇa abhāvena abhāva jñānam janyate iti uktam bhavati
gṛhītvā smṛtvā iti ca dharma dharmiṇoḥ abhedāt samāna kartṛka tva abhidhānam iti
katham punar idam avagamyate bhāva grahaṇam idam indriya apekṣam na abhāva grahaṇam iti
samānaḥ hi
atas āha svarūpa iti

original: yo hi gṛhasvarūpemevāvadhārya kvacidgata' pṛcchyate--- tatra caitro 'sti na veti,
analyzed: yaḥ hi gṛha sva rūpāṇi eva avadhārya pṛcchyate tatra caitraḥ sti na vā iti
tadā asau pṛṣṭaḥ tatra na asti itām tadā eva pratipadyate

original: yadi tvindriyādhīnamabāvajñānaṃ bhavet nā sati tadvyāpāre jāyate /
analyzed: yadi tu indriya adhīnam aba avajñānam bhavet nā sati tad vyāpāre jāyate
na ca pūrva avagata abhāva smaraṇam eva iti vācyam
na hi asati pratiyogi smaraṇe bhāvaḥ dṛśyate
na ca āśraya grahaṇa kāle pratiyogi smaraṇam asti
bahūnām eva hi kathyate

original: na ca tāvātāṃ smaraṇaṃ samprati viśeṣeṇa smaryata iti,
analyzed: na ca smaraṇam samprati viśeṣeṇa smaryate iti
tat ayuktam

original: na hyabhāvatvaṃ nāma sāmānyanyato 'vagato viśeṣeṇa smaryata iti, yuktam /
analyzed: na hi abhāva tvam nāma sāmānya nyatas vagataḥ viśeṣeṇa smaryate iti yuktam
pūrva anubhava āhita bhāvanā bījā hi sā smṛti
na alpam avyatirekam gocarayitum utsahate

original: tastadānīmeva pratiyogismaraṇapura' saramindriyānapekṣamabhāvajñānaṃ jāyata iti manoharamidam /
analyzed: tas tadānīm eva pratiyogi smaraṇa pura saram indriya anapekṣam abhāva jñānam jāyate iti manoharam idam
tat idam uktam tadā eva pratipadyate iti
idam ca prataykṣa phala smṛti nivṛttyā phalataḥ pratyakṣa anavṛttiḥ iti uktam eva iti
na ca api atra anumāna tvam liṅga abhāvāt pratīyate

original: bhāvāṃśo nanu liṅgaṃ syāt tadānīṃ nājighṛṇāt // Msv_5,8.29 //
analyzed: bhāva aṃśaḥ nanu liṅgam syāt tadānīm na ajighṛṇāt
abhāva avagateḥ janma bhāva aṃśe hi ajighṛkṣite

original: tasmin pratīyamāne tu nābhāve jāyate mati' // Msv_5,8.30 //
analyzed: tasmin pratīyamāne tu na abhāve jāyate
na ca eṣa pakṣa dharma tvam pada vat pratipadyate
saha sarvaiḥ abhāvaiḥ ca bhāvaḥ na aikāntikaḥ mata

original: kvacid bhāve 'pi sadbhāvo jñāto yasya kadācana /
analyzed: kvacid bhāve sadbhāvaḥ jñātaḥ yasya kadācana
tasya abhāvaḥ tatra eva kadācid avagamyate
evam tāvat akṣa ja tvam abhāva dhiyaḥ nirākṛttam
idānīm laiṅgika tvam nirākaroti na ca api atra iti
atra codayati bhāva aṃśa iti
pariharati tadānīm iti matiḥ antena
dvau atra bhāvau pratiṣedhya pratiṣedha ādhāraḥ ca
tatra na tāvat pratiṣedhyaḥ liṅgam
avagatam hi liṅgam bhavati
na ca tadā ghaṭaḥ gṛhyate

original: na hi tasmin gṛhyamāṇe tadabhāvo grahītuṃ śakyate /
analyzed: na hi tasmin gṛhyamāṇe tad abhāvaḥ grahītum śakyate
satyām tu pratijñāyām na asataḥ liṅga tvam
atas na abhāvaḥ jighṛkṣita ijighṛkṣita pratiṣedhya bhāvaḥ liṅgam iti

original: astu tarhi pratiṣedhādhārabhāvo liṅgamata āha---na caiṣaiti /
analyzed: astu tarhi pratiṣedha ādhāra bhāvaḥ liṅgam atas āha na ca eṣā eti
eṣaḥ iti para upasthitam aparokṣam bhāvam nirdiśati
yathā arthe pakṣīkṛte padam ataddharmatayā na hetuḥ iti uktam
evam bhū tala bhāvaḥ na ghaṭa ādi abhāva dharmaḥ iti
api ca anvaya adhīna ātma lābham anumāna jñānam

original: na ca bhūtalabhāvasya sarvairabhāvai' sambnadho jñāyate /
analyzed: na ca bhū tala bhāvasya sarvaiḥ abhāvaiḥ jñāyate

original: tat kathaṃ tataste pratyeṣyanta ityāha--- saheti //31//
analyzed: tat katham tatas te pratyeṣyante iti āha saha iti
astu kvacid bhū tala ādau bhāve

original: sadbhāvo 'pi yasya ghaṭāde' kadācit jñāta' tasyāpi
analyzed: yasya ghaṭa āde kadācid tasya api
tatra abhāvaḥ vagamyate iti āha kvacid iti
yatra āpi dṛṣṭa pūrva tvam yad abhāvasya tatra ca
tad abhāva matiḥ dṛṣṭā sambandhe kṣā an apekṣayā
kasyacid yadi bhāvasya syāt abhāvena kenacid
sambandha darśanam tatra sarva mānam prasajyate
gṛhīte ca bhāva aṃśe na eva abhāve naya vastu na
sarvasya matiḥ iti evam vyabhicārāt aliṅga tā
sambandhe gṛhyamāṇe ca sambandhi grahaṇam dhruvam
tatra abhāvam ati kena pramāṇena upajāyate
tadānīm nahi liṅgena sambandhi grahaṇam bhavet
tatra avaśyam abhāvasya pramāṇa antarataḥ

original: na kevalaṃ yadyatra kadācid dṛṣṭaṃ tanmātrasya tatrābhāvo 'vagamyate,
analyzed: na kevalam yat yatra kadācid dṛṣṭam tanmātrasya tatra abhāvaḥ avagamyate

original: yasyāpi tu yatrābhāvo na dṛṣṭapūrvastasyāpi tatrābhāvo 'vagamyata ityāha---yatreti //33//
analyzed: yasya api tu yatra abhāvaḥ na dṛṣṭa pūrvaḥ tasya api tatra abhāvaḥ vagamyate iti āha yatra iti
yadi tu yena kenacid ekena abhāvena gṛhīta sambandhāt bhāvāt abhāva antara anumānam iṣyate
tatas ti prasaktiḥ iti āha kasyacid iti

original: na caivamastīti vyatirekeṇa darśayati---gṛhīte 'pi ca bhāvāṃśe naicābhāve 'nyavastuna' /
analyzed: na ca evam asti iti vyatirekeṇa darśayati gṛhīte ca bhāva aṃśe
sarvasya matiḥ ityantena
anaikāntikaḥ ca ayam bhāvaḥ bhāva antaraiḥ api sambandhāt
atas na aikāntika tvāt asya ghaṭa ādeḥ abhāvam gamayitum aliṅga tvam iti āha evam vyabhicārāt aliṅga tā iti
api ca sambandha grahaṇam sambandhi grahaṇa adhīnam

original: tadihābhāvākhye sambandhini grahītavye kiṃ pramāṇamiti vaktavyamityāha--- sambandha iti //36//
analyzed: tat iha abhāva ākhye sambandhini grahītavye kim pramāṇam iti vaktavyam iti āha sambandhaḥ iti
na tāvat liṅga ga vidita sambandham tad avadhāraṇe pramāṇam
itaretara āśrayam hi tathā syāt iti abhiprāyeṇa āha tadānīm iti
atas vaśyam tad grahaṇe pramāṇa antaram arthanīyam iti āha tatra iti
prati ādeḥ anutpattiḥ na tu liṅgam bhaviṣyati
na viśeṣaṇa sambandhaḥ tasyāḥ sāmānyatas bhavet
atra idānīm anupalabdhi liṅga vādinaḥ bauddhasya pratyavasthānam āha pratyakṣa ādeḥ iti

original: dvedhā hi hetavo bauddhairvibhajyante--- kāryaṃ svabhāva iti,
analyzed: dvedhā hi hetavaḥ bauddhaiḥ vibhajyante kāryam svabhāvaḥ iti
anupalabdhiḥ ca ika jñāna saṃsargiṇoḥ eka upalabdhiḥ eva

original: tasyāśca svarūpaṃ jñeyarūpaṃ ca prakāśate iti jñānajñeyasvabhāvā /
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca sva rūpam jñeya rūpam ca prakāśate iti jñāna jñeya svabhāvā
na hi asau svarūpam iva jñeya sattām api vyabhicarati

original: tasyāśca svasādhyena nāstīti vikalpaśabdātmakavyavahāreṇa tadyogyatayā vā tādātmyameva pratibandha' /
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca sva sādhyena nā asti iti vikalpa śabda ātmaka vyavahāreṇa tad yogyatayā vā tādātmyam eva

original: na hyasau nāstīti vyavahāraṃ vyabhicarati śiṃśapeva vṛkṣatām /
analyzed: na hi asau na asti iti vyavahāram vyabhicarati śiṃśapā iva vṛkṣa tām

original: tadevaṃ jñātapratibandhānupalabdhi' yo nāma bhrāmyan viviktadeśopalabdhāvapi ghaṭāya ghaṭate taṃ prati nāstīti vyavahāraṃ tadyogyatāṃ vānumāpayati
analyzed: tat evam jñāta pratibandha anupalabdhi yaḥ nāma bhrāmyan vivikta deśa upalabdhau api ghaṭāya ghaṭate tam prati nā asti iti vyavahāram tad yogyatām vā anumāpayati

original: evaṃ ca ghaṭādyabhāvānupalabdhiprayoga'--- yad dṛśyaṃ hi sadyatra nopalabhyate tattatra nāsti /
analyzed: evam ca ghaṭa ādi abhāva anupalabdhi prayoga yat dṛśyam hi sat yatra na upalabhyate tat tatra na asti

original: nopalabhyate copalabhyamāne deśe dṛśyo ghaṭa iti /
analyzed: na upalabhyate ca upalabhyamāne deśe dṛśyaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti
etat api dūṣayati na viśeṣaṇa sambandhaḥ tasyāḥ iti

original: ya evānupalabdhyānumātumiṣyate ghaṭābhāvo nāstīti vyavahārastadyogyatā vā naikenāpi viśeṣeṇānupalabdhe' sambandho 'vagata',
analyzed: yaḥ eva anupalabdhyā anumātum iṣyate ghaṭa abhāvaḥ na asti iti vyavahāraḥ tad yogyatā vā nā ekena api viśeṣeṇa anupalabdhe sambandhaḥ
katham tatas viśeṣa anumānam
bhū tala upalabdhiḥ hi sā

original: tasyāśca nānāvidhānekaghaṭapaṭādiviṣayā nāstīti vyavahārā dṛśyanta iti kathaṃ viśeṣeṇa ghaṭo nāstīti vyavahārayet /
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca nānāvidha aneka ghaṭa paṭa ādi viṣayāḥ na asti iti vyavahārāḥ dṛśyante iti katham viśeṣeṇa ghaṭaḥ na asti iti vyavahārayet
ghaṭa anupalabdhiḥ asau

original: ato ghaṭābhāvaṃ tadvyavahāraṃ vā prasādhayatīti cet /
analyzed: atas ghaṭa abhāvam tad vyavahāram vā prasādhayati iti ced
kaḥ tasyāḥ ghaṭena sambandhaḥ
deśa upalabdhiḥ hi sā
tāvat eva tasyāḥ ghaṭa anupalabdhi tvam

original: tacca sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭamiti kathamekenaiva vyapadiśyate ced ghaṭābhāvo nāma kaścit_ /
analyzed: tat ca sarvān prati aviśiṣṭam iti katham ekena eva vyapadiśyate ced ghaṭa abhāvaḥ nāma kaścid

original: kasmācca satyapi ghaṭe ghaṭo nāstīti vyavahāro na pravartate /
analyzed: kasmāt ca sati api ghaṭe ghaṭaḥ na asti iti vyavahāraḥ na pravartate
sat vyavahāra virodhāt iti ced
katham ghaṭa anupalabdhau sat vyavahāra
asti hi tadānīm api
vivikta upalabdhiḥ hi
na asau ghaṭe sati iti ced
kaḥ viveka arthaḥ iti
nanu ayam abhāvaḥ eva
tad abhāve narthakam vivikta vacanam
atas n upalabdheḥ ayam api viśeṣaḥ sādho eva

original: yadasati ghaṭe nāstīti vyavahāro na satīti /
analyzed: yat asati ghaṭe na asti iti vyavahāraḥ na sati iti

original: yaccedaṃ ghaṭābhāvamatilaṅghya nāstīti vyavahārānumānamavasthitaṃ tadapi kena viśeṣeṇeti na vidma' /
analyzed: yat ca idam ghaṭa abhāvam atilaṅghya na asti iti vyavahāra anumānam avasthitam tat api kena viśeṣeṇa iti na vidma
saḥ pi bhāva atirekī na kaścid upalabhyate

original: yogyatā tadanatirekiṇī tasmin buddhe buddhaiveti na kiñcidanumeyaṃ paśyāma' /
analyzed: yogyatā tad anatirekiṇī tasmin buddhe buddhā eva iti na kiñcid anumeyam paśyāma
vārtikakāreṇa
tu idam upekṣya eva tāvat
dūṣaṇa antaram uktam iti
na ca api abhāva sāmānye pramāṇam upajāyate

original: vyabhicārādā viśeṣāstu pratīyeran kathaṃ tayā // Msv_5,8.39 //
analyzed: viśeṣāḥ tu pratīyeran katham tayā
na ca anavagatam liṅgam gṛhyate ced asau api
abhāva tvāt abhāvena gṛhyeta anyena hetunā

original: sa cānyena grahītavyo nāgṛhīte hi liṅgatā /
analyzed: sa ca anyena grahītavyaḥ na a gṛhīte hi liṅga tā
tad gṛhītiḥ hi liṅgena syāt anyena iti ananta tā
liṅga abhāve tathā eva syāt anavastheyam iti atas

original: kvāpyasya syāt pramāṇatvaṃ liṅgatvena vinā dhruvam // Msv_5,8.42 //
analyzed: kvāpi asya syāt pramāṇa tvam liṅga tvena vinā dhruvam
nā asti iti dhī phalam ca eṣā pratyakṣa ādeḥ ajanmana
tasya eva ca pramāṇa tvam ānantaryāt pratīyate
abhāva sāmānyena tu anupabdhe sambandha sidhyati eva
na tu abhāva sāmānye pramāṇam upajāyate iti āha sāmānya iti

original: viśeṣāstvanaikāntikatayā nānupalabdhyā bodhayituṃ śakyanta ityāha--- vyabhicārāditi //39//
analyzed: viśeṣāḥ tu anaikāntika tayā na anupalabdhyā bodhayitum śakyante iti āha vyabhicārāt iti

original: api ca--- nānavagatarūpaṃ liṅgamanumāne liṅgaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: api ca na anavagata rūpam liṅgam anumāne liṅgam bhavati
tat iyam pratyakṣa ādi anutpattiḥ abhāva tvāt apareṇa liṅgena avagantavyā
evam hi vadanti
yāvān kaścid sa sarva upalabdheḥ eva iti

original: evaṃ ca tatra tatra sadṛśāparāparaliṅgānusāreṇānavasthāpāta ityāha--- na ceti dvayena /
analyzed: evam ca tatra tatra sadṛśa apara apara liṅga anusāreṇa anavasthā pātaḥ iti āha na ca iti dvayena
etat ca upalabdhi abhāvaḥ nupalabdhiḥ iti āpādya uktam
vivikta itara padārthaḥ nupalabdhiḥ iti tu pratyuktam iti

original: evaṃ yo 'pyasau liṅgirūpābhāva' so 'pi sambandhagrahaṇārthamavaśyaṃ prathamavagantavya' /
analyzed: evam yaḥ pi asau liṅgi rūpa abhāva saḥ pi sambandha grahaṇa artham avaśyam prathamam avagantavya
tad avagame pi tad rūpa apara liṅga abhyupagamāt anavasthā eva
atas kvacid avaśyam anumāna abhāvāt pramāṇa antaram abhyupagantavyam iti āha liṅga iti

original: yadi tu nāstīti buddhireva liṅgamityucyate tanna /
analyzed: yadi tu na asti iti buddhiḥ eva liṅgam iti ucyate tat na
phalam hi sā
pratyakṣa ādi anutpādasya katham tat liṅgam
tad siddhi artham eva hi liṅgam iṣyate
tri lakṣaṇena yā buddhiḥ janyate sā anumeṣyate
na ca anutpatti rūpasya kāraṇa apekṣi tā kvacid
mānam katham abhāvaḥ ced prameyam ca asya kīdṛśam
meyaḥ yadvat abhāvaḥ hi mānam api evam iṣyatām
bhāva ātmake tathā meye na abhāvasya pramāṇa tā
tathā abhāva prameye pi na bhāvasya pramāṇa tā
siddhāyām tu buddhau kim liṅgena
tat etat āhana iti

original: yadi sā phalaṃ kiṃ tarhi pramāṇata āha--- tasyaiveti /
analyzed: yadi sā phalam kim tarhi pramāṇataḥ āha tasya eva iti

original: yasyaiva sā phalaṃ tadeva pratyakṣādyanutpatte' phalānantaryātpramāṇamiti //43//
analyzed: yasya eva sā phalam tat eva pratyakṣa ādi anutpatte phala ānantaryāt pramāṇam iti
kiñca saugata samaya siddha anumāna lakṣaṇa grantha anusāreṇa api na pratyakṣa ādya janmanaḥ numāna tvam iti āha tri lakṣaṇa iti
evam hi te paṭhanti
trirūpāt liṅga tortha dṛś anumānam iti
na ca anutpattiḥ utpatte prāgabhāvaḥ buddhe kenacid janyate
prāk eva tri lakṣaṇena hetunā iti
nanu ca hetu tayā anupalabdhiḥ anumānam iṣyate
na tu anumitiḥ anumānam iti bhāva sādhanatayā
atas kim tad nirāsena
satyam ahetu tayā tāvat anumāna tvam nirākṛtam eva
anena tu lakṣaṇa ananta pātaḥ varṇyate iti
atra codayati mānam iti
pramāṇa tā hi bhāva ātmanā vyāptā pratyakṣa ādiṣu avagatā
tad nivṛttyā nivartyate iti
itaraḥ tu varṇitaḥ sma ābhi prāgbhāva nāma saṅkaraḥ caturdhā
na ca bhāva bodha vailakṣaṇyam upalabhyate
bādha viraha sāmānyāt

original: sa ca prāmāṇye kāraṇaṃ na bhāvasvarūpatā /
analyzed: sa ca prāmāṇye kāraṇam na bhāva svarūpa tā

original: sā tu prāmāṇyaṃ pratyaprayojikaiva kathañcitteṣu saṅgatā,
analyzed: sā tu prāmāṇyam prati aprayojikā eva kathañcid teṣu saṅga tā
atas na abhāva tvena aprāmāṇyam bhavati
bhāve tu prameye tat apramāṇam eva iti abhiprāyeṇa āha prameyam iti
anurūpam eva idam yat abhāve bhāva pramāṇam iti āha meyaḥ iti

original: yathā bhāvātmake meye 'bhāva' pramāṇaṃ nānurūpaṃ tathā tadabhāve bhāva ityāha--- bhāvātmaka iti //46//
analyzed: yathā bhāva ātmake meye bhāva pramāṇam na anurūpam tathā tad abhāve bhāvaḥ iti āha bhāva ātmake iti

original: bhāvātmakasya mānatvaṃ na ca rājājñayā sthitam /
analyzed: bhāva ātmakasya māna tvam na ca rāja ājñayā sthitam
pariccheda phala tvāt hi prāmāṇyam syāt dvayoḥ api
yadi ca asya pramāṇa tvam abhāva tvena na iṣyate
vastuna kāraṇa tvam hi dṛṣṭam iti abhimāni tā
na liṅga tva prameya tve bhavetām tadvat eva hi

original: tathā sati ca pūrvokto vyavahāro na sidhyati // Msv_5,8.49 //
analyzed: tathā sati ca pūrvoktaḥ vyavahāraḥ na sidhyati
pramāṇānām anutpatteḥ na abhāvasya ca dharma tā

original: yatrābhāvo 'sti tenāsyā' sambandho naiva vidyate // Msv_5,8.50 //
analyzed: yatra abhāvaḥ sti tena asyāḥ sambandhaḥ na eva vidyate

original: yo na sannihitastatra tasya dharmo bhavediyam /
analyzed: yaḥ na sannihitaḥ tatra tasya dharmaḥ bhavet iyam

original: na ca tasya prameyatvaṃ dharmadharmitvavarjanāt // Msv_5,8.51 //
analyzed: na ca tasya prameya tvam dharma dharmi tva varjanāt
na bhāva tmakam eva pramāṇam iti rājājñā

original: yadeva tu paricchedaphalaṃ tadeva tu pramāṇam,
analyzed: yat eva tu pariccheda phalam tat eva tu pramāṇam
tat ca pratyakṣa ādya janmanaḥ api samānam iti āha bhāva ātmakasya iti
syāt etat vastunaḥ eva prāmāṇya darśanāt na avastunaḥ pramāṇa tvam iti

original: tathā ca sati bauddhānāmapi liṅga prameyatve na syātām,
analyzed: tathā ca sati bauddhānām api liṅga prameya tve na syātām

original: te 'pi hi nāvastuno dṛṣṭe ityāha-- yadīti sārdhena /
analyzed: te hi na avastunaḥ dṛṣṭe iti āha yadi iti sārdhena
anujñāne doṣam āha tathā sati iti

original: na ca syād vyavahāro 'yamiti kāraṇādivibhāgenokto vyavahāra ityartha' //48,49//
analyzed: na ca syāt vyavahāraḥ yam iti kāraṇa ādi vibhāgena uktaḥ vyavahāraḥ iti artha
apakṣa dharma tvāt api pratyakṣa ādi anutpattiḥ na liṅgam iti āha pramāṇānām iti
na abhāve pakṣīkṛte pratyakṣa ādi anutpattiḥ tad dharma tayā avagamyate
abhāvena sambandha abhāvat iti abhiprāyaḥ iti
nanu abhāva viśiṣṭam bhū talam sādhayiṣyāma

original: tacca pūrvavagatamiti taddharmo bhaviṣyatītyata āha--- yatreti /
analyzed: tat ca pūrva avagatam iti tad dharmaḥ bhaviṣyati iti atas āha yatra iti
na hi bhū tale pratyakṣa anutpatti
jñāyamāna tvāt tasya iti

original: ghaṭasya tarhi dharmo bhaviṣyati tadgocare pratyakṣādīnāmanutpatterata āha---yaiti /
analyzed: ghaṭasya tarhi dharmaḥ bhaviṣyati tad gocare pratyakṣa ādīnām anutpatteḥ atas āha yā eti
satyam

original: yatra pratyakṣādīni notpadyante taddharmatā kathañcid bhavedapi,
analyzed: yatra pratyakṣa ādīni nā utpadyante tad dharma tā kathañcid bhavet api
na tu asau iha pramīyate
dharma dharmi tvayoḥ abhāvāt
na hi
abhāvena tu sambandhaḥ bhavet tad viṣaya tvataḥ

original: tajjñānād viṣaytavaṃ ca jñāne meyaṃ na vidyate // Msv_5,8.52 //
analyzed: tad jñānāt ca jñāne meyam na vidyate
saṃyoga samavayā ādi sambandhaḥ na eva vidyate

original: nāgṛhīte hi dharmatvaṃ gṛhīte siddhasādhanam // Msv_5,8.53 //
analyzed: na a gṛhīte hi dharma tvam gṛhīte siddha sādhanam
abhāva śabda vācya tva apratyakṣa ādeḥ ca bhidyate
pramāṇānām abhāvaḥ hi
abhāvaḥ pi pramāṇena sva anurūpeṇa mīyate

original: prameyatvād yathā bhāvastasmād bhāvātmakāt pṛthak // Msv_5,8.55 //
analyzed: prameya tvāt yathā bhāvaḥ tasmāt bhāva ātmakāt pṛthak

original: karmāṇi sarvāṇi phalai' samastai' sarvairyathāvacca yadaṅgakāraṇḍai' /
analyzed: karmāṇi sarvāṇi phalaiḥ samastaiḥ sarvaiḥ yathāvat ca yad aṅga kāraṇḍaiḥ

original: na saṅgatānīha parasparaṃ hi nāṅgaṃ tadetatprabhavaṃ kratūnām // Msv_5,8.56 //
analyzed: na saṅgatāni iha parasparam hi nā aṅgam tat etat prabhavam kratūnām
tad dharmiṇam kṛtvā abhāva viśiṣṭa tā sādhyate tasya apratīte
nā api tad viśiṣṭam bhū tala ādi
tadānīm tasya tatra abhāvāt iti

original: abhāvasya tu sādharmo bhaviṣyati tadviṣayatvāt tasyā' /
analyzed: abhāvasya tu sādharmaḥ bhaviṣyati tad viṣaya tvāt tasyāḥ

original: abhāve hi prameye sā liṅgaṃ bhavatyeva /
analyzed: abhāve hi prameye sā liṅgam bhavati eva
kintu na asrañcetitaḥ bhāvaḥ viṣayaḥ bhaviṣyati
jñāte ca prameya abhāvaḥ iti āha abhāvena iti
anyaḥ tu na kaścid abhāvena anutpatte sambandha prakāraḥ vidyate
yena tad dharma tām anugamya anumānam bhaviṣyati iti āha saṃyogaḥ eti
itas ca apakṣa dharma tvam iti āha na agṛhīte iti
na hi agṛhīte parvate dhūḥ tad dharma tayā avagamyate
atha tadvat abhāvaḥ pi prāk pratīyate iti ucyate
siddham tarhi sādhyate iti

original: evaṃ pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ prasādhitaṃ bhedaṃ prayogeṇa darśayati---abhāvaśabdeti //54//
analyzed: evam pratyakṣa anumānābhyām prasādhitam bhedam prayogeṇa darśayati abhāva śabda iti
prayoga antaram āha
atas siddham bhāva ātmakāt pramāṇāt anya tvam abhāvasya iti upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
veda upayogam abhāvasya darśayati karmāṇi iti
yaḥ yam sarva karmaṇām phala asaṅkara paraspara asaṅkaraḥ ca
na asau abhāva prāmā
yukti āgamābhyām iha tarkitaḥ yam pramāṇa ṣaṭakam pravibhajya bhāṣye

original: tato 'dhikaṃ yad dvayamiṣṭamanyairbhedo na tasyetyapi siddhametat // Msv_5,8.57 //
analyzed: tatas dhikam yat dvayam iṣṭam anyaiḥ bhedaḥ na tasya iti api siddham etat

original: iha bhavati śatādau sambhavādyā sahasrānmatiraviyutabāvāt sānumānādabhinnā /
analyzed: iha bhavati śata ādau sambhava ādyā sahasrāt matiḥ a viyuta bāvāt sa anumānāt abhinnā

original: jagati bahu na tathyaṃ nityamaitihyamuktaṃ bhavati tu yadi satyaṃ nāgamād bhidyate tat // Msv_5,8.58 //
analyzed: jagati bahu na tathyam nityam aitihyam uktam bhavati tu yadi satyam na āgamāt bhidyate tat
ṇyāt ṛte sidhyati iti
yathā iti
yāvat tāvat yathāvat iti iha iti
vedam pratinirdeśaḥ iti
nanu ca vyāsa mata anusāriṇā upamāna atiriktam pramāṇa dvayam upavarṇitam
ṛṣiṇā ca sambhava aitihyayoḥ api pramāṇa tvam āśritam
tad parityāge kāraṇam vaktavyam atas āha yukti iti
pramāṇa ṣaṭakam eva hi yuktyā saṅgacchate
āgama anugataḥ ca
āgamaḥ ca mīmāṃsā tantram

original: ato yuktyāgamābhyāmiha śābare bhāṣye pramāṇaṣaṭkameva pravivicya tarkitam /
analyzed: atas yukti āgamābhyām iha śābare bhāṣye pramāṇa ṣaṭkam eva pravivicya tarkitam
yat tu dvayam adhikam iṣṭam tat atra eva antargatam iti
punar tasya antargatiḥ atas āha eha bhavati iti

original: yā tāvat sahasrācchate mati' sambhavākhyaṃ pramāṇamiṣyate sānumānānna bhidyate /
analyzed: yā tāvat sahasrāt śate mati sambhava ākhyam pramāṇam iṣyate sa anumānāt na bhidyate
sahasrāt śatam aviyuti bhāvāt avinābhāvāt avagamyate
atas tāvat anumānāt na bhidyate
aitihya pramāṇam uktam tāvat asatyam eva
nidhi prāpti asura kanyā vaśīkaraṇa ādi
draupadī pañcabhartṛkā ityādi
yadi tat satyam tad āgamāt na bhidyate
āpta āgamaḥ hi asau
uktam ca puruṣa uktiḥ api śrotuḥ āgama tvam prapadyate iti
atas numāna āgamayoḥ antarbhāvāt na sambhava aitihyayoḥ pṛthak upanyāsa siddha
iti upādhyāya sucaritamiśra kṛtau kāśikā
ṭīkāyām abhāva pariccheda samāpta
atha citrākṣepa
para loka phalā pūrvam ākṣiptāḥ codanā parai
idānīm aihika ākṣepa sūtra kāreṇa vā ucyate
bhāṣya pāṭhaḥ vicārya
atra bhāṣyam nanu bhavantu anyāni pramāṇāni
śabdaḥ tu na pramāṇam kutas
animittam vidyamāna upalambhana tvāt iti

original: asyārtha'--- yadyapi sarvapramāṇāvyabhicārānna pramāṇasāmānayabhāvinā dharmeṇa śabdo 'pi na pramāṇam,
analyzed: asya artha yadi api sarva pramāṇa avyabhicārāt na pramāṇa sāmānaya bhāvinā dharmeṇa na pramāṇam
viśeṣeṇa tu ātma bhāvinā dharmeṇa apramāṇam

original: tathā hi citrayā paśavo bhāvyanta iti citrayā yajetetyasyāratha' /
analyzed: tathā hi citrayā paśavaḥ bhāvyante iti citrayā yajeta iti asya aratha
kṛta citrasya api yajamānasya anantaram avikala sakala indriyaiḥ api paśavaḥ na dṛśyante
tat na nūnam iṣṭi paśu phalā iti bhavati
tat idam uktam animittam vidyamāna upalambhana tvāt iti

original: kimuktaṃ bhavati--- upalambhanāni hi cakṣurādīni paśūnāṃ vidyante /
analyzed: kim uktam bhavati upalambhanāni hi cakṣuḥ ādīni paśūnām vidyante
na ca paśu kāma iṣṭyam antaram paśavaḥ upalabhyante
tasmāt ukta visaṃvādāt apramāṇam citrā codanā iti
sa punar ayam ākṣepaḥ gata arthaḥ upalakṣyate
codanā sūtre hi nanu atathābhūtam ityādinā bhāṣyakāreṇa ākṣepa parihārau uktau
punar uktam idam iti āśaṅkya āha para loke iti

original: asyārtha' paralokaphalā hi tatra svargakāmo yajetetyevamādicodanā vedabāhyaboddhādiparamatenākṣiptā' /
analyzed: asya artha para loka phalā hi tatra svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti evamādi codanā veda bāhya boddha ādi para matena ākṣiptā
idānīm aihika phalāḥ citra ādi codanāḥ ākṣipyante

original: nanūbhayīmapi codanāmākṣeptuṃ śakyata eva vākyatvādayo hetava' /
analyzed: nanu ubhayīm api codanām ākṣeptum śakyate eva vākya tva ādayaḥ hetavaḥ

original: ta eva tatra bhāṣyakāreṇa 'yat kiñcana laukikaṃ vanacam' iti darśayatāntarṇītā' /
analyzed: te eva tatra bhāṣyakāreṇa yat kiñcana laukikam vanacam iti darśayatā antarṇītā

original: vārtikakṛtāpi---'yadi vā puruṣādhīnaprāmāṇyā' sarvacodanā' iti vivṛtā' /
analyzed: vārtika kṛtā api yadi vā puruṣa adhīna prāmāṇyā sarva codanā iti vivṛtā
tasmāt asat etat para loka phalāḥ eva tatra ākṣiptāḥ iti
yat api ced anīma aihika ākṣepaḥ iti uktam tat ayuktam

original: ihāpi ca---'evaṃ dṛṣṭāpacārasya vedasya svargādyapi phalaṃ nāstīti manyāmaha' iti sarvākṣepa' kṛta' /
analyzed: iha api ca evam dṛṣṭa apacārasya vedasya svarga ādi api phalam na asti iti manyāmahe iti
vārtikakāreṇa api ca
evam sati agnihotra ādi vākyeṣu api mṛṣārtha tā
iti vadatā

kā iyam vyavasthā
atra ucyate

citrā paśu phala tva ādi viṣayāḥ codanāḥ mṛṣā
pratyakṣa ādi adhikāre pitaiḥ artha asaṅgatiḥ yata
idānīm tuśabda śakti parāmarśa dvāreṇa abhyantarāḥ eva hetavaḥ upapatsyante

ānantaryam anuktam ced na sāmarthya avabodhanāt
iti

tat yadi api na iṣṭiḥ ananta phalā iti śruti
tathā api artha sāmarthyāt atat avagamyate

original: kathamaparathā'yadāsau vidyamānāsīt tadā palaṃ na dattavatī,
analyzed: katham aparathā ayadā asau vidyamānā āsīt tadā palam na dattavatī

original: kālāntare punarasatī kathaṃ dāsyati' iti na ca paśavo 'nantasamabhavadbhāvanā',
analyzed: kāla antare punar asatī katham dāsyati iti na ca paśavaḥ nanta samabhavat bhāvanā
svargaḥ hi nānā ākṣipta viśiṣṭa deha indriya ādi parigrahaḥ bhavitum utsahate
atas mā abhūt anantaram

original: amī puna' paśava' sambhavanti yajamānasyātraiveti svahetusamanantaramanupalabhyamānā dṛṣṭapratigrahādihetvantarā' śrutacitrādiphalatayā na  #
analyzed: amī puna paśava sambhavanti yajamānasya atra eva iti sva hetu samanantaram anupalabhyamānāḥ dṛṣṭa pratigraha ādi hetu antarā śruta citra ādi phala tayā na
śakyante vagantum

original: ayameva tu śabdaśaktiparāmarśo vārtikakṛtā tārkikaprakriyāmanuvidadhānena 'na vā paśuphale'tyādinā sādhanaprayogairupadarśita' /
analyzed: ayam eva tu śabda śakti parāmarśaḥ vārtika kṛtā tārkika prakriyām anuvidadhānena na vā paśu phala ityādinā sādhana prayogaiḥ upadarśita
tat evam aihika phalāsu citrā codanāsu ākṣiptāsu tad sāmānyāt itarāsu tathātvam iti punar api agnihotra ādi codana ākṣepe vatiṣṭhate
sa ca ayam aihika ākṣepa dvāreṇa apinā ucyate
atas eva ca aihika ākṣepaḥ iti uktam
etat uktam bhavati aihika phalānām āmuṣmika phalānām ca ayam aihika ākṣepa puraskāreṇa eva ākṣepa

original: yadāmuṣmikasvargādi tanmā nāma karmānantaramupalabhyatāmaihikaphalaṃ tu paśvādi kiṃ nopalabhyate,
analyzed: yat āmuṣmika svarga ādi tat mā nāma karma anantaram upalabhyatām aihika phalam tu paśu ādi kim nā upalabhyate

original: tanna nūnaṃ tat phalamiti aihikaphalakarmacodanāvyabhicāreṇānyāsāmapi paralokaphalānāṃ tatsāmānyādākṣepa' /
analyzed: tat na nūnam tat phalam iti aihika phala karma codana avyabhicāreṇa anyāsām api paraloka phalānām tad sāmānyāt ākṣepa

original: pūrvaṃ tu tā' parata' prāmāṇyamāśritya paroktairaiva vākyatvādibhirhetubhirākṣiptā' /
analyzed: pūrvam tu vākya tva ādibhiḥ hetubhiḥ ākṣiptā
tat uktam paraiḥ iti
parihāra antaram āha sūtra iti

original: ayamabhiprāya'--- codanāsūtre bhāṣyakṛtā sūtrakāreṇa vakṣyamāṇākṣepaparihārāvanāgatāvekṣaṇena pratijñāsamarthanārthabhupavarṇitau /
analyzed: codanā sūtre bhāṣyakṛtā sūtrakāreṇa vakṣyamāṇa ākṣepa parihārau anāgata avekṣaṇena pratijñā samarthana artha bhupavarṇitau

original: idānīṃ tu sūtrakāreṇa svayamevocyata iti tenedameva sarvacodanākṣepakṣetramityuktamiti //1//
analyzed: idānīm tu sūtrakāreṇa svayam evā ucyate iti tena idam eva sarva codanā ākṣepa kṣetram iti uktam iti
atra parihāre pūrva uktaḥ eva ākṣepa hetuḥ iti
tam upanyasyati citra iti phalāni ityantena
ayam artha citrā paśu phala tva ādi viṣayāḥ codanāḥ dharmiṇya
yadi īdṛś tat mṛṣā dṛṣṭam vipralipsoḥ yathā

original: nadītīre phalānīti tatrādṛsyāni tāni cet // Msv_5,9.3 //
analyzed: nadī tīre phalāni iti tatra adṛsyāni tāni ced

original: na vā paśuphalā citrā svakāle tadadānata' /
analyzed: na vā paśu phalā citrā sva kāle

original: snānabhujyādivat te 'pi tatsādhyā na bhavanti vā // Msv_5,9.4 //
analyzed: snāna bhujya ādi vat te tad sādhyāḥ na bhavanti vā
tad utpattau asadbhāvāt svarga tṛpti sukha ādi vat
vaidharmyeṇa ubhayatra api bhavetām sukha mardane
ānantaryam anuktam ced na sāmarthya avabodhanāt
