yathā uktam āpta uktiṣu nara apekṣā iti
prayoga antaram āha tad kṛtaḥ iti eva antena
vaidika vākya kṛta pratyaya samyak iti sādhyam
nitya vākya udbhava tvāt
yathā tad vākya svarūpa viṣayā
sā api hi vākyāt udbhavati
nirviṣaya budhi anutpatte
veda vākya nitya tā ca veda adhikaraṇe sthāpayiṣyate iti

original: atraiva sādhye pūrvoktā'--- 'nānyatvāt' iti bhāṣyavyākhyānāvasara uktā'--- doṣavarjitai' kāraṇai' janyamānatvāt,
analyzed: atra eva sādhye pūrva uktā na anya tvāt iti bhāṣya vyākhyāna avasare uktā doṣa varjitai kāraṇaiḥ janyamāna tvāt
an āpta a praṇīta ukti janya tvāt

original: deśādibhede 'pi deśādibhede 'pi bādhavarjanāt iti hetavo darśayitavyā ityāha--- atreti //2//
analyzed: deśa ādi bhede pi deśa ādi bhede pi bādha varjanāt iti hetavaḥ darśayitavyāḥ iti āha atra iti
atra bhāṣyam syāt etat
na eva śabdasya arthena sambandha
kutas sya pauruṣeya tā a pauruṣeya tā vā iti
tasya abhiprāyam āha

original: asyārtha'--- śabdārthasambandhānāṃ nityatvamāśrityānapekṣatvāditi sūtrakāreṇa yo hetu' svata' prāmāṇyasidhyarthamukta',
analyzed: asya artha śabda artha sambandhānām nitya tvam āśritya anapekṣa tvāt iti sūtrakāreṇa yaḥ prāmāṇya sidhi artham ukta

original: tena codanānāmaprāmāṇye nirākṛte 'dhunā sambandhodbhavatvābhāvena paro bauddhādirmithyātvamuktavān /
analyzed: tena codanānām aprāmāṇye nirākṛte dhunā sambandha udbhava tva abhāvena paraḥ bauddha ādiḥ mithyātvam uktavān

original: evaṃ ca tadā vārtikakāreṇa vṛttikāramatenātraiva svata' prāmāṇyaṃ vyutpādyamiti darśitam /
analyzed: evam ca tadā vārtikakāreṇa vṛtti kāra matena atra eva svata prāmāṇyam vyutpādyam iti darśitam

original: tathā ca 'sūtrakāreṇa cocyata' iti punaruktiparihāre parata' paprāmāṇyoktairevākṣepahetubhi' pūrvapakṣo 'bhihita' /
analyzed: tathā ca sūtrakāreṇa ca ucyate iti punarukti parihāre paratas pūrvapakṣaḥ bhihita

original: ihāpi ca bhāṣyakāreṇa 'brūta' ityucyate--- avabodhayati budhyamānasya nimittaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: iha api ca bhāṣyakāreṇa brūta iti ucyate avabodhayati budhyamānasya nimittam bhavati
ityādi codanā sūtra uktam eva svata prāmāṇya kāraṇam uktam iti
mithyātvasya nirāsa artham tad paraiḥ nā iṣyate dvayam

original: naiva vāstyatra sambandha' kṛtako veti vakṣyate //5//
analyzed: na eva vā asti atra sambandha kṛtakaḥ vā iti vakṣyate
asambhavena śeṣāṇām saṃśleṣa pariśipyate
tasmin eva ca sambandhe pratītiḥ laulikī dhruvam
etat eva vivṛṇoti sambandhaḥ iti vakṣyate ntena

original: codanāmithyārthanirāsārthaṃ hi sambamandhasadbhāvo nityatā ca heturukta' /
analyzed: codanā mithyā artha nirāsa artham hi sambamandha sadbhāvaḥ nitya tā ca hetuḥ ukta
tat ca dvayam api paraiḥ na iṣyate
tatra sambandha abhāvaḥ tāvat anena eva bhāṣyeṇa ukta
kṛtaka tvam tu yadi prathamam aśrutaḥ na pratyāyayati
kṛtakaḥ tarhi iti anena vakṣyate
tat atra sambandha abhāvena anapekṣa tvāt iti hetoḥ asiddhiḥ uktā
na ca asati sambandhe
para ukta artha pratītiḥ utpadyate iti darśitam
pratibandha bale hi artha antara darśinaḥ u pi artha antare jñānam utpadyate

original: anādṛtapratibandhastu yatkiñcid vidvān sa sarvaṃ jānīyādityatiprasajyata iti //4,5//
analyzed: an ādṛta pratibandhaḥ tu yat kiñcid vidvān sa sarvam jānīyāt iti atiprasajyate iti

original: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa kāryakāraṇabhāvādaya' sambandhā' śabdasyānupapannā ityuktvā saṃśleṣasambandhabhāva eva darśita',

tat etat vārtikakāraḥ darśayati asambhavena iti
nimitta naimittika āśraya āśrayi bhāva ādaya sambandhāḥ eva
kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tu boddha gandhi vaiyākaraṇaiḥ abhyupagataḥ eva
te pi āhu
śabdāḥ ca dṛśyante pratyakṣāḥ yadi api sphuṭam
abhidhāna abhidheyau tu jñāna ākārau tathā api na
iti

original: evaṃ hi manyante--- na tāvad varṇā' śabda',
analyzed: evam hi manyante na tāvat varṇāḥ śabda
pratyekam avacāka tvāt
ayugapad vartinām ca avayavi samudāya āsarambha anupapatte

original: ata eva gośabdatvādijātyasambhavāt bhūtādiviśeṣāṇāṃ ca pratiprayogamanyatvenāvācakatvād
analyzed: atas eva go śabda tva ādi jāti asambhavāt bhūta ādi viśeṣāṇām ca pratiprayogam anya tvena avācaka tvāt
varṇa buddhi smṛti saṃskārāṇām ca akṣara vat pratyākhyānāt pūrva varṇa janita saṃskāra sahita antya varṇasya api
varṇa tvena apūrva varṇa vat avācaka tvāt pūrva pūrva nikhila varṇa pada upasahāra krameṇa caramasya
kasyacid sphoṭa ātmanaḥ nava grahāt yugapad avasthita aneka varṇa ākāra jñāna ātmā eva śabda
jāti vyakti avayava avayavi guṇa guṇi vyatireka avyatireka ādi vikalpa dūrīkṛta ni
na sambhavati iti jñāna ātmaka śabda vedanā anantara utpadyamāna bāhya jāti ādi nirbhāspa ratyaya mātra ātmā eva
tad niṣedham atas prāha na
tad deśa anantara adṛṣṭeḥ vindhyaḥ himavatā yathā
evam arthaḥ dvayam vā api sādhanīyam asaṅgatam

śakti rūpam gṛhītvā āha saṃśleṣaḥ yadi vāryate
sambandha andha
siddha sādhya tvam atha sambandha mātrakam

original: sa cāyamevambhūtor'tha' śabdena janyata eveti kāryakāraṇabhāvameva śabdārthayo' sambandhamātiṣṭhante /
analyzed: sa ca ayam evambhūtaḥ ūrtha śabdena janyate eva iti kārya kāraṇa bhāvam eva śabda arthayoḥ sambandham ātiṣṭhante
tat ca idam ati dūram apabhraṣṭam
evam ca satya vidita sva rūpa śaktīnām api artha saṃvid upajāyeta

original: dṛṣṭā hi khalu mṛtsalilapracchannā api vrīhayo 'ṅkurādikāryamārabhamāṇā aviditasvarūpaśaktayo 'pīti sūktam--- asambhavena śeṣāṇāmiti /
analyzed: dṛṣṭāḥ hi khalu mṛd salila pracchannāḥ api vrīhayaḥ ṅkura ādi kāryam ārabhamāṇāḥ a vidita sva rūpa śaktayaḥ pi iti su uktam asambhavena śeṣāṇām iti
katham tu saṃśleṣa pariśiṣyate iti
pratīteḥ abhyupagamāt ca

original: gaurayamiti hi sāmānādhikaraṇyena śabdopaśliṣṭamarthamavayanto laukikā dṛśyante /
analyzed: gauḥ ayam iti hi sāmānādhikaraṇyena śabda upaśliṣṭam artham avayantaḥ laukikāḥ dṛśyante
abhyupagataḥ ca kaiścid śabda arthayoḥ saṃśleṣaḥ eva sambandha
prapañcitaḥ ca asau adhyāsa vādaḥ iti

original: laukikāśca prāyeṇa saṃśleṣameva saṃbandhaṃ manyante iti sa eva sambandha' prasakko nirākārya ityāha--- tasminniti prāhāyena bhavati sa taddeśa  #
analyzed: laukikāḥ ca prāyeṇa saṃśleṣam eva saṃbandham manyante iti saḥ eva sambandha prasakkaḥ nirākāryaḥ iti āha tasmin iti prāha āyena bhavati sa tad deśa
eva dṛśyate rañjuḥ iva ghaṭe
tad anantara deśe vā
na ca ca śabda arthayoḥ anyatara deśe vā anyataraḥ dṛśyate
atas himavat vindhyayoḥ iva na anayoḥ sambandhaḥ iti
arthaḥ vā pakṣīkāryaḥ iti āha evam iti

original: dvayaṃ vā parasparamasambaddhamitaretaradeśe tadanantaradeśe vādṛṣṭe' sādhyamityāha--- dvayamiti /
analyzed: dvayam vā parasparam asambaddham itaretara deśe tad anantara deśe vā adṛṣṭe sādhyam iti āha dvayam iti

original: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa 'syāccedarthena sambandha' kṣuramodakaśabdoccāraṇe mukhyasya pāṭanapūraṇe syātām', ityuktam /
analyzed: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa syāt ced arthena kṣura modaka śabda uccāraṇe mukhyasya pāṭana pūraṇe syātām iti uktam
tasya abhiprāyam āha kṣura iti uktam antena

original: asyārtha'--- atra bhāṣyakāreṇa śabdārthayo' sambnadhasiddhyarthaṃ taddeśānantarādṛṣṭeriti heturantarṇīta',
analyzed: asya arthaḥ atra bhāṣyakāreṇa śabda arthayoḥ tad deśa anantara adṛṣṭeḥ iti hetuḥ antarṇīta

original: taṃ ca gaurayamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyapratītibhramād yo nāmāsiddhaṃ manyate,
analyzed: tam ca gauḥ ayam iti sāmānādhikaraṇya pratīti bhramāt yaḥ nāma asiddham manyate
saḥ evam pratībodhyate yadi śabda arthayoḥ upaśleṣa
pitā putra ādi sambandhaiḥ anaikānta prasajyate
eka bhūmi ādi sambandhāt dṛṣṭānte sādhya hīna tā
vācya vācaka sambandha niṣedhe loka bādhanam
virodhaḥ ca sva vākyena na hi sambandha varjitaiḥ
lakṣaṇa sambandhaḥ bhavet
śabda deśaḥ eva syāt

original: mukhaṃ ca tasya deśa iti kṣuramodakaśabdoccāraṇe mukhasya pāṭanapūraṇe syātām,
analyzed: mukham ca tasya deśaḥ iti kṣura modaka śabda uccāraṇe mukhasya pāṭana pūraṇe syātām

original: na ca te sta'ṣa tasmānmodakādyarthakriyānupalambhācchabdadeśe taddeśānantarādṛṣṭeriti siddho hetu' /
analyzed: na ca te tasmāt modaka ādi arthakriyā anupalambhāt śabda deśe tad deśa anantara adṛṣṭeḥ iti siddhaḥ
sāmānādhikaraṇya buddhiḥ tu śabda arthayoḥ na asti eva
na hi nīlimnā iva anuraktam utpalam śabda anuraktam artham upalabhāmahe
gādi sāsnādimat rūpā hi tayoḥ buddhaḥ udeti
atra siddhāntabhāṣyam
vyapadiśati bhavān ityādi
tasya abhiprāyam āha atha iti hīna tā antena

original: atrāyamabhiprāya'---- pratyāyyapratyāyakaśaktirūpo hi na' śabdārthayo' sambandho 'bhipreta', tad yadi
analyzed: atra ayam abhiprāya pratyāyya pratyāyaka śakti rūpaḥ hi na śabda arthayoḥ sambandhaḥ tat yadi
saṃśleṣa lakṣaṇa sambandha abhāva sādhyate
tadā siddha sādhya tā doṣa
sambandha abhāva mātre tu yauna ādi sambandhaiḥ anaikāntika tvam
himavat vindhyoḥ api ca eka bhūmi ādi sambandhāt sādhya hīnaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti

original: yadi tu vācyavācakasambandhamevābhipretya na śabdār'thena saṅgata iti sādhyate tato laukikavirodha ityāha---vācyeti /
analyzed: yadi tu vācya vācaka sambandham eva abhipretya na śabda arthena saṅgataḥ iti sādhyate tatas laukika virodhaḥ iti āha vācya iti
dūṣaṇa antaram āha virodhaḥ iti
atra kāraṇam āha na hi iti para antena
caturvidhaḥ hi puruṣa
sandigdhaḥ viparyastaḥ ca iti
tatra pratipanna pratipādayitā
itare sāpekṣā pratipādyā
tad pratipādana arthā ca pratijñā

original: tadya eva teṣāmanyatama' para' pratipādayitumabhipreto bhavati sa eva vācyavācakasambandhavarjitai' pratijñārthagaucarai' padai' pratipādayitumaśakya',
analyzed: tat yaḥ eva teṣām anyatama para pratipādayitum abhipretaḥ bhavati saḥ eva vācya vācaka sambandha varjitai pratijñā artha gaucarai padai pratipādayitum aśakya

original: ata' pratijñāṃ prayuñjānairāśrita' śabādarthayorvācyavācakalakṣaṇasambandha iti tanninirākaraṇe svavāgvirodha iti /
analyzed: pratijñām prayuñjānaiḥ āśrita sva vāc virodhaḥ iti
sa ca ayam abhidhayā sva vāc virodha
pañcadhā hi
uccāraṇa abhidhā dharma dharmi ubhaya uktibhiḥ iti
pratijñā artham padaiḥ śakya pratipādayitum
abhidhāna kriyāyām hi karma tvam vācya saṃśritam

original: śabdānāṃ karaṇatvaṃ vā kartṛtvaṃ vā nirūpita' /

pratipattau upādānāt sāhitye ca vivakṣite
vācya vācaka sambandha svarūpam idānīm abhidyotayati abhidhāna iti

original: asyārtha'--- ekasyāmabhidhānakriyāyāṃ śabda' karaṇaṃ kartā vā,
analyzed: asya arthaḥ ekasyām abhidhāna kriyāyām śabda karaṇam kartā vā
vivakṣātaḥ kāraka pravṛtte
arthaḥ tu karma eva
a taḥ yada nayoḥ karma karaṇa tvam karma
kartṛ tvam vā

original: nirūpita'--- sambandha iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti /
analyzed: nirūpita sambandha iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti

original: yadvā--- ekasyāṃ gavādyarthapratipattau sādhyamānāyāmekena vaktropādīyamānāvaruṇaikahānīvadvivakṣitasāhityau śabdārtho yanniyamyete so 'nayo'  #
analyzed: yat vā ekasyām go ādi artha pratipattau sādhyamānāyām ekena vaktrā upādīyamānau aruṇa eka hānī vat vivakṣita sāhityau śabda arthaḥ yat niyamyete saḥ
sambandhaḥ iti āha pratipattau iti
upādānāt iti upādīyamāna tayā viśeṣaṇa vivakṣām darśayati

original: upādeyasya hi viśeṣaṇaṃ vivakṣitaṃ bhavati śorivaikatvaṃ--- paśunā yajeteti /
analyzed: upādeyasya hi viśeṣaṇam vivakṣitam bhavati śoḥ iva eka tvam paśunā yajeta iti
uddeśya viśeṣaṇam tu avivakṣitam bhavati

uddeśyāḥ hi grahā
teṣu saṃmārjana vidhānāt
iha ca artha pratipattau ekasyām upādeyau śabda arthau
paśuḥ iva yoge
atas sāhityam viśeṣaṇam iti aruṇa ekahāyanyoḥ iva anayoḥ niyama sambandhaḥ iti

samudāye hi tatra vākyam samāpyate
śabda arthau tu
na eva pratīti kriyāyām viśeṣa
ṇa taya a śrutau
katham anayoḥ sāhitya vivakṣā
na śrūyamāṇa tā viśeṣaṇa vivakṣā hetu
api tu artha saṃvyavahāraḥ hi
pāka ādau yat audana ādi sthālī ādi kriyā

original: vyavahāradarśanāt anabhihitamapyarthaṃ jānāti tadā sthālyādīnāṃ vivakṣitaṃ sāhityaṃ manyate,
analyzed: vyavahāra darśanāt anabhihitam api artham jānāti tadā sthālī ādīnām vivakṣitam sāhityam manyate
katathā manvāna svayam api paktu kāmaḥ tat sarvam āharati

original: evamihāpi bāla' prayojyavṛddhasya viviṣṭārthavyavahāradarśanena tadviṣayāṃ buddhimanumāya śabdānantarabhāvitayā śabdakāraṇatāṃ tādavavadhārayati
analyzed: evam iha api bāla prayojya vṛddhasya viviṣṭa artha vyavahāra darśanena tad viṣayām buddhim anumāya śabda anantara bhāvitayā śabda kāraṇatām
vaktuḥ ca asyām prayojya vṛddha pratipattau darśana pārārthyāt pradhāna bhūtāyām upā
dīyamānayoḥ śabda ārtayoḥ sāhityam vivakṣitam iti

original: evaṃ ca viditvā svayamapi parārthaprayoge sahitau śabdārthau hṛdayamāveśitāvupādāya
analyzed: evam ca viditvā svayam api para artha prayoge sahitau śabda arthau hṛdayam āveśitau upādāya

original: śabdaṃ coccārya parapratipattiṃ bhāvayatīti sūktaṃ sāhityavivakṣā varṇasāhityavivakṣāvaditi //12-13 1/2 //
analyzed: śabdam ca uccārya para pratipattim bhāvayati iti sūktam sāhitya vivakṣā varṇa sāhitya vivakṣāvat iti
niyamyete tad ekasyām sambandha
tatra yadi api asambandha kārakāṇām parasparam
tathā api yad kriyā tasyām upakārya upakāri tā
tad kriyā saṅgate paścāt sambandha kīrtyate tayoḥ

original: nanvevaṃ vadatā śabdārthayo' kriyāsambandha eva darśita',
analyzed: nanu evam vadatā śabda arthayoḥ kriyā sambandhaḥ eva darśita
na parasparam
guṇa pradhāna bhāvam antareṇa sambandha ayogāt

original: vakṣyati hi--- 'guṇānāṃ ca parārthatvādasambandha' samatvāt' iti /
analyzed: vakṣyati hi guṇānām ca parārtha tvāt asambandha sama tvāt iti
syāt etat

original: kriyākārakasambandhapūrvakatvāt sarvasambandhānāṃ kriyākārakasambandha eva darśita iti /
analyzed: kriyā kāraka sambandha pūrvaka tvāt sarva sambandhānām kriyā kāraka sambandhaḥ eva darśitaḥ iti

original: astu tāvat, taduttarakālabhāvī tu ko 'nayo' sambandha iti vācyameva /
analyzed: astu tāvat tad uttara kāla bhāvī tu kaḥ sambandhaḥ iti vācyam eva
tat etat sarvam anubhāṣya pariharati tatra iti
asya artha yadi api kārakāṇām pradhāna artha tvāt na paraspara sambandha
tathā api pratipatti abhidhānayoḥ yā kācid kriyā gṛhyate

original: tasyāṃ ca kriyākārakasambandhottarakālabhāvī parasparopakāryopakārakalakṣaṇa' śabdārthayorasti sambandha'//
analyzed: tasyām ca kriyā kāraka sambandha uttara kāla bhāvī paraspara upakārya upakāraka lakṣaṇa śabda arthayoḥ asti sambandha
tat punar idam pūrva apara viruddham pradeśa antara viruddham ca

original: tathāhi --- atra tāvadekasyāṃ kriyāyāmupakāryopakārakatvaṃ śabdārthayo' sambandha ityuktam,
analyzed: tathā hi atra tāvat ekasyām kriyāyām upakāryā upakāraka tvam śabda arthayoḥ sambandhaḥ iti uktam
pratipattau upādānāt iti kriyā anumāna aṅga tvam eva paraspara niyama ātmakaḥ sambandhaḥ iti uktam
pradeśa antare śaktiḥ eva sambandhaḥ iti vakṣyati
kvacid ca śabda śakti niyamam eva sambandham āha
vācya vācaka śaktyoḥ ca niyama phala lakṣaṇaḥ iti
anyatra api uktam
eka abhidhā nimit tvam karma kartṛ tvayoḥ ca yat
yaḥ vā karaṇa krama tva niyamaḥ bhidhayā ekayā

prayogāt para sāmānye sati ca api aprayogata
sāsnā ādi ekārtha sambandhi go tva mātrasya vācaka
go śabdaḥ iti vijñānam anvaya vyatireka jam
tasmāt gamaka tā eva ādau abhidhāyaka tā
tad nimitta iti
sambandha niyamaḥ yam tu yā avinābhāvitā ucyate
sambandha grahaṇāt pūrvam yasmāt na gamayati atas
gavā ādeḥ nā abhidhā śaktiḥ devadatta pade yathā
anvaya vyatireka ābhāyam vākya jñāḥ tu viviñcate iti uktam
tau anvaya vyatirekau darśayati tatra iti dvayena
tatra sāmānye gavādau

original: gośabdasya bahulaṃ prayogāt tadviśeṣeṣu ca śābaleyādiṣu asatsvapi bāhuleyādiṣu proya(gā?ga)
analyzed: go śabdasya bahulam prayogāt tad viśeṣeṣu ca śābaleya ādiṣu asatsu api bāhuleya ādiṣu

original: darśanāt parasāmānye ca sattādau satyapi bhāvāntare 'prayogāt sāsnādibhi' sahaikāvayavirūpārthasamnabdhigotvamātrasya
analyzed: darśanāt para sāmānye ca sattā ādau sati api bhāva antare prayogāt sāsnā ādibhiḥ saha eka avayavi rūpa artha samnabdhi go tva mātrasya

original: gośabdo vācaka ityanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ jñānaṃ janyate sāsnādyekārthasambandhīti cāvinābhāvinā
analyzed: go śabdaḥ vācakaḥ iti anvaya vyatirekābhyām jñānam janyate sāsnādi eka artha sambandhi iti ca avinābhāvinā
cihnena go tvam upalakṣayati iti

original: ata' siddhaṃ gamyagamakabhāva eva śabdārthayo' sambandha' prathamamavagamyate na punaravinābhāva iti //29-30 1/2//
analyzed: atas siddham gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ eva śabda arthayoḥ sambandha prathamam avagamyate na punar avinābhāvaḥ iti
upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
nanu saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandhaḥ bhāṣyakāreṇa ukta

original: na ca gamakaṃ saṃjñeti laukikā manyante,
analyzed: na ca gamakam saṃjñā iti laukikāḥ manyante
na hi agneḥ dhūma saṃjñā iti ucyate
atas āha abhidhāyaka tā iti
ayam abhiprāyaḥ asya arthaṃsya ayam gamakaḥ iti jñāte
na a vyāpriyamāṇasya avagatau kāraṇa tvam upapadyate iti tad vyāpāraḥ vasīyate
śabda vyāpāraḥ ca abhidhā iti ucyate
atas tra abhidhāna kriyā sambandhāt gamaka tvasya eva viśeṣaḥ abhidhāyaka tā śabde jñāyate
abhidhāyaka tā eva saṃjñā tvam iti upapanna saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandhaḥ iti
avinābhāvi tā tu sambandha niyama
na sambandhaḥ iti āha sambandha iti
idam ca niṣkṛṣṭa arthe niyamyate iti atra uktam asmābhi
tasmāt iti pada anuṣaṅgeṇa upasaṃhṛtam iti vedi
yathā eva gamaka śabdaḥ vyavahārāt pratīyate
tathā eva śakti vijñānam tasya upāyaḥ vagamyate
sva rūpa grahaṇam ca asya yathā vyāpriyate phale
tathā sambandha vijñānam bhavet
tavyam
anvaya vyatireka abhāva śabdau na artha bhedaḥ śaṅkitavyaḥ iti
yadi pratyāyakaḥ iti bhāṣyakāreṇa prayogaḥ
tam āha sambandha iti

original: devadattādayo hi yadṛcchāśabdā yatraiva saṅketyate tameva pratīpādayanti /
analyzed: devadatta ādayaḥ hi yadṛcchā śabdāḥ yatra eva saṅketyate tam eva pratīpādayanti
na ca eṣām kvacid api svābhāvikī
tat ayam prayoga artha go ādi śabdaḥ dharmī
na abhidhā śaktaḥ iti sādhyam
upāya antara apekṣa tvāt iti hetu
yat upāya antara apekṣam tat na svarūpataḥ śaktam
devadatta ādi padam iva saṅketa grahaṇa apekṣam iti

original: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa 'yadi pratyāyaka' śabda' prathamaśruta' kiṃ na pratyāyayati' iti
analyzed: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa yadi pratyāyaka śabda prathama śruta kim na pratyāyayati iti

original: paricodya 'sarvatra no darśanaṃ pramāṇam' ityādinā darśanabalena gṛhītaśaktika' pratyāyayatīti parihāra ukta',
analyzed: paricodya sarvatra naḥ darśanam pramāṇam ityādinā darśana balena gṛhīta śaktika pratyāyayati iti parihāraḥ ukta
tat darśayati yathā eva iti
asārtha gamaka tvam eva tāvat śabdasya kim abhyupagamyate
vyavahāra darśana balena iti ced
samānam idam śkati saṃvedane pi
na hi avidita śaktayaḥ śabdāt artham avayantaḥ dṛśyante iti

original: syādetat--- prakāśakā' pradīpādayo 'viditasambandhā api svārthaṃ prakāśayanto dṛśyante,
analyzed: syāt etat pradīpa ādayaḥ vidita sambandhāḥ api sva artham prakāśayantaḥ dṛśyante
tad vidharmā ca śabda
atas na prakāśakaḥ iti
tat ca na evam
śakti vailakṣaṇyāt
vicitra śaktayaḥ pi hi bhāvāḥ
prakāśayatu nāma
na etāvatā śabdena api tad dharmeṇa bhavitavyam
atas yama paryanuyoga

original: api ca vrīhyādayo 'gṛgītasvarūpā api kāryamārabhanta eveti śabde taddharma' kiṃ nāropyate /
analyzed: api ca vrīhi ādayaḥ gṛgīta svarūpāḥ api kāryam ārabhante eva iti śabde tad dharma kim nā āropyate
kāraka hetavaḥ hi vrīhi ādayaḥ
śabdaḥ tu jñāpaka hetu
atas pekṣate svarūpa grahaṇam iti ced

original: kena vedamājñāpitaṃ jñāpakena svarūpagrahaṇamapekṣitavyaṃ na sambandhagrahaṇamiti,
analyzed: kena vā idam ājñāpitam jñāpakena svarūpa grahaṇam apekṣitavyam na sambandha grahaṇam iti
darśana balena iti ced
samānam idam sambandha grahaṇa ape
yat sādhakatama tvena kasyacid kiñcid ucyate
tasya anugrāhaka apekṣā na sva śakti vighātinī

original: na hi tatkāṇaṃ loke vede vā kiñcidīdṛśam /
analyzed: na hi tat kāṇam loke vede vā kiñcid īdṛśam
itikartavya tā sādhye yasya na anugrahe rthitā
pratyātma niyata tvāt ca yathā eva karaṇam bhavet

original: bāhyāntaravibhāgena kvacit syād vā vivakṣayā // Msv_5,9.38 //
analyzed: bāhya antara vibhāgena kvacid syāt vā vivakṣayā
udvignaḥ hi andhakāreṇa kaścid evam bravīti api

original: kiṃ cakṣuṣā mamaitena dṛṣṭaṃ dīpena yanmayā // Msv_5,9.39 //
analyzed: kim cakṣuṣā mama etena dṛṣṭam dīpena yat mayā

original: kṣāyāmapi, darśanabalādeva hi liṅgaśabdādayo jñāpakaviśeṣā' sambandhagrahaṇamapekṣante /
analyzed: kṣāyām api darśana balāt eva hi liṅga śabda ādayaḥ jñāpaka viśeṣā sambandha grahaṇam apekṣante
na cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ
sarvatra hi naḥ darśanam pramāṇam
kārakāḥ cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ iti na anumanyāmahe
jñāna kāraṇasya eva jñāpaka tvāt
tat etat āha svarūpa iti

original: nanu ca sambandhagrahaṇāt prāgapyabhidhāne śabda' śakto na vā /
analyzed: nanu ca sambandha grahaṇāt prāk api abhidhāne śabda śaktaḥ na vā
yadi śakta kim sambandha grahaṇa apekṣayā
na ced
sambandha grahaṇam eva hi sat āgama nyāyena kāraṇam āpadyeta
atas āha yat sādhakatamā iti
na tāvat sambandha grahaṇāt pūrvam aśaktam eva śabdam avagacchāma
na ca śaktasya anugrāhaka apekṣā sva śaktim viharati inti iti
kim punar na vihanti atas āha na hi iti

original: yadi hyanugrāhakāpekṣā svaśaktiṃ vihanyāt sarvameva laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ karaṇaṃ karaṇatāṃ jahyāt /
analyzed: yadi hi anugrāhaka apekṣā sva śaktim vihanyāt sarvam eva laukikam vaidikam karaṇam karaṇa tām jahyāt
apekṣate hi sarvam eva karaṇam itikartavya tā janitam anugraham iti

original: kiñca--- astu tāvaditikartavyatāpekṣā karaṇabhāvaṃ na vihantīti,
analyzed: kiñca astu tāvat itikartavyatā apekṣā karaṇa bhāvam na vihanti iti
pratyuta tayā api nā eva karaṇa tvam nā asti
pratikaraṇa svarūpam tad apekṣā niyamāt iti āha pratyātma iti
nanu evam ubhaya samavadhānam eva antareṇa kārya aniṣpatte katham karaṇa itikartavya tā vibhāgaḥ darśayitavya

original: ata āha--- bāhyāntareti bāhyamapi kvacid vivakṣāta' kārakapravṛtte' karaṇatayā vivakṣyata ityāha--- kvacitsyādveti //38//
analyzed: atas āha bāhya antara iti bāhyam api kvacid kāraka pravṛtte karaṇatayā vivakṣyate iti āha kvacid syāt vā iti
nitya vṛttau tu nā andhānām dṛṣṭiḥ dīpa śataiḥ api
rūpa ādi darśane yasmāt tasmāt cakṣu prakāśakam
śarīra ātma manaḥ yogāt asādharaṇa tā balāt
vijñāna āsatti bhāvāt ca cakṣu karaṇam iṣyate
tathā evā iha api sambandha jñānam aṅgam prasiddhita

original: gauravāt karaṇatvena mataṃ cet kena vāryate // Msv_5,9.42 //
analyzed: gauravāt karaṇa tvena matam ced kena vāryate
yathā cakṣuḥ iti idam tu vyabhicāri tvam ucyate
devadatte ca avyaktām śaktim icchanti yuktitaḥ
etat eva darśayati udvignaḥ iti
jñāna utpattau antaraṅgam api cakṣuḥ na karaṇatayā manyate

original: kintu kitaścittāratamyaviśeṣād bāhyameva pradīpaṃ karaṇatayā vivakṣatīti //39//
analyzed: kintu kitas cit tāratamya viśeṣāt bāhyam eva pradīpam karaṇa tayā vivakṣati iti
sa ca ayam

original: nityavṛttau nityaṃ tu kāryasiddhau āntarasya takṣuṣa' karaṇatvamavagamyata ityāha---nityavṛttāviti /
analyzed: nitya vṛttau nityam tu kārya siddhau āntarasya takṣuṣa karaṇa tvam avagamyate iti āha nitya vṛttau iti
andhānām dṛṣṭiḥ darśanam na asti iti artha
nanu astu vijñāna kārya āsatti viśeṣaṇāt pradīpa ādi apekṣayā cakṣuṣa karaṇa bhāva
ātma mana saṃyogaḥ tu jñāna utpattau atyantam āsan

original: ata' kathaṃ tadapekṣayā cakṣuṣa' karaṇatvaṃ bhaviṣyatītyata āha---śarīreti /
analyzed: katham tad apekṣayā cakṣuṣa karaṇa tvam bhaviṣyati iti atas āha śarīra iti
ayam abhiprāya na āsatti viśeṣaḥ eva karaṇa tve kāraṇam
api tarhi bāhya pradīpa ādi apekṣayā āsatti
ābhyantara ātma mana saṃyoga apekṣayā tu asādhāraṇyam

original: ātmamana' saṃyogo hi rasādijñānasādhāraṇo nāvyabhicāritayā rūpadarśanakāraṇamiti
analyzed: ātma mana saṃyogaḥ hi rasa ādi jñāna sādhāraṇaḥ na avyabhicāri tayā rūpa darśana kāraṇam iti
śakyate vagantum sa cakṣuṣa punar asādharaṇa tayā eva rūpa jñāne kāraṇa tvam iti cakṣuḥ rūpa ādi bhedaḥ tu
iti atra uktam iti
tat evam dṛṣṭānte vivakṣā āsana nikarṣa viśeṣa kṛta karaṇa iti kartavya tā vibhāgam darśayitvā prakṛte yojayati tathā eva iti

original: anena yattadāgamanyāyena sambandhagrahaṇameva kāraṇamāpadyetetyuktaṃ tadapi vivakṣāviśeṣavaśenāstviti darśitamiti //42//
analyzed: anena yat tad āgama nyāyena sambandha grahaṇam eva kāraṇam āpadyeta iti uktam tat api vivakṣā viśeṣa vaśena astu iti darśitam iti

original: aparamapi--- 'yathā cakṣurdraṣṭṭana bāhyena prakāśena vinā' ityādi parihārabhāṣyaṃ,
analyzed: aparam api yathā bāhyena prakāśena vinā ityādi parihāra bhāṣyam
tasya abhiprāyam āha yathā iti
cakṣuḥ hi pradīpa ādi upāya antarā
prakāśe sthite bāhye na andhaiḥ rūpam pratīyate
phala ānantaryataḥ ca api cakṣu karaṇam iṣyate
puruṣa adhīna vijñānaḥ tebhyaḥ prāk anirūpitaḥ

original: ya' saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandha' sa ceṣṭaśced dhruvaṃ kṛta' // Msv_5,9.45 //
analyzed: saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha sa ca iṣṭaḥ ced dhruvam
bhinna deśa ādi adhiṣṭhānāt yathā rajju ghaṭa ādiṣu

original: samaṃ nāstyanayo' kiñcit tenāsaṅgatatā svata' // Msv_5,9.46 //
analyzed: samam kiñcid tena asaṅga tatā
rūpa prakāśane svabhāvataḥ śaktam iti anaikāntikaḥ
dṛṣṭāntaḥ api sādhya vikalaḥ iti āha devadatta iti

original: yadṛcchāśabdānāmapi jñānasāmarthyaṃ vidyamānameva niyogenābhivyajyata ityadhyāsavāde varṇitam /
analyzed: yadṛcchā śabdānām api jñāna sāmarthyam vidyamānam eva niyogena abhivyajyate iti adhyāsa vāde varṇitam

original: atra ca yathā cakṣuriti bhāṣye cakṣuṣa' karaṇatvamityatropapattimāha---prakāśaiti /
analyzed: atra ca yathā cakṣuḥ iti bhāṣye cakṣuṣaḥ karaṇa tvam iti atra upapattim āha prakāśa eti
idam ca nitya vṛttau iti atra uktam api adhunā bhāṣya samarthana artham uktam iti apaunaruktyam iti

original: tadevamupapādita' saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandha' kṛtakatvena bhāṣyakṛtākṣipta'--- 'yadi prathamaśruto na pratyāyayati kṛtakastarhi' iti,
analyzed: tat evam upapādita saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha kṛtaka tvena bhāṣyakṛtā ākṣipta yadi prathama śrutaḥ na pratyāyayati kṛtakaḥ tarhi iti
tat etat vārtikakāraḥ darśayati puruṣa iti

original: evaṃ cātra prayoga'--- ya' saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandha' sa kṛtaka',
analyzed: evam ca atra prayoga yaḥ saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha sa kṛtakaḥ
puruṣa apekṣa tvāt
rajju ghaṭa saṃyoga vat iti
aparam api svabhāvataḥ hi a sbandhau etau śabda arthau ityādi bhāṣyam
tasya abhiprāyam āha bhinnā iti

original: ayamartha'--- yathā rajjusarpādiṣu bhinnadeśakālādhiṣṭhāneṣu kiñcid deśādi samaṃ nāsti,
analyzed: ayam artha yathā rajju sarpa ādiṣu bhinna deśa kāla adhiṣṭhāneṣu kiñcid deśa ādi samam na asti
evam tayoḥ śabda arthayoḥ
atas tadvat eva tau api svabhāvataḥ sambandhau iti
īdṛśī ca atra prayoga racanā śabda arthau
a sama deśa kāla tvāt
rajju ādi vat
tau eva na sama deśa kālau
bhinna deśa ādi adhiṣṭhāna upalambhāt
tadvat eva iti
iti upādhyāya sucaritamiśra kṛtau saṃbandha ākṣepa samāpta
